column1: PRE-ORDER HERE

In 2012, LUNATIK raised the bar for device protection with TAKTIK Extreme. We believed that consumers aspired to better quality accessories for their valuable devices than what currently existed on the market, and we were right.
Since then, TAKTIK has successfully protected thousands of iPhones for those who rely on their gear—people who serve in our military, police, firefighters, skydivers.

column1: The dangers of not using protection are clear. On average, 2 out of 3 smartphone users damage their phones. Repairing or replacing a damaged phone cost you time, money and potentially valuable data. Why risk it? Use the proper protection and enjoy your mobile life with confidence.

Some of you've asked if we will be offering TAKTIK 360 and AQUATIK for iPhone 6 Plus. The short answer is not right now. For the duration of this campaign, we are focused on manufacturing and shipping product for iPhone 6. Though we are currently in development on 6 Plus offerings, they will not be included as a a part of this campaign.  The best way to stay in the loop on future products is by signing up for LUNATIK's newsletter.
TAKTIK 360 is the evolution of our most protective case, TAKTIK Extreme. While maintaining our tough standards for impact and drop protection, TAKTIK 360

enhanced protection from water and dust (IP68). We listened to our customers and made installation easier with our patent pending compression closure system and single latch closure. The Corning® Gorilla® Glass lens adds an <span style=""letter-spacing: 0px
column2: >extra layer of screen protection without compromising a fluid touchscreen experience.
column3: >Fully prepared for life’s unexpected adventures, TAKTIK 360 is the ultimate in rugged protection.

column1: to go wherever life takes you, AQUATIK is sleek, refined, and fully water and

dust-proof. The low profile, easy-to-pocket, snap-in design compliments the slim form factor of the iPhone 6. AQUATIK achieves an advanced level of protection through case and membrane seals capable of keeping out water and dust (IP68). It’s our thinnest, ultra protective case yet.
NEED PROTECTION WHILE YOU WAIT? WE GET IT.

Redefining protection doesn't happen overnight. Developing and engineering cases as complex and protective as TAKTIK 360 and AQUATIK take time...and we're not cheaters. We got the iPhone data the same day you did, and we've been hard at work ever since. From development and tooling to testing and obtaining IP68 and MID-STD-810G ratings, we are committed to designing the best products possible. That will take a few months. However, we can appreciate that you want to get your device protected as soon as possible.

That's why we're offering to ship you our brand new SEISMIK case for iPhone 6, FREE of charge while you wait. Inspired by the airless tires on military vehicles, SEISMIK's shock-absorbing perimeter guards incredibly well from unexpected impacts and drops. So well, it actually bounces on impact.

Led by award-winning design entrepreneur Scott Wilson, founder of Chicago-based design and experience firm MINIMAL, the team has a proven track record in bringing disruptive solutions to market.

column1: WHY INDIEGOGO? HELP PUT OUR PLAN INTO ACTION

We care deeply about making the best products possible and are grateful to have an incredible community of uncompromising users to help inform our products. Users who won't settle and whose hobbies, passions, jobs or lives depend on having the best gear available.

No design is perfect. The quest for ultimate protection is an evolutionary, iterative and expensive process, and we've been continually learning, refining and pushing the limits since TAKTIK was first introduced for the iPhone 4s.
We are small design company, not a billion dollar case brand that has unlimited resources and distribution.
column2: >With your support, we are focused on shipping TAKTIK 360 and AQUATIK in Q1 of 2015. We are truly excited to share this journey with you. As we move further into the campaign, we will be providing frequent updates and insight into our development process. We value the journey as muc2h as the final product and hope you do to.

In 2012, LUNATIK raised the bar for device protection with TAKTIK Extreme. We believed that consumers aspired to better quality accessories for their valuable devices than what currently existed on the market, and we were right.

Since then, TAKTIK has successfully protected thousands of iPhones for those who rely on their gear—people who serve in our military, police, firefighters, skydivers. Users who won't settle and whose hobbies, passions, jobs or lives depend on having the best gear available. We care deeply about making products of the highest quality possible and are grateful to have an incredible community of uncompromising users to help inform our products.
Now with the launch of the new iPhone 6, we've raised the bar again.
Introducing TAKTIK 360 and AQUATIK, our most advance device protection ever.

Creating a fully submersible waterproof case that doesn't compromise the design and use of the iPhone is no small feat. We've designed airtight compression closure systems for both TAKTIK 360 + AQUATIK
protect from water and dust to an IEC rating of IP68.
means with all ports and membranes closed, your iPhone will stay safe and dry
for up to one-hour in water as deep as two meters. Stay connected while you take a worry-free swim in the pool or venture down the river in your kayak with confidence.

Our best-selling TAKTIK Extreme has saved thousands of phones from the most extreme impacts and drops. Our fans have proudly shared their wild survival stories—epic journeys, 3000 ft. skydive drops, 50mph tumbles off of motorcycles, cases even getting run over by cars and phones making it out unscathed. Each time reminding us why obsessing over the details really matters.

TAKTIK 360 + AQUATIK are designed to provide fearless drop, shock and impact protection that exceeds military standards (MIL-STD-810G). Most of all, you can go anywhere life takes you and not have to worry about whether your phone will survive your next epic adventure.

Let's face it. Every now and again, sh*t happens. The new iPhone is sleeker and slimmer than ever, but with its smooth rounded corners and larger screen, it is highly susceptible to accidental slips and drops. Whether your phone falls out of your pocket into uncharted toilet bowl territory or down the side of a mountain, TAKTIK 360 + AQUATIK are designed to protect from life's unexpected moments.

The dangers of not using protection are clear. On average, 2 out of 3 smartphone users damage their phones. Repairing or replacing a damaged phone cost you time, money and potentially valuable data. Why risk it? Use the proper protection and enjoy your mobile life with confidence.

Some of you've asked if we will be offering TAKTIK 360 and AQUATIK for iPhone 6 Plus. The short answer is not right now. For the duration of this campaign, we are focused on manufacturing and shipping product for iPhone 6. Though we are currently in development on 6 Plus offerings, they will not be included as a a part of this campaign.  The best way to stay in the loop on future products is by signing up for LUNATIK's newsletter.
TAKTIK 360 is the evolution of our most protective case, TAKTIK Extreme. While maintaining our tough standards for impact and drop protection, TAKTIK 360

enhanced protection from water and dust (IP68). We listened to our customers and made installation easier with our patent pending compression closure system and single latch closure. The Corning® Gorilla® Glass lens adds an extra layer of screen protection without compromising a fluid touchscreen experience. Fully prepared for life’s unexpected adventures, TAKTIK 360 is the ultimate in rugged protection.
to go wherever life takes you, AQUATIK is sleek, refined, and fully water and

dust-proof. The low profile, easy-to-pocket, snap-in design compliments the slim form factor of the iPhone 6. AQUATIK achieves an advanced level of protection through case and membrane seals capable of keeping out water and dust (IP68). It’s our thinnest, ultra protective case yet.
NEED PROTECTION WHILE YOU WAIT? WE GET IT.

Redefining protection doesn't happen overnight. Developing and engineering cases as complex and protective as TAKTIK 360 and AQUATIK take time...and we're not cheaters. We got the iPhone data the same day you did, and we've been hard at work ever since. From development and tooling to testing and obtaining IP68 and MID-STD-810G ratings, we are committed to designing the best products possible. That will take a few months. However, we can appreciate that you want to get your device protected as soon as possible.

That's why we're offering to ship you our brand new SEISMIK case for iPhone 6, FREE of charge while you wait. Inspired by the airless tires on military vehicles, SEISMIK's shock-absorbing perimeter guards incredibly well from unexpected impacts and drops. So well, it actually bounces on impact.

LUNATIK exploded onto the global tech scene in 2010 with TikTok + LunaTik watch kits and essentially sparked the global crowd-funding movement. Since LUNATIK's inception, we have positioned ourselves as a premium lifestyle brand that consistently challenges convention and exceeds consumer expectations. Led by award-winning design entrepreneur Scott Wilson, founder of Chicago-based design and experience firm MINIMAL, the team has a proven track record in bringing disruptive solutions to market.
WHY INDIEGOGO? HELP PUT OUR PLAN INTO ACTION

We care deeply about making the best products possible and are grateful to have an incredible community of uncompromising users to help inform our products. Users who won't settle and whose hobbies, passions, jobs or lives depend on having the best gear available.

No design is perfect. The quest for ultimate protection is an evolutionary, iterative and expensive process, and we've been continually learning, refining and pushing the limits since TAKTIK was first introduced for the iPhone 4s.

We are small design company, not a billion dollar case brand that has unlimited resources and distribution. With your support, we are focused on shipping TAKTIK 360 and AQUATIK in Q1 of 2015. We are truly excited to share this journey with you. As we move further into the campaign, we will be providing frequent updates and insight into our development process. We value the journey as muc2h as the final product and hope you do to.

column3: >The 3 Good Deeds Project will allow you to give back to society. Within just a few simple clicks of a button you can help make a difference.

column1: Children are our future. Many of us will have long discussions about the youth of today, but very little if anything is being done about it. The key to a bright and peaceful future is with the children, which is where the 3 Good Deeds Project comes into play.

If you really want to make a difference you can do so over the next 30 days. Not only will you be giving those children who’re facing a dismal future without any help, you’ll get something in return as well.

This initiative was created for those innocent children who face a bleak future of not enough food to eat, no clean water, no school books or school, no teacher and no access to reliable health care. People like you now have the opportunity to help out by just donating as little as $30. 

$30 dollars might pay for a family of three to eat at a Western fast food chain like McDonalds one time, but $30 in an impoverished developing nation in some of the world’s poorest parts of the world will provide a child with a month’s worth of clean pollutant-free water and food. Every few minutes a child dies somewhere because they don’t have the basic necessities to live and now you can help. But that’s not all
column2: those who choose to do one good deed and donate $30 will also get a token of appreciation in return – the World’s slimmest power bank. If you’re one of these people that forget to charge their phone before heading out, you will no longer have to worry with this great gadget that is slim enough just to pop into your wallet or purse.
column3: >If you’re feeling more generous, how about making a second good deed at the same time? Donators are given the chance to donate another $30 to the same child. Not only will you be giving your child enough food and clean water for a month, you’ll also provide safe and sanitary shelter for him or her. Again your good deed will not go unnoticed and you’ll get something in return for your goodwill, a small coin-sized GPS item finder. You’ll no longer have to worry about losing or ‘misplacing’ your car keys or other gadgets again. They’ll no longer be any excuses for running late because you can’t find this or that, and every time you do use your GPS item finder to locate your things that are MIA, you’ll be reminded of the wonderful good deed you did, you’ll remember that you helped give a child or children some hope.
column4:
/>

Why stop at two good deeds when you can make three? You’ll also have the opportunity to donate another $30 to help children in impoverished countries get a better start in life. By donating the same amount for the third time you’ll give a child the ultimate gift – education. $30 will give a child access to quality education for a period of 30 days. Again your kindness will not go unnoticed and in return you’ll receive a slim phone charging cable. This handy cable can easily be attached to your keychain so you’ll never have to go without a phone charger again. What’s more is this handy device has a built-in flash memory that will store up to 32 GB worth of files.

We often see images of poor and hungry children from across the world and despite these heartbreaking images touching us, very few people act. 

There are over 300 million starving children throughout the world. Every second a child dies due to starvation, disease and lack of clean drinking water. There are 7.6 million children under the age of 5 who will die in the next year due to them living in poverty, and for many of us these numbers are difficult to fathom.
column6: >It’s time to help. It’s time to take action. There are many who would state that we should help our own before we help others, but this is incomparable. These children in developing countries do not have access to clean drinking water. Instead they are forced to drink polluted and disease ridden water that will most likely kill them. Young girls are forced to wed because there are no other options. Small innocent children starve to death because there isn’t enough food…

column1: There’s always going to be those countries and people who are wealthier than others. No Matter how much we think we’re suffering, we’ve got to remember that there’s always going to be others worse off.

Every time the TV shows hungry crying children in pain we winch. Many things run through our minds. We wonder how it is that so many innocent children around the world are affected by the horrors of poverty. Thoughts consume us, but there’s always one question that lingers – How can I help? Can I really make a difference?
Yes you can make a difference. You can make a notable difference by participating in the 3 Good Deeds Project.

3GD has partnered up with some of the best and most reliable manufacturers and suppliers to ensure you’re rewarded for your good deeds.

The idea behind 3GD is simple. They aim to help and encourage people to spread more goodwill throughout the world. Their goal is to facilitate donating to a worthy cause - impoverished children, to make sure your donations get to the place they should. There’s no middleman and all money donated will go towards improving the lives of those children who are lacking some of the basic human necessities.
column3: >Every child deserves a shot at a future no matter what their socio-economic background is and now 3GD is giving you the chance to make that change. Very often charity organizations take a cut of the donated money, which has made more people question where their money is going and therefore fewer people are donating. 3GD is a non-profit organization that ensures that your money and good deeds will go to the places intended. There’s zero profit involved and 3GD has researched some of the most reputable charity organizations worldwide to collaborate with.

column1:
3GD knows how important it is to keep those involved up-to-date and the progress being made which is why a website will be launched in the immediate future to track absolutely everything from the amount of money you have donated over a period of time to what it is you’re proving. You’ll be able to see firsthand what kind of change you’ve helped create and you’ll also be able to see how and where your money is being spent. 

It’s highly likely that you’ve been wondering how you can make a difference. Now you can simply by taking part in the 3GD campaign to help impoverished children in some the poorest parts of the world. Do some good today because like Maya Angelou once said “No one has ever become poor by giving.”
Here are a few of the most commonly asked questions about 3GD. If you’ve got a question that isn’t covered here, please feel free to drop a message and we’ll get back to you with the answer ASAP.
3GD is a charity campaign that allows you to give back to the community by making donations in collaboration with some of the leading children’s charities.

Your good deeds will not go unnoticed. You’ll be duly rewarded depending on the number of good deeds. 3GD has teamed up with some leading manufacturers to help bring to you some cool gadgets. Your first good deed will earn you the world’s slimmest power bank that will allow you to charge your phone from wherever you go. Your second good deed will see you receiving a GPS item finder and your third good deed will get you a phone charging cable that also doubles up as a 32 GB storage device.
What phones does the 3GD app work with?

The 3GD app works with a number of devices including iPhones, Samsung phones, Blackberries and LG phones. Depending on your device, we’ll send you either an iPhone charger cable or a Micro USB connector in your preferred color.
How many different items can be tracked with the 3GD app?
It’s limitless, you’ll be able to track as many different items as you like with the 3GD app.
When will the finished product be available for shipping?
We’re working really hard to get everything in order and our estimated first shipping date is at the beginning of January 2015.
How can I choose my device color?
It’s super easy. After you’ve finalized your purchase, you’ll be sent a personalized welcome email that will ask you for your color preference.

As you know there are children living in poverty all over the world, however, we will be helping some of the well-known reputable children’s charities that work with children from some of the world’s harder hit countries in Africa and India. Our future goal is to widen our reach and work with children closer to home in the USA, UK and Australia if our funding allows it.
There are so many starving children in the world, how do you choose which ones to help?

Of course we can’t help everyone, but every little bit counts. We’re collaborating with some of the world’s top children’s charities that support those in poorer nations such as Feed the Hungry. Every month Feed the Hungry aid 79,000 children and we hope to improve this even more with the 3GD initiative.
How do we know that other people are making money out of this?

3GD was set up on the premise to help children and children only. Obviously, some of the money raised will have to go towards legal and manufacturing costs, however, majority of the money earned will go to those children in need. Our website will be updated on a regular basis which shows where the money raised will go and more specifically what the children will get.
Is the one month donation a one off?

No, not at all. You’re able to donate for however many months you would like and there are a number of different pricing plans that you can sign up for that will help the children. For now we have a few different rewards for your good deeds and we aim to bring you more rewards in the future.
Why did you decide to start such a charity without gain?

3GD begun with a simple intention – to try and make the world a better place. We’re starting off small and taking one step at a time. We know we can’t fix the world, but we can certainly improve it which is why we’ve decided to focus on helping the hungry to begin with. We’ve got more ideas for the coming years and hope to launch similar charitable projects in the future.
Will we receive a proof of payment?

Yes, absolutely! Everyone who does a good deed and donates will receive an official 3GD certificate stating how much they contributed. Your proof of payment will also be listed on the official website once all the deeds have been completed.
How much do we need to pay?
You choose the amount that suits you best. We have a number of different pricing options starting at $30. It all depends on how much goodwill you want to spread.
What’s the difference between your children’s charity and others?

We’re a community based charity and we strongly believe in teamwork. We don’t work as individuals and we do not offer this service to profit. Our main goal is to help the needy, but we also want you to feel good for your good deeds, which is why we offer something in return to say thank you.

By donating the same amount for the third time you’ll give a child the ultimate gift – education. $30 will give a child access to quality education for a period of 30 days. Again your kindness will not go unnoticed and in return you’ll receive a slim phone charging cable. This handy cable can easily be attached to your keychain so you’ll never have to go without a phone charger again. What’s more is this handy device has a built-in flash memory that will store up to 32 GB worth of files.We often see images of poor and hungry children from across the world and despite these heartbreaking images touching us, very few people act. There are over 300 million starving children throughout the world. Every second a child dies due to starvation, disease and lack of clean drinking water. There are 7.6 million children under the age of 5 who will die in the next year due to them living in poverty, and for many of us these numbers are difficult to fathom. It’s time to help. It’s time to take action. There are many who would state that we should help our own before we help others, but this is incomparable. These children in developing countries do not have access to clean drinking water. Instead they are forced to drink polluted and disease ridden water that will most likely kill them. Young girls are forced to wed because there are no other options. Small innocent children starve to death because there isn’t enough food…

column1: There’s always going to be those countries and people who are wealthier than others. No Matter how much we think we’re suffering, we’ve got to remember that there’s always going to be others worse off.

Every time the TV shows hungry crying children in pain we winch. Many things run through our minds. We wonder how it is that so many innocent children around the world are affected by the horrors of poverty. Thoughts consume us, but there’s always one question that lingers – How can I help? Can I really make a difference?
Yes you can make a difference. You can make a notable difference by participating in the 3 Good Deeds Project.

3GD has partnered up with some of the best and most reliable manufacturers and suppliers to ensure you’re rewarded for your good deeds.The idea behind 3GD is simple. They aim to help and encourage people to spread more goodwill throughout the world. Their goal is to facilitate donating to a worthy cause - impoverished children, to make sure your donations get to the place they should. There’s no middleman and all money donated will go towards improving the lives of those children who are lacking some of the basic human necessities. Every child deserves a shot at a future no matter what their socio-economic background is and now 3GD is giving you the chance to make that change. Very often charity organizations take a cut of the donated money, which has made more people question where their money is going and therefore fewer people are donating. 3GD is a non-profit organization that ensures that your money and good deeds will go to the places intended. There’s zero profit involved and 3GD has researched some of the most reputable charity organizations worldwide to collaborate with.

3GD knows how important it is to keep those involved up-to-date and the progress being made which is why a website will be launched in the immediate future to track absolutely everything from the amount of money you have donated over a period of time to what it is you’re proving. You’ll be able to see firsthand what kind of change you’ve helped create and you’ll also be able to see how and where your money is being spent. It’s highly likely that you’ve been wondering how you can make a difference. Now you can simply by taking part in the 3GD campaign to help impoverished children in some the poorest parts of the world. Do some good today because like Maya Angelou once said “No one has ever become poor by giving.” FAQs
Here are a few of the most commonly asked questions about 3GD. If you’ve got a question that isn’t covered here, please feel free to drop a message and we’ll get back to you with the answer ASAP.
3GD is a charity campaign that allows you to give back to the community by making donations in collaboration with some of the leading children’s charities.
Do I get anything in return?

Your good deeds will not go unnoticed. You’ll be duly rewarded depending on the number of good deeds. 3GD has teamed up with some leading manufacturers to help bring to you some cool gadgets. Your first good deed will earn you the world’s slimmest power bank that will allow you to charge your phone from wherever you go. Your second good deed will see you receiving a GPS item finder and your third good deed will get you a phone charging cable that also doubles up as a 32 GB storage device.
What phones does the 3GD app work with?

The 3GD app works with a number of devices including iPhones, Samsung phones, Blackberries and LG phones. Depending on your device, we’ll send you either an iPhone charger cable or a Micro USB connector in your preferred color.
How many different items can be tracked with the 3GD app?
It’s limitless, you’ll be able to track as many different items as you like with the 3GD app.
When will the finished product be available for shipping?
We’re working really hard to get everything in order and our estimated first shipping date is at the beginning of January 2015.
How can I choose my device color?
It’s super easy. After you’ve finalized your purchase, you’ll be sent a personalized welcome email that will ask you for your color preference.
Where are the sponsored children based?

As you know there are children living in poverty all over the world, however, we will be helping some of the well-known reputable children’s charities that work with children from some of the world’s harder hit countries in Africa and India. Our future goal is to widen our reach and work with children closer to home in the USA, UK and Australia if our funding allows it.
There are so many starving children in the world, how do you choose which ones to help?

Of course we can’t help everyone, but every little bit counts. We’re collaborating with some of the world’s top children’s charities that support those in poorer nations such as Feed the Hungry. Every month Feed the Hungry aid 79,000 children and we hope to improve this even more with the 3GD initiative.
How do we know that other people are making money out of this?

3GD was set up on the premise to help children and children only. Obviously, some of the money raised will have to go towards legal and manufacturing costs, however, majority of the money earned will go to those children in need. Our website will be updated on a regular basis which shows where the money raised will go and more specifically what the children will get.
Is the one month donation a one off?

No, not at all. You’re able to donate for however many months you would like and there are a number of different pricing plans that you can sign up for that will help the children. For now we have a few different rewards for your good deeds and we aim to bring you more rewards in the future.
Why did you decide to start such a charity without gain?

3GD begun with a simple intention – to try and make the world a better place. We’re starting off small and taking one step at a time. We know we can’t fix the world, but we can certainly improve it which is why we’ve decided to focus on helping the hungry to begin with. We’ve got more ideas for the coming years and hope to launch similar charitable projects in the future.
Will we receive a proof of payment?

Yes, absolutely! Everyone who does a good deed and donates will receive an official 3GD certificate stating how much they contributed. Your proof of payment will also be listed on the official website once all the deeds have been completed.
How much do we need to pay?
You choose the amount that suits you best. We have a number of different pricing options starting at $30. It all depends on how much goodwill you want to spread.
What’s the difference between your children’s charity and others?

We’re a community based charity and we strongly believe in teamwork. We don’t work as individuals and we do not offer this service to profit. Our main goal is to help the needy, but we also want you to feel good for your good deeds, which is why we offer something in return to say thank you.",14.0,0,"1 Campaign

Battery Anxiety is everyone’s problem.  But have you heard of

without a mobile device or beyond mobile phone contact. In today’s hectic
environment, people don’t just want a phone, they need a phone. The average
mobile user would rather lose a pinky-finger than being left stranded without
the ChargemSpot! The reality is that with mobile
compulsion and addiction on the rise, 3G and 4G high speed mobile networks

Battery Anxiety is everyone’s problem.  But have you heard of
Nomophobia? Nomophobia is an abbreviation for “No-Mobile-Phone
phobia, describing a growing fear in today’s world- the fear of being
without a mobile device or beyond mobile phone contact. In today’s hectic
environment, people don’t just want a phone, they need a phone. The average
mobile user would rather lose a pinky-finger than being left stranded without
the ChargemSpot! The reality is that with mobile
compulsion and addiction on the rise, 3G and 4G high speed mobile networks
and unlimited talk, text and web, as well as Wi-Fi neighborhoods and
underground subway stations now offering wireless voice and data, the need
for a universal battery recharging with relevant signage ecosystem is upon us
If businesses truly want to engage you and be rewarded with
your loyalty and brand appeal, shouldn’t they market to you what you really
want to see? The next generation of personalized digital signage needs to be
much smarter and interactive.  Behold the ChargemSpot! Wouldn’t you like
to see drink and foodstuff ads that don’t misjudge you and just target you
based on the obvious demographic and interest information?  Forget
advertisers assuming they know you will be interested in their unlooked-for
products. Personal social data is becoming rich enough for something much
cooler and innovative, because it’s all about captivation not confinement!
ansiedad que causa el quedar con la batería del móvil o dispositivo
descargada, es un problema que nos afecta a todos. Pero alguna vez ha
usada para describir el temor que está afectando a más y más personas cada
día. Es el temor de estar sin un teléfono móvil o fuera del alcance de
ChargemSpot!  La realidad es que con el crecimiento alarmante de adicción
a teléfonos móviles, las infinitas opciones de  redes móviles de alta
velocidad 3G y 4G,  paquetes de llamadas, mensajes de texto y navegación
ilimitados, así como el “Wi-fi en el vecindario” y hasta en el subterráneo un
sistema de recarga universal para baterías de dispositivos móviles se hace
la protesta de “No Más Publicidad Irrelevante”!
Si diferentes  empresas quieren hacerlos participes
de de sus servicios y usuarios de sus productos, no deberían ellos entonces
crear publicidad para lo que realmente queremos ver? La nueva generación de
publicidad personalizada digital debería ser mucho más inteligente e
ChargemSpot!  No le gustaría ver publicidad de bebida y centros de comida
que no solo usan su muy obvia información demográfica para venderle un
producto? Olvide ya los anuncios de las  empresas que llegan a la
conclusión errada que usted si estará interesado en sus productos no
deseados. La data social personal se está cambiando permitiendo la creación
de algo mucho más innovador, porque ya todo se trata sobre la información
telling you everything... just not showing you

product exploration started with one very simple question:
can the routine occurrence of charging in public also be a PRIVATE experience
that will allow YOU to be in control of marketing messages?
The Chargem system involves five years of analytical
insights gathered over time as we pondered the idea, our   long term
vision and passion to make this a reality.  What really matters to us,
in the end, more than idea itself, is sound execution.  And, the fact
that we know you’ll love this product!
That would be truly awe-inspiring to us!  We would get to
see our market validated and our vision come to life with the support of fans
who care. With the additional funds we will begin to develop marketing tools
in preparation for launch. First month launch and operational costs includes
installation of the ChargemSpot.  Additional funds will also kickoff
research and development phase for the other intended mobile service
We will remain optimistic regardless.  We will continue
to find the means to get our product off the ground with alternate funding
options, at least at first.  Many traditional capital sources are more
conservative than they used to be about when and to whom they'll loan
money.  Finding traditional investors takes work, time, and money we can
ill afford.  We may hear a lot of “No’s”—but that just makes the first
time we hear “Yes!” that much more exciting.

Mobile device makers are forced to spend enormous efforts on
battery life marketing stunts and on creating various engineering “cheats” to
get the maximum battery life and performance for our most favored gadgets.
With mobile compulsion and addiction on the rise, experts agree that a
commercially viable and safe breakthrough in battery capacity is not expected
within the next 3 to 4 years (and will not be available to the mass market
for a number of years after that).

About us and the campaign
We are two guys from Hungary, Budapest who love creating things for our tabletop wargame hobby.
My name is Gergely. I am running the Facebook page ""
column2: >Gregsters's Lab in 6mm""
column3: > where you can already see some of my other creations.

column1: I did the bunker design and my friend, Daniel is doing the resin casting.
I am an active Epic:Armageddon player, painter, scratch-builder who ventured recently into the world of digital creation.
I started 3D not long ago as a fun side project, but after showing my first sketches I got positive feedback and decided to share this one with other gamers.
My friend Daniel has lot of experience in resin casting. On his Facebook page you can check all the things he has been commissioned to cast. Without him, this would stay in digital form only.

We decided to give Indiegogo a try to make the models available to gamers like us and to collect funds to be able to print and cast as many parts as possible. If you support us, we will be able to realize more and more designs and launch more campaigns in the future.

This bunker system could be a nice addition to any 6mm scale tabletop wargame. Scenery always adds a lot of atmosphere to any game and greatly contributes to the gaming experience.
With this campaign we wish to collect funds for printing the final models at Shapeways in Frosted Ultra Detail quality. We tried this material before and it works fine for master models.
We also need the funds to buy all the resin and the rubber for the molding and most likely to build more pressure chambers.
As we reach stretch goals, we can print even more models and add bonus items for the contributors. If we have all the masters ready, we can cast them all in resin for you.

One campaign, two systems...wait a sec... THREE

When we reached the 50% funding, we activated two new perks. On the right you can spot the Sigma Star Systems walled compound and forward base.

So you have more options, depending on your needs.
As the tests were really good, we add now the GreyDark Industries research center to the available options.
Each square is 10mm X 10mm
MAKE SURE YOU CHECK THE ADD-ON PACK AT THE VERY END!
We set up several levels of contribution, each level containing more and more elements. All elements will be resin!
For size comparison, please have a look at the following picture. Corridors are around 8mm high.

Enough parts to create a small outpost, or fortified base.
Contains 39 pieces total:
• 18 connectors that link the corridors and other features
The image on the top of the page and on our video in the gallery shows a possible Private level bunker layout.
Please do not forget to add the shipping cost to your contribution. Please see bottom of the page or the FAQ.
A well defended military outopost. Contains 71 pieces total:
• 35 connectors that link the corridors and other features
Please do not forget to add the shipping cost to your contribution. Please see bottom of the page or the FAQ.

Enough parts to build a bunker system that would stop an attacking army. 
Contains 115 pieces total:
• 55 connectors that link the corridors and other features
Please do not forget to add the shipping cost to your contribution. Please see bottom of the page or the FAQ.
Cover your table half with bunkers and corridors. Contains 350 pieces total:
• 170 connectors that link the corridors and other features
Please do not forget to add the shipping cost to your contribution. Please see bottom of the page or the FAQ.
Go crazy and build the ultimate attack breaker. Contains 700 pieces in total:
• 340 connectors that link the corridors and other features

When arriving to the desert planet of Sigma IV, the first dropships immediately deployed pre-fabricated walls to block sand blows and possible hostile forces.

Walled compund - 76 pieces total
You can use these pieces to build many types of wall systems. Here is just one example what you could do:
The sensor tower in the middle will be available in the add-on pack later.

GreyDark Industries specializes in high-tech military hardware. Their research stations are protected with top-notch troops and heavy weaponry. Usually located in desolate places, rarely can you see one with your own eyes.
We are happy that the tests came out well, so from now on, you can also get these two new perks:
The pictures are just examples. Only your imagination is the limit what you build from the elements.
When we reached the 50% funding we started discussing the issue of the stretch goals.
We came to the conclusion, that we will abolish the stretch goals and make things available beforehand.
[As we turn into the last 40 days of the campaing, the Sigma Star Systems walled compound will become available this Wednesday. (see pictures in the gallery...) ]
In the last 30 days we activate the add-on packs, so you will have access to the command bunker, the sentry tower and all the other items that were planned as stretch goals. Not active yet!
[As a special surprise, we plan to add some more terrain as a perk. Here is the preview of the GreyDark Industries research station.] It is now active!
We are introducing 4 add-on packs. Each pack gives you certain number of points that you can spend on the below add-on items.

Add-on pack Nr. 4 --- 50 EUR = 125 points

The add on packs have free postage included.

Bonuses
We are giving you free points to spend, based on the level we reach with out campaign. Calculate with the total amount you contributed, postage included.
2000 EUR reached- you get 5% of your total pledge in points as bonus
(e.g if you spent 100 EUR, then you get 5 extra points, if you spent 20 EUR, you get 1 point) - GOAL REACHED
3000 EUR reached - you get 10% of your total pledge in points as bonus
(e.g if you spent 100 EUR, then you get 10 extra points, if you spent 20 EUR, you get 2 points) - LOCKED
4000 EUR reached - you get 15% of your total pledge in points as bonus
(e.g if you spent 100 EUR, then you get 15 extra points, if you spent 20 EUR, you get 3 points) - LOCKED
Rounding: when calculating, follow this method e.g. 1.5 is 1 but 1.6 is 2
You will be asked at the end of the campaign to list your points spending, including bonuses. We will contact each of you individually.
CLICK HERE: You can also see everything in this Google document! Includes measurements of the items too!
Please check the Google document for the exact size, as the pictures below are correct in size relative to each other!

The delays we calculated with might come from the shortage of casting material, technical problems. To avoid most of these we try to have more than one source and will have multiple pressure chambers to be able to work even if one or two might fail. Even if there is an overwhelming interest, we think we can adjust the production by setting up even more pressure chambers.
We already have some of the basic elements printed and casting these can start when the campaign starts.

We will have help with the packing and posting, so if everything is done, we will pump out as many packages as possible per day. We will use registered shipping only to avoid untraceable, lost packages.
If you do not need any bunkers for your tables, we appreciate if you share the page for others who might like it.
Have a look at the first test casts and a new terrain piece using the bunker elements.
Do not forget to check the gallery tab on top!!
How do I add the extra cost for shipping?
When you select a perk, you will land on a new page where you can add additional gift to your original pledge. Here you can add the shipping described on the page.

See example below. Select the Custom option. E.g. if you want to add 30 EUR for the sergeant level plus shipping, then select the additional gift (custom) and add the 7 EUR shipping there. The total would be then 37 EUR
If you have not added the shipping when you selected the perk, you can also add the extra shipping by using the 1 EUR level (plus the CUSTOM) button to send the total shipping.

Rounding: when calculating, follow this method e.g. 1.5 is 1 but 1.6 is 2
You will be asked at the end of the campaign to list your points spending, including bonuses. We will contact each of you individually.
CLICK HERE: You can also see everything in this Google document! Includes measurements of the items too!
Please check the Google document for the exact size, as the pictures below are correct in size relative to each other!

The delays we calculated with might come from the shortage of casting material, technical problems. To avoid most of these we try to have more than one source and will have multiple pressure chambers to be able to work even if one or two might fail. Even if there is an overwhelming interest, we think we can adjust the production by setting up even more pressure chambers.We already have some of the basic elements printed and casting these can start when the campaign starts.

We will have help with the packing and posting, so if everything is done, we will pump out as many packages as possible per day. We will use registered shipping only to avoid untraceable, lost packages.
If you do not need any bunkers for your tables, we appreciate if you share the page for others who might like it.
Have a look at the first test casts and a new terrain piece using the bunker elements.
Do not forget to check the gallery tab on top!!
How do I add the extra cost for shipping?
When you select a perk, you will land on a new page where you can add additional gift to your original pledge. Here you can add the shipping described on the page.

See example below. Select the Custom option. E.g. if you want to add 30 EUR for the sergeant level plus shipping, then select the additional gift (custom) and add the 7 EUR shipping there. The total would be then 37 EUR
If you have not added the shipping when you selected the perk, you can also add the extra shipping by using the 1 EUR level (plus the CUSTOM) button to send the total shipping.
We will collect all frequently asked questions in this document and answer them.
You can also reach us at the Tactical Command forum:
Forum topic over at Tactical Command",23.0,0,"6 Campaigns

0,"

UPDATE - Announcing ""double perks"".  For only $5 more, you will receive double perks.  So, if you order one Jib Case, you will receive two for only $5 more.  If you order four, you will receive eight for only $5 more.  Be sure to choose the perk you want plus the $5 Double Perk.

Watch the video above and then choose a perk to the right to get your very own JIB Case.  Don't worry about carrying your wallet, cash or gift cards.  Just carry your phone and Tap To Pay™ with Jib!  Paying with your phone is easy with Jib. Simply link your Jib to any Visa or MasterCard® debit card, PayPal or bank account, pop it on your phone and tap to pay.


THE JIB STORY

I have a problem. I have a daughter too, however, she's not the problem. My problem is three-fold...

First, paying with your phone is a pain! To pay with your phone in America, you must first have a phone with the appropriate technology. Plus, you typically need to download, install and register a mobile application. Then, you need to perform as many as 10-12 steps such as waking your phone, entering your passcode, launching an app, logging in and usually a few other steps before you can actually pay for something using your phone.

Second, Merchants pay approximately 2%, or more, of transaction value, plus other fees, when consumers don't use cash. Currently totaling more than $50 Billion dollars each year, just in the U.S. Even though the merchant incurs the fee, they pass it along to consumers in their cost of goods sold. 

Last, but not least, there is too much plastic out there and it often winds up in our oceans - polluting the environment and killing our planet! 

JIB's solution is safer, faster, more convenient and more friendly to the environment than paying with cash, checks or plastic cards. Especially for my teenage daughter, whom I would rather see paying securely with her phone instead of carrying around cash.
column6:
schema=vimeo"" width=""580"">

OVERVIEW

Interchange fee is a term used in the payment card industry to describe a fee paid between banks for the acceptance of card based transactions. 

In recent years, interchange fees have become a controversial issue as well as the subject of regulatory and antitrust investigations. Many large merchants such as Wal-Mart have the ability to negotiate fee prices. However, while some merchants prefer cash or PIN-based debit cards, most believe they cannot realistically refuse to accept the major network-branded cards. This holds true even when their interchange-driven fees exceed profit margins. Some countries, such as Australia, have established significantly lower interchange fees, although according to a U.S. Government Accountability study, the savings enjoyed by merchants were not passed along to consumers. The fees are also the subject of several ongoing lawsuits in the United States.

For one example of how interchange functions, imagine a consumer making a $100 purchase with a credit card. For that $100 item, the retailer would get approximately $98. The remaining $2 gets divided up. About $1.75 would go to the card issuing bank (defined as interchange), $0.18 would go to Visa or MasterCard, and the remaining $0.07 would go to the retailer's merchant account provider.

Merchants should not have to pay the big banks 2% of their sales to accept plastic payments. My goal is to put some of that $50-Billion back into the economy while reducing the number of plastic cards that ultimately end up in our landfills or oceans.

Together, with your backing, we will do this!


URBAN DICTIONARY

Verb. To jib. The act of maneuvering a bicycle, skateboard, snowboard or skis in a tricky manner on top of and around structures such as stumps, rocks, stairs, railings, rooftops, etc. When you are playing around, showing off, jumping, flipping, hopping, etc. you are jibbing.

Jibbing: A snowboarding style referring to the use of rails, tables, trees, etc. as obstacles. Also known as: bonking or tapping.


WHAT IS JIB

A world where your phone will replace your wallet is one step closer with the release of new iPhone cases from San Diego-based Jib Technologies, Inc.

JIB utilizes Near Field Communications (NFC) wireless technology
column7:
this contactless payment technology feature allows users to tap their phone on contactless payment terminals without the need to physically swipe or insert a card into a point-of-sale device.

That means iPhone 4/4s and iPhone 5/5s owners with JIB can ""bonk"" or ""tap"" to make payments at locations compatible with Isis, Google Wallet, Visa payWave, MasterCard PayPass and American Express ExpressPay.

At Jamba Juice and Sports Authority, for example, users can tap a JIB-equipped iPhone to a checkout terminal to make a payment, rather than pulling out a credit card or cash.

You're never too young for JIB! You can order JIB even if you are under 18. During the activation process you will be asked to provide the e-mail address of a parent. This parent will receive an e-mail in which they will be asked to approve the account. Once we receive their approval, your JIB account will be ready to use.

With JIB, you can Tap to Pay™ with your phone.
column12:
schema=vimeo"" width=""580"">

HOW JIB WORKS

A tiny microchip and radio antenna embedded in your JIB case transmits your payment details wirelessly to a secure high-speed contactless reader at the point of sale. The reader then verifies your transaction with JIB's reliable network and indicates approval almost instantly.

The chip can only be read when in close proximity (within a few centimeters) to the secure reader, and it must be correctly oriented to be processed. After waving your JIB in front of it, the reader will light up and beep to inform you that your information has been received and is being processed through JIB’s secure network.


BACKGROUND

I once read, ""If you don't like something, change it"".  

I don't like being charged $16 per month by my bank to use and keep track of my own money.  So, I created JIB to change the way people bank and keep track of their own money. 

According to Bank of America's web-site, their ""simple, straightforward checking"" account has a Monthly Maintenance fee of $12.00.  If you are not careful, they also hit you with a bunch of other fees.  For example, you may incur fees for using ATMs, wire transfers or monthly statements that include a printed check image.  With a Bank of America simple, straightforward checking account, you pay a $35 NSF: Returned Item fee for each transaction that does not go through.  Plus, you pay another $35 if your account stays overdrawn for 5 consecutive business days.

JIB never charges you to use your own money.  In fact, JIB will reward you for using your own money with things like free music or video downloads and free skateboards or snowboards as well as discounts on the things you buy at your favorite merchants. 

JIB is not just a great iPhone case that enables you to Tap To Pay™.  JIB is like your bank.  In fact, JIB is better than your bank.  JIB does not charge you monthly fees.  JIB does not charge you ATM fees.  JIB does not charge you NSF fees.  JIB does not charge you ANY fees and your money with JIB is FDIC insured, up to $250,000.  Your money with PayPal is not insured by the FDIC.


GETTING STARTED USING JIB

1. Receive, register and activate your JIB.

2. Top Up your JIB.

3. Tap To Pay™.


HOW TO PAY USING JIB

Paying with your phone is easy.

To use JIB, just tap your phone on the universal contactless symbol on the reader at checkout. When you see the green light and hear the beep, your payment has been accepted. That's it – you're ready to go.

Step-1: Hold the back of your phone over the contactless symbol on the terminal at checkout.

Step-2: There is no step #2. That's it! No app to download, no fumbling with cash, cards or coupons. JIB is simpler and safer to use than credit, debit or gift cards.

Just look for this symbol at checkout:

JIB is designed to simplify your life, save valuable time, and even help reduce fraud. Here's how: 

• No swiping makes checkout faster and easier

• You remain in control of your phone during the transaction, reducing the risk of fraud

• You'll enjoy the same multiple layers of security protection you get with traditional Visa or MasterCard debit cards, including Zero Liability, which ensures you are not responsible for fraudulent or unauthorized transactions 

• Transactions are processed through the same, reliable payment network as magnetic stripe transactions.


JIB IS SAFE

Encryption technology and JIB zero liability protection makes using contactless at checkout as safe as swiping. And contactless has built-in safeguards to help prevent unwanted purchases.

Encryption—unique to every purchase—protects your transaction data, and your card or device never leaves your hand, reducing the risk of card loss or counterfeit. What’s more, safeguards are in place to bill you only once if you accidentally tap twice. So your contactless-enabled JIB card or device is one of the most secure ways to pay.


JIB IS SIMPLE

JIB is accepted globally at all kinds of merchants including: retail stores, fast-food restaurants, pharmacies, transit points of entry, grocery and convenience stores. You’ll even find contactless in taxicabs and vending machines.

JIB contactless technology lets you make everyday purchases quickly and safely with just a tap of your phone wherever you see the universal contactless symbol. So checkout is easier than ever, and it’s faster than fumbling with cash.


JIB IS SECURE

JIB adds a level of security since your mobile device never leaves your hand when you Tap To Pay™.

With JIB, your payment data is stored in a microchip so you never reveal your account number or PIN, and you can take it with you without carrying a wallet.

JIB uses secure chip processing which means a number of layered cryptographic techniques protect you against skimming, counterfeiting, transaction replay types of fraud, and tactics such as electronic pick-pocketing.


WHERE WE ARE AT NOW

We’ve paid for the design, engineering, patents and tooling. We have gone through a rigorous manufacturer development process and now have a partner with the capability and facility to produce the first batch of JIB Cases to our high standards.

The manufacturing partner that we have picked is a very experienced and well-respected mobile phone accessory company that makes high quality protective cases for brands you would recognize and respect. Our finished tooling can support a volume of 10,000 JIB Cases per month. 

We’ve put everything we have into this project. We’ve sacked our savings, maxed out our credit cards and even raided my kids' college funds to bring this project to where we are today. 

Everything is ready! We have the design, engineering, patents and tooling complete. By backing this project you are a vital part of the process and literally the final step in bringing this project to market. 

Please check out the backer rewards on the right and lets bring JIB to market in time for back to school and the holiday shopping season. 

Again… Design is complete... Tooling is finished… We are ready to bring you this great new iPhone case that will enable you to Tap To Pay™. 

Reserve your JIB now and please share this video with your friends. 

Thank you! 


PERKS

$20.00 - Only the first 250 JIB Cases are available at this price.  
$30.00 - Hurry! Only the next 500 JIB Cases are available at this price.
$40.00 - Act fast! Only the next 750 JIB Cases are available at this price.
$50.00 - One (1) JIB CASE for your iPhone 5/5s or iPhone 4/4s.
$60.00 - BUDDY 2-PACK: Only 50 two-packs are available at this price.
$70.00 - BUDDY 2-PACK: Only 100 two-packs are available at this price.
$80.00 - BUDDY 2-PACK: Only 150 two-packs are available at this price.
$90.00 - BUDDY 2-PACK: Only 200 two-packs are available at this price.
$100.00 - BUDDY 2-PACK: Get a 2-Pack and pay only $50 each.
$120.00 - FAMILY 4-PACK: Only 25 Family 4-packs available at this price.
$140.00 - FAMILY 4-PACK: Only 50 Family 4-packs available at this price.
$160.00 - FAMILY 4-PACK: Only 75 Family 4-packs available at this price.
$180.00 - FAMILY 4-PACK: Only 100 Family 4-packs available at this price.
$200.00 - FAMILY 4-PACK: This is a great deal for INTERNATIONAL backers to save on shipping.
$250.00 - RESELLER PACK:  Get ten (10) JIB CASES for iPhone 5/5s or iPhone 4/4s in assorted colors. Also available as College Ambassador Pack! Email for details.
$500.00 - DISTRIBUTOR PACK:  Get twenty-five (25) JIB CASES for iPhone 5/5s or iPhone 4/4s in assorted colors. Also available as College Ambassador Pack. 


RISKS AND CHALLENGES

We've spent most of the last year working with our partners to mitigate as many risks as possible, yet we know there will still be hurdles along the way. We will always be transparent with our community about challenges, including these:

Ship date: We have built in extra time for the manufacturing process and are confident we will ship by the projected dates, but there is always a chance that things will take longer than planned.

Product changes: As we refine JIB based on additional community feedback and more product testing, slight changes may be made. We'll only make changes that enhance the product experience.

Supplier coordination: We work with a variety of suppliers to source the best materials and ensure the product is developed correctly. Each supplier has its own challenges, which may affect its partners, including us.

column3:
>
Thank you so so so much for your contributions in a single day we made enough to cover costs from here and a donation from elsewhere. You guys are the best and Kay will thank you all personally. She has asked me to put up a post to ask for no more donations, so I will say this. We are currently at £400 ( okay, £401) and every donation received after this point will go directly to the charity Special Effect. Special Effect is a charity that brings games and technology to kids with special needs so that they can just be kids and enjoy themselves. Their website is at http://www.specialeffect.org.uk

>Every penny given here on out will go to the charity (I will post up screenshots once the funding cycle has ended) so if you want to just donate to send a message to show love, anything you give will be handed over to people who can use it in funding happiness in other people's lives.
column5: >Again, thank you from the bottom of our hearts. As I said below, I've always believed that there are many more good than bad people out there, it took no time at all for me to be proven 100% right.

column3:
>
Kay Hardman is awesome. Kay can often be found in FanBoy 3 generally running around, setting up tournaments, sorting product, making the place just a more fun, pleasant place to be. Dig the big shiny fans in the back? Thank Kay. Been part of a pony tournament? All Kay. That new order and reservation system?  Yup.

column1: Outside of FanBoy, you know the kind of awesome guy Kay is, so I don't need to preach to you, but you know she's the sort who will do anything in their power to help you out if you need it.

Also, extremely bad track record when it comes to mobile phone ownership. People really like the idea of her not having a phone. From being pick pocketed in London, to grab and runs, it hasn't been a good time to be a phone owned by Kay Hardman. Which brings us to yesterday. In a crowded FanBoy 3, with Kay stood in front of the counter and Dave sat behind it, some bad guy managed to distract their attentions and swipe it before getting away. He was calculated, opportunistic and knew what he was doing.
A two year contract for a galaxy s6 and she hadn't had it for a week before this guy took it. I'm asking you guys to help me change this.

This fund is to replace the stolen phone. With working, moving house and being in the middle of an MA dissertation, the inconvenience and worry and stress this cause was truly not needed. So let's try and get a good thing to stem from this bad thing.

I'm always telling people the thing that I believe deep in my heart most of all. There are some people who do bad things in the world, but the good guys outweigh them by many many factors of magnitude. Please spare a little and let me prove that my view isn't as naive as people tell me.

Any money that comes in will go directly to replacing the phone. If the police find her stolen phone then all money will be given back to donors, or to charity if the donation was given anonymously and I can't tell who it is from.

This fund was set up by Chris Slater, that odd chap with the bike and the pony tail and in no way asked for by Kay. In fact I'm setting this up whilst she is asleep so that I can't get duffed by her for it. It will make her very shy knowing this has been made, but it's a good cause for a super good guy.

Please help, chip in what you can if you can. If everyone puts in a little, we'd be there in no time. If you can't afford it, then spread this to others who you think might want to, and just send Kay a virtual hug and a ""yo, what's up?""

","*update!*Thank you so so so much for your contributions in a single day we made enough to cover costs from here and a donation from elsewhere. You guys are the best and Kay will thank you all personally. She has asked me to put up a post to ask for no more donations, so I will say this. We are currently at £400 ( okay, £401) and every donation received after this point will go directly to the charity Special Effect. Special Effect is a charity that brings games and technology to kids with special needs so that they can just be kids and enjoy themselves. Their website is at http://www.specialeffect.org.uk

Every penny given here on out will go to the charity (I will post up screenshots once the funding cycle has ended) so if you want to just donate to send a message to show love, anything you give will be handed over to people who can use it in funding happiness in other people's lives. Again, thank you from the bottom of our hearts. As I said below, I've always believed that there are many more good than bad people out there, it took no time at all for me to be proven 100% right. ***********

Kay Hardman is awesome. Kay can often be found in FanBoy 3 generally running around, setting up tournaments, sorting product, making the place just a more fun, pleasant place to be. Dig the big shiny fans in the back? Thank Kay. Been part of a pony tournament? All Kay. That new order and reservation system?  Yup.
Outside of FanBoy, you know the kind of awesome guy Kay is, so I don't need to preach to you, but you know she's the sort who will do anything in their power to help you out if you need it.

Also, extremely bad track record when it comes to mobile phone ownership. People really like the idea of her not having a phone. From being pick pocketed in London, to grab and runs, it hasn't been a good time to be a phone owned by Kay Hardman. Which brings us to yesterday. In a crowded FanBoy 3, with Kay stood in front of the counter and Dave sat behind it, some bad guy managed to distract their attentions and swipe it before getting away. He was calculated, opportunistic and knew what he was doing.
A two year contract for a galaxy s6 and she hadn't had it for a week before this guy took it. I'm asking you guys to help me change this.

would get minimal mistakes. However, if you asked me a week later to recite
that same Juz without reviewing, I would get mistakes, especially repeat ones.

FAQ

    How can we contact you?

    Feel free to email us anytime at hello@quranacademy.io

    When does the free subscription reward start?

    The free subscription reward will start from the day we launch our complete product. Let's say you pledged $75 on our campaign, you are entitled to 2 years free subscription. You will be on our private and public beta, and your 1 year subscription will start from the day we launch our complete product in June 2015 insha'Allah.

    Will the App be free?

    The app will be free during our beta launches. However, once we launch the final product by June 2015, we will start charging a monthly or yearly subscription. Don't worry, the App will be super affordable insha'Allah:)

    When are you launching the final product?

    We are planning on launching the complete product in all devices (iPhone, Android, iPad) by June 2015. We are a technology company so we'll always be adding more features as we get more and more customer feedback  :)

    What features will be included in the final product?

    We will have a number of dynamic features:

    1)  Create memorization lessons

    2)  Track your mistakes

    3) Take Adaptive Quizzes to reinforce weaker memorization areas

    4) Connect with Qur'an memorizers so they can track mistakes for you 

    5) View Common Mutashaabihaats (similar verses with subtle differences) per Juz

    6) We'll have a Dashboard that displays robust Analytics on your memorization

    What are you launching in August?

    In August, we are planning on launching our private beta so that we can test user behavior and collect feedback. It will be an iPad launch only and will be marketed to a closed group (including our backers).

    What's happening by January 2015?

    By January 2015, we are planning on launching our public beta across all devices (iPhone, Android, iPad). 

    Are you launching a Speech Recognition Engine?

    A Speech Recognition System will automatically point out user's mistakes and prompt them when the mistakes are made. If we reach our stretch goal of $400,000, we would launch this feature by the end of 2015. 

    Also, one thing to keep in mind is that the Speech Recognition feature will not be 100% accurate. We are confident that it can be 90% accurate through time. As we start collecting more and more data on users, the Engine will become more and more accurate and through time, it will be pretty robust insha'Allah.

    Are you planning on launching in multiple languages?

    insha'Allah that's the goal. We will certainly launch in multiple languages over time. We are planning to scale to other common languages spoken in Muslim countries by Fall 2015.

Millions of Qur’an memorizers ALWAYS make mistakes when
reviewing the Qur’an for over a decade, and talking to hundreds of Qur’an
memorizers, I realized that EVERYBODY faces the same issue of always making

big personal struggle that’s faced by all memorizers. Every Qur’an memorizer
will testify that Qur’an memorization is not nearly as difficult as retaining
what you’ve memorized. You have to constantly revise what you memorized or you
I’ve been really digging deep into this problem and
one of the main reasons that people constantly make mistakes is that they don’t

have much actionable data on their mistakes.Here’s what I mean by that. Currently, people track their mistakes by drawing lines in the Qur'an on where they are messing up. Some people draw lines while others draw circles around their mistakes, or a combination of both. Below is an example of how most people track their mistakes.                                            Unfortunately, this method is not so effective to strengthen our weaker memorization areas. Memorizers need smart data on where they need improvement and where they are making repeat mistakes.This is why Qur'an Academy was born.  It's a humble effort to provide smarter data to help folks become more effective with their memorization & revision insha'Allah!
Qur'an Academy is very flexible and is meant for anybody who wants to memorize at least some portion of the Qur’an, no
matter how old or young you are.
