From the guys who brought you the worlds FIRST injection molded, low-cost, open-source 3D printer.
Watch the H1 in action on Ustream. We will be posting announcements during this campaign when we will be print LIVE with the new H1.1
SeeMeCNC is back, with an updated version of our H-1 3D printers

Building upon our first version of the open-source Huxley, the H-1, we have re-designed many of the more difficult parts of building and adjusting our machines to make it easier and faster to assemble. We have also improved the bearing design of the origional reprap
column2: /reprap.org/huxley"" rel=""noopener nofollow"" target=""_blank"" title=""RepRap Huxley"">Huxley, from which the H in our machines name came from.  We have re-designed the bearing assemblies on all axes to use bronze linear bushings instead of the more complicated and sometimes frustrating triple plastic bearings of the origional. Along with the new design improvements, we have listened to what a lot of people were saying, and offer the awesome RAMPS 1.4 boards by Ultimachine. The RAMPS setup is for those who want a dedicated 3D printer control solution.

column1: How we are able to do it

Thanks to all of our contributors and success of our first campaign, we have managed to get set up and stock components we do not manufacture, like motors.  While we CNC machine and injection mold all our own parts in house, there is still a fair amount of stuff we have to buy in quantity to keep making the most affordable DIY 3D printer kits in the world. Also, because of these contributions, we are able to keep working on making it easier to get going in the world of 3D printing.  Another product of the success of our first campaign was, we gained a great deal of knowledge from our contributors, and are bringing many of their suggestions and ideas to life in this next version of our machine. Whether you have one of our origional H-1 machines, or are just looking to get into the world of 3D printing, we are dedicated to making it as affordable as possible, as well as maintaining a great online community for our users and builders to share their ideas, improvements and suggestions with each other.  We have a fantastic group over on our Forum that are always quick to help out a new member with getting up and running.  If it wasn't for the outstanding people that contributed to our first campaign, started a Yahoo Group for early members to gather and talk about their kits, and especially our users that created a great set of manuals for assembly, wiring and more.
We are almost ready to fire up the presses!

We are just about done with all the designs for the injection molds, and are just about to start machining the molds for the presses.  With your help, we will be able to finish off the tooling and get to work on making these new kits.  If you already have one of our origional H-1 kits, don't worry, we aren't leaving you behind.  All of the newly designed uprades will be bolt-on upgrades for the H-1 original kits.  We are offering up a complete upgrade kit with all the new injection molded and CNC machined bearing parts, as well as just the CNC machined parts, for those of you that want to print your own plastic parts.

If you are one of the origional H-1 owners, or just want to try your hand at printing our parts, and would like to start printing the plastic parts now, we're uploading ALL the new .stl files to both our .org website ( http://seemecnc.org/download/H1-1 for the new files ) as well as the wiki at reprap.org, where all our first H-1 files are located.  If you look to the bottom of the .stl files section, you will see the new pieces being added as we finish them.
Here's a list of what changes and improvements we have made:
Significantly reduced hardware count.  We have removed over 150 pcs. of hardware from the original kit!
Easier to assemble.  With less parts to put together, it's naturally faster and easier to assemble.

Much better linear motion design.  In place of the origional roller ball style design, we have incorporated bronze linear bushings and a ""follower"" style bearing arrangement.  The original design was overconstrained, and did have issues with binding.  The new bronze bushings help to keep the cost down, while increasing accuracy, but also make aligning the smoot bars much less critical becuase of the rolloer follower design on the opposite bar.

RAMPS 1.4 is now available from SeeMeCNC.  When we started SeeMeCNC, one of our goals was to bring a more conventional CNC control into the 3D printing world.  The DIY CNC community and the 3D printing community didn't have a lot of interaction with each other.  We saw the opportunity to cross these paths, and did so by using Mach3 CNC software.  However, there's still a lot of you out there that like Arduino and the totally open-source approach to your printing needs. So, we now are able to fill both those shoes thanks to the great folks over at Ultimachine.com.  We have been using Repetier host and firmware on our machines, and so far have had great results!
NEW COLORS ! ! ! !  Many of our origional contributors asked if we could make the kits in different colors.  So, you asked for it!

Once we are done running the prototype machines here this next week, we will start shipping the H-1 Upgrade (machined parts and bushings only) ASAP.  They will be the first to ship, as they are the fastest for us to manufacture.  The next perk level to start shipping will be the H-1 Upgrade kit including plastic parts.  These perks will start shipping by the end of our campaign.  We already ready to run production on these. We already have our vendors ready too.  The injection molds are almost done, and if you saw us during our last campaign, you know how fast we can mold the parts!  For the first campaign, we built over 29 injection molds!  Lastly, the parts and hardware kits as well as the other complete kits will be shipping, most likely by the end of the campaign as well, as we already have most of the injection molds done, short of the new bearing design pieces.

For all contributors in the lower 48 states, you will recieve free shipping of your perks.  For all other shipping locations, you will be billed actual shipping charges at the time of shipping.  We use USPS flat rate shipping, and they have done an excellent job at the best price available.  If you were to purchase one of the complete kits with electronics, shipping would be around $55 USD.
Thank you for taking the time to visit our campaign

Whichever level perk you choose, rest assured that you are contributing to a team that has a proven record of deliver the goods.  As of May, we have over 430 machines shipped all over the world!  To top that off, even though our first campaign for our original kit topped over $24,000 (our goal was only $2500), we managed to get all those kits shipped by the end of the following month of our campaign.  We are much better prepared to handle larger orders this time, and we can't wait to ship your new SeeMeCNC H-1.1 kit to you!

SeeMeCNC Team

","From the guys who brought you the worlds FIRST injection molded, low-cost, open-source 3D printer.
Watch the H1 in action on Ustream. We will be posting announcements during this campaign when we will be print LIVE with the new H1.1
SeeMeCNC is back, with an updated version of our H-1 3D printers

Building upon our first version of the open-source Huxley, the H-1, we have re-designed many of the more difficult parts of building and adjusting our machines to make it easier and faster to assemble. We have also improved the bearing design of the origional reprap Huxley, from which the H in our machines name came from.  We have re-designed the bearing assemblies on all axes to use bronze linear bushings instead of the more complicated and sometimes frustrating triple plastic bearings of the origional. Along with the new design improvements, we have listened to what a lot of people were saying, and offer the awesome RAMPS 1.4 boards by Ultimachine. The RAMPS setup is for those who want a dedicated 3D printer control solution.
How we are able to do it

Thanks to all of our contributors and success of our first campaign, we have managed to get set up and stock components we do not manufacture, like motors.  While we CNC machine and injection mold all our own parts in house, there is still a fair amount of stuff we have to buy in quantity to keep making the most affordable DIY 3D printer kits in the world. Also, because of these contributions, we are able to keep working on making it easier to get going in the world of 3D printing.  Another product of the success of our first campaign was, we gained a great deal of knowledge from our contributors, and are bringing many of their suggestions and ideas to life in this next version of our machine. Whether you have one of our origional H-1 machines, or are just looking to get into the world of 3D printing, we are dedicated to making it as affordable as possible, as well as maintaining a great online community for our users and builders to share their ideas, improvements and suggestions with each other.  We have a fantastic group over on our Forum that are always quick to help out a new member with getting up and running.  If it wasn't for the outstanding people that contributed to our first campaign, started a Yahoo Group for early members to gather and talk about their kits, and especially our users that created a great set of manuals for assembly, wiring and more.
We are almost ready to fire up the presses!

We are just about done with all the designs for the injection molds, and are just about to start machining the molds for the presses.  With your help, we will be able to finish off the tooling and get to work on making these new kits.  If you already have one of our origional H-1 kits, don't worry, we aren't leaving you behind.  All of the newly designed uprades will be bolt-on upgrades for the H-1 original kits.  We are offering up a complete upgrade kit with all the new injection molded and CNC machined bearing parts, as well as just the CNC machined parts, for those of you that want to print your own plastic parts.

If you are one of the origional H-1 owners, or just want to try your hand at printing our parts, and would like to start printing the plastic parts now, we're uploading ALL the new .stl files to both our .org website ( http://seemecnc.org/download/H1-1 for the new files ) as well as the wiki at reprap.org, where all our first H-1 files are located.  If you look to the bottom of the .stl files section, you will see the new pieces being added as we finish them.
So what changes did we make?
Here's a list of what changes and improvements we have made:
Significantly reduced hardware count.  We have removed over 150 pcs. of hardware from the original kit!
Easier to assemble.  With less parts to put together, it's naturally faster and easier to assemble.

Much better linear motion design.  In place of the origional roller ball style design, we have incorporated bronze linear bushings and a ""follower"" style bearing arrangement.  The original design was overconstrained, and did have issues with binding.  The new bronze bushings help to keep the cost down, while increasing accuracy, but also make aligning the smoot bars much less critical becuase of the rolloer follower design on the opposite bar.

RAMPS 1.4 is now available from SeeMeCNC.  When we started SeeMeCNC, one of our goals was to bring a more conventional CNC control into the 3D printing world.  The DIY CNC community and the 3D printing community didn't have a lot of interaction with each other.  We saw the opportunity to cross these paths, and did so by using Mach3 CNC software.  However, there's still a lot of you out there that like Arduino and the totally open-source approach to your printing needs. So, we now are able to fill both those shoes thanks to the great folks over at Ultimachine.com.  We have been using Repetier host and firmware on our machines, and so far have had great results!
NEW COLORS ! ! ! !  Many of our origional contributors asked if we could make the kits in different colors.  So, you asked for it!

Once we are done running the prototype machines here this next week, we will start shipping the H-1 Upgrade (machined parts and bushings only) ASAP.  They will be the first to ship, as they are the fastest for us to manufacture.  The next perk level to start shipping will be the H-1 Upgrade kit including plastic parts.  These perks will start shipping by the end of our campaign.  We already ready to run production on these. We already have our vendors ready too.  The injection molds are almost done, and if you saw us during our last campaign, you know how fast we can mold the parts!  For the first campaign, we built over 29 injection molds!  Lastly, the parts and hardware kits as well as the other complete kits will be shipping, most likely by the end of the campaign as well, as we already have most of the injection molds done, short of the new bearing design pieces.

For all contributors in the lower 48 states, you will recieve free shipping of your perks.  For all other shipping locations, you will be billed actual shipping charges at the time of shipping.  We use USPS flat rate shipping, and they have done an excellent job at the best price available.  If you were to purchase one of the complete kits with electronics, shipping would be around $55 USD.
Thank you for taking the time to visit our campaign

Whichever level perk you choose, rest assured that you are contributing to a team that has a proven record of deliver the goods.  As of May, we have over 430 machines shipped all over the world!  To top that off, even though our first campaign for our original kit topped over $24,000 (our goal was only $2500), we managed to get all those kits shipped by the end of the following month of our campaign.  We are much better prepared to handle larger orders this time, and we can't wait to ship your new SeeMeCNC H-1.1 kit to you!

after putting together a simple kit!

column1: We are Makers, we design for Makers!
The self-balancing Robot is an interesting educational
toy. Many friends around us were trying to build one, but they encountered many
challenges including the lack of the parts that are easy to assemble, suitable
electronic circuits, and sample programs. So, we decided to make a
self-balancing robot as simple as possible.

column5: >Thanks to Arduino team that almost every

column1: maker has one Arduino board in hand. Among those Arduino boards, Arduino UNO R3
is the most universal entry-level board. Arduino UNO is open source and there
are huge of applications based it. We want to help those who has the similar idea of making a
self-balancing robot based on the Arduino UNO.

column5: >The Balanbot is a Arduino Based Self-balancing Robot Kit.

column1: easy to assemble. It uses strong acrylic structures and keeps the robot
balanced using its center of gravity. In order to achieve high-performance, we
tests various torque-gear motors to ensure the robot will keep balance and move
flexibly even if it gets pushed suddenly.

the Balanbot will be so much fun for novice and experienced robotics fans!

    Typical Control Demonstration
To meet different needs, we implemented several ways
to control the Balanbot. We believe the applications of Balanbot are unlimited
and up to its users and their favorite devices and platforms.
Balanbot includes everything you need to make your own self-balancing robot:
two high torque and high speed gear motors, wheels, acrylic structures, 18650
battery holder (batteries are not included), Balance Shield, and Arduino UNO-compatible board.
3mm thick acrylic boards and other accessories for its main structure. The 5mm
board is used to fix the two motors. One of the 3mm boards is used to fix the
battery and the other is for an Arduino-compatible board plus the Balance
Balanbot is super easy to assemble and play! There are no complicated
connections and it is fast to put together. It is suitable for kids and
experienced makers as well. Thanks to the powerful Balance shield, it is much
easier now to create a balancing robot than it was before.
MPU6050 which is the world’s first integrated 6-axis motion-tracking device
that combines a 3-axis gyroscope and a 3-axis accelerometer. It connects to the
Arduino UNO compatible board through the I2C interface. With this sensor, you
can get stable angle when the Kalman filter is used.
integrated one L298P for driving motors. The L298P is a high voltage (50V),
high current (2A) dual channel full-bridge driver. It can drive inductive loads
such as relay, DC, and stepping motors.
are also led indicators, a power switch and a buzzer on the Balance Shield. You
can even write your own code to make it play a melody.
universal serial interface is left for connecting adapters like serial
Bluetooth and serial Wi-Fi for communicating with other devices. Four IO pins
are left for connecting other sensors or RC receiver for making it more
provide beautiful and colorful acrylic structures!
almost all the resources of an Arduino UNO. The Kalman filter is used to
combine the data from the gyroscope and the accelerometer together in order to
get stable angle information. With optimized PID parameters we obtained after
several months of testing, the Balanbot now has strong stability!
messages comes from UART. It is easy to communicate with the Balanbot using adapters
such as Bluetooth, serial Wi-Fi, etc.
controller accepts up to 4 channel ppm signal from an RC receiver. It means
that you can control the Balanbot with a
Remote Controller, if you have one at hand.
created an Android App and a PC software as well. You can control your Balanbot
The referral Contest - Win a gift for free

You and anyone else can promote the campaign, in any way (but spam) and the person who raises the highest amount of money based off of referrals will get a prize. If you liked this project on facebook, tweeted it, or plused it on Google, commented on forums or reddit for example, then you are automatically apart of the referral contest. You know that every user on indiegogo has his/her own code ID, you share the project link to others, then it is easy for indiegogo know the influence.

So all you have to do is get online anywhere and share with as many people as possible your link, and then wait. The person who brings the highest amount of funds by his/her referral code will get the stunning prize!

All the information can be checked in the dashboard supplied by indiegogo website. We will show it at last when the contest is done. We will send one gift to the winner, it is our next cool project. And we will let you know all the detail at last. It is going to be FREE, if you win the referral contest, so I suggest you start to like this project on facebook, tweet, share, and post (again, no spam) your link (dedicated to this campaign) everywhere.
We believe in the Open Hardware movement. We benefited
a lot from it and we are eager to contribute back. The design of the Balanbot
will also be Open to encourage learning and further modifications for any
If you have more questions, please feel free to
contact us. We will build a forum and a mailing-list and invite people to
discuss cool applications for the Balanbot!
You can see the beta version of Balanbot for now.
We are hardware engineers and designers. Our goal is
to help makers get more out of their work with lots of fun. To achieve this goal,
we work hard and we will never give up!
challenges for any hardware project in manufacturing. We have a lot of
experience in hardware manufacturing, however. The Balanbot is fully tested and
is ready for the batch manufacturing. We hope everything will go smoothly and
we will work hard to have the rewards to be shipped in time.
for the risks from delivery, we have been shipping thousands of packages and
established good relationships with many transporters. They will help ensure
that the rewards arrive in time and in perfect condition.
If you can not support us directly, there are many
other ways that you could help. You can help us via Facebook or twitter and
share this project to let more people to know about the Balanbot. Your help,
support, and collaboration will be our guiding light our the future. Thank you!
We are looking for some one who will be intrested in developing iOS app for Balanbot.

You know we can use a Bluetooth 4.0 Low Energe (BLE) module to connect Balanbot with iOS device (iPhone 4S and above). We will share the protocol and Android code to you, and help you understand the communication method we use. Now you need is just coding for iOS and share it to all the fans later. 

What is really important is, we must be open for everyone. Open the hardware and open the software.
When you have done iOS, then tell us and we will share people where the App is.

We will give one Balanbot with BLE module for free to thank the first  iOS developer!!

Thank you all, have a nice day!

We are Makers, we design for Makers!
The self-balancing Robot is an interesting educational
toy. Many friends around us were trying to build one, but they encountered many
challenges including the lack of the parts that are easy to assemble, suitable
electronic circuits, and sample programs. So, we decided to make a
self-balancing robot as simple as possible.
Thanks to Arduino team that almost every
maker has one Arduino board in hand. Among those Arduino boards, Arduino UNO R3
is the most universal entry-level board. Arduino UNO is open source and there
are huge of applications based it. We want to help those who has the similar idea of making a
self-balancing robot based on the Arduino UNO.
The Balanbot is a Arduino Based Self-balancing Robot Kit.
The Balanbot is Open Source and
easy to assemble. It uses strong acrylic structures and keeps the robot
balanced using its center of gravity. In order to achieve high-performance, we
tests various torque-gear motors to ensure the robot will keep balance and move
flexibly even if it gets pushed suddenly.
the Balanbot will be so much fun for novice and experienced robotics fans!  Typical Control Demonstration
To meet different needs, we implemented several ways
to control the Balanbot. We believe the applications of Balanbot are unlimited
and up to its users and their favorite devices and platforms.
Balanbot includes everything you need to make your own self-balancing robot:
two high torque and high speed gear motors, wheels, acrylic structures, 18650
battery holder (batteries are not included), Balance Shield, and Arduino UNO-compatible board.
The Balanbot uses one 5mm and two
3mm thick acrylic boards and other accessories for its main structure. The 5mm
board is used to fix the two motors. One of the 3mm boards is used to fix the
battery and the other is for an Arduino-compatible board plus the Balance
Balanbot is super easy to assemble and play! There are no complicated
connections and it is fast to put together. It is suitable for kids and
experienced makers as well. Thanks to the powerful Balance shield, it is much
easier now to create a balancing robot than it was before.
MPU6050 which is the world’s first integrated 6-axis motion-tracking device
that combines a 3-axis gyroscope and a 3-axis accelerometer. It connects to the
Arduino UNO compatible board through the I2C interface. With this sensor, you
can get stable angle when the Kalman filter is used.
integrated one L298P for driving motors. The L298P is a high voltage (50V),
high current (2A) dual channel full-bridge driver. It can drive inductive loads
such as relay, DC, and stepping motors.
are also led indicators, a power switch and a buzzer on the Balance Shield. You
can even write your own code to make it play a melody.
universal serial interface is left for connecting adapters like serial
Bluetooth and serial Wi-Fi for communicating with other devices. Four IO pins
are left for connecting other sensors or RC receiver for making it more
provide beautiful and colorful acrylic structures!
almost all the resources of an Arduino UNO. The Kalman filter is used to
combine the data from the gyroscope and the accelerometer together in order to
get stable angle information. With optimized PID parameters we obtained after
several months of testing, the Balanbot now has strong stability!
messages comes from UART. It is easy to communicate with the Balanbot using adapters
such as Bluetooth, serial Wi-Fi, etc.
The coolest fact is that the
controller accepts up to 4 channel ppm signal from an RC receiver. It means
that you can control the Balanbot with a
Remote Controller, if you have one at hand.
created an Android App and a PC software as well. You can control your Balanbot

We're developing an app for smartphones that will provide tools and support for living a more sustainable lifestyle. Simple awareness of the following sustainability attributes can drastically alter our individual ecological footprints, and can easily be integrated into our daily lives

We at DreamGreen believe that the solution to the degradation of our planet lies with individual behaviour, and that if we all exchanged our bad habits for sustainable actions, we would create a much healthier environment for ourselves and future generations. But where do we start? Human development may be causing irreversible damage to our planet, and projected climate change will add another element of stress to our sensitive ecosystems. Although there has been a global shift in environmental ideology in recent years, large-scale actions have yet to be taken. We have to stop turning a blind eye, waiting for others to find solutions, and take ownership of the problem!

So this is what DreamGreen wants to develop with your support! Smartphones present a unique opportunity to disseminate information on a wide level, especially to people who want to reduce their significant ecological footprint, but don’t know how. We're developing an App that's interactive and informative, and it will serve to motivate people on a personal basis to be more sustainable.
The App will also feature an ecological footprint calculator, community forums, and will connect individuals with green companies that have sustainability initiatives.

If you would like to see other information or tools included in the app, have questions or concerns, or have any information that you believe we would find useful, please phone us at 760-799-4769, or post to our facebook page at https://www.facebook.com/DreamgreenApp?fref=ts

Funding will mainly be allocated to the software development of the App. The interactive component, the inclusion of community forums, and the ecological footprint calculator, require  a major expense. All remaining funding will be allocated to the marketing of the App.

This App will give millions of people access to sustainability resources in the palm of their hands. It will serve to educate people about the simplicity and benefits of adding sustainable activities into their daily lives. If we are all motivated to make little changes in our lifestyles, we can make a huge difference to the planet.

Did you miss our Campaign?
We wanted to use BeagleBone Black on the Go.  And we needed
console access while outdoors. Hence we designed this remarkable
console adapter to meet the needs of peer users with Android and
BBConsole is a Bluetooth Low Energy serial console adapter for BeagleBone Black.
You can view all your console messages, enter commands and
login/logout  on your BeagleBone Black from your BLE enabled

smartphone or Tablet.

BBConsole works with all new iDevices and new Android phones that support Bluetooth Low Energy (also known as BLE or Bluetooth Smart or Bluetooth 4.0).

Simply plug it into J1 Port (Console Port) and start using it. There is no need to change any software settings nor any need

to tinker with hardware on your BBB.

BBConsole fits in the space between the BBB headers, so you can continue using your capes with no conflict.
BBConsole Apps will be available for Android, and iOS devices.

BBConsole Development

The iOS and Android app development is in progress, below is a screen of an iPod

And a screen of an Android Phone with BBConsole:

And a screen of an iPad ->

Technical Details

BBConsole uses Rx, Tx and Ground pins from the J1 Port, and converts the signal to Bluetooth.

Your Support

The BBConsole design is done, prototypes are made and they are being tested with BBB.
Now we are planning for the manufacturing run. With your support, we
will be able to manufacture BBConsole in large quantity to reduce the
08/19/2014 Beta tests for BBConsole are in progress now.
09/02/2014 Finalize design and Order materials for Production
09/28/2014 Product manufacturing and production run testing
Our team includes top notch engineers from field of electronics and Information Technology. For more information about us, please visit: http://openelectrons.com/about

column4: >Gyromatic is an Australian brand based in Outback Australia. We have some big ideas and need your help to get our product over the pond.

column6: We got 25K+ Funded! We have been able to secure 5 more Go2X devices for this campaign, we took many orders outside of Indiegogo that forced the supply for October to diminish, we have secured a build slot for these 5 on the 5th of November which means we will most likely deliver in Later November. To be safe we made this a delivery by December expectation&lt

column4: >Clarification - All units purchased will be shipped, flexible funding essentially means we are committed and doing this no matter what. So get on it for 50% less then what our RRP will be and we include shipping!!

column5: >We have been involved in Helicopter filming and Gyro Stabilisation since the 90's, and have created airborne camera systems for helicopters and utilised UAV Multicopters for Airborne Video work for our own projects which led to the development of the Go2X.

column4: >Gyromatic was first established in the late 90's as the Australian reseller for the popular KenLab mechanical gyro that help make DSLR and video cameras stable, Gyromatic is a leader in handheld brushless Gimbal stabilisers specialising in the GoPro, BlackMagic, Sony Nex and DSLR and similar type cameras.

>The technology we use is a disruption to the Gyro stabilised platform industry which has long held a strangle hold on stabilisation. We use the Simple Brushless Gimble Controller with its main advantages being no backlash in the gear, instantaneous response and low weight. The controller receives information from gyroscopes and accelerometers mounted on the camera platform, an algorithm is used to define the camera angle and then correction is returned to the camera housing keeping the camera stable
>Whether you are filming an action sequence, filming from a boat, helicopter or camel, interviewing a punter or jumping off a cliff, the result you get from filming with the Go2X is second to none.

column1: Go2X PRO  ""Blackmagic Pocket Cinema Camera""

column4: >The Go2X Std package consists of the Go2X, 2 x 12V batteries and a rapid battery charger. The Go2X pro package is fitted with a thumbstick to manipulate the camera angle in both pitch and roll which also incorporates a push button menu system to select various operational profiles like horizon hold and follow me* modes. The Go2X device is made up of a plastic and rubber grip housing with legs and a sliding on/off switch, a mobile screen or device support stand, a adjustable CNC aluminium gimbal assembly with 2 x custom made rewound brushless motors. The assembly also houses an IMU (inertial measurement unit) on the camera carriage frame and a controller on the back of the mobile device mount.

>We need to 25K to gear up for tooling to produce the Go2X in quantity which will allow us to continually innovate hand held gyro technology and drive cost efficiency. We manufacture the device using a combination of CNC plastic and aluminium tooling, 3D printing and injection moulding . We also have the possum works in operation working on other cool assemblies.
>The result you get from filming with brushless gimbals is second to none and can make anyone pro.
>Check out what Robert Scoble thought about the Go2X https://plus.google.com/111091089527727420853/posts/bMkZdBXC5mv

>Did I mention how far away from the rest of the world we are :) . If you like this idea and want to help.. Tell a Twit! Spread the Face! Use the Google! Check out our site <a href=""http://www.gyromatic.com.au/"" rel=""noopener nofollow"" style=""color: #ff970f

column2: >

column8: >Aeromatic Pty Ltd is the owner of the Gyromatic brand and would like to thank Nic for the video and editing, Matt for the tech help, Jack for ideas and presenting for us, Kristian for the CAD and Joe and team for the cool footage.

column1: Gyromatic is an Australian brand based in Outback Australia. We have some big ideas and need your help to get our product over the pond.

Update >> We got 25K+ Funded! We have been able to secure 5 more Go2X devices for this campaign, we took many orders outside of Indiegogo that forced the supply for October to diminish, we have secured a build slot for these 5 on the 5th of November which means we will most likely deliver in Later November. To be safe we made this a delivery by December expectation<<

Clarification - All units purchased will be shipped, flexible funding essentially means we are committed and doing this no matter what. So get on it for 50% less then what our RRP will be and we include shipping!!

We have been involved in Helicopter filming and Gyro Stabilisation since the 90's, and have created airborne camera systems for helicopters and utilised UAV Multicopters for Airborne Video work for our own projects which led to the development of the Go2X.

Gyromatic was first established in the late 90's as the Australian reseller for the popular KenLab mechanical gyro that help make DSLR and video cameras stable, Gyromatic is a leader in handheld brushless Gimbal stabilisers specialising in the GoPro, BlackMagic, Sony Nex and DSLR and similar type cameras.

The technology we use is a disruption to the Gyro stabilised platform industry which has long held a strangle hold on stabilisation. We use the Simple Brushless Gimble Controller with its main advantages being no backlash in the gear, instantaneous response and low weight. The controller receives information from gyroscopes and accelerometers mounted on the camera platform, an algorithm is used to define the camera angle and then correction is returned to the camera housing keeping the camera stable
Whether you are filming an action sequence, filming from a boat, helicopter or camel, interviewing a punter or jumping off a cliff, the result you get from filming with the Go2X is second to none.

The Go2X Std package consists of the Go2X, 2 x 12V batteries and a rapid battery charger. The Go2X pro package is fitted with a thumbstick to manipulate the camera angle in both pitch and roll which also incorporates a push button menu system to select various operational profiles like horizon hold and follow me* modes. The Go2X device is made up of a plastic and rubber grip housing with legs and a sliding on/off switch, a mobile screen or device support stand, a adjustable CNC aluminium gimbal assembly with 2 x custom made rewound brushless motors. The assembly also houses an IMU (inertial measurement unit) on the camera carriage frame and a controller on the back of the mobile device mount.

We need to 25K to gear up for tooling to produce the Go2X in quantity which will allow us to continually innovate hand held gyro technology and drive cost efficiency. We manufacture the device using a combination of CNC plastic and aluminium tooling, 3D printing and injection moulding . We also have the possum works in operation working on other cool assemblies.
The result you get from filming with brushless gimbals is second to none and can make anyone pro.
Check out what Robert Scoble thought about the Go2X https://plus.google.com/111091089527727420853/posts/bMkZdBXC5mv

Did I mention how far away from the rest of the world we are :) . If you like this idea and want to help.. Tell a Twit! Spread the Face! Use the Google! Check out our site http://www.gyromatic.com.au/

Aeromatic Pty Ltd is the owner of the Gyromatic brand and would like to thank Nic for the video and editing, Matt for the tech help, Jack for ideas and presenting for us, Kristian for the CAD and Joe and team for the cool footage.",6.0,1,"1 Campaign

The evolution in Apple iOS Docks is not what you'd expect... it's much BETTER!

CORE REFERRAL CONTEST RULES
We are offering a REFERRAL CONTEST to WIN a FREE Dock/Viewing Stand

We will guarantee one winner in this Referral Contest with
the possibility of selecting 3 winners if the campaign reaches a total
of $15,000 before the conclusion of the campaign.
Those individuals willing to refer others that choose to contribute and make a donation(s) will become eligible to win.
The winner(s) shall be determined by the total donations made by those individuals that they have referred.
total amount donated by individuals referred by you will determine your
score/rank. The individual with the highest score/rank is guaranteed to
WIN a CORE Dock of their choice.
If the campaign raises $15,000, we will announce three winners that will include the TOP 3 scoring/ranked individuals.
Thank you so much for your help and Good Luck to you all!
To qualify, all that we ask is that you make a purchase and share this
campaign page with a friend using the SHARE TOOLS associated with this campaign
NOTE: This offer excludes all Reseller, Distributor and ***EARLYBIRD INTERNATIONAL*** levels.
In a very short period of time, Apple iOS devices have become
embedded in the very fabric of our lives, yet no one has developed a
dock that will properly service these precious devices in a manner

befitting them!

Over the years I have purchased several docks for my iPhones did the job that I expect.

We pay a lot of money for our Apple mobile devices and we deserve a dock that is manufactured to the same specifications of our devices.

With no suitable products available to me, I decided to develop my own... but not just any dock, this one would have to be unique!

I started by buying a 3D Printer from Makerbot to start making prototypes...

After almost a year of research and development, making sure that our designs would accommodate both 30 pin and Lightning cables, the product is finally ready for market and the Apple enthusiast in each of us. 

Please join us on our adventure to eliminate tangled and lost cords and to enhance your Apple iOS device experience!

We call it the CORE... We hope you like it!
The CORE (the Dock/Viewing Stand for every Apple iOS device ever made)
The CORE was designed to charge with standard Apple iOS charging cables and to provide exclusive features unavailable on competing products

-They’re BIGGER and HEAVIER than the Elevation Dock to support both an iPhone and an iPad.

The
increased size provides the weight and stability required for
effortless “one-hand docking and undocking” and will stay on the table

where it belongs, rather than in the air attached to your device.

-The CORE will charge every APPLE iOS Device ever made including iPhones, iPads and iPods regardless of their charging format.
-Each Aluminum CORE will easily accommodate an iPhone and an iPad
with or without a case. It will handle most cases 5.0 mm thick or less (on bottom or back). A
custom insert gives additional support for an iPad without a case. The CORE is also made to a width that will easily accommodate the rumored iPhone 6 sizes.
column6:
schema=youtube"" width=""580"">

-Every CORE will provide “Simultaneous Charging” for up to two Apple iOS devices.

-The ""Viewing Stand"" provides a landscape viewing option that's ideal for watching most anything.

-The ""Swivel Plate"" will allow you to turn your dock to achieve the perfect viewing angle.
column11:
schema=youtube"" width=""580"">

-Unlike the Elevation Dock, which requires 13 things to secure a single cord… you’ll only need your hands to set up the CORE.

-The CORE provides a wall-mounting option that will provide a custom viewing experience.

column1: - Multiple devices are normally charged individually using separate
cords which are often tangled or misplaced. With the CORE, worrying
about cords will become a thing of the past!
column2:
>

-Every CORE follows more than 20 finishing and quality control procedures to deliver a superior finish that’s 2nd to none!
column3:
>

Apple Quality Finishes

The CORE comes in two distinct designs

column1: the highest quality standards available. We manufacture them from
aircraft grade aluminum using the same processes that Apple uses to

manufacture its uni-body products.

We offer them in a bead blasted finish or one of three (3) anodized color finishes as well.
APPLE enthusiasts around the world prefer clean, simple and elegant
products, and expect superior quality and user-friendly features

unmatched by competing products.

FEATURES

After many months of design,
prototyping, focus groups and multiple redesigns we believe that we’ve

It’s the BEST docking solution available for any Apple iOS device, no matter where you live.

It's
perfect for the office or any room in the house and it's sure to
provide you with effortless charging and hands-free viewing experiences

for years to come. 

ANY BACKERS living in the local areas of Las Vegas/Henderson NV, USA and Windsor, ON, Canada, you will receive a refund for the costs associated with shipping if you are willing to pick up your orders from us when they are ready.

We expect to be shipping on December 1st, 2014 if the project reaches its funding goal.

We’re very excited about the CORE and we hope that you are too. If so, we need your help to bring them to market.

Thank you for taking the time to review our project and we really appreciate your support.

column3: t=7s"" rel=""noopener nofollow"">C-FORCE C-air is improving! The latest video of CF120 Pro

column5: Review from 羅卡Rocca on YouTube&lt

column1:
Players' expectations of the gaming experience are becoming increasingly demanding. 

Game console manufacturers have all dedicated their own unremitting efforts and experience to the creation of 4K HDR, motion-sensing games, and cloud games. In the pursuit of excellence, C-FORCE, an expert in USB-C technology and an avid observer of the gaming industry, has now released the C-air modular gaming suite.

C-air aims to provide the ultimate gaming experience for console and mobile gamers and the C-air suite is fully compatible with all gaming scenarios through its modular product design. Moreover, the extraordinarily thin and lightweight yet phenomenal display gives all gamers what may be the best gaming experience in the world.

 

 

C-air's modular connection design (all module details are provided in the module list below) can be used to lock C-air's CF012S display to a Switch Joy-Con, a PlayStation controller, an Xbox controller, and a mobile gamepad, or it can be attached to its exclusive stand cover for use on a desk.

 

 

C-air permits video signal access from all mainstream gaming devices through the video processing intermediate station the CF120Pro, from the three major game consoles to mobile phones supporting USB-C DP video output, and even the most traditional PCs! As long as a USB-C DP signal or an HDMI signal is used, C-air can be successfully accessed.

The display is the key for players as it defines a player’s gaming experience. 

To ensure players can really ‘feel’ the game, C-air offers the powerfully performing CF012S. The CF012S achieves a 4K HDR display on a 12.5-inch panel and features the 100% Adobe RGB, which provides the optimal color performance. In short, the CF012S gives players an unbeatable gaming experience. (How to connect the module is shown in the set-up details below.) 

To compete to provide the best handheld gaming experience in the world, we needed to be obsessed with weight and size. So, the CF012S is just 225 grams and up to just 5.3 mm in thickness. The CF012S is the ideal partner to help you achieve the best in handheld gaming.

 

 

The ultra-thin CF012S requires care and protection. So, the exclusive stand cover can be connected to the CF012S via magnetic adsorption, which protects the display and provides the optimal product form for multiplayer gaming. 

 

To handle the needs of a range of players, we take advantage of the flexibility of modularity. 

Our universal connector enables players to connect to PlayStation controllers, Xbox controllers, and mobile gamepads. We have also designed a compatible power adapter, the A005, and a Bluetooth audio module is available for use with your Nintendo Switch. We even have a 2x scope available for you to purchase to enhance the immersive experience of your gaming. Finally, we offer a two-meter living room cable so you can choose exactly where you want to do your gaming.   

 

 


 

C - FAMILY

Please contact info@cforcedesign.com for business cooperation.

ClutchIt is a revolutionary double-sided magnet phone holder &
column2: mount that can ClutchIt to any metallic surface or to nearly any surface with the metal plate pads. No need for unsafe driving phone mounts requiring use with two hands. With ClutchIt you can avoid clutter and bulk while adding convenience to your life.
column4:
showinfo=0"">
ClutchIt utilizes rotating ball joints with super-powered magnetic ends to give you a solid hold with amazing degrees of flexibility. Now you can mount your phone to any surface with the help of adhesive film and our unique magnetic pads! And surfaces that are already metallic? All you have to do is place ClutchIt on your table, wall, or more and you've got a reliable phone mount that is sleek, sexy and easy to use!
The inspiration behind the ClutchIt came from the creator's father, who is an Uber driver in New York City. ""The current phone holders out there are so dangerous!"", says Hong, who has experienced firsthand what can happen when you use phone holders that can fall down, obstruct views, or block vents. ""Once when we were driving, the suction cup phone holder fell from the windshield and, distracted by trying to catch the phone, we almost hit a truck!"". No more dangerous phone holders, says Hong.
column5: >ClutchIt is in Production!

column1:
Frustrated by the lack of a phone holder that takes up minimal space, is strong and supportive, and looks good, Hong set out to design his own phone mount, holder and more.

Clutchit by itself is a phone stand - no metal disc needed!

We design with quality and user-friendliness in mind. Making sure that it holds even the heaviest of phones and even smaller tablets at any angle.  Clutchit itself weights about half a pound, so you feel the weight and quality of clutchit, when you first hold it in your hands, you will want to play with it for hours, thinking of creative ways and angles to Clutchit!
column2:
>ClutchIt is Indestructible!

ClutchIt survived a rigorous lethal weapon test by Dan Bilzerian .
column5:
showinfo=0"">
ClutchIt! fits into a wide array of lifestyles. The device itself comes in 5 colors to match your style. These options were developed with the new iPhone in mind, so you can be sure to be ahead of the latest trends.
 

 

Every ClutchIt comes with clear adhesive films and magnetic metal pads. The adhesive films provide a way to prepare any surface to become magnetic, without the fear of ruining the material or leaving an unwanted, sticky residue.

The metal pads adhere to the film, making any surface you want metallic! They are easy to remove, but still powerful. You can't always plan for when you'll need a convenient place to hold your phone, but with the ClutchIt you'll always be ready!

 ClutchIts are strong enough to hold the biggest smartphones and even small tablets! The powerful magnetics hold strong to any magnetic surface and allow for 360º rotation, bending at 100º on all sides.

ClutchIt does it all!

Clutchit can even hold up a Samsung tablet or an iPhone 7 vertically
column9:
original_referer=https://www.kickstarter.com/projects/thatsclutch/clutchit-the-worlds-first-magnetic-anywhere-phone/description"" rel=""noopener nofollow"">

You can now order Red Magic from https://redmagic.gg
--------------------------------------------------------------
column6: >Imagine a device that strikes the balance between sleek, a natural fit hardware and fully optimised software.

column5: >Now stop imagining: The Red Magic is a reality.
>While at the drawing board, we faced the challenge of creating a design that not only looked great but could be ergonomic, distinctive and ensure high performance.

>Other phones had either not adapted to gaming (some looked and felt like bricks) or were simply iPhone copycats. That’s when we decided to create a design impressive enough to leave a mark on the smartphone industry.
>It took more than a hundred design iterations to find the perfect look for Red Magic. We have created a sleek smartphone that’s comfortable to hold, with tactile buttons rounding out the contours.
>Not to mention the multi-layered cooling system packed into the device that boosts gameplay optimisation.
>So there’s no need for a trade-off between aesthetics and performance, after all.

>16 million colours. Four different lighting effects. One RGB LED strip. Because...
Well, why not?
It just looks awesome!
>For mobile gaming, it’s not about having the fastest chipset but what will deliver the most stable and optimised experience.

>That’s what brought us to the Qualcomm® Snapdragon 835™. Through months of development, we worked to optimise this chipset to strike the perfect balance between performance, battery life and temperature. So you can jump straight into the game knowing you have the best hardware suited for the job.
>It wasn’t enough to have enhanced software and hardware for Red Magic. We needed something to give gameplay an extra jolt of power.

column6: >GameBoost delivers a more stable framerate, faster app loading and learns from your usage. Plus, it turns off any distracting notifications during gameplay, allowing you to play at your very best.

column5: >Through rigorous lab testing, we managed up to seven hours of playing Arena of Valor from the Red Magic’s 3,800 mAh battery.
>This smart, high-density battery is built for endurance and charges quickly—perfect for on-the-go gaming.

column12: >But we quickly hit an obstacle. It was impossible to include clunky cooling fans without compromising on the smartphone’s slim design.

column5: >So, we took a cool-headed approach to keep the temperature down. We packed in three special technologies to keep our device cool to the touch—all without fans.
>Firstly, the extra layers of graphite help take heat away from the processor.
column10: >On top of that, the convex-styled back adds more surface area to dissipate heat faster. Basically, the more surface area, the faster conduction and convection can take place.

column5: >Finally, the three cooling ports on the back of the device allow for better hot–cool air exchange.
>Combine these three components and what you get is the coolest phone. Literally! At its peak temperature, it’s almost ten degrees cooler than an iPhone X.

>For the audiophile, DTS Technology and a Smart Amplifier system enable you to enjoy an expanded soundstage filled with breathtaking clarity and enhanced bass. We have also integrated a DAC to experience clear, crisp music for a more immersive sound experience.
>We’re proud of our Red Magic smartphone. But that doesn’t mean it’s ready to be hastily sent out untested. We are perfectionists, after all.
>On April 14 we placed our devices in the hands of experts for rigorous daily driving usage testing, and from there we’ll be implementing their feedback over the next few weeks.

>While they've found a couple of bugs with some of the features, the Red Magic team is working to have your device fully optimised from the day you receive it. And in case some smartphones are shipped out without those features, we promise to add them back in as soon as the glitches are fixed.

>We’re expecting to have a stable build around end of May or early June should everything go to plan. If the timeline changes, we’ll keep you in the loop. If you want to help us test, please reach out to us with your order number and you could be added to our testing group.
>Thank you for your support and patience.
>Establishing ourselves in October 2017 as the gaming arm of Nubia, we’ve harnessed their skill in smartphone design and combined it with a gamer’s determination to achieve high-performance gameplay.
>And we’re just getting started. With these resources at our disposal, we’ve made it our mission to break further ground and unlock the potential of mobile gaming.
>Contribute now and join us on our mission.

>At Red Magic, we strive for a 100% transparent approach to shipping. Delivery is one of the team’s expertises and your package is our priority. So we’ll do everything we can to keep you up to date on your purchase.
>We’ll start dealing with orders as soon as we are in stock. When your Red Magic smartphone is dispatched we’ll notify you right away.

>After dispatching, you should receive your package within one to 30 business days depending on your location. Delivery delay may occur due to weather, import declaration process and other uncontrollable events.

>All our products will be shipped under DDU term, we will arrange the delivery to your address but cannot clear for import, you may need to cooperate with courier on local import declaration and payment of duty/tax if necessary. As a result, extra costs beyond port-of-entry may be incurred upon receipt of your Red Magic smartphone.

>We’re not shipping to North America at the moment, but we are working on an optimised version for the region. To make up for the wait, we’re offering exclusive discount vouchers on any future purchase made at RedMagic.gg (see Perks).

>Update #1. You asked. We listened. Due to huge demand, the Android version is now available for early software testing—exclusive to North American users (North America Early Testing Perk). Best of all, we’ll exchange your tester phone for the real deal once it’s ready. Just keep in mind that users may have limited 4G connectivity in the region.
>Although we may ship to your country, connectivity efficiency depends on your location and mobile operator. Please check with your local carrier for more info.
>Red Magic provides a limited warranty for your smartphone and the original accessories delivered with your smartphone (hereinafter referred to as “product”) purchased from Indiegogo.
>The warranty includes 12 months free maintenance for the smartphone. If there is a functional failure or product quality problem, the product will be repaired free of charge.
>Any defect arising due to misuse of the product, damages due to liquid ingress, physical abuse, or normal wear and tear is not covered by this warranty.
>Damages caused to the product by accidents, lightning or any other Acts of God are not covered by this warranty.
>The warranty becomes void if the unit is tampered with, altered or repaired by unauthorised persons.
>The warranty becomes void if the serial number of the product is defaced or altered, rendering it difficult to identify the instrument.

>The warranty does not cover shipping costs for returning the product to Red Magic. We do not pay for delivery upon arrival of your returned product, and packages where insufficient postage has been paid will be rejected or sent back to the buyer.
>After inspection for repairment/replacement, Red Magic will cover any shipping costs for sending the product back to the buyer should the product meet the criteria set out in the warranty.

>The Red Magic warranty for Indiegogo may not apply in all cases, depending on factors such as use of the product, where the product was purchased, or who you purchased the product from. Please review the warranty carefully, and contact support@redmagic.gg if you have any questions.
>You can return your Red Magic smartphone (hereinafter referred to as “product”) for quality reason within 15 days from the day you received it.
>When returning the product to us we recommend you obtain proof of posting, and send us the tracking info in order to ensure a smooth return and refund process.
>We will usually make any refunds using PayPal. The money should be returned within 10 days.

>If you need to make a return, the product must be returned in a reasonable condition along with any packaging, manuals, accessories, free items and any other components. Only under these conditions can we provide a refund in accordance with our returns policy.

>In all cases, we reserve the right to inspect the product and verify any fault. For an exchange or refund, the product must be in otherwise “as new” condition and if possible with the original packaging. We therefore reserve the right to refuse a refund or exchange if the product returned is deemed to have been damaged.

column1: You can now order Red Magic from https://redmagic.gg--------------------------------------------------------------Imagine a device that strikes the balance between sleek, a natural fit hardware and fully optimised software.
Now stop imagining: The Red Magic is a reality.
While at the drawing board, we faced the challenge of creating a design that not only looked great but could be ergonomic, distinctive and ensure high performance.

Other phones had either not adapted to gaming (some looked and felt like bricks) or were simply iPhone copycats. That’s when we decided to create a design impressive enough to leave a mark on the smartphone industry.
It took more than a hundred design iterations to find the perfect look for Red Magic. We have created a sleek smartphone that’s comfortable to hold, with tactile buttons rounding out the contours.
Not to mention the multi-layered cooling system packed into the device that boosts gameplay optimisation.
So there’s no need for a trade-off between aesthetics and performance, after all.
16 million colours. Four different lighting effects. One RGB LED strip. Because...Well, why not?It just looks awesome!
For mobile gaming, it’s not about having the fastest chipset but what will deliver the most stable and optimised experience.

That’s what brought us to the Qualcomm® Snapdragon 835™. Through months of development, we worked to optimise this chipset to strike the perfect balance between performance, battery life and temperature. So you can jump straight into the game knowing you have the best hardware suited for the job.
It wasn’t enough to have enhanced software and hardware for Red Magic. We needed something to give gameplay an extra jolt of power.

GameBoost delivers a more stable framerate, faster app loading and learns from your usage. Plus, it turns off any distracting notifications during gameplay, allowing you to play at your very best.  GameBoost:
Through rigorous lab testing, we managed up to seven hours of playing Arena of Valor from the Red Magic’s 3,800 mAh battery.
This smart, high-density battery is built for endurance and charges quickly—perfect for on-the-go gaming.
Multi-layered Cooling Technology    // But we quickly hit an obstacle. It was impossible to include clunky cooling fans without compromising on the smartphone’s slim design.
So, we took a cool-headed approach to keep the temperature down. We packed in three special technologies to keep our device cool to the touch—all without fans.

Firstly, the extra layers of graphite help take heat away from the processor. On top of that, the convex-styled back adds more surface area to dissipate heat faster. Basically, the more surface area, the faster conduction and convection can take place.
Finally, the three cooling ports on the back of the device allow for better hot–cool air exchange.
Combine these three components and what you get is the coolest phone. Literally! At its peak temperature, it’s almost ten degrees cooler than an iPhone X.

For the audiophile, DTS Technology and a Smart Amplifier system enable you to enjoy an expanded soundstage filled with breathtaking clarity and enhanced bass. We have also integrated a DAC to experience clear, crisp music for a more immersive sound experience.
We’re proud of our Red Magic smartphone. But that doesn’t mean it’s ready to be hastily sent out untested. We are perfectionists, after all.
On April 14 we placed our devices in the hands of experts for rigorous daily driving usage testing, and from there we’ll be implementing their feedback over the next few weeks.

While they've found a couple of bugs with some of the features, the Red Magic team is working to have your device fully optimised from the day you receive it. And in case some smartphones are shipped out without those features, we promise to add them back in as soon as the glitches are fixed.

We’re expecting to have a stable build around end of May or early June should everything go to plan. If the timeline changes, we’ll keep you in the loop. If you want to help us test, please reach out to us with your order number and you could be added to our testing group.
Thank you for your support and patience.
Establishing ourselves in October 2017 as the gaming arm of Nubia, we’ve harnessed their skill in smartphone design and combined it with a gamer’s determination to achieve high-performance gameplay.
And we’re just getting started. With these resources at our disposal, we’ve made it our mission to break further ground and unlock the potential of mobile gaming.
Contribute now and join us on our mission.

At Red Magic, we strive for a 100% transparent approach to shipping. Delivery is one of the team’s expertises and your package is our priority. So we’ll do everything we can to keep you up to date on your purchase.
We’ll start dealing with orders as soon as we are in stock. When your Red Magic smartphone is dispatched we’ll notify you right away.

After dispatching, you should receive your package within one to 30 business days depending on your location. Delivery delay may occur due to weather, import declaration process and other uncontrollable events.

All our products will be shipped under DDU term, we will arrange the delivery to your address but cannot clear for import, you may need to cooperate with courier on local import declaration and payment of duty/tax if necessary. As a result, extra costs beyond port-of-entry may be incurred upon receipt of your Red Magic smartphone.
Countries and regions we ship to:
European UnionUnited KingdomMalaysiaPhilippinesHong KongMacauTaiwanSingaporeJapanSouth KoreaAustraliaUnited Arab EmiratesIsraelNorwayVietnamIndiaRussiaBrazilSwitzerland

We’re not shipping to North America at the moment, but we are working on an optimised version for the region. To make up for the wait, we’re offering exclusive discount vouchers on any future purchase made at RedMagic.gg (see Perks).

Update #1. You asked. We listened. Due to huge demand, the Android version is now available for early software testing—exclusive to North American users (North America Early Testing Perk). Best of all, we’ll exchange your tester phone for the real deal once it’s ready. Just keep in mind that users may have limited 4G connectivity in the region.
FDD-LTE: Band B1/3/5/7/8/20TDD-LTE: Band B34/B38/39/40/41TD-SCDMA: Band B34/B39
Although we may ship to your country, connectivity efficiency depends on your location and mobile operator. Please check with your local carrier for more info.
Red Magic provides a limited warranty for your smartphone and the original accessories delivered with your smartphone (hereinafter referred to as “product”) purchased from Indiegogo.
The warranty includes 12 months free maintenance for the smartphone. If there is a functional failure or product quality problem, the product will be repaired free of charge.
Any defect arising due to misuse of the product, damages due to liquid ingress, physical abuse, or normal wear and tear is not covered by this warranty.
Damages caused to the product by accidents, lightning or any other Acts of God are not covered by this warranty.
The warranty becomes void if the unit is tampered with, altered or repaired by unauthorised persons.
The warranty becomes void if the serial number of the product is defaced or altered, rendering it difficult to identify the instrument.

The warranty does not cover shipping costs for returning the product to Red Magic. We do not pay for delivery upon arrival of your returned product, and packages where insufficient postage has been paid will be rejected or sent back to the buyer.
After inspection for repairment/replacement, Red Magic will cover any shipping costs for sending the product back to the buyer should the product meet the criteria set out in the warranty.

The Red Magic warranty for Indiegogo may not apply in all cases, depending on factors such as use of the product, where the product was purchased, or who you purchased the product from. Please review the warranty carefully, and contact support@redmagic.gg if you have any questions.
You can return your Red Magic smartphone (hereinafter referred to as “product”) for quality reason within 15 days from the day you received it.
When returning the product to us we recommend you obtain proof of posting, and send us the tracking info in order to ensure a smooth return and refund process.
We will usually make any refunds using PayPal. The money should be returned within 10 days.

If you need to make a return, the product must be returned in a reasonable condition along with any packaging, manuals, accessories, free items and any other components. Only under these conditions can we provide a refund in accordance with our returns policy.

In all cases, we reserve the right to inspect the product and verify any fault. For an exchange or refund, the product must be in otherwise “as new” condition and if possible with the original packaging. We therefore reserve the right to refuse a refund or exchange if the product returned is deemed to have been damaged.

Order CancellationYou can contact our customer service via support@redmagic.gg if you would like to cancel your order. Once your order has been processed and shipped, cancellation will not be possible.

Clunky head cams?  View Blocking Devices?  Weary Arms?  All History!  Oh and no more fumbling for your devices either.  Welcome hands free, one button operation, hi-def video, super hi-resolution pics, POV eyewear.

And welcome bluetooth enabled, listen to your jam, playlist, audio books, satellite service, make and take phone supported eyewear.

Welcome Custos.  Cutting edge, bone conduction wearable tech with six (6) interchangeable lenses for multifunctional use.

column9: >World's safest, most technologically packed multi-functional sunglasses

column2: >CUSTOS is Latin for ""Guardian"".  Protecting
column6: >you and your experience is the core concept behind Custos.  From the open ear design to the integrated EMR shielded construction to the cutting edge tech, Custos is all  about safely enhancing your experience from listening to your jam to connecting and sharing with the people in your life.

column10: >Do you ever wish you had more and better quality videos and photos of your favorite moments to share with family and friends?
>Do you envy those people who seem to have everything important recorded?

column7: >You're  going to love Custos, because that can be you!  At the push of a button, your hands are free to keep doing what you were already doing and you're shooting video or taking a picture of exactly what you're looking at.  How cool is that?  And in total High Definition (HD)-Beautiful!

column13: >Spectate or Participate?  Why not BOTH.  With Custos you CAN!

column5: >You're going to love your Custos with its easy push button operation and hands free use. You won't miss anything because capturing the action is right at your fingertip and you can capture your moments totally hands free.

column7: >We currently have a working prototype and we've finalized most of the production details with our manufacturing partners.

>By intention and design, at this point everything we have incorporated into Custos we are set to deliver.  That is the benefit of rigorous field testing.  We did not want customers and supporters to be guinea pigs.  There won't be any delays for features because we're marketing what we have now to deliver.  We believe that's the fair and right way to respect our supporters.
>Could there be a manufacturing delay?  There is always that possibility.  Our order will go in in December and that should be great timing.
>We are very confident that given your support, we'll  order on time, manufacture and produce a quality product to the exact specs we have marketed or better and deliver on time or before.

>As developments occur we will keep our supporters updated via the Indiegogo system and provide timely notification of any delays.  Though it is our very sincere intention to notify our supporters we are ahead of schedule.  We like sharing good news!

column1: 1. Bluetooth or WiFi?
2. Pricing and Package
3. Video Camera-Camera
I've seen other video glasses that are wifi, Custos are Bluetooth, what's the difference?
• But with WIFI I can stream to my smartphone, that sounds pretty cool, right?
• Custos are Bluetooth 4.0 and the most recent iteration is Bluetooth 4.2 is there a difference?
• I've been seeing all kinds of different pricing in campaigns, what are the hidden costs in your perks?
• There are less expensive video glasses available.
• What exactly is included in the CrowdFunder?
• Can I adjust the quality or resolution of the video?
• Can I adjust the focus, zoom?
• Will I be able to take video at night?
• I have an iPhone, Android, windows device, are Custos compatible with my device?
• What's the wireless range of Custos?
• There are so many functions in Custos, but there seem to be only a few tiny buttons, can they really work to control so many different functions?
Is there an instruction manual with step by step how to instructions for Custos glasses?
• Is there a Web site where I can find detailed instructions?
• Custos touts 6 different colors of interchangeable lenses, how easily are the lenses switched out and how secure are they in place?
