TransPhotonic technology was originally co-engineered by our founder, Ken Wright, for U.S. Navy submarines to “see” in murky-water and other obstructed situations.

Within the Eclipse software, a series of images are precisely aligned using a GPS-like function to create a complete picture of the breast. Deep tissue masses are highlighted in the image, which can then be saved and monitored for changes as part of your monthly self-breast exam, or shared with a medical professional, or the Eclipse Image Review Service.

The Pink Cloud is a networked breast health social ecosystem of Eclipse users. When a woman activates her Eclipse device, she automatically receives a Pink Cloud account. This turnkey service is as easy to use as iTunes and streamlines a woman’s ability to monitor her breast health. Images generated using the Eclipse are automatically uploaded to her personal, private account. Depending upon her preference, each woman may choose to keep her images private, share them with her doctor, use Eclipse’s review service or anonymously share them with other members of the Pink Cloud community.
Unlike traditional social media sites, the Pink Cloud is a safe, anonymous, member-only community.
The Pink Cloud brings together the combined wisdom, strength, and compassion of women who have taken control of their breast health. Once logged in, women can:

Access a secure area to upload and store scans directly from Eclipse.  Once uploaded, they can monitor their breast health on a regular basis, share their scans with their doctor or subscribe to an image-review service in which medical experts provide analysis of their scans.
Schedule automatic email and text reminders about self-exams.
Provide their insights, ideas and opinions as part of a community to help us improve Eclipse and the Pink Cloud as we develop new features and services focused on early detection.
Join our social network where they can share advice on how to better use the Eclipse, promote good breast-health practices and inspire other women to be proactive about their breast health.

Within the Pink Cloud Community, each user has an opportunity to ask and answer questions, seek and offer advice, solicit and provide counsel, and exchange referrals. In addition, the Pink Cloud hosts message boards, provides breast health information, and access to doctors.
Our aim is to make the Pink Cloud the destination site for breast health. Together, Eclipse and the Pink Cloud will become the forefront of early breast cancer detection.
Ken Wright is an accomplished inventor and visionary with a true passion for product development and industrial design.

With breast cancer awareness on the rise - and yet few innovative solutions on the horizon - Ken was inspired as a husband and father to utilize his skills as an innovator to make a better future for his wife and daughter, and generations of women ahead.

Ken has invented and contributed to award-winning product designs in industries ranging from automotive to aerospace, to telecommunications and healthcare. He also co-engineered an underwater laser scanning system for autonomous deep-sea exploration submarines which inspired Eclipse technology.

Ken also helped develop the first portable zinc-air fuel cell, the first full-motion teleconferencing system, and the first mobile satellite news vehicles. His “Edison” approach to code breaking and problem solving has made him an invaluable resource to such companies as Canon, AquaLung and NiteRider Technical Lighting Systems, LucasFilm, Paramount Pictures, Ford Motor Company and Disney.

Ken Wright: “Of all the projects I have ever worked on, Eclipse has the most meaning and value to me by far. The wonderful support we have gotten and continue to get will mean we can get this life-saving technology into women’s hands sooner than later. The Eclipse needs to exist now!”

The Eclipse team is a collaboration of intelligent and passionate technologists, scientists, doctors, breast health advocates, sponsors and associates that are determined to help ensure Eclipse becomes a reality for millions of women and loved ones.

Ken Wright, the inventor of Eclipse, was involved in developing highly advanced sensor technology that allowed autonomous submarines to see through murky water. Not only could the sensors see through these obstructed situations, they could also discriminate between different materials and molecular properties of target objects on the ocean floor.  That led to the big eureka moment when Mr. Wright realized he could modify this type of technology using harmless low level light (Photons) to look into the body, and in particular, the breast, to find specific cell targets and diseases like cancer.

Soon after his eureka moment, Ken Wright got to work. Over the next decade and a half - through countless hours of R&D, proof of concept models and prototype efforts - Ken was able to put this life saving technology into the size of a computer mouse for the price of a low cost digital camera or phone.
Over 100 prototypes, proof of concept and experimental models have been iteratively developed to help us get to where we are today.

We have done extensive in-house alpha and beta testing at our Innovation Labs in San Diego, as well as collaborative testing and research with several major medical universities and cancer specialists.
We are now ready to put Eclipse into the hands of at least a thousand women to fully beta test the ergonomics and Pink Cloud experience using the Eclipse PS1 pilot program.

We are trying to break new ground and develop something that is undeniably needed: taking the guess-work out of self-breast exams with a simple and smart digital breast self-exam device. Like the now commonplace home digital scale, thermometer or blood pressure device, Eclipse delivers precise information that puts women in control of their health.

Thanks to fully functioning prototypes and extensive testing, we are ready for our first beta pilot product, Eclipse PS1, to be manufactured in a limited production. A manufacturing plant in the US has been identified, and as soon as the funding is available, production can begin. A prototype of the Pink Cloud has also been in development and tested in preparation for the beta-tester community.

Our mission is to empower women with the Eclipse digital breast self-exam system. Our goal is to put working prototypes into the hands of 1000 women by the first quarter of 2014 to gain critical feedback to have the Eclipse prepared for full production by the fourth quarter of 2014. Our goal is to have over a million Eclipses in the hands of women by the end of 2015, and more than 20 million within fiver years. We will also create and distribute over 1000 community kits to developing countries by the end of 2015, and 100,000 kits within five years.

Eclipse technology will also be made available to the medical community with the goal of radically improving current mammography systems, as well as empowering women and their doctors to work together to deliver the most comprehensive breast health.
Help us make history for women everywhere by providing an effective means of early detection that leads to early treatment in the fight against breast cancer.

This is where we need your help. The Eclipse PS1 (Phase1) system is a non-medical, beta model device. We want to put the Eclipse PS1 technology into the hands of women and medical professionals as soon as possible to gather critical feedback.
We’re looking to raise $650,000 to finish the funding needed to get the Eclipse to market.
Become Part of the Eclipse Solution Team

Make history by being the first to benefit from Eclipse! You will become part of a pilot team and learn how to use the Eclipse system and help us in the development of the final phase of Eclipse with your feedback! We want to know how you like the design, instructions, the Pink Cloud and educational components we make available. Your kit will include an Eclipse pilot system plus educational booklet and video.
What is the Eclipse PS1 Beta

The Eclipse PS-1 is a beta model/system used for evaluation and feedback from women and medical professionals It's purpose is to get our technology into the hands of 1,000 women and medical professionals for important feedback that will ultimately help our final product. This will help the company grow its user experience smartly.

Getting early adopters in at this level has a huge win-win effect for both Eclipse and the women it will help. The whole purpose is to test and develop Eclipse iteratively until it is the best it can be.

The Eclipse PS-1 program is designed to take participants through a journey of learning and discovery about breast health. It is designed for both learning and input as the process moves forward. The Eclipse experience will guide participants through:
Interactions with the Eclipse engineering and medical professional team
Help determine the final commercial Eclipse PS-2

NOTE: The Eclipse 1 device is not intended to diagnose, treat, cure or prevent any disease. The FDA has not yet evaluated the Eclipse PS1 device, technology, services or statements. The Eclipse PS1 device is a pre-production model intended to be used by our pilot program participants, for the use of simulation practice, education and testing. Since the Eclipse PS1 works off of very low-level light (photons), there is no invasive or harmful technology involved. Our goal is to create a device commercially available FDA approved device that will act as a prompting tool for the user to seek professional medical attention if changes in the breast are seen and/or detected, and empower women to better monitor their breast health.
Brad Graves, Bob Baransko and Korey Castillo, San Diego Business Journal

“We have interviewed and have seen many impressive technologies and innovative companies in San Diego but after visiting the Eclipse labs and seeing the Eclipse demonstration we were truly amazed. This is a technology and product path that will literally change the breast health industry. A definite game changer and life-saver.”
Dr Han Chiu M.D., MA, Stanford School of Medicine

“I believe this is a great advancement for breast cancer and perhaps beyond to other areas of the body,” said Dr. Han Chiu MD, Stanford School of Medicine.  “It’s as safe as using your own finger tips only much more sensitive and effective.  There hasn’t been anything like this for breast health which gives me as a physician quantifiable data to be more objective while also adding to better patient interaction.”
James H. Adair, Ph.D., Professor, Material Science and Engineering and Bioengineering, Penn State University - Keystone Nano, Inc
“Eclipse’s vision absolutely resonates with the vision we have at Penn State and Keystone Nano.

Eclipse and our technologies will empower women with more than just early detection, it means that the words, ""You have cancer.' will stop evoking the fear and desperation and lead to us treating cancer like just another treatable disease.  Early detection means far less invasive surgical options are possible.  Your early detection system resonates with me because we at Keystone Nano share your vision.

We share the same enthusiastic outlook for this technology and willingness to create solutions to transform this dreaded disease into a manageable illness.  My wife, Bernadette has battled breast cancer with 11 major surgeries
I am honored to work with the Eclipse team as part of our important mission.”
Device Would Add to Arsenal In Fight Against Breast CancerClick here to read more

MEDCITY NEWS: Can this startup raise $650K from the crowd to launch at-home breast imaging device?
CROWDFUND INSIDER: Eclipse: An At-Home Breast Cancer Screening Device Crowdfunding On Indiegogo
YOUR FAB LIFE: At-Home Breast Cancer Screening Device Is First Line of Prevention
MOBI HEALTH NEWS: Wireless breast self-exam device heads to Indiegogo
MASS DEVICE: Women's health startup solicits crowd-funding for at-home breast exam device
GIGAOM: Do women need a digital breast self-exam? This Indiegogo project thinks so
What is the advantage of using the Eclipse over a traditional breast self-exam?
Eclipse sensors are three- to five-times more sensitive than the human touch. This means potential issues might be detected much sooner… you’re literally “seeing” what you otherwise might not feel.
You can save your Eclipse images to monitor changes in your breast health from month-to-month.

Expert advice is a click away using The Pink Cloud. You’re never alone to review your Eclipse scans. You can subscribe to our review service to share your images with an expert. Or share the images to help your doctor to locate your area of concern easier.

No. The Eclipse is designed to track changes in breast tissue, which may indicate a need for follow up by your physician. Eclipse should never be considered an alternative to normal diagnostic procedures like mammograms. Eclipse serves as a “prompting tool” to seek medical attention sooner if something suspicious appears.
How can Eclipse improve my breast health?

Eclipse creates a “digital” breast self-exam by creating digital images of your deep tissue. The images highlight differences in the tissue density to indicate where a potential issue might be. The goal is to identify possible masses earlier to prompt you to seek further diagnosis by your doctor. Eclipse images also can be saved so you can monitor changes from month-to-month.
Do I need a prescription to use the Eclipse?
No. Your health care provider may recommend that you use the Eclipse, but a prescription is not necessary to purchase or use the Eclipse.
Currently, Eclipse in not covered by most insurance. Eclipse is new on the market and we’re working with insurance companies in hopes of making it eligible.
Why should I buy the first generation Eclipse rather than waiting for the FDA-approved version?

There is no better time than NOW to get a start with early detection. As a user of our first generation Eclipse model, you will have the earliest possible start at methodically monitoring your breast health! In addition, you will receive a free upgrade when the FDA-approved version is available.",32.0,0,"1 Campaign

column1: Contacts2Go will be manufactured using a range of plastic injection molding techniques, as well as a variety of materials such as PP(Polypropylene) and rubberized plastic, all approved by the FDA for medical devises and are non toxic and non permeable, to prevent bacterial buildup.

When the successful funding of the Contacts2go is complete, The expert engineers at “Sun Tooling and manufacturing” located in Centerville Utah,  will ensure the tightest tolerances possible to make sure the C2G meets the highest possible standards.

This process will take approximately 4 weeks to complete, Funder's “please be patient” it’s critical this is done right. When the tooling is complete and the first samples are assembled, We will test and approve the first run and post an update to all funders. It will take approximately another 3  weeks to produce package and ship the first run. So funder's can expect them around January 2014

Having the tooling and molding produced is very expensive
How we plan to do it

Contacts2Go will be manufactured using a range of plastic injection molding techniques, as well as a variety of materials such as PP(Polypropylene) and rubberized plastic, all approved by the FDA for medical devises and are non toxic and non permeable, to prevent bacterial buildup.

When the successful funding of the Contacts2go is complete, The expert engineers at “Sun Tooling and manufacturing” located in Centerville Utah,  will ensure the tightest tolerances possible to make sure the C2G meets the highest possible standards.

This process will take approximately 4 weeks to complete, Funder's “please be patient” it’s critical this is done right. When the tooling is complete and the first samples are assembled, We will test and approve the first run and post an update to all funders. It will take approximately another 3  weeks to produce package and ship the first run. So funder's can expect them around January 2014
Thank you, Thank you, Thank you for looking

Short Summary

We all take pictures on our smartphones when at weddings, birthday parties and anniversaries. You'll probably find the organisers have a professional photographer cataloguing the whole event. But, no matter how good the professional is, we always get a very, well, ""professional"" and small snapshot of what actually happened during the day. You'll also need to wait for the photographer to release your pics so you can share them one by one with your friends and family.

As a keen photographer I'd like to encourage the ease of sharing those ""real"" pictures with your friends - You know the ones of your best man caught eyeing up the bridesmaid or Mum sneaking another piece of cake.

This project will provide a service that allows everyone at your party to take a picture on their smartphone and it automatically be uploaded to a cloud service that can be streamed live onto any internet connected device, viewed later by the host and easily share all the photos from your event with everyone that was there. No more uploading photos, no more fake poses for Facebook pictures and finally a real picture of what happened on your special day.

 

What We Need &
column2:
What You Get

The 3 guys involved with this project may be good at professional photography, video production and design but we're certainly not code developers.

We need the £60,000 requested to hire developers capable of building a service of this magnitude that will offer its users security, reliability and affordability.

If we don't reach our goal, we've opted to donate all funds raised to a charity aimed at freeing those oppressed from human trafficking. Hope for Justice.

Other Ways You Can Help

Not everyone can contribute financially but may still want to help with this project. We're always open to suggestions as to how you can spread the word, offer skills that you believe are valuable to project or just offering advice on how we can reach our goals.

column1: Vaultek® is a smart safe designed to keep your belongings - yours.
Your things, the things you love.  Your life, your security.  Vaultek® is making personal security more accessible than ever - protecting what matters most.

The Vaultek™ app connects via Bluetooth to allowing you to remotely unlock the safe.  We have employed a sophisticated encryption algorithm to ensure the Bluetooth communication between your phone and the Vaultek™ safe are completely secure.
A high resolution fingerprint scanner grants quick access to the safe.  You can store up to 20 different user IDs.
A backlit numeric keypad illuminates at night via proximity sensor providing visibility at night or in low light environments.

column2: >How your Vaultek® safe keeps people out.

column1: <div>The uni-body exterior is created from formed carbon steel
column2: there are no welds for superior strength.

column1: Latches are impact resistant to withstand forceful impacts.
Reinforced anti-pry bars along the seams prevent tools from attempting to pry the safe open.
Hinges are mounted on the interior so they can not be breached.

Activates when six (6) consecutive incorrect keypad entries are made. During sleep mode the keypad does not accept any entries for two minutes. If a button is pressed during Sleep Mode, all of the numbers flash red and the alarm sounds twice. The backup key may be used to open the safe during sleep mode.

The Vaultek™ safe has a built in tamper detection feature that will let you know if someone has entered an incorrect code on the keypad. You will receive a notification on your phone when someone has entered an incorrect code on the keypad if in Bluetooth range.

column2: >Vaultek® integrates powerful technology to create a safe that's not only secure, but accessible and simple to use.  Its core features a 32-bit micro processor that creates a highly responsive experience.  Whether you are opening the safe with the app, numeric keypad, or the fingerprint scanner - feedback is quick and accurate.

column1: Vaultek™ safes use a high resolution fingerprint scanner with a scanning area of 9mm x 9mm.  The safe does not keep any fingerprint images in its memory.  It only extracts and keeps digital templates consisting of minute information of the original print.  This information can not be used to reconstruct fingerprint images.  This results in safeguarding your identify while providing quick and accurate access.

column2: a feature that silences the polyphonic feedback.

column1: With interior LEDs, you can see your belongings in dark environments, and using the Vaultek™ app you can control the brightness of the light.

Speed is key to immediate access.  A proximity sensor automatically detects your hand presence and readies the safe for input commands.  This is especially helpful at night or in dimly lit environments, allowing the interface to illuminate for visibility.
When transporting your safe, you may wish to put your safe into travel mode in order to save power.
Under normal usage the battery can last up to 4 months.  When ready to recharge, an included micro-USB cable plugs into the safe sidewall.

column4: >The Vaultek™ app is available for Android and iOS devices.

column1: The app brings in a new level of interaction between you and the safe.  You can perform multiple tasks, including unlocking the safe with one simple swipe.
1. Monitor battery level: Opt to receive notifications of low battery.
2. Remotely unlock safe: While in Bluetooth range you can remotely open the safe with the Vaultek™ app.
3. Adjust the brightness of the interior light: You can vary the brightness on the internal light of the safe from 0 – 100%.
4. Option to disable sound: Can turn the successful unlock sound, and the number keypad sound On/Off.
5. Manage multiple user accounts: With the app you can delete User Ids from the safe or assign a name to any User ID. Set Password and manage multiple user accounts.
6. Track usage history of safe access

Due to several requests since start of campaign to offer a non fingerprint model, our team moved quickly to develop a solution.  Introducing the VT20, all the same features of the VT20i, but without the fingerprint scanner for an improved price point.
3. Charging kit with micro-USB cable and AC adapter
5. Mounting hardware to bolt down safe

column2: >Vaultek® is the result of more than two years non-stop hard work by a team of designers, engineers, testers and advisors. Our goal has always been to come up with the best personal safe that incorporates advanced technology, elegant styling, solid construction, and excellent workmanship.  We started from rough concepts with wild ideas two years ago, and now we have completed the production tooling and
column4: > engineering tests. We have created (6) functional units using production tooling, and very pleased with the results: the safe looks beautiful, feels great, and performs reliably.

column2: >The keypad construction is similar to professional gaming keyboards
column3: powered by a fast micro processor.  The safe can be accessed quickly and reliably through the keypad, a high resolution fingerprint scanner, or the Vaultek® smartphone app. The safe contains many features that have not been seen before in this industry.

column2: >Our team is very proud of what we have achieved thus far, and we will continue our progress by receiving feedback and testing functional units to identify all problems and glitches - revising and refining before moving into mass production. We invite you to become a Vaultek® Beta Pilot tester and give us your feedback.

>By supporting the Vaultek® community as a backer, you help us transition from testing stage to the first mass production scheduled to start late September this year. Your contribution completes this last leg of our long journey.  Many thanks from the Vaultek® team!
>Formed carbon steel assembly before exterior is powder coated.
>CNC machined badges and molded control panel.

column1: 1.  What are the general applications for this safe?

A: This safe is a secure personal storage device with quick access through fingerprints, a pin code, or the smartphone app. It is typically used to store firearms and valuables such as jewelry, documents, data storage devices, prescribed medicines, etc.
A: Less than 1/10 second upon entering the correct PIN code, fingerprint acceptance, or successfully unlocking from the app.
3.  How many fingerprints can be added to the safe?
4.  What type of battery does my Vaultek® safe use?
A: The safe uses a Model 18650, rechargeable, lithium-ion battery.  It is a 3.7V, rechargeable battery that is commonly available with capacities ranging between 2000 and 3500mAh.
5.  What is the charging time for the battery?
A: It takes approximately 2.5 hours to charge the battery from empty to full.
6.  How can I check the battery level?

A: To check the remaining capacity of battery, press and hold the ‘5’ button on the keypad for three seconds. The buttons from ‘1’ to ‘4’ will glow green or red to indicate the remaining capacity. You can also use the Vaultek® app on your smartphone to check the battery level. The number of lights indicates the amount of the power remaining.
7.  How long can the battery work before recharge?
A: For each full charge, the battery can last 4 months under normal operating conditions. However the battery life will decrease significantly under extremely low or high temperatures.

A: The safe can be charged by using any standard Micro USB cell phone charger.  The safe can be connected to the supplied wall adapter or any powered USB port for charging.  A Micro USB cable is included. Each safe also comes with a mechanical key.
9.  Is the safe approved for hand guns in California?
A: Not yet, but we are in the process of getting certified with California DOJ testing.
10.  Is there a way to secure the safe so it cannot be carried away?
A: A steel cable is supplied with each safe. The safe also has internal mounting holes, enabling it to be bolted to a flat surface.  Bolts are included.
A: The main housing structures are made of high tensile strength 16-gauge carbon steel with a durable powder coating for corrosion protection.
12.  How many numbers are required for the numerical code?
A: Any sequence of 4-8 single keypad entries.
13.  Is my Vaultek® safe fire proof or water proof?
A: No, the safe is neither fire proof nor water proof. This safe has been specifically designed for portable secure access control and convenience.
A: Yes, the fingerprint sensor in the safe is not affected by sunlight.
15.  Can I travel with my Vaultek® safe through US Customs or TSA Security at the airport?

A: Yes, there are no restrictions on carrying this type of item. Please be aware that  you may be asked to open your safe rather than passing it through x-ray,  and that we recommend that an enrolled user be present during the transport of this item in case such a request is made by a government authority.
17.  What are the internal and external dimensions of the safe?
A:  External: W x D x H=11.5” x 9’ x 2.75”
column2: Internal: W x D x H=11” x 6.5’ x 2”

column1: 18.  Can I open the safe in the dark?
A: Yes, the safe is equipped with proximity sensors that illuminate the keypad and fingerprint sensor when your hand touches the keypad area.

2. To Richard @ iRay - The 3D animation came out awesome.  http://www.iray3d.com
3. To our backers.  You make this possible.  Thank you.

Vaultek® is the result of more than two years non-stop hard work by a team of designers, engineers, testers and advisors. Our goal has always been to come up with the best personal safe that incorporates advanced technology, elegant styling, solid construction, and excellent workmanship.  We started from rough concepts with wild ideas two years ago, and now we have completed the production tooling and stage one engineering tests. We have created (6) functional units using production tooling, and very pleased with the results: the safe looks beautiful, feels great, and performs reliably.
The keypad construction is similar to professional gaming keyboards
column2: powered by a fast micro processor.  The safe can be accessed quickly and reliably through the keypad, a high resolution fingerprint scanner, or the Vaultek® smartphone app. The safe contains many features that have not been seen before in this industry.

column1: Our team is very proud of what we have achieved thus far, and we will continue our progress by receiving feedback and testing functional units to identify all problems and glitches - revising and refining before moving into mass production. We invite you to become a Vaultek® Beta Pilot tester and give us your feedback.

By supporting the Vaultek® community as a backer, you help us transition from testing stage to the first mass production scheduled to start late September this year. Your contribution completes this last leg of our long journey.  Many thanks from the Vaultek® team!

1.  What are the general applications for this safe?

A: This safe is a secure personal storage device with quick access through fingerprints, a pin code, or the smartphone app. It is typically used to store firearms and valuables such as jewelry, documents, data storage devices, prescribed medicines, etc.
2.  How quickly does the safe open?
A: Less than 1/10 second upon entering the correct PIN code, fingerprint acceptance, or successfully unlocking from the app.
3.  How many fingerprints can be added to the safe?
A: 20 unique fingerprints can be registered.
4.  What type of battery does my Vaultek® safe use?
A: The safe uses a Model 18650, rechargeable, lithium-ion battery.  It is a 3.7V, rechargeable battery that is commonly available with capacities ranging between 2000 and 3500mAh.
5.  What is the charging time for the battery?
A: It takes approximately 2.5 hours to charge the battery from empty to full.
6.  How can I check the battery level?

A: To check the remaining capacity of battery, press and hold the ‘5’ button on the keypad for three seconds. The buttons from ‘1’ to ‘4’ will glow green or red to indicate the remaining capacity. You can also use the Vaultek® app on your smartphone to check the battery level. The number of lights indicates the amount of the power remaining.
7.  How long can the battery work before recharge?
A: For each full charge, the battery can last 4 months under normal operating conditions. However the battery life will decrease significantly under extremely low or high temperatures.
8.  What happens if the battery dies?

A: The safe can be charged by using any standard Micro USB cell phone charger.  The safe can be connected to the supplied wall adapter or any powered USB port for charging.  A Micro USB cable is included. Each safe also comes with a mechanical key.
9.  Is the safe approved for hand guns in California?
A: Not yet, but we are in the process of getting certified with California DOJ testing.
10.  Is there a way to secure the safe so it cannot be carried away?
A: A steel cable is supplied with each safe. The safe also has internal mounting holes, enabling it to be bolted to a flat surface.  Bolts are included.
11.  What is the safe made of?
A: The main housing structures are made of high tensile strength 16-gauge carbon steel with a durable powder coating for corrosion protection.
12.  How many numbers are required for the numerical code?
A: Any sequence of 4-8 single keypad entries.
13.  Is my Vaultek® safe fire proof or water proof?
A: No, the safe is neither fire proof nor water proof. This safe has been specifically designed for portable secure access control and convenience.
14.  Will my Vaultek® safe work outside?
A: Yes, the fingerprint sensor in the safe is not affected by sunlight.
15.  Can I travel with my Vaultek® safe through US Customs or TSA Security at the airport?

A: Yes, there are no restrictions on carrying this type of item. Please be aware that  you may be asked to open your safe rather than passing it through x-ray,  and that we recommend that an enrolled user be present during the transport of this item in case such a request is made by a government authority.
16.  How much does the safe weigh?
17.  What are the internal and external dimensions of the safe?
A:  External: W x D x H=11.5” x 9’ x 2.75”
column2: Internal: W x D x H=11” x 6.5’ x 2”

column1: 18.  Can I open the safe in the dark?
A: Yes, the safe is equipped with proximity sensors that illuminate the keypad and fingerprint sensor when your hand touches the keypad area.

column4: >The Lycan Powerbox is a portable solar storage solution

column1: that puts abundant, natural energy right at the tips of your fingers. Keep 100%
solar power ready to go in case of an emergency power outage, take it with you
for camping trips, or just use it when needed as an eco-friendly alternative
power source to lighten your home’s electrical load.
After a few hours of charging from a solar panel, wall
outlet, or 12V car charging socket The Lycan Powerbox can be used to power up a number of appliances and
devices—without the noise and pollution of traditional gas generators.
Lightweight and rugged, it’s the perfect little powerhouse to keep you going
for up to 900 watt-hours. And as the first portable solar storage with
swappable batteries, it’s easy to keep the power flowing for hours on end.

column1: disaster, to provide sustainable energy you can tap into when grid power is
down. In light of the recent Japan and Ecuador earthquakes and other adverse
weather around the globe, having a backup power plan has never been more
important for keeping you safe and connected. The Lycan Powerbox’s solar
storage can help you and your loved ones prepare for unexpected environmental
catastrophes by powering up your most needed devices on the fly. The simple act
of communicating with a family member could make all the difference if the
power goes out due to a storm or other cause. Though we can’t prevent natural
disasters, we can use The Lycan to protect our families, provide support during
uncertain situations, and lessen the impact of widespread power failures.

column1: engineer a superior lithium-iron-phosphate battery (a higher grade than the

makes this portable solar storage solution so exceptional—a feature we knew

very first compact solar storage product to include an interchangeable battery,
The Lycan allows you to prepare a library of fully charged batteries for quick,

waiting hours to recharge the unit, and when the battery runs through its life
cycle, you don’t have to run out and buy a whole new generator! This feature is
not only super convenient and energy efficient, it could potentially be a
lifesaver in the event of a natural disaster or other emergency.

column1: • Three options for charging: outlet, solar panel, and car charging socket
• 100% clean energy with solar panel charge
<i>After the idea of a powerful but easy to use portable solar storage solution,
our engineering team quickly got to work with initial green-focused designs and
prototypes. The goal was to create a safe, sustainable product that maximized
performance and minimized the space. Given that there would be a lot of
components in a portable box, the engineering team also anticipated a lot of
heat generation. Therefore, initial designs catered to proper and natural heat
dissipation. Keeping safety as a priority, the engineering team researched and
decided on an initial design for the battery component. Once the initial design
was given the green light, the first shell was Rapid Prototyped to ensure form
and portability at full scale. Following the shell, the engineering team worked
endlessly to place the components in a fashion that geared the highest
performance, optimal efficiency, and maximum utility.

Post Design / Improvements / Accomplishments 
In order to execute a product while keeping in mind the end goal, improvements
needed to be made. For starters, the engineering team was able to reduce the
size of the initial prototype, while maintaining the same peak performance. The
internal components were redesigned to optimize the space and air flow. In
order to increase internal air circulation, the Lycan was installed with
ultra-quiet fans and had more vents put into play in order to maximize heat
dissipation. The initial battery design came into question and upon further
review, we decided to go for the safest and most long-lasting battery
chemistries in the market today, lithium-iron-phosphate. Along with that, our
proprietary battery and connectors were designed to allow for quick and easy
replacing or swapping of the battery. This will eventually be a practice that
every consumer could do in under 20 seconds, if needed. These are the
improvements that have been accomplished thus far.

What still needs to be done?
The Lycan design needs to undergo more safety and performance
tests for viability purposes. The LCD display is scheduled to be tooled out and
programmed to display parameters such as voltage values, amperage values, and
even state of charge (SOC) values for the different components both DC and AC.
Lastly, the battery needs to undergo a final test and approval upon mass
production. Once an overall design is finalized, the production mold will be
created and scheduled to meet mass production requirements.

Thank you for your contribution to Renogy Solar and supporting
our mission to bring The Lycan Powerbox to light. As a token of our gratitude
for your gift, please enjoy these rewards.
The Renogy product development team is a diverse,
young-hearted, determined, and intelligent group of eco-warriors who share a
passion for innovation and clean energy goals. We utilize constant
collaboration and creativity to build cutting-edge, sustainable products that
make everyday lives easier, more efficient, and greener. We’re enthusiastic
about bringing our latest solar storage innovation, The Lycan Powerbox, to
homes and organizations of all shapes and sizes.
Q. What is the expected lifespan of the battery?
Q. Can I use the Lycan Powerbox while it’s charging?
A. Yes, the Lycan Powerbox operates as a UPS (uninterruptible power supply) system.
Q. Can the Lycan Powerbox power my entire home?
A. No, the Lycan Powerbox can power a total of 1200 Watts AC.
A. No, however the casing of the Lycan Powerbox is water resistant
Q. What is the warranty for the Lycan Powerbox?
Q. Which Renogy panel is best suited for the Lycan Powerbox?
A. The Lycan Powerbox is compatible with all Renogy solar panels but we recommend pairing it with the solar suitcase w/o controller due to its portable nature.
Q. What happens if I change my address before it ships?
A. Please email Indiegogo@renogy.com with your order confirmation and new shipping address.
Q. What is included in the package?

A. The Lycan Powerbox, an AC adapter, and a MC4 to DC connector. Note: The Lycan Powerbox will not include solar panels with purchase (unless included in the perk), they will need to be purchased separately.
Q. Is it safe to use the Lycan Powerbox indoors?

Risks and Challenges

As an experienced manufacturer in the solar industry, Renogy continues 
to push the envelope when it comes to efficiency. Although risks and 
challenges are a part of any product launch, you can be certain that the 
Renogy team is taking all the necessary precautions to ensure that this 
product launch is delivered on schedule and working to mitigate any 
issues we may encounter regarding final lead time and/or legal contract 
information. Our dedicated product development team is excited to see 
The Lycan Powerbox launch successfully, and we promise to take 
whatever steps are necessary to begin delivery in August of 2016. 
Unforeseen challenges may arise, but you can count on the Renogy 
team to face any obstacles head on, as we have done so in the past. As 
this product progresses, Renogy will make sure to keep all of our backers 
in the loop with real-time updates regarding advancement and 
drawbacks.

A. The Lycan Powerbox is compatible with all Renogy solar panels but we recommend pairing it with the solar suitcase w/o controller due to its portable nature.
Q. What happens if I change my address before it ships?
A. Please email Indiegogo@renogy.com with your order confirmation and new shipping address.
Q. What is included in the package?

A. The Lycan Powerbox, an AC adapter, and a MC4 to DC connector. Note: The Lycan Powerbox will not include solar panels with purchase (unless included in the perk), they will need to be purchased separately.
Q. Is it safe to use the Lycan Powerbox indoors?

Risks and ChallengesAs an experienced manufacturer in the solar industry, Renogy continues to push the envelope when it comes to efficiency. Although risks and challenges are a part of any product launch, you can be certain that the Renogy team is taking all the necessary precautions to ensure that this product launch is delivered on schedule and working to mitigate any issues we may encounter regarding final lead time and/or legal contract information. Our dedicated product development team is excited to see The Lycan Powerbox launch successfully, and we promise to take whatever steps are necessary to begin delivery in August of 2016. Unforeseen challenges may arise, but you can count on the Renogy team to face any obstacles head on, as we have done so in the past. As this product progresses, Renogy will make sure to keep all of our backers in the loop with real-time updates regarding advancement and drawbacks.",60.0,0,"1 Campaign

column1: GoldEye Bar powers a wide range of devices equipped with a barrel plug or USB connector.  Most versatile and easy to use rapid-DC power bank.The barrel port 'Quick OUT notch' discharges  12V-16V-19V currents.
DC current is faster than your charger as there is no conversion transformer inside or outside the devices used. Battery to Battery charge.

column2: >A wide range of USB connector tip or barrel-tip cables can be found online to match your device
> Surprise Attack by Raccoons During our Photo-shoot

column1: Q) Can I charge 2 or more devices at the same time? Yes.You can charge simultaneously 2 or more devices. You can charge 2 mobile phones + a tablet + a laptop +.... As long as there are remaining out ports.

Q) How does the GoldEye recharge?   The GoldEye can be recharged  1. Through an A/C wall plug,  2. through a car's lighter out or 3. by the sun. It will recharge even when ''off'' and left in the sun on your window sill. Think of the GoldEye as a rechargeable battery...whose role is to recharge the batteries of other devices.
Q) How long does GoldEye's saved energy last? Like an battery, it will stay full until you start using it. We recommend recharging it once every 6 months to ensure it remains full when you need it.
Q) How long does it take to recharge my GoldEye Bar to 100%? The A/C wall recharge time is 3 hours. Recharging from the Sun alone takes 2 days.

Q) Can I plug my devices to GoldEye while it is recharging itself from the sun? Yes. GoldEye can simultaneously charge your devices while recharging itself from the sun! You can leave your appliances attached (connected by cable) to the GoldEye Bar and the sun will continue to fill it up. Of course, the sun-recharge process is much slower than the A/C recharge method and does not imply the sun's energy is directly filling your device. It will most probably also use part of the saved energy supply.
Q) How do I use GoldEye? Turn GoldEye on. Connect your device to  the 5V USB ports  (for mobiles) OR  to the Quick Out Notch port. The USB port supports maximum 5 volts
column2: the 'Quick Out Notch' port supports 12,  16 and 19 Volts

column1: Q) Can I use the 2 USB  port to charge cameras or laptops? No. You use 'Quick Out Notch' to charge large devices like cameras and laptops since this is where the 12v-16v-19v charge comes out!   The 2 USB ports is 5V for smallest devices like mobiles phones.
Q) What's the difference between the Out Notch &
column2: the USB ports please!?   Both accept USB connector cables but the Out notch also accepts barrel tip connector.  Out Notch gives higher voltage to charge large devices like laptops and the 2 USB ports are for small devices like mobile phones.   Not all USB cables can handle the same currents so the USB adaptor tip is made to transfer higher voltage current!

column1: Q) What If I plug my phone to the wrong port, it will take too much voltage and damage?

As mentioned above, If your mobile is compatible with Quick Charge technology then GoldEye Bar will fast charge it through the Out Notch port. Some recent Mobiles take fast charge, some don't. Check your phone's capability and plug it in the Safe USB ports if it takes lower voltage.

Q) Where do I find cables that correspond with my device(s) if they are not included in the GoldEye package? The package includes 2 sets of cables: it's all you need.  You can find a wide range of USB cables online that fit your your devices. USB is the most common and adaptable cable tip out there. Some companies offer safe Magsafe-to-USB for example. Many DSLR battery chargers come with USB. A simple online search will give you affordable, safe and versatile range of cables for you. Or, Just ask us, we might be able to hand you some (cables or advice)!

Q) I am so confused! which voltage do I choose for my device? GoldEye's Out Notch voltage settings are 12v, 16v, 19v. Check the specifications (voltage, amps, watts) that are written on the device or on the battery of the device you want to charge. Find specifications online or call the manufacturer!

To simplify things, think of the GoldEye as a battery that charges the battery of your other devices. Don't be intimidated by the size or cost of your device as the important component is the battery of your device.
Q) But, the voltage of my device does not match exactly 12v/16v/19v, can I still use GoldEye?

As guidance, follow one basic simple rule: always choose the higher voltage +- 5V and never the lower one. For example, if your appliance requires 14.2 volts, then we recommend you choose setting 16V on the GoldEye and NOT 12v!  We recommend asking your device's manufacturer which of the three 12-16-19v setting is the best to recharge your device. The majority of devices are in that range.
• The GoldEye is a power bank battery. This means it stores energy and saves it for later use
• GoldEye will continue charging your devices while simultaneously recharging itself from the sun! It will also recharge itself from the sunlight even when it is turned off.
• High-sensitivity solar panel - solar charger will absorb sunlight, even the smallest ray of light touching it will begin the recharge GoldEye
• GoldEye will automatically go in sleep mode if even if you forget the power ON. It will also turn off when it is done charging your devices and when finished recharging itself.

column2: >THANK YOU FOR VISITING SHARE IT IF YOU LIKE IT!

column2: >On order: Write your ring size in the same field as your name.
>My name is Stanley Wissmar and I have a background

column1: within Nanotechnology. We have developed a patented concept named ""SMARTRing"" which can be
used for a wide variety of applications. Technology has now progressed so far
that it is ready to adapt to us consumers fully on our terms. There is no need
to carry pass cards or keys etc. which can easily be misplaced or stolen. Now
it can all be stored in an ordinary fingering. With the latest generation of
Smartphones enabled with NFC (Near Field Communication, similar to RFID) you
can program pass cards and tags for your own individual needs. The silver based SMARTRing is
packaged with two NFC tags, one on the front side and the other on the backside,

in order to use it for several, different applications. The plastic part has an excellent (scratch resistant) surface which makes it impossible to see the difference from silver. It is commonly used for the medical industry (hearing aids etc.) so hence no allergic problems will become an issue.
instead of a pass card to your digital door lock at home or at work.
Smartphone: unlock screenlock on your Smartphone easily, to protect others than
authenticate easily every time you want to log in
online even more secure than today by having an extra secret password stored in
excerpt. See also on Google Play all the Apps that are already available for
finished with the development and prototyping and are now ready to launch
production where you can be one of the first, proud owners of this
We need 30 000 USD in order to launch our first
production line. In detail it consists of manufacturing the electronics,
The Product: Our first product line will
be a classical design: an ordinary 6mm wide silvering which can be worn by both
male and females. The inside is made of pure silver and the outside of a
plastic with an excellent silver finish. The plastic is needed in order for the
NFC tag antenna to communicate with the Smartphone or Reader. So both in looks
and shape it is reminiscent of an ordinary ditto (see picture above).
Our unique perk is that by funding this project you
will get at the price of:
own SMARTRing with engravement (initials inside the ring)
If we do not reach our goal we will use the funds to develop
and widen our product portfolio to offer a broader variety of rings having
ornaments and precious stones (diamonds, sapphire, zirconium etc.)
where you can make your own design in collaboration with our design team.
will be delivered in an exclusive gift box and sent with express delivery (DHL,
Your ring should fit your finger comfortably
enough so that it will not fall off, but loose enough to slide over your
knuckle. Finger size changes depending on the time of day and the weather. For
best results measure your finger size:
At the end of the day and when your fingers are warm
(Fingers are smaller in the early morning and when cold.)
Measure finger size 3 to 4 times to eliminate an
Women’s rings typically range from size 3 to 9. The
most commonly purchased women’s ring sizes range from size 5 to 7. Size 6 is
Men’s rings typically range from size 8 to 14. The
most commonly purchased men’s ring sizes range from size 8 to 10-½. Size 9 is
If ordering from outside of the US or Canada,
determine your ring size according to your country’s standard. Then use the
International Ring Size Chart to convert to the corresponding US ring size to
The impact is limitless as this will make it possible
for people to use the newly established technology (NFC with Smartphones) with
traditional accessories having added security and instant availability not obtained
Invest in your own SMARTRing and experience the next
generation of possibilities opening up with the NFC enabled Smartphones. We are
a highly skilled team experienced in rolling out new products and this will be one
Please help us in spreading the word of this new product. It is the first in line and we are most grateful for your support and
feedback in how we can improve it even more. Also, use the Indiegogo share

column4: >Millions of people are traveling, millions of people are living far from their home, family and friends. They need to communicate. But this is expensive. VoIP solutions can reduce communications costs and provide services, unavailable in telephone networks (video calls, media exchange and so on).
>So, where would you like to have VoIP solution? No doubts the best place is your mobile phone. It is always with you.

column1: What are the main problems when using mobile VoIP:
• Poor voice quality or no voice in 3G networks.
• If application is switched off you can not receive calls.
• If application is running in background it will drain battery very fast.

column4: >There are numerous VoIP solutions for mobile phones - Skype, Viber, Google Voice, SIP providers.
>Our service is designed for mobile networks.

column1: • It use very low bandwidth (~30% less than Skype), so you can make good quality calls in 3G networks.

column4: >It is a telephony service based on SIP. The user have a telephone number (internal or from one of 60 countries). He can make calls using traditional phone interface.

column1: • Server software and hardware which can serve up to 10,000 customers.
• Clients (Soft Phones) for Android and iOS.
• For desktop users we have Webphone which can be used in Web browser (Google Chrome, Opera, FireFox) without any additional software.
Currently we have about 1500 customers, which are using our service for free. And this number is increasing every day.
In order not to stop registration we must invest in equipment.
If we reach our goal
column2: >€25,000 we will extend our equipment to serve 100,000 customers.
>We will also continue to develop new versions of applications. We will also develop new customer interface which will allow to order DID numbers from different countries online.
>The more funding we receive, the more we can make for software development.

column1: Our project is very young. And software is far from perfect. But it performs its main function - communicate for free. I hope that with your help we can make this solution one of the best.
Any one can test and use our service for free. Using our service is also a contribution!
If you can not contribute, please share it with your friends.
Don't forget to use Indiegogo share tools!

Millions of people are traveling, millions of people are living far from their home, family and friends. They need to communicate. But this is expensive. VoIP solutions can reduce communications costs and provide services, unavailable in telephone networks (video calls, media exchange and so on).
So, where would you like to have VoIP solution? No doubts the best place is your mobile phone. It is always with you.
What are the main problems when using mobile VoIP:
Poor voice quality or no voice in 3G networks.
If application is switched off you can not receive calls.
If application is running in background it will drain battery very fast.
There are numerous VoIP solutions for mobile phones - Skype, Viber, Google Voice, SIP providers.
Our service is designed for mobile networks.
It use very low bandwidth (~30% less than Skype), so you can make good quality calls in 3G networks.
Low power consumption, long battery life.
All call and messages are encrypted.
It is a telephony service based on SIP. The user have a telephone number (internal or from one of 60 countries). He can make calls using traditional phone interface.
and receive calls from ordinary phones
Server software and hardware which can serve up to 10,000 customers.
Clients (Soft Phones) for Android and iOS.
For desktop users we have Webphone which can be used in Web browser (Google Chrome, Opera, FireFox) without any additional software.
What We Need & What You Get
Currently we have about 1500 customers, which are using our service for free. And this number is increasing every day.
In order not to stop registration we must invest in equipment.
If we reach our goal  €25,000 we will extend our equipment to serve 100,000 customers.
We will also continue to develop new versions of applications. We will also develop new customer interface which will allow to order DID numbers from different countries online.
The more funding we receive, the more we can make for software development.
Our project is very young. And software is far from perfect. But it performs its main function - communicate for free. I hope that with your help we can make this solution one of the best.
Any one can test and use our service for free. Using our service is also a contribution!

Don't forget to use Indiegogo share tools!",6.0,0,"1 Campaign

column11: >We've all folded origami or built a paper model or two before, but up until now no one could program them or control the movement of their papercrafts from a mobile device.
column15: >After months of development, we gave papercrafts the reboot they so direly needed. Kamibot is a programmable robot that you can skin and personalize with papercrafts.

column11: >Kamibot papercrafts are designed to be modular, with customizability in mind. Magnets are placed in paper modules as they are assembled so that you can share parts and accessories among all of your papercrafts.

column2: >
column10: >Control Kamibot's behavior from your smartphone.
column15: >Kamibot can be controlled manually from your smartphone or tablet. When switched to line mode from your phone, it will follow a black line that it detects via infrared sensors located on its underside.

column6: >Kamibot can detect objects in front of itself.
column11: >Not only can Kamibot measure how far an object is away from itself, but it can also avoid obstacles via ultrasound sensors installed at its front. Did we mention, Kamibot serves as a nice nightlight?

column6: >Even children can program Kamibot.
column11: >Kamibot was designed to be an educational toy. Since it was built on the Arduino platform, it is compatible with Arduino and Scratch. This means anyone can reprogram Kamibot with the use of Scratch and Arduino.
column16: >Note: We will provide the Kamibot libraries online on our website at no cost.

column11: >Show us what you can make.
column16: >You can print our templates off our website for free, so you can design your own unique Kamibot from home.
column21: >Note: You should use magnets from our kits, unless your from the future and you printer can print magnets.

column3: />

column7: >You are playing a big role in the birth of Kamibot by supporting our campaign. KamiBot's design is finished and ready for manufacturing.

column3:
>

카미봇을 응원해주셔서 고맙습니다. 

후원해주신 펀딩으로  움직이는 페이퍼토이만이 아닌 누구나 프로그램할수 있고, 다양한 

캐릭터를 직접 만들수 있는 혁신적인 제품(""카미봇"")이 세상에 나올수 있습니다. 

펀딩 금액은 카미봇의 제작에 사용됩니다:

1. PCB  제작 

2. 카미봇 로봇 제작

3. 페이퍼토이 제작

4. 패키지 박스 제작

5. 금형 제작

column5: >A: 종이를 접고, 붙여서 동물, 사람, 캐릭터 등을 3D 형태로 만들어지는것을 말합니다.

>A: 웹사이트에서 제공하는 기본 도면을 다운받으셔서 색칠 또는 도면을 변경하여 만드실수 있습니다.
column13: >Q: 배송 지역이 없으면 어떻게 하나요?
column17: >A: 배송 지역이 선택사항에 없으시면  www.kamibot.com 으로 연락주시면  배송가능하도록 하겠습니다.

column1: Not just a papercraft.We've all folded origami or built a paper model or two before, but up until now no one could program them or control the movement of their papercrafts from a mobile device. After months of development, we gave papercrafts the reboot they so direly needed. Kamibot is a programmable robot that you can skin and personalize with papercrafts.

Magnetic paper modules.Kamibot papercrafts are designed to be modular, with customizability in mind. Magnets are placed in paper modules as they are assembled so that you can share parts and accessories among all of your papercrafts.

Control Kamibot's behavior from your smartphone.Kamibot can be controlled manually from your smartphone or tablet. When switched to line mode from your phone, it will follow a black line that it detects via infrared sensors located on its underside.

Kamibot can detect objects in front of itself.Not only can Kamibot measure how far an object is away from itself, but it can also avoid obstacles via ultrasound sensors installed at its front. Did we mention, Kamibot serves as a nice nightlight?

Even children can program Kamibot.Kamibot was designed to be an educational toy. Since it was built on the Arduino platform, it is compatible with Arduino and Scratch. This means anyone can reprogram Kamibot with the use of Scratch and Arduino. Note: We will provide the Kamibot libraries online on our website at no cost.

Show us what you can make.You can print our templates off our website for free, so you can design your own unique Kamibot from home. Note: You should use magnets from our kits, unless your from the future and you printer can print magnets.

You are playing a big role in the birth of Kamibot by supporting our campaign. KamiBot's design is finished and ready for manufacturing.All funds will go to manufacturing, production, and packaging of KamiBot e.g. materials, casting (tooling), printing/scoring of papercrafts, PCV production.

We are confident and focused on delivering all pledges in a timely manner, However, as with any product that involves complex manufacturing, delays in production could possibly become an issue. We will be transparent with our backers, and keep our backers caught up on any issues we may have and mitigate such issues in a timely manner.
Our team is dedicated to bringing paper to life. Our vision is to expand the human imagination and creativity by bringing movement and animation to something as inanimate as paper.

A: Papercrafting is similar to origami (Japanese art of folding paper) except that the crafter cuts, folds, and glues pieces to create a final 3 dimensional object. In origami there is no such cutting or gluing involved. Note: Kamibot papercrafts come precut and scored
Q: How long is Kamibot's battery life?
A: Kamibot's battery lasts up to 90 minutes.
Q: How can I program Kamibot?
A: Kamibot can be programmed using an Arduino compatible IDE, such as Scratch.
Q: What if I want to make my own papercraft?

A: Since we provide the templates online for free on our website, you can download a blank template and color and design your own unique character from your home.Q: What if my country isn't listed for shipping?A: If your country isn't list, it doesn't mean we can't ship there, just contact us via our landing page www.kamibot.com and we will figure out a way to ship out to you.
단순한 페이퍼토이가 아닙니다.페이퍼토이는 종이를 접어서 캐릭터를 만들수 있지만 스마트폰으로 컨트롤이 되거나 프로그래밍 할수 없습니다.저희는 페이퍼토이를 프로그램 할수 있고, 스마트폰으로 컨트롤할수 있는 새로운 페이퍼토이 ""카미봇""을 만들었습니다.
자석으로 부착이 가능한 페이퍼모듈.카미봇 페이퍼토이는  모듈에 자석이 부착됨으로서 탈부착이 용이하며, 사용자가 디자인 변경하여 다양한 캐릭터를 만들수 있게 설계되었습니다.
카미봇을 스마트폰으로 제어할수 있습니다. 카미봇을 스마트폰으로 제어 할수 있으며, 라인모드를 선택하게 되면, 검은색 라인을 따라 다닙니다.
카미봇은 장애물 감지가 가능합니다. 카미봇은 장애물을 감지할수 있으며, 장애물을 피하갈수 있게 할수 있습니다. 또한 카미봇을 조명으로 활용할수 있습니다.
어린이도 카미봇을 프로그램 할수 있다.카미봇은 소프트웨어 교육에 활용할수 있게 만들어 져있습니다. 어린이 소프트웨어 교육용 툴인 스크래치로 직접 프로그래밍 할수 있으며, 아두이노도 프로그램이 가능합니다. *카미봇 라이브러리를 웹사이트에서 공개 합니다.
나만의 캐릭터를 만들어 보세요.캐릭터의 도면은 웹사이트에서 무료로 제공합니다. 집에서 간편하게 프린트해서 나만의 캐릭터를 만들어보세요.
카미봇을 응원해주셔서 고맙습니다. 후원해주신 펀딩으로  움직이는 페이퍼토이만이 아닌 누구나 프로그램할수 있고, 다양한 캐릭터를 직접 만들수 있는 혁신적인 제품(""카미봇"")이 세상에 나올수 있습니다. 펀딩 금액은 카미봇의 제작에 사용됩니다:1. PCB  제작 2. 카미봇 로봇 제작3. 페이퍼토이 제작4. 패키지 박스 제작5. 금형 제작
우리는 계획대로 카미봇을 생산을 완료하고 배송을 할수 있을것입니다. 그러나 생산 과정에서 생길수 있는 부품 수급 지연,  인증 취득 지연등 예기치못한
요인으로 지연이 될수도 있습니다. 만약 예기치못한 지연 사유가 발생할시에는
지연 내용을 게시판에  게시하고, 문제를 최대한 빨리 해결하도록 할것입니다.
(주)삼쩜일사는 단순한 페이퍼토이를 움직이게 함으로서 창의력과 상상력을 향상시킬수 있는 다양한 인터렉티브 페이퍼이를 만들어 가고 있습니다.
A: 종이를 접고, 붙여서 동물, 사람, 캐릭터 등을 3D 형태로 만들어지는것을 말합니다.
A: 카미봇은 스크래치 또는 아두이노 IDE를 이용하여 프로그램이 가능합니다.
A: 웹사이트에서 제공하는 기본 도면을 다운받으셔서 색칠 또는 도면을 변경하여 만드실수 있습니다.Q: 배송 지역이 없으면 어떻게 하나요?A: 배송 지역이 선택사항에 없으시면  www.kamibot.com 으로 연락주시면  배송가능하도록 하겠습니다.",57.0,4,"1 Campaign

I want to introduce myself, my name is Todd Burnham. My background is IT Technician. I worked with lot of computers, electronics and also repair smartphones. I even worked in the company distribute cell phone accessories and seeing how fast cell phones and accessories are growing. I saw opportunity to create something amazing in cell phone accessories industry. Bring the old technology to the new era. Being IT, and repairing so many smartphones and tablets you need lot of charging cables. You also need lot of outlet walls to plug in USB adapter. Most of the adapter that you get only have one USB, that is so frustration and you have many same devices to charge. Their is one cable that I like it called 4in1 cable, but the issue are short cable, tips are old technology, and you can not charge the same devices. I created custom quad 4in1 cables with longer cable at is 5ft,  and now you can charge same devices like 4 iPhone 7. We did not stop there - Not all cables are equal, that why I have many variety of quad 4in1 cables for you guys to pick.

 Why did I created this cable, because people are using more portal devices in there household, work place, school and public place . Trying to find 4 lightning cables to apple devices and charging that the same time and using 4 usb ports to charge them. That what I came up with idea to use 4in1 cables, customize the tips and make the cable longer - so you still play with your devices. We called this Quad 4in1 cables. Please support us, please keep reading down.

I want to create new technology quad in 4in1 cables, so people have options to pick. There are not any market for this cable.

Here is Concept of drawing quad 4in1 cables, but the cables was to short. So we make the cable longer.

Supports: All my cables are Compatible 

Compatible iPhone 5 / 5c / 5s / 6 / 6+ / 6s / 6s+/ 7 /+7

Compatible iPad mini / mini 2 / mini 3 / mini 4 / Air / Air 2 

 Compatible iPad Pro 

Apple 30 pin Android Phones, Tablets New Android with USB-C like 

Google Pixel, One Plus 3 with USB-C and new Laptop that take Type-C 

Android/Windows Phones and Tablets 

Spec: 

Length Total is 5Ft 

Output: 2.0A and Up

Charge 4 devices as same time 

Cable is Flat Style

4in1 Cable - 4 Apple Lightning

Quad 4in1 Cables - What you need to make your cable charge better!
We recommend using travel charger with 2.4a and Up to power two tablets and two small devices. If your travel charger less then 2.1A, it may not charge all the device as same time.

column1:
Now you can see how useful quad 4in1 cable on all the apple devices!

Now we are in the finalize on our products. We had to make couples updated on the cable length, it was short. We want to make 5 ft, so it easy to plug in and have more space for each of the devices. 

Please Follow Us for Any Update, We will have more pictures and videos demos next week. If you have any questions, please feel free to email me. 

Here the manufacturing  that i'm working with and they are ready to mass produce the cables

Business License

Import License

Manufactory License

 Here is some pictures of people working on cables and the warehouse.

Our Commitment

Last few months have been filled with hard work partnering with the best factories in China to bring the best technology in to your life, We are ready to move forward with manufacturing our products. This will be ship out by Janurary time frame.

Why Indiegogo - We have been working on brand new products over the last months investing our personal money and time. Coming this far, we have refined the Quad 4in1 cables to make life easy, The funds raised with Indiegogo will be used finalize marketing, website, build teams and order product bringing it into the world for everyone to enjoy. We choose Kickstarter because over last several years this has been a hub for entrepreneurs and dream-chasers to realize their goals and bring an idea to life

Check out our website www.4in1cables.com, we also have other cables on our website. On this campaign, we just only selling 7 products, check out the perks.

Thank you for your supporting on Indiegogo Campaign! Thank Again! 

 

 

Risks and challenges

With any project, there are risks and challenges that must be considered before going forward. These can include:

● Supply Chain: Manufacturing Delay 
A delay in the supply chain would cause us to miss our promised shipping deadlines. We don’t anticipate that this will become a problem, as we have developed really close relationships with our suppliers and have worked out a generous timeline that we intend to beat.

● Fulfillment Capacity 
If we generate a lot of interest and we get swamped with orders, it is possible that fulfillment and shipping will be delayed. However, we have worked out a schedule for our project to ensure that we allow plenty of time to ship our orders in a timely fashion. We will be devoting our full-time efforts to this project.

Above all, we want our potential backers to know that we plan to be very upfront and honest about any delays or challenges that we run into along the way. If we happen to run into delays during production or distribution, we will let you know about it as soon as we know about it!

Learn about accountability on Indiegogo

Coming this far, we have refined the Quad 4in1 cables to make life easy, The funds raised with Indiegogo will be used finalize marketing, website, build teams and order product bringing it into the world for everyone to enjoy. We choose Kickstarter because over last several years this has been a hub for entrepreneurs and dream-chasers to realize their goals and bring an idea to lifeCheck out our website www.4in1cables.com, we also have other cables on our website. On this campaign, we just only selling 7 products, check out the perks.Thank you for your supporting on Indiegogo Campaign! Thank Again!   Risks and challengesWith any project, there are risks and challenges that must be considered before going forward. These can include:● Supply Chain: Manufacturing Delay A delay in the supply chain would cause us to miss our promised shipping deadlines. We don’t anticipate that this will become a problem, as we have developed really close relationships with our suppliers and have worked out a generous timeline that we intend to beat.● Fulfillment Capacity If we generate a lot of interest and we get swamped with orders, it is possible that fulfillment and shipping will be delayed. However, we have worked out a schedule for our project to ensure that we allow plenty of time to ship our orders in a timely fashion. We will be devoting our full-time efforts to this project.Above all, we want our potential backers to know that we plan to be very upfront and honest about any delays or challenges that we run into along the way. If we happen to run into delays during production or distribution, we will let you know about it as soon as we know about it!Learn about accountability on Indiegogo",10.0,8,"3 Campaigns
The Free Worldwide Panic Button will be integrated into Speedentity, the alert and protection community platform made for people and from people.

Simply tap on the Speedentity App's button in case of an emergency then an operator will answer you 24/7/365 instantly knowing:

- the exact positioning of the Speedentity user through the GPS system

- direct access to his/her Speedentity Web Rescue Page

- the reason for calling (i.e.: fire, police, ambulance, other)
In seconds, the operator will contact your nearest rescue institution
and provide vital information about you and your emergency situation.
Easy, fast, reliable and unique, the Speedentity Free Worldwide Panic Button is what you need in case of need!

column2:
Challenges

The first challenge is, once implemented, the users cannot take advantage of the Free Worldwide Panic Button because there may not be sattelite coverage (GSM connection).

The second challenge is that the user may be in a location too remote for institutional rescuers to access. ","The Free Worldwide Panic Button will be integrated into Speedentity, the alert and protection community platform made for people and from people.

Available in both Micro USB or Lightning.
We've heard numerous complaints about charging cables:
Here are Lux Cables we want to change things with our premium charging cable.

We grew tired of purchasing cheaply made cables from overseas and then having to constantly replace them. We've created a luxurious cable that will match the expensive devices that we use daily. We spend hundreds of dollars on a phone only to use a cheaply made cable
column2: that doesn't make sense to us!

column1: 2 meters (just over 6 ft) in length while still providing the optimal amount of power being sent to your cable from any source. It is perfect for charging while reading or when you are too far away from a power outlet and double the length of most cables included with your devices!
Our lightning cable is MFI Certified (Apple certified) and manufactured by a licensed manufacturer, making sure that it compatible with any iOS and future iOS updates.
Metal encased tips and is covered by a thick nylon material (at least 25% thicker than most other cables), ensuring your cable is long lasting and tangle-free. No more dreaded splitting or bent ends.

Our Micro USB cables support Quick Charge and have a thicker wire gauge! Allowing you to use all of your phones charging features. (20AWG for lower resistance and faster charging than a budget cable). This allows you to charge your phone faster than conventional charging.
All of our cables include a one year warranty! Rest assured that you will have a premium cable with a guarantee.

We are always looking at additional ways to continually improve our cable as we grow! Your feedback is appreciated. Let us know if you have any ideas on how to improve our project and make our cable even more luxurious.
• iPad mini / mini 2 / mini 3 / mini 4 / Air / Air 2
• Android/Windows Phones and Tablets (our cable also supports Quick Charge)
Normal retail price starting at $28 USD plus shipping.

We have prepared for our campaign by finding suitable manufacturers, testing multiple prototypes, and creating the best finished product we imagined. This saves us time and avoids potential delays in fulfilling our rewards.
May - June - Shipping to all of our backers worldwide.
Our cable has been custom designed by us and is not a resale of other available cables.
We tested and compared multiple cables with our final working prototype to make sure that our cable is the highest quality compared to cheaper cables available.
A collection of talent from Vancouver, BC Canada
Reilly Renwick - Kickstarter Expert - Campaign Manager (Expertly managed other campaigns and brought them to success)
Two great partner companies are assisting us in making sure our campaign runs smoothly and that rewards are delivered on time as promised. Check them out below!
Help us to bring our product from our mind to your home.
We at Lux Cables have spent our due diligence making a plan to provide our Lux cables to backers. Why do we need your donation?
• We have a MOQ (Minimum Order Quantity) to meet. If we receive $5,000 CAD in donations we will be able to make our creation a reality.
• Quality is key - We need to meet this MOQ to make sure our product is created by the best manufacturer and so we don't lessen our quality like other cables out there.
• MFI Certified - We will be using campaign funds for our MFI licensing, allowing us to use Apple certified connectors and the ""Made for iPod/iPad/iPhone Logo""
Send us a message at hello@luxcables.com or through Kickstarter and we will get back to you as soon as possible.
We welcome any feedback and further improvements recommended by our backers!
Make some noise about our campaign! Tell your friends and make sure to share our project. Your funds will be used towards accelerating production and making further improvements to our cable!
Thank you from all of us at Lux Cables.

Risks and challenges

What could go wrong? We have planned for the unknown.

Too many orders - we have made sure our manufacturer is ready to scale operations if needed.

We have crossed all our T's and dotted all our I's making sure we are ready to manufacture, deliver, and keep our backers happy!

We believe in open communication. If you have any questions, we are here to help!

Lumenaire comes in two models:

Lumenaire $599 (Early Bird! Pricing)

Product Highlights:

Daylight Color (5600K)

12,000 Lumens of Overall Power (Approximately 750W tungsten equivalent)

Super Thin at just over 1""

Super Light at just over 2 pounds

Built-in Softbox (LEDNatural technology) for ultra portability

Included Rechargeable Battery and AC Adapter for Studio Use

Tungsten, Cool, RingLight and Spotlight Attachments

Fits on any Standard Tripod Mount (1/4"" 20)

Flexible Ball Head Mount (1/4"" 20)


Lumenaire DUO $649 (Early Bird! Pricing)

Product Highlights:

Dual Color Model (3200K Tungsten- 5600K Daylight)

12,000 Lumens of Overall Power (Approximately 750W tungsten equivalent)

Super Thin at just over 1""

Super Light at just over 2 pounds

Built-in Softbox (LEDNatural technology) for ultra portability

Included Rechargeable Battery and AC Adapter for Studio Use

Tungsten, Cool, RingLight and Spotlight Attachments

Fits on any Standard Tripod Mount (1/4"" 20)

Flexible Ball Head Mount (1/4"" 20)


Lumenaire Essentials Kit $99
The Lumenaire Essentials Kit includes everything you need to round out your Lumenaire:
       - 1x Protective Cushioned and Water-Resistant Zipper Case
       - Upgrade to Heavy Duty Tripod BallHead Mount
       - Upgrade to 9800mah Battery for 2+ hour run-time (instead of the default 6800mah battery / 1+ hour run-time). Run-time varies based on power setting. 2+ hour run-time estimate is at full power.

Lumenaire is also available at a special bundle price for multi-light and multi-accessory kits (2x, 3x, etc.).

Please make your perk choice on the right.


Shipping:

U.S. Shipping: $39 Flat Rate Priority Mail Shipping

International Shipping: $69 Flat Rate First Class International Mail

Note to International Customers: We will supply you with the correct plug for your respective region when ordering. We carry plugs for US, UK, EU and AU.


In the News:

""The LED light panel, called the Lumenaire, is a super thin and light weight portable light perfect for the video and photo industry."" - LEDInside.com


The Go Anywhere, Do Anything LED light at a price you won't believe!

Thanks

column1: for checking out our Lumenaire project! Here
at ColorRight, we've been making awesome white balance tools and flash
diffusers for over 5 years. We've even won awards for our ColorRight PRO
Now, we want to introduce you to the Lumenaire. Recently, we raised almost $60K for our first Power Panel campaign and over $40K on our second Power Panel campaign.
far, we have made 3 working prototypes of this
revolutionary type of LED panel light that works for both photo and
Video. The Lumenaire LED light is an ultra thin LED panel (1 inch) that
has gobs of power (approximately 12,000 lumens, 750+ Watt Light Bulb). Lumenaire also uses our LEDNatural technology for ultra soft light without the hassle of a
softbox. At just over 2 pounds this panel is your Go Anywhere, Do
The Lumenaire is amazing, but we need your help to make it a reality. We
are leveraging a lot of the technology and knowledge we gained from our earlier Lumenator and Power Panel projects in the Lumenaire, so we don't need to raise as much
money to make the Lumenaire a reality, but we still need lots of help!
family run company, even with the 3 new staff we've added. We believe these LEDNatural LED products are the
think Lumenaire, Power Panel and Lumenator are the future of photo &
contributing you are making a difference in the lives of photographers
and videographers everywhere. The Lumenaire, Power Panel and Lumenator projects have the potential to
totally up-end all our pre-conceived notions about what LED lighting
can do, and where it can go. With the success of Lumenaire, Power Panel and Lumenator we plan to

We
