of LED lighting technology. We can't wait to see where you take the Lumenaire or what you do with it once you get there.

We can't get
there without you. Please help us get the word out, by telling your
family and friends and through Facebook, Twitter, Instagram etc. This

site has convenient links for most social sites right here on this page.

Thank you so much for supporting the future of photo and video lighting with your contribution!

Please choose your perk using the links to the right.

Lumen FAQ:

Q: How do you measure lumens? I see all of your products range quite high but most companies measure at the light source (1mm away)...so how to compare with working distance?

A: Lumens are a measure of total light output, not the light intensity at a specific distance. We are reporting the total amount of light output from the LEDs themselves, inside the light chamber, prior to the diffusion technology.

If you buy an LED light bulb in any regular store you will see a Lumens rating (not lux). We think this is the best rating method to use for our lights because it is the most common, and is the best understood by the average consumer. If you know how bright a ""60 watt"" 800 Lumen LED bulb you bought at Wal-Mart is, you can probably make a reasonable inference about a higher Lumen rating.

You are probably seeing some other LED manufacturers use a Lux measurement which needs to include a specific distance. Lux more or less tells you how intense a light beam is at a specific point, at a specific distance. I'm not sure why some manufacturers use this measurement, but it doesn't really tell you a lot. A very narrow beam of light (e.g., a flashlight could have a very high lux, but low lumens). I highly doubt you would want to use a flashlight to light your subject though.

One of the reasons our LEDNatural technology is so special is precisely because our technology has a 120 degree coverage area, whereas, most traditional LED panels only have a 60 degree coverage area. In this scenario, a 60 degree LED light panel could conceivably measure higher on a Lux reading than a panel with a 120 degree area of coverage, but actually put out less light (Lumens). Hope some of this makes sense.

In short, its apples to oranges. We choose to report the more common measure of LED brightness.

column4:

These are a selection of available designs for the iPhone 6 cases, we will keep adding to them as the campaign progresses.


Details - iPhone 6 cases
>Printed hard case made of polycarbonate material
>Full access to all ports and buttons

column3:
>About us

Iconemesis is an online British accessories brand, working with inspiring designers to produce creative and fashionable iPhone cases.

We have come a long way since our launch back in August 2011
column4:
collaborating with the likes of Fifi Lapin and Gemma Correll, we pride ourselves on a wide collection that caters for every taste. We are also delighted to have become a favourite among many globally renowned fashion bloggers. This is just the start. We see ourselves as more than just an iPhone case brand: we believe that with your help we can achieve our goal of extending our collection to other devices and fashion accessories, and becoming a globally recognised brand.


The Collection

Our cases feature designs by established illustrators such as Gemma Correll, Boyarde Messanger and Fifi Lapin as well as emerging talent Sacha Kreeger and Cat Sims.
column5:
>The cases are cute and combine style with functionality, offering superior protection for any iPhone. Each case is made with high attention to detail, and we don’t compromise on quality either. The cases are perfect for protecting iPhones from everyday knocks and scratches.


Compatibility

iPhone 6

iPhone 5s

With your support we can expand this to other devices in future.


Why Indiegogo?

Until recently, we have produced all our cases in house, but in order to concentrate on the quality and create the best products for our customers we have decided to outsource production. We are excited about this move, but in order to do this we need significant funding to help us begin production. 

We have everything in place
column6:
we just need your support to move onto the next stage.

By contributing, you will help to fund:

- Production tooling

- Large product order


Perks

In return for your support, we’re offering you some exciting perks (which can be found on the right hand side of this page). We’ve included some of them below, and we will keep adding to them as the campaign progresses.

iPhone 6 

$20 - Early Bird: 25 iPhone 6 cases available

$25 - One iPhone 6 cases


iPhone 5s

$20 - Early Bird: 26 iPhone 5s cases available(SOLD OUT)

$25 - One iPhone 5/5s case

$48 - Two iPhone 5/5s cases

$70 - Three iPhone 5/5s cases


Other ways you can help

Let’s get everyone talking about Iconemesis! Help us spread the word by sharing this campaign with your friends and family. You can also add your support by sharing this campaign on Facebook and on Twitter using the hashtag:

#supporticonemesis
column9:
/>


Design Options - iPhone 5/5s


FAQs

Can you ship internationally?

Yes! It’s ship worldwide for free.


I’ve picked a perk with a design choice – how do I select a case?

Thanks for your contribution! We’ll email you to confirm the design you’d like.


I have a question and I’d like to talk to someone about my pledge.

Feel free to contact us on go@iconemesis.co.uk and we’ll do our best to respond within two business days.


What if we don’t reach our target?

We appreciate your support in helping to reach our target goal. If we can’t reach our target, all the money raised through this campaign will be used for the production and shipment of our products.


Do you have cases for Android/Samsung/Nokia devices?

Unfortunately, the cases are only compatible with the iPhone 6(4.7) and 5s. But we have plans to introduce designs for other devices in the future!


Help! I can’t get my payment to work in PayPal – what should I do?

Email the Indiegogo Customer Happiness Team at support@indiegogo.com – they’ll be able to track your transaction and help with any issues.

Email the Indiegogo Customer Happiness Team at support@indiegogo.com – they’ll be able to track your transaction and help with any issues.",12.0,0,"2 Campaigns

column1:
0,"

Cellular Providers are Being Put on Notice

Cellular providers are continually telling us that they have the best plans for us. The plans are new and improved to give us just what we need… at an excessive cost. The latest smartphone has the most “amazing” new features… but they aren’t innovative at all. NEBI.MOBI is the most cost-effective, innovative service and smartphone to ever hit the market. Cell phone providers think they have a lock on the services, but NEBI.MOBI, with your help, is going to show them how it’s really done.

As Seen On
column2:
dir=0"" src="""" style=""""/>

    

    

What Cellular Telephone Services Don’t Tell You—AKA The Deception

Telephone data is transformed from analog to digital content. All cell phone plans indicate a separation between talking minutes, number of text messages, and amount of data use. These are actually all the same service, provided the same way. By separating them and limiting amounts of each one for different packages, they deceive consumers into believing that different rates should apply to talk, text, and data. Why are we paying three different rates with different limitations for the same thing? All of these services are digitally provided. They should all be unlimited at one low price. This is a sales gimmick and it locks customers into two year contracts and fees for overages that are outrageous. 

No More Hype, Just Honesty and Innovation

We need to move away from the hype and misleading information of cellular providers and their famous two year contracts and three prices for the same service. Instead of depending on cellular network signals, at NEBI.MOBI we are using Wi-Fi based network signals and Voice over Internet Protocol (VoIP) technologies to deliver superior service without the inflated price tag. These technologies are capable of supporting talk, text, and data – which is really all just data. This will bring smartphones to an entirely new level of capability and accessibility. That’s right, innovation in the mobile industry. This is a rare gem.

Can I use VOIP?

VOIP technology has become increasingly efficient. Our codecs secure encrypted connections and maintain lightning-fast data transfer speed. Smartphone designs, whether you consider ours or your current phone, have advanced to the point of being able to support VOIP apps reliably.

Is Wi-Fi Up to the Challenge?

column1: Wi-Fi is not controlled by government agencies and does not incur huge government-related fees and taxes. Wi-Fi signals have increased in capability and availability to a point that makes it faster and easier to access from a growing number of sources every day. We believe that free public Wi-Fi access should be available in every city. Free public access should be provided by each city’s leaders as a show of understanding of the importance of communication and connection in today’s world. One of our goals with funding of NEBI.MOBI is to increase advocacy nationwide for free public Wi-Fi in entire cities. Until we fully succeed, you can supplement your Wi-Fi access points through data-only cellular plans for achieving a wider coverage area, and still enjoy substantial savings compared to your traditional smartphone bills. You deserve to be able to connect wherever you are, without having to search for a free hotspot or pay a cellular service for data usage.

EVE 008 is our remarkable touchscreen smartphone. It actually has a replaceable battery that will eliminate the need for bulky charging cases or a tangle of charging cords and panicked searches for places to charge your phone. Two phone lines can be combined on one device by using two SIM card services simultaneously, eliminating the need for a work and home cell phone, lightening the load in your purse or pocket. An SD slot allows for expansion and transfer of data without dealing with additional technology or apps. Data is saved even if the phone is injured. And EVE 008 doesn’t carry the price tag of smartphones with even half of her capability. That doesn’t even begin to describe what EVE 008 can do for you.
• Software supported 8MP camera with LED flash light

column2: T, Metro PCS and more for US)

column1: • Special fast charger, USB cable, and noise canceling headphones are included
CHOICE: When is the Last Time You Were REALLY Given a Choice?
NEBI.MOBI services allow you to use EVE 008 or your own smartphone. You get to choose. This is real choice. No contracts attached. We refuse to impose limits like cell providers.

Cellular networks, Wi-Fi, VoIP, expanding network infrastructures, GSM, codecs, telecom providers… It can be overwhelming. We have done the research, studied the options, explored the field, experimented, and applied the science. We have designed and manufactured a value-oriented smartphone capable of operating via Wi-Fi or current mobile carriers. Our Android OS has been boosted for higher power efficiency. We have submitted for trademarks, secured FCC license approvals, negotiated service contracts, and coded and test our apps and service architecture.

As we begin, we will need a lot of subscribers with current Wi-Fi optimized VOIP devices to help us drive down the wholesale minutes pricing from telecom servers. We want to make sure that we can support the greatest number of customers with optimal bandwidth for a positive user experience.

Another use of funds will be the deployment of free public Wi-Fi coverage. We want to expand the availability to more places so that everyone, whether they use our service or not, has access to free public Wi-Fi.
Reasons You May Not Have Considered that Might Make You Go Hmmm….
This device and network has more value than you may think. With our system:
• Teens cannot text and drive as they move through active Wi-Fi zones
• You can travel worldwide and avoid roaming charges once our Wi-Fi based phone service is live
• You can resell your old expensive cell phone at near retail and use one that’s even better - Pocket the extra savings from the resale
• The two SIM card strategy allows you to carry one phone for two lines
• No dragging around a separate charger with our quick-swap battery
• You can let your young child play games on EVE 008, which you surely shouldn’t do with a $600-$800 smartphone
• SD card slot for expansion and easy transfer of data – no technical assistance or fancy programs needed
• Tons of Android Apps available for use with EVE 008
• Skype and Wi-Fi chat applications allow communications with family and friends around the world
• EVE 008 can serve as a low cost temporary or permanent replacement phone if your current smartphone is stolen or broken
• NEBI.MOBI can easily replace home phone service as a much lower cost option
• Regardless from reaching to our funding goal, anyone who donates $175 will receive EVE 008 with our thanks - No tax, no shipping, no handling charges! What a great value!
• As soon as we have the funding and are ready to activate NEBI.MOBI service, our backers will pay only $60/YEAR for the unlimited mobile phone service
• EVE 008 is totally hot—have you seen her pics?
Innovation and the New Era of Smartphones Needs You

My wife and I believe in innovation. We believe in this project. We have invested time and money into establishing as much as we can and now we need help to get this project off the ground and let it fly. Your donation will be a part of a new era of smartphone services. The funds raised will be used to launch the platform, acquire users, and drive down the price of our devices and services. Higher volume equals lower costs to consumers. We need to pay for high-end telecom servers to ensure proper levels of bandwidth for the best experience for our customers. Funds will also help us deploy our plans for increased free Wi-Fi coverage.

Be a REBEL—Revolutionary Evolution Backer for Escape from Limitations. Escape from the constraints of the same old mobile delivery systems that have been around forever. They keep charging more because they think we are trapped. It’s time to show them that the Innovation Revolution has started and you are a part of it. How many times does an opportunity like this present itself? In this industry, not very often. In fact, almost never. Be a REBEL and join the revolution. It’s like the Boston Tea Party for the 21st century.
Can I Really Make a Difference and What’s in it for Me Besides Awesome REBEL status?

To be a part of NEBI.MOBI, you can do two things. First, you can spread the word. Tell people about us. Tell them what we are doing. Show them the EVE 008 specs and cool features. See how your friends and connections feel about freedom from cellular carriers and expensive plans and devices. Link to our campaign. Use your social media to help us educate people about our project. Tell them to be a REBEL! Encourage people to unchain themselves from the cellular carriers who hold them captive! They take your business for granted believing you have no alternative. BUT YOU DO. We need you to help us get this message out! Help the Revolution grow. Add to our REBELs!

Second, you can make a monetary contribution to help us finish up funding the project. We’ve done a lot on our own, but we still need some help. As for you, there are some really awesome perks and rewards for making donations. T-shirts, parties, free smartphones, starring in our advertising, and naming our next mobile device model are up for grabs along with other thank you gifts. In fact, the first 50 backers at the $149 level will receive an EVE 008 with our thanks! The best reward will be your freedom from cellular providers. Let’s face it, we’re all sick of their manipulations.

If we cannot reach our goal on Indiegogo, it will be impossible for us to secure competitive pricing from potential vendors in a timely manner. If we can reach our goal, we will be able to pass along cost savings to our customers. We want to provide you with unlimited mobile service for $60 per year or less, and an affordable, efficient, optimized mobile device for the lowest possible cost to you without requiring any contracts.
This is the first REAL innovation in the mobile industry and you can be a part of it. Claim your status as a founder of the new wave. How cool is that?
Achievement of our goal will allow us to move to our Stretch Goals, including specialized EVE 008 cases and extra batteries.

Yes, this is an ambitious target for us, but it is very possible to hit with your support. Reaching these levels of a volume reduces our manufacturing cost per device, and we would like pass such savings to you by including a beautiful, custom fit, see-through case for protecting your smartphone…

Successfully funding this much means that we now reached to a production volume that makes economically feasible to manufacture our smartphones in additional colors without an extra cost to our backers. Now, you can select what color you would like for yourself…

Wow, this is like a dream number for us. This amount of a funding will also allow us to take advantage of some serious economies of scale. We will be able to send you an extra battery with each EVE 008 device, too… Thank you a million times…

column4: >If I Buy an EVE 008, What’s Next?

column1: EVE 008 has already met all of the regulatory approvals necessary for entering the manufacturing process. When our funding rises, we will reach a point of better economic feasibility for manufacturing volumes. At that point, we can focus our energy on pairing this amazing value device with its complementing mobile phone service.

EVE 008 will arrive ready-to-use with any GSM mobile carrier service. We are continuing to work on NEBI.MOBI mobile phone service as the funding increases. When our backers support us in a way that allows a reasonable cost decrease for the provision of the service, it will be activated. At that time, we will alert you that the system is ready to add your $60 per year unlimited mobile service plan.

I am Nebi Cem Erdogan, and with my wife Eve, we are completely dedicated to this project. I have studied at Columbia University and MIT to explore economics, strategy, and innovation management. I have worked at several Fortune 500 companies. I am passionate about innovation and entrepreneurship. We are ready to take on whatever challenges come with our commitment to the NEBI.MOBI project. And we want you to be a part of it. We are so grateful for each and every contribution made. Your belief in the success of NEBI.MOBI and EVE 008 is a gift for which we are very thankful.

Please become a part of our plan to make smartphone services fairly priced and available to more people. Be a part of innovation. Be someone who creates change. Be a REBEL And let’s just teach those cellular providers a lesson or two while we’re at it.

V-KOZ is a VOICE TRANSLATOR connected to your phone, smartphone, tablet allows you to communicate with the world.
The operating is simple, you speak and the translation is done in the language you want from the buccal speaker.
yes yes you can speak all languages..... ​ in which language I have to tell you!
The language will remain the main obstacle to peace and development in the world. Problems understanding languages can lead to conflict.
The V-KOZ is the way to meet and exchange between peoples, hope all the V-KOZ becomes a tool for peace.
The V-KOZ is three types of translations.
Translation by the Web (already over 70 languages​​).
Human translation by phone (A friend or professional translator by SKYPE, VIBER etc ...). All languages ​​are possible.
V-KOZ est un traducteur vocal, relié à votre téléphone, smartphone, tablette vous permet de communiquer avec le monde entier.
Le fonctionnement est simple, vous parlez et la traduction est restituée dans la langue que vous avez souhaitée dans le haut-parleur buccal.

oui oui vous pouvez parler toutes les langues ...... mais en quelle langue il faut que je vous le dise ! Les langues restent le principal obstacle pour la paix et le développement dans le monde. La difficulté à comprendre les langues peut conduire à des conflits.
Le V-KOZ est un moyen de rencontre et d'échange entre les peuples, souhaitons que le V-KOZ devienne un outil pour la paix.Le V-KOZ permet trois types de traductions,
La traduction hors-ligne (déjà plus de 10 langues).
La traduction par le Web (déjà plus de 70 langues).
Et la traduction humaine par téléphone (Un ami ou un professionnel traducteur par Skype, Viber... etc). Toutes les langues sont possibles.
V-koz works with android system (except sony ericson but we are planning to add other operating systems)
V-KOZ is equipped with a bi-directional microphone to optimize the capture of words and with a powerful speaker to reproduce the instant translations. With    V-KOZ your hands are free.
NB : 75 decibels cover a conversation in a restaurant (french touch).
V-KOZ est équipé d’un micro bidirectionnel pour optimiser la captation des paroles et d’un puissant  haut-parleur pour restituer les traductions instantanées. Avec le V-KOZ vos mains sont libres.
NB : 75 décibels couvrent une conversation dans un restaurant (french touch).
V-KOZ is a voice translator which accompanies you everywhere. Professionals:  it also allows you to receive all the peoples of the world.
V-KOZ est un traducteur vocal qui vous accompagne partout dans le monde.
Professionnels: Il vous permet aussi de recevoir tous les peuples du monde.
V-KOZ voice translator for your multi-language conferences. V-KOZ allows you to talk to a parent, a friend, a business partner in the world.
V-KOZ un traducteur vocal pour vos conférences multi-langue. V-KOZ vous permet de parler à un parent, un ami, un partenaire d'affaires dans le monde.
V-KOZ a foreign language teacher at home, at work.... everywhere !
V-KOZ is a means of quick and simple integration of a foreign employee to a team.
V-KOZ un professeur de langue étrangère à la maison, au bureau....partout !Le V-KOZ est un moyen d'intégration rapide et simple d'un employé étranger à une équipe.
All major events taking place on the planet show us we need to be equipped with a simple and ergonomic device to be able to dialogue with our partners.

V- KOZ essential accessory for all your mission !  Tous les grands événements qui se déroulent sur la planète nous montrent la nécessité de s’équiper d’un appareil simple et ergonomique pour pouvoir dialoguer avec nos partenaires.V-KOZ  accessoire indispensable à toutes vos missions !
Our Projects   1 - Improve the quality, design and functionality of our device.
2 - Offline translation. We are working on the translation offline that will give people the ability to communicate without internet connection.

3 - Translation by professionals. We are working on the establishment a platform for professional translators who will provide a human translation of very high quality in specialized fields (medical, legal, technology ...). It's technology optimized with V-KOZ in translation and international communication.
1 - Améliorer la qualité, le design et la fonctionnalité de notre appareil.
2 -  Hors ligne traduction. Nous travaillons sur la traduction hors ligne qui donnera aux gens la possibilité de communiquer sans connexion internet.

3 - Traduction par des professionnels. Nous travaillons sur la mise en place d'une plateforme de traducteurs professionnels qui permettra d'obtenir une traduction humaine de très grande qualité dans les domaines pointus (médical, justice, technologique...).
C'est une technologie optimisé par le V-KOZ dans la traduction et la communication internationale.

We are a small and new company and without you, we will not succeed. Every donation is important to us. This campaign helps us to keep working on our translator. Your contributions allow us to develop and manufacture the entire infrastructure for quick translations between people. So please donate! With your help, we can assist in understanding and peace among men.

Nous sommes une petite et nouvelle entreprise et sans vous, nous ne pourrons pas réussir. Chaque don est important pour nous. Cette campagne nous aide à continuer à travailler sur notre traducteur. Vos contributions nous permettent de mettre en place la fabrication  et toute l'infrastructure pour des traductions rapides entre les hommes. Donc, s'il vous plaît, faites un don ! Avec votre aide, nous pouvons aider à la compréhension et à la paix entre les hommes.

There are many ways to contribute! Even if you don't have the money, you can help us turn V-KOZ into a success by sharing this Indiegogo campaign with your friends and your business. Just click on any of the Facebook, Twitter, and other sharing buttons let the world know about translator V-KOZ!

Il y à plusieurs de façons de contribuer ! Même si vous n'avez pas l'argent, vous pouvez nous aider à transformer V-KOZ en un succès en partageant cette campagne Indiegogo avec vos amis ou votre entreprise. Il suffit de cliquer sur l'un des boutons de partage Facebook, Twitter, et que le monde sache à propos du traducteur V-KOZ!

Professional translator benefit from opportunities of V-KOZ. You stay in your home or office and your customers move through the world. After simple text message from the client you can start the phone translation (via SKYPE, VIBER, etc ....). V-KOZ Translations immediately transmits your buccal speaker. All the world's languages ​​can be translated.Please contact us to register on our platform.
Grow your business through the V-KOZ.

Traducteurs professionnels profitez des opportunités du V-KOZ. Vous restez chez vous ou au bureau et vos clients se déplacent dans le monde. Après un simple texto de la part du client vous pouvez commencer la traduction téléphonique (via SKYPE, VIBER, etc...). Le V-KOZ transmet vos traductions immédiatement dans le haut-parleur buccal. Toutes les langues du monde peuvent être traduites.
N'hésitez pas à nous contacter pour vous inscrire sur notre plateforme.
Développez votre business grâce au V-KOZ.",29.0,1,"1 Campaign

column2: >NOTE: Project funding/pre-orders have now ended! If you want to get your hands on sympleSEQ when it is ready to ship, subscribe to the hexinverter.net email list here! You will then receive an email when it becomes in stock in my web-shop:

column1: Intro - what is the sympleSEQ, and why do I need it?

Many step-sequencer kits exist on the market for use with analog modular synthesizers, but unfortunately the vast majority of them are extremely intimidating for builders to put together due to all of the off-board wiring that is required of the builder. Every step in the sequencer requires a substantial amount of wiring to the potentiometer, switch and LED for that step. The task of wiring a large, multi-channel sequencer for programming drums or complex patterns becomes a pretty daunting task.

sympleSEQ is here to change this, though, and offers a unique dual-board, scalable design that enables hobbyists to build a fully-functional, 8-step analog sequencer for use with their modular synthesizer (or other control-voltage based synthesizer). The two boards connect together through a header system that makes it a breeze to assemble. A carefully designed PCB set along with other component-kits offers different options for builders to assemble their very own analog step-sequencer with ease.

What makes sympleSEQ unique is its use of board-mount potentiometers, switches and LEDs. The task of wiring the panel controls becomes easy when you just have to snap them into the board and solder in place instead of tediously running wires to everything. Best of all, sympleSEQ offers a circuit board package where all of the specific parts you require that are special to this design are included!
sympleSEQ also offers a thorough instruction manual, with printable drill template for easily drilling holes in your panel to accept the control-surface board.
By offering a fundraising project like this, I am able to source parts and circuit boards at cheaper prices, and reduce the cost of building the project.
Please don't hesitate to visit the electro-music.com forum where I reside, which will serve as another place for this project, and a help-forum/questions answering place for anyone that has them!

NOTE: The image which you see above is the prototype board, and thus is going to be much uglier than the production-run boards. Your controls will also mount properly to the front-panel, unlike mine which were slightly off due to the hand-made boards. I also used non board mount switches in my handmade board
column2: the production boards use PCB mount switches so are much better aligned and secured.

column1: Here is a snapshot of the board CAD renderings. With a few cosmetic tweaks, they will be ready for production as double-layer, silk-screened, solder masked boards!
- Can fit vertically into 1U wide of MOTM style panel space
- 2 sequencers fit into 3U high Eurorack panel space
- All 8 steps have note on/off switches to turn the summed gate off for that step
- All steps output a short gate to make use of envelope generators (unlike many ""Baby10"" designs which tie the notes together). This should work to trigger drums as well.
- Select from 2-8 steps via the same toggles used for gate on/off. This addition does not make the design more complex, which is a plus!
- CV (contol voltage) output for interfacing with any analog gear
- Extremely easy to assemble (even for beginners!)
- Easily scalable with detailed instructions on how to do so (build as many channels as you want, all running off of the same master tempo clock!)
- Power supply can be a 9V battery, +12V or +15V to accommodate a wide variety of system formats and portability!
- 161x41mm board space needed to mount the control panel
- Included detailed instruction manual with easy-mode drilling template for the front panel!
- Easily add external clocking (CMOS level - compatible with the MFOS 16 step and others I am sure)
- The option is there to add external/switch controlled Reset -- external Stop/Pause is in beta phase and may or may not be included in the final design suggestion.
- Either of these features can be triggered by your choice of switch, positive voltage signal, or both
4 different kit offerings to satisfy all ranges of builders!

The sympleSEQ project has been carefully designed to fill a rather large market-gap in the world of analog synthesis that exists due to there being no simple to build sequencers out there. Thus, it is only natural that it also satisfies many types of builders by offering 4 different kit-complexities for builders to select from.
NOTE: Every kit contains a set of PCBs of course! -- the only difference is in the components included.

column2: >1.) Full component kit -- for new (or lazy) builders

column1: - All of the necessary components required to electrically build the sympleSEQ, including board mount switches, potentiometers, hardware to mount the board and the headers which connect the boards together.
- NO knobs or jacks, as these are dependent on the person's personal taste/system format.

column2: >2.) Minimal component kit -- for those that wish to source their own common components

column1: - Headers to connect the boards together
- Hardware to mount the board to the front panel

column2: >3.) PCB set only -- for those that wish to order their own components

column1: - Headers to connect the boards together
- Hardware to mount the board to the front panel

column2: >4.) The multi-channel DIY extravaganza -- for those that wish to build a large 4-channel sequencer, a discount is offered on PCB/hardware sets

column1: - Enough components to build a FOUR channel monster step-sequencer! The kit includes 4x Option #1
- Your name gets a special mention in the instruction manual as a person who helped immensely in making this project happen!
So, what's NOT included in a full kit?
- 2+ Jacks (minimum one for CV and one for GATE -- more for extra features like reset/pause or clock in/out) -- banana, 1/4"", 1/8"", whatever you use -- that is why they are not included!
- 8x 6mm shaft Knobs - maximum 19mm diameter (personally, I like the pot shafts without knobs as they have a pointer on them!)
- 2x switches and .01uF ceramic capacitors for reset/pause if you desire switches and jacks.
- 2x jacks for reset in and pause in
So, where is the money going exactly, and how does this work?
I would be asking the same thing right about now if I were in your seat, of course!

First off, the $2,800 campaign goal is not an arbitrarily selected value. I have made precise calculations in order to determine the cost of ordering enough boards and materials for the projected amount of sales. This includes everything from face-value cost, to shipping, customs duties and PayPal fees all associated with running this project!

When you select a level of contribution from the right, and contribute funds to this project, it is accumulated until the end of October. Once the campaign is complete, all of the parts, circuit boards and items required to piece together kits for all of the contributors will be ordered and accumulated until they are ready to go!

The contribution value at the right includes shipping to your door! I realize a lot of people come from all over the world, so have calculated a generic shipping value that everyone will pay in order to minimize confusion of payments. Inevitably, some will be cheaper, and some will be more expensive. It is my hope that it will balance out perfectly :)
When you contribute, there is an option to leave your shipping address. Do this, and when the kits are ready, they will be mailed out to you lickety-split!
You may also go and visit the forums over on electro-music where this project originated to become notified of

updates on the project and to track the completion of parts orders. I will of course be updating the thread frequently and notifying everyone of when everything ships out to people. I will do the same on this site as well!

I hate waiting as well, but this is the only way this project can happen! It is of the utmost importance to me that I ship everyone's kits to them as quickly as possible, so rest assured that I will not stall when it comes time to order and ship your goods!

iVoteUS.com was founded in Florida in February 2011, and incorporated there in April 2011.  Since that time iVoteUS.com's founders have invested roughly $200,000 and over 8,000 hours on the project.

iVoteUS.com is developing a smartphone app that automatically compiles relevant info about all the elections in which a user is eligible to vote based on her address, and displays dates, times, and locations, allowing the user to control the frequency of email and text alert reminders of upcoming elections.

When the user selects one of the elections from the list, our app displays a convenient ""matrix"" of all the candidates and issues in that election, allowing for easy comparison of their views side-by-side. The user may choose to read a summary of a candidate's view, expand to read more, or watch a video clip of that candidate stating his position. Candidates' views are also distilled to a single digit number from 1 to 9 representing the left to right ideological spectrum, in order to give users an instant snapshot of each candidate's ideological position.
The app also provides non-partisan, unbiased summaries of the relevant issues in each election, and profiles, biographies, and voting records of all candidates.

The app is but a first step in a detailed, step-by-step plan to secure our right to vote in all elections online, from our home computers or mobile devices, and soon voters will be able to cast their ballots directly from their smartphones through secure portals, using our app.

Our app also empowers voters by allowing them to suggest referendum issues, or any proposition they would like to see enacted as law.  iVoteUS.com will enable voters to cast their ballots on such referenda online, and automatically create petitions with tens of millions of signatures where a referendum has supermajority support. These petitions can then be pressed onto the legislative agenda for passage into law.

The $250,000 of funding we seek on Indiegogo.com, together with other funding we are pursuing through other methods, will go directly into the design and creation of our app, whose architecture will employ modules specific to our software, emailed to the 650,000 U.S. elected officials and the candidates running against them.

These politicians will have a strong incentive to complete their modules within our guidelines and parameters, including responding to specific issue questions, as we will soon be a major source of exposure to their constituents.  These modules will then be incorporated into our database and programs with little to no labor, greatly reducing the cost of construction of our database and systems.
iVoteUS.com will thus map the American political genome very, very efficiently, making us the Google/Facebook/YouTube of politics/elections/voting.

Each person making a donation will get our app, and by joining our social network of voters, will help create a community of well informed citizen-activists that have the tools to help shape our democracy, and participate meaningfully in self-government.

These tools are the iVoteUS.com smartphone app, and the mechanisms of our social network.

Flyover Innovations LLC, a consumer electronics startup company, is finalizing the development of our first product - Blumoo - an open source hardware platform capable of controlling your home theater equipment and streaming music to your existing stereo equipment all from your favorite mobile device.

No need to waste your money buying inadequate Bluetooth speakers or high-end receivers to get the convenience of remote control and streaming from your mobile device.  Keep your existing system and add premium functionality with Blumoo.
Blumoo connects to your mobile device via Bluetooth technology to enable both universal remote control functionality and hi-fi audio streaming.

The Blumoo app (iOS and Android) that you download to your mobile device automatically loads the appropriate remote control database for your equipment.  The Blumoo app provides a simple, intuitive user interface on your mobile device for stereo controls as well as quick access to your media libraries and favorite streaming music apps.

The Blumoo ""pod"" integrates a powerful infrared (IR) transmitter that is universally compatible with standard home theater equipment.  Blumoo will be able to control all of your equipment from the primary ""pod"" IR transmitter for typical installations.  If it is desired to control several theater devices that are separated by closed cabinets, an additional IR emitter may be used to reach all devices.  Blumoo has an additional port on the cable that, if desired, can accept a readily-available, standard 3.5mm IR emitter cable.  Since the IR transmitter is located inside the stationary Blumoo ""pod"", your phone becomes the remote control to your standard equipment without the 'line-of-sight' limitations that are typical with most remote controls.
Audio from your mobile device is transmitted wirelessly via Bluetooth to Blumoo.  The audio is transmitted to the receiver from Blumoo via standard 3.5mm jack or RCA connections.

The Blumoo app provides the remote control interface to your stereo equipment and quick access to your streaming and media app's.  To maintain an intuitive interface to the user, only relevant controls for the selected mode will be displayed.

If we can achieve our stretch goal, we will be able to create a full universal remote control app for iOS and Android to control all of your home entertainment equipment (TV, Blu-Ray, DVD Player, Receiver, Satellite, Cable Box, etc) - all from your single Blumoo hardware device!
The standard main screen of the iOS/Android app includes quick access to power on the stereo receiver, volume control, and auxiliary selection.
If you are on your streaming auxiliary, you can access your media libraries or streaming app's by tapping the music icon.
If you are on CD or Tuner, you'll get quick access controls relevant for those functions.
Blumoo is a flexible hardware platform that can be used to control any device with an infrared remote control (TV, DVD &
column2: Blu Ray players, Satellite Box, Cable Box, Projectors, Soundbars, and much more) associated with it from your mobile device.  Following launch we will provide an open API with our comprehensive IR code database to enable developers at-large to modify, expand, and make new Blumoo app variants!  The database is extremely large so we won't be posting it on here, but feel free to contact us if you have any specific questions of what the database includes...if it has an IR interface and you want to control it, theres a good chance our database includes it.

column1: We designed the Blumoo hardware and app entirely around simplicity.  The entire Blumoo experience - from set-up to daily use - revolves around ease of use for you.
Just a few simple steps to get your Blumoo installed:
1) Connect Blumoo audio output to your receiver or speaker system's input with standard RCA or 3.5mm connection.
2) Connect the included power cable to Blumoo and plug into a wall outlet.
3) Install the iOS or Android App on your mobile phone or tablet.  The setup wizard will walk you through installation.
4) Press the button on top of Blumoo to pair with your mobile device.
5) Select Manufacturer from drop down list.

We are offering the following Blumoo colors for our Indiegogo campaign.  The Brushed Aluminum version will be our trademark product that will be taken into market.  If you want to stand out from the crowd, we are offering the Black Chrome and the Royal Blue versions as Indiegogo exclusives and will only be available through this campaign.
Show your support for Flyover Innovations with this unique t-shirt. Blumoo Bob on the front, Flyover Innovations logo on the back.

We have concentrated on stereo control for the included app because this is a such a common use case and yet no device exists on the market to provide both full control and streaming capability to your existing equipment from your mobile device.  BUT...Blumoo can control all of your home theater equipment.  If we are able to exceed our goal and reach $40,000 we will be able to create a full universal remote control app for all of your home theater equipment (tv, blu-ray, dvd, projector, satellite, cable box, etc) and send it to all donors that purchased any Blumoo package!!!
What will we do with Indiegogo funding?
We are a small startup company with big dreams - we need your help to realize these dreams!  With a successful campaign, we can bring Blumoo to market and get Flyover Innovations off the ground.
The funds raised from this Indiegogo campaign will enable us to take Blumoo into production.  We can begin cutting tooling for the composite parts and purchase components for the first build.
We know everyone can't donate, but if you believe in our product and our startup company, please share this page, Tweet about us, Pin us, and email your friends about us.
Please visit https://www.facebook.com/FlyoverInnovationsKC page and ""Like"" us there too...and follow us on Twitter @FlyoverKC
If you are interested in becoming a distribution partner with Flyover Innovations please be sure to contact us to discuss the opportunity and receive bulk order pricing.
What stage of development is Blumoo in?
We have fully functional prototypes and are currently in the product testing phase.  Check out the ""Gallery"" tab to see videos of Blumoo in action.
Hardware: Initial design is complete for Blumoo, we are now in the process of testing the hardware and embedded software to ensure that Blumoo meets our quality and robustness standards.

iOS and Android App: Blumoo app development is currently underway.  The app is currently functional, however, we are continuing efforts to refine it in order to ensure that we have a remote control interface that's intuitive and simple with the necessary features.
Mechanical: Initial design is complete and undergoing testing and evaluation.  Ready to cut tooling!
Manufacturing and Supply Chain: We have already visited, audited, and established a partnership with a reputable manufacturing company.
Will the final product differ from the prototype shown in the video?
Blumoo ""Pod"" - The prototype Blumoo ""pod"" looks very similar to what it will look like in production.  However, there are two items that will be slightly different on production versions:
• The Blumoo logo will be silkscreened on the lower front of the case
• The production cable will have the power, 3.5mm audio, and 3.5mm optional IR extender jacks injection molded into a harness

Blumoo ""App"" - The App will maintain a similar layout as shown in the demo.  There may be some slight modifications to the graphic symbols used and the page layout as we finalize the UI.  Updated screenshots will be provided if changes are made.
As questions come in, we'll update them here:
1.  What version of Bluetooth is used on Blumoo?
We are using Bluetooth v4.0.  We use A2DP profile for stereo audio transfer and SPP for remote control transfer between Blumoo and your mobile device.
2.  What if I have both an Android and an iOS device in my house - can I get both app downloads with a purchased package?
Yes. The Blumoo apps will be readily available for free download.
3.  What control functions are built into the app? What devices can it control?

The standard app will be launched as a music controller - it will be capable of controlling your receiver/tuner, and CD player.  The controls that are displayed on the app are relevant for the auxiliary that is selected. For example, if you select ""tuner"" then the controls displayed would be Power, Volume Control, Tune Up/Down, and your Preset Station selections.  If you selected ""CD"" as the auxiliary, the controls would be Power, Volume Control, Skip Forward/Back, Pause, Stop, and Disk Change.  If you select an open Aux we will default to showing streaming media controls - receiver Power, Volume Control, access to your mobile devices stored music (itunes, android music player) and access to your streaming app's (Spotify, Pandora, Grooveshark, etc).  If we are able to achieve our stretch goal, we will create an app that will allow you to use Blumoo to control all of your home theater devices (TV, DVD player, Stereo, Cable Box, etc).  Suggestions for additions to the app?  Let us know!!
4.  Can I have more than one device connected to Blumoo at a time?

Yes. We are targeting the ability to have 5 devices connected to Blumoo at a time!  We don't like looking for remotes, so we don't want you searching for your phone either...pick up whatever mobile device is closest to you (phone, tablet, itouch) and start controlling/streaming!

5.  When the full universal app is created that is able to control all of my home theater equipment (TV, DVD Player, Stereo, Cable Box, etc), will I need to add more Blumoo's or will one device be able to control all of these?

As long as all of your devices are in relatively close proximity as they typically are in a standard living room or theater installation, a single Blumoo hardware device will be able to control all of these devices.  If you have a device that is outside of the proximity (e.g. in a closed cabinet that will be away from the Blumoo ""Pod"") you can simply plug in an IR extension dongle into the available port on the Blumoo ""Pod"" cable.
6.  Is there a 'learning' function for the unit if my equipment is not in the database?

Yes. We have incorporated a ""learning"" mode into the Blumoo in the rare chance that your equipment or specific control command is not included in the database.  If you are curious if your equipment is covered in the database, shoot me a message and I'll check for you!

Our engineering team has more than 60 years combined experience in product development and manufacturing with high volume consumer electronics companies. We know there will always be small hiccups along the way when taking products from development to the market. The good news is that, in previous ventures, our team has likely faced and tackled whatever challenges may be ahead. We have the experience, insight, and tenacity to minimize and overcome them.

Product
To minimize risks associated with the product we have constructed and are in the processes of vetting a comprehensive test plan to ensure the product meets compatibility requirements and fulfills our quality and robustness standards.
Final validation testing is ongoing but results to date have been very positive. We are at a point in the design process that we do not foresee any major technical hurdles that would affect the schedule.
We are preparing to send Blumoo out for final certifications and approvals from the appropriate agencies. There is always risk until the final paperwork is in hand, but this is not a new process for us and we are well prepared to remedy any issues if they arise.

App
The biggest hurdle with the app was finding a database that was comprehensive enough to cover the broad range of home theater equipment. This issue has been resolved and the focus is now on finalizing the user interface and menu structure. We have an experienced app developer and user interface consultant on the team to ensure an intuitive interface without losing necessary functionality.

Manufacturing and Supply Chain
We have selected a partner that will manufacture Blumoo. Our manufacturing partner is equipped to scale as needed to ensure that we can fulfill customer demand.
As with most companies, the biggest risk associated with Manufacturing and Supply Chain is related to forecasting appropriately to ensure that we overcome component leadtimes to secure appropriate quantities required to fulfill demand. We have strong relationships with our suppliers and maintain regular communication to keep them updated in order to minimize this risk as much as possible.
THANK YOU for the consideration to assist us with this campaign and the opportunity to make the Blumoo available to all!
Flyover Innovations was founded by Jason Carman and Mark Vogt with the desire to give consumers access to elegant, high-quality, consumer electronic devices that are simple to set-up and use.

Mark and Jason met each other more than 10 years ago working as engineers for GPS manufacturer, Garmin.  Entrepreneurs at heart, we realized that many people were not utilizing technology to the fullest extent in many real-world scenarios...the reason? Over and over again people stated that it was too difficult to set up and/or use.

In 2012, Jason and Mark decided to pair up and try to make a difference.  We cherry picked exceptional talent for the team and founded Flyover Innovations LLC. The core motto behind the team is a strict focus on complete user experience - from setup through daily use.  It's simple - technology should be used to simplify our lives, not complicate it.  We also believe in the fundamental importance and strength of community-developed products. This is why we are launching the Blumoo platform with an open API to enable app developers in the community to continue to add new features and functions to the product.
A sincere thank you for helping our team get a start in building a truly user-focused company.
(from left: Jason (CEO), Peter (SW Eng), Mark (CTO), Steve (Mech Eng), Rob (BDM))

Flyover Innovations LLC, a consumer electronics startup company, is finalizing the development of our first product - Blumoo - an open source hardware platform capable of controlling your home theater equipment and streaming music to your existing stereo equipment all from your favorite mobile device.

No need to waste your money buying inadequate Bluetooth speakers or high-end receivers to get the convenience of remote control and streaming from your mobile device.  Keep your existing system and add premium functionality with Blumoo.
Blumoo connects to your mobile device via Bluetooth technology to enable both universal remote control functionality and hi-fi audio streaming.

The Blumoo app (iOS and Android) that you download to your mobile device automatically loads the appropriate remote control database for your equipment.  The Blumoo app provides a simple, intuitive user interface on your mobile device for stereo controls as well as quick access to your media libraries and favorite streaming music apps.

The Blumoo ""pod"" integrates a powerful infrared (IR) transmitter that is universally compatible with standard home theater equipment.  Blumoo will be able to control all of your equipment from the primary ""pod"" IR transmitter for typical installations.  If it is desired to control several theater devices that are separated by closed cabinets, an additional IR emitter may be used to reach all devices.  Blumoo has an additional port on the cable that, if desired, can accept a readily-available, standard 3.5mm IR emitter cable.  Since the IR transmitter is located inside the stationary Blumoo ""pod"", your phone becomes the remote control to your standard equipment without the 'line-of-sight' limitations that are typical with most remote controls.
Audio from your mobile device is transmitted wirelessly via Bluetooth to Blumoo.  The audio is transmitted to the receiver from Blumoo via standard 3.5mm jack or RCA connections.
What does the Blumoo app do?

The Blumoo app provides the remote control interface to your stereo equipment and quick access to your streaming and media app's.  To maintain an intuitive interface to the user, only relevant controls for the selected mode will be displayed.

If we can achieve our stretch goal, we will be able to create a full universal remote control app for iOS and Android to control all of your home entertainment equipment (TV, Blu-Ray, DVD Player, Receiver, Satellite, Cable Box, etc) - all from your single Blumoo hardware device!
The standard main screen of the iOS/Android app includes quick access to power on the stereo receiver, volume control, and auxiliary selection.
If you are on your streaming auxiliary, you can access your media libraries or streaming app's by tapping the music icon.
If you are on CD or Tuner, you'll get quick access controls relevant for those functions.

Blumoo is a flexible hardware platform that can be used to control any device with an infrared remote control (TV, DVD & Blu Ray players, Satellite Box, Cable Box, Projectors, Soundbars, and much more) associated with it from your mobile device.  Following launch we will provide an open API with our comprehensive IR code database to enable developers at-large to modify, expand, and make new Blumoo app variants!  The database is extremely large so we won't be posting it on here, but feel free to contact us if you have any specific questions of what the database includes...if it has an IR interface and you want to control it, theres a good chance our database includes it.
How do you set up Blumoo?
We designed the Blumoo hardware and app entirely around simplicity.  The entire Blumoo experience - from set-up to daily use - revolves around ease of use for you.
Just a few simple steps to get your Blumoo installed:
1) Connect Blumoo audio output to your receiver or speaker system's input with standard RCA or 3.5mm connection.
2) Connect the included power cable to Blumoo and plug into a wall outlet.
3) Install the iOS or Android App on your mobile phone or tablet.  The setup wizard will walk you through installation.
4) Press the button on top of Blumoo to pair with your mobile device.
5) Select Manufacturer from drop down list.

Hi, my name’s Kennedy. I live in Vancouver, British Columbia. I have a genetic disease called Osteochondritis Dissecans. In most cases, it's little pieces of bone that break off in usually the knee or elbow of an active person when they've shocked their body. These pieces are usually so small that they either dissolve or reattach themselves. As well, they usually break off on the outside of a bone which a person usually can't feel. So in most cases, people aren’t even aware when they have Osteochondritis Dissecans. Unfortunately, I have a rare case due to the size and location of my dead bone. My most recent MRI and CT scans shows that there’s a 2.6 x 1.8 x 0.4 cm bone defect along the medial knee joint with at least 7 small fragments overlying the defect. The fragments vary in size with the largest measuring 1 cm x 8 mm. As well, there’s swelling demonstrated in the suprapatellar bursa and in the medial gutter.

In 2001, I injured myself during a school field trip. I tore a ligament and my gastrocnemius muscle (attached to the achilles tendon). This is when my knee pain began. Prior to my injury, I was very active and loved to dance. Initially, when I complained about my knee pain my doctors didn't take me seriously so nothing was done. I was repeatedly told that I was experiencing growing pains. In 2005, I had to quit dancing and quit all other forms of physical activity (excluding short distance walking). In the fall of 2006, I had my first MRI and this is when Osteochondritis Dissecans was discovered in my knee. In 2007, I had my first failed surgery. My surgeon at the time drilled 3 holes into my knee hoping to create a blood flow and revive my cells. In 2008, I had my second failed surgery. The same surgeon drilled the same 3 holes as well as 2 more. His intent was to attach my dead bone to my healthy bone with 2 screws. However, he was unable to because my dead bone was very soft (like mush) and wouldn't hold the screws. Also, I've been left with very little healthy cartilage. My former surgeon called my cartilage ""shaggy"".

Everyday I experience knee pain - some days are worse than others. Last January, I was on bed rest for a month due to excruciating pain. My dad came over from Victoria and brought me to Ossur (http://www.ossur.com/?PageID=12521). I’ve been wearing one of their unloader braces since February 2012.  I do notice a difference when I have it on so I wear it on a daily basis. However, I look at it as more of a band-aid and temporary help.

A few months ago, I was given the option to have more surgeries. This time they'd be much more invasive. The surgeons want to do at least 3 surgeries, maybe more. During the first one they want to straighten my knee joint by putting a metal plate in the joint and cut a leg muscle of mine to reshape and tighten the ligaments of my knee. The second surgery will be to remove the dead bone fragments. The third surgery will be a tissue/bone graft borrowed from the tissue bank (deceased donors). The surgeons say they may have to do more than one graft and the total time of surgery and recovery is estimated at 2 years. They aren’t sure how successful all these surgeries will be which leads me with an uneasy feeling.

My dad's been interested in stem cell research. The cost has always held us back though. Unfortunately, the stem cell procedures that I need aren't available in Canada, and aren't covered by the government. However, at this point I really can't wait any longer. I'm so very fortunate to have such a loving and supportive family. My dad’s helping me out as much as he can. As well, my mom would like to be able to help me out. She’s planning on selling her car for me. It's really not in my nature to ask for help but as much as I would love to solve my health problems I don't want to create new problems for my family. So I'm asking your for help <

Half of the funds that I hope to raise will go towards my procedures which is a total of $5000. The other half that I hope to raise will go towards my 4 trips to the hospital, located in Boca Raton, FL. There’s 5 procedures in total. The first 2 are done in the same visit. After these, I'm suppose to go to Boca Raton every 4-6 weeks for following procedures.

I'm hoping these procedures will eliminate my chronic pain and strengthen my knee. Before I had to completely stop all physical activity (excluding short distance walking), I was a dancer. I danced everyday and I loved it. It was a true passion of mine. I've been injured for so long, that it seems far fetched to me to think that I could ever dance again. However, dancing is what really makes me most happy in life. It’d be a dream come true.

First of all, I'd like to say thank you for taking the time to read my story. I know that many people who'd like to help can't afford to donate any money. There's plenty of other ways you can help though! It'd mean a lot to me if you shared my page with your family, friends and coworkers. Hopefully this will spread the word and help me reach my goal. Not only would it be a dream come true to live a life with no pain and no limitations. Also imperative that doctors, specialists, parents, phys ed teachers (etc) have more knowledge on this genetic disease. To this day, one of the most frustrating parts of my health struggles is that my doctors and phys ed teachers (even with a doctor's note) didn't take my knee pain seriously.
From the bottom of my heart, thank you again for taking the time out of your day to read this!! ~Kennedy

Not only would it be a dream come true to live a life with no pain and no limitations. Also imperative that doctors, specialists, parents, phys ed teachers (etc) have more knowledge on this genetic disease. To this day, one of the most frustrating parts of my health struggles is that my doctors and phys ed teachers (even with a doctor's note) didn't take my knee pain seriously.
From the bottom of my heart, thank you again for taking the time out of your day to read this!! ~Kennedy",0.0,0,"1 Campaign
New SlideStand Prototype in closed and locked position
• A simple peel and stick universal stand for your cell phone.

• It works on almost any cell phone or iPod type of device and adheres to all cases and shields.(will not stick to devices with tempered glass-needs a case/shield)(will not stick to highly contoured or bedazzled cases)
• Uses a 3M adhesive so there is no chance of damage and there is no sticky residue if removed.
• Locks flat and pops open only when you need it.
• It’s made from a recycled material and can be recycled.
• It has been tested to over 8000 open/close cycles –It’s there for the life of your phone!
• We have a US patent for the SlideStand and an International patent pending.
• Product specifications: Height: 6.7cm — 2.6 inches * Width: 4.1cm – 1.6 inches * Thickness: 2.5mm – 0.098 inches
New SlideStand Prototype - opens to accomodate various phones
• Watching TV, movies, sporting events or music videos
• Viewing slideshows or delivering a PowerPoint presentation on the go
• Follow notes while playing a musical instrument
• To see who is calling from across the room
• On your night-stand as an alarm clock

When we started on the development of this product 2 years ago we were not aware of funding platforms such as Indiegogo that could have helped us – but we were passionate about our invention and with the help of family and friends we funded the project ourselves.
During our first trial production run our mould became irreparably damaged.  All our hard work, money and support of family and friends was all put into jeopardy.

Despite this set back we decided not to give up.  You know what they say: when you are given lemons, make lemonade, so we decided to take this opportunity to make the SlideStand even better. We drew up a new and even cooler design – same principle – but even more functionality such as a wider choice of standing positions via more angles and an option of dual color.

We are a group of friends that wanted a cool, durable and inexpensive stand for our smartphones. We have been committed to this project for over 2 years and realized that we have more innovative ideas for the mobile telephone industry that we would like to develop. We hope that the SlideStand is just the first in a long line of innovative products and a start of something much bigger.
Miraslav E. Royz (Electro-Mechanical Engineering Robotics) Ottawa, Canada
Our many friends in Canada,USA and Europe that helped us in development.
New SlideStand Prototype on a tablet - very stable and great for viewing video and reading.
WE NEED YOUR HELP TO RAISE $9000 TO BUILD A NEW MOULD AND LAUNCH OUR INVENTION.
$6,400 for new mould - $2,600 materials and manufacturing.
• First and foremost you will have our gratitude for helping us recover and by giving us the ability to launch our invention.  So any contribution however small is greatly appreciated

• For $7 which includes shipping(Canada and USA) - please add $3 shipping(All other countries) you will receive a brand new cooler than ever SlideStand – your choice of black or white color.  (Our initial colors will be black or white(solid - one color) – if we are fortunate to raise more than the $9,000 we will try to make dual color SlideStands available for your choice – so they can be white frame and black inside or some other cool pastel color combinations  – we welcome your suggestions of color(please understand if we can’t make all colors available right away)
• If you would like we can put your logo or company information directly in the center of the SlideStand – It’s a great promotional tool so don’t forget to check that out.
• Take a look at the various options and rewards for making a contribution – Thank You!

We started this project and did the majority of the work on our own – it was a tough 2 years.  We suffered a major setback when our mould was damaged, but we refuse to give up.  With your help we can complete our journey of invention and bring this product to the marketplace so everyone can enjoy.

All your contributions are greatly appreciated.  Any and all funds will go towards reaching our goal of restarting SlideStand and launching our invention.  Thank you for taking the time to look at and consider our project.  Please tell your friends about us.

SpeedSpiration in a minute. Watch our new Video
https://vimeo.com/50842267
See our new perk, the creative Adventcalender! Each day filled with inspiration...
The radio feature on our brainstorming event in Hamburg is online now. Listen to it under http://t.co/Imt4THxl

Brainstorming is a great tool for getting new ideas. It works perfectly for groups - but what to do if there are no others around to brainstorm with? In such case SpeedSpiration helps - the fastest brainstorming platform with gaming factor!
On SpeedSpiration international people of all ages and professions come together to ask and answer creative brainstorming questions.
Those are questions for which the answers cannot be googled
column2: the answers you get will mostly be surprising and unexpected.

column1: How is this made possible? By an open and spontaneous mechanism: Anyone can insert questions, anyone can answer questions. In order to challenge creative and spontaneous ideas SpeedSpiration's brainstorming is organized like a quiz: The challenge is to answer successively appearing questions within 60 seconds each. Therby answers will be more spontaneous than planned, more creative than elaborate. Additionaly, users can reward each other by giving points for great ideas and inspirations.
The very first draft of our concept you can find at www.speedspiration.com
Our core team (who met at Startup Weeking Hamburg) unites various competencies:

Diana: Holds a Diplom in Media Computer Science (with minor in Psychology) and a PhD in Computer Science/Human Computer Interaction. She is interested in online communites, web programming, and UX...and she loves snowboarding and travelling. If she is not working on creative projects like SpeedSpiration, she works as an IT project manager in Hamburg.

Deva: Holds a BA in Philosophy and a MA in Performance Art. As a philosophic dancer she is interested in creative strategies, new media culture, bodily realities and the spaces in-between. Next to thinking she loves all kinds of moving - from dancing to surfing... She works as a research assistant at Hamburg University.

Natalie: Holds a Master's Degree in Management and Entrepreneurship and has gained practical marketing experience at Jung von Matt. Today, she works as innovation strategist in a German business consultancy. In her free time, she enjoys long walks with her dog Henry and is crazy about travelling, snowboarding and startups :).

We are currently working on SpeedSpiration in our free time. Received fundings would be helpful for marketing, implementation and business model expenses. Our goal of 3.500 euros is meant for the first kick off. The final implementation of SpeedSpiration will need more financial background - so we won't say no if we get more funding
Marketing: In order to reach a wide range of users, we would like to invest in marketing (e.g. image film).
Implementation: We would like to have some money to recruit and pay interns helping us with the platform.
Business Model: To set up a sustainable business model some money will be invested in developing premium features - e.g. in form of ""Promoted Questions"" based on the model of Google Adwords.
People who donate 10 € get a personal SpeedSpiration button. A award to be part of the creative brainstorming crowd.
People who donate 15+ € get a free premium account for our platform. And - as a member of the beta group - you will have the chance to decide on how the platform will be developed further!
People who donate 50+ € will get served a creative dinner in a nice atmosphere in Hamburg, Germany. You get to know us and other supporters and we will use the meeting to network and brainstorm!
People who donate 250+ € will be invited to a half day creative workshop with our interdisciplinary team. (Please note: the workshops will take place in or around Hamburg
column2: other destinations are possible, we need to talk about travel expenses though.)

column1: People who donate 750+ € will get a personalized half day creative workshop. (Please note: the workshops will take place in or around Hamburg
column2: other destinations are possible, we need to talk about travel expenses though.)

column1: The bigger the creative crowd, the more inspirational it will be. So tell your friends about Speedspiration and challenge them to join the creative game!

„You want to free up the abilities of everybody to contribute ideas, because everybody has ideas, and you need to create a climate in which that will happen."" (Sir Ken Robinson, Think Quaterly by Google: Issue Creativity, 2012)

With SpeedSpiration we want to create such a climate in which ideas can evolve. We want to offer a free tool, where people of all ages and backgrounds meet in a creative room to inspire each other, independent of their individual or economical aims and purposes.

In a playful way we want to implement a new navigation system for those who like to go on an expedition through creative landscapes. With SpeedSpiration we can inspire each other to be creative and encourage others to discover themselves in their own amazing creativity. While creativity is one of the core competencies of our todays society, a lot of people do not trust in their creativity and do not challenge it.

„CEO’s identified creativity as the number-one leadership competency of the future (...) [But creativity] isn’t something they learn within their company, and it certainly isn’t something they are taught in business school. Business schools teach people how to be deliverers, not discoverers."" (Jeff Dyer &
column2: Hal Gregerson: The DNA of Disruptive Innovators, 2011)

column1: By its simple gaming-like structure SpeedSpiration allows an easy access to the creative crowd, to inspirational ideas from others and to the own great creativity.
You like SpeedSpiration and would like to help us?
Please visit our (still work in progress) website: www.speedspiration.com

As soon as SpeedSpiration Beta starts we will inform you. You can be one of the first users to play with your creativity!
