The Short Version of who we are!

column1: Hi. We're Blue Infusion Technologies.  We are regular guys by day and tinkerers/inventors/entrepreneurs by night from various areas of Maryland. We have been working on a method to make it easier to control music while wearing gloves and active. Our current project is the BEARTek glove and we’re almost complete.  But we need your help.

We need to raise $47,000 to cover the cost of manufacturing fabrics, electronics, and plastics.  So we're turning to our strongest supporters to ask for contributions. In exchange, we're offering some perks which we think you’ll like, including pre-orders and signature series gloves. Your contribution will help us manufacture and deliver BEARTek gloves to active people everywhere, and further, it will help support a home-grown idea turn into something big. Thanks!

Hey Indiegogo. Thanks for checking out our campaign.  BEARTek gloves are smartly designed, electronically capable gloves intended to make it much easier to control music and phone calls while maintaining control, comfort, and safety in your activity.  With the help of our Electronic Bluetooth Module (EBM), BEARTek gloves use bluetooth technology to control your smart phone with ease using only the natural movements of touching your thumb to your fingertips.

BEARTek stands for:
Who are we and where'd the glove idea come from?

<div>My name is Willie and I am an avid sportbike rider.  In my early years riding, I recognized a challenge that riders who wanted music typically faced.  Unless they wanted an expensive helmet-mounted solution, there weren't too many options available for them.  Friends I've talked to have similar problems on the slopes.  The idea dawned on me that there should be another way - a safer way - a less expensive way - a <span style=""font-style: italic
column2:
>cooler way - thus the idea was born... years ago.

This idea of a glove which allows the user to control his music was pretty cool, I thought - but I hadn't acted on it.  After years of taking notes, keeping the idea in the back of my mind, and recognizing many of the other active people it would benefit, I HAD to see if this was something which could be created.  So late last year, I built a small team and got to work.
>What can a BEARTek glove do?
column3:
>
By touching your thumb to the appropriate finger, you will control your phone's ability to do the following and more:

column1: Future modules will surely enable more features.
column3: >Similar to the 'lock' feature on your phone or MP3 player, the sides of the index finger on BEARTek gloves allow you to eliminate accidental activation or deactivation of activity.
column4: />
column5:
>
BEARTek gloves are the perfect tool for Exceptional Mobile Audio Control
column6:
>Who is it for?

Anyone can use these gloves for their chosen activities - just a short list is below

column1: We are starting with motorcycle and ski gloves, enough demand will quickly encourage the designs of other gloves.  We are relying on you to share with us what YOU want as far as activity gloves.  We love to hear from interested people, and we want your demand to guide our production.  We intend to produce winter model gloves simultaneously with the motorcycle gloves.  The ONLY hurdle is the cost and you can help clear that with grace.  My manufacturer knows already exactly what we are looking for.
What materials are BEARTek gloves made from?

BEARTek gloves are made primarily from standard materials appropriate for the specific glove use.  ABS plastic is used to house the electronic components.  Other materials include genuine and synthetic leathers, suede, polyester, polyurethane, and conductive fabrics.

Our ski and motorcycle gloves are designed with materials for waterproofing, breathe-ability, comfort, and warmth.  The fingers are slightly pre-curved to reduce ""break-in"" time and enable easier grip on handle bars and ski poles.  On the motorcycle gloves we've added ventilation in-between the fingers and on the back of the hand for air-flow and cooling.  Ski gloves will come with tethering straps so they can be removed without risk of dropping and losing a glove.
Our gloves are made of high-quality materials for long-lasting comfort, protection, and durability.

When designing the BEARTek glove, one of the challenges we'd faced when conceiving consumer value was expense and maintenance.  You can't wash electronics (usually) and they are not always inexpensive to replace when damaged.  Our solution - separate the glove from the electronics.  The EBM is a removable component which enables cleaning and maintenance of the glove without risk to the electronics.  That solves the maintenance problem... but what about expense?  The removability of the EBM immediately aids in the solution of cost.  The EBM and gloves are designed to be completely interchangable.  One EBM can be used on every type of glove we will offer.  So if you ride in the summer and ski in the winter, you only need a single EBM.  What's better is upgrade of the EBM will automatically mean all of your BEARTek gloves are enabled for the new capabilities.

High quality manufacturing isn't cheap, so the gloves aren't either.  Our cost model currently stands as follows.  Less complex gloves will cost considerably less.
Motorcycle glove - $129
Ski glove - $89
Electronic Bluetooth Module - $139
column2: >Only on Indiegogo - the cost is about $130 for a glove and module together, depending on your perk selection!
column3: >Palm view:

column1: So - why Indiegogo?  We have come so far with this idea and are just about ready to take it to market.  Unfortunately it costs a good bit of money to make that happen.  With the positive responses we've heard so far about the 'coolness' and utility of this product in many markets, we've decided that rather than searching high and low for an investor who'll try to own the company to take us to market, we'll ask the people.  We need your donations to help us manufacture this product and go to the next logical level.

To get there we need to create molds for the ABS plastics ($12,000), electronics for the Bluetooth module and the glove ($18,000 to reach minimum order), and the gloves themselves which have a minimum order quantity ($15,000), and a little room for the ever-present ""fudge-factor"".

I think we've put together some pretty cool perks around the donation model and hope you like them.  Additionally, we've made the price considerably lower than what the gloves and brain modules will be at retail.  All of this is with the hope that you'll take advantage of what we have and tell your friends, family, forums, and bloggers.
As you back us, you'll be coming on the journey with updates of the BEARTek glove reaching maturity and venturing out into the world.  This'll be fun :-).

column3: >We appreciate our donors and we will deliver the gloves and modules to you in the order the donations are received - so the earlier you donate, the earlier you'll have your set.  *Signature series may be slightly delayed.
>Bluetooth Module and BEARTek glove cradle

column1:
There are tons of ways you can help if you so desire.  First and foremost, TELL EVERYONE :-).  Facebook, Twitter, email, forums, magazines, blogs, motorcycle shops, ski shops, screaming from rooftops (that's bold), in a song, anything you can think of, then... tell US!!!  We'd LOVE to hear how you're spreading the word.

Indiegogo has AWESOME share tools!  Using them will allow us to know how many new donors you have been able to refer so you have a chance at the special treat at the bottom of this page.  As you can tell, we're looking for creative ways to get you to tell 20 friends... and have them each tell 20 friends... and so on.  Again, we're open to ideas - it's an open forum to success.

What if we don't reach our goal?

Eek!  What an unwelcome thought.  So, first, we wouldn't launch this campaign if we didn't think we'd make it.  Second, if there's anything we can do to help you decide to contribute or you have ideas on how we can better spread the word, let us know.

Now, to answer the question.  The reality is it is possible not to reach the goal.  At the end of the campaign, if we have not fully succeeded, we will work to build the product  to the highest quality and reward our contributors - if we can't even to THAT, we'll just return the donations which IndieGoGo has passed through to us, back to you.
column5: >*NOTE:  This campaign is focused on motorcycle and winter sports gloves exclusively.  For any other type of glove we encourage you to let us know your preference by funding this campaign at
column6: >any level and in the comments section, identify the type of glove (cycling, running, etc) you are most interested in, and as SOON as this campaign reaches it's goal, we will launch a parallel campaign for the most popular other model glove(s).   With your help, it's entirely possible to have ski gloves this winter!!!

column3: >***A Special Reward to the 3 donors with!!!***

column2: >*(if we exceed the funding goal by $10,000)*

column3: >One round trip ticket from anywhere in the continental US to Consumer Electronics Show (CES) in Las Vegas (if we can get in), with 2 night's hotel stay, and my treat dinner with the signature level donors

Future modules will surely enable more features.Similar to the 'lock' feature on your phone or MP3 player, the sides of the index finger on BEARTek gloves allow you to eliminate accidental activation or deactivation of activity.BEARTek gloves are the perfect tool for Exceptional Mobile Audio ControlWho is it for?Anyone can use these gloves for their chosen activities - just a short list is below

We are starting with motorcycle and ski gloves, enough demand will quickly encourage the designs of other gloves.  We are relying on you to share with us what YOU want as far as activity gloves.  We love to hear from interested people, and we want your demand to guide our production.  We intend to produce winter model gloves simultaneously with the motorcycle gloves.  The ONLY hurdle is the cost and you can help clear that with grace.  My manufacturer knows already exactly what we are looking for.Back and cradle view:
What materials are BEARTek gloves made from?

BEARTek gloves are made primarily from standard materials appropriate for the specific glove use.  ABS plastic is used to house the electronic components.  Other materials include genuine and synthetic leathers, suede, polyester, polyurethane, and conductive fabrics.

Our ski and motorcycle gloves are designed with materials for waterproofing, breathe-ability, comfort, and warmth.  The fingers are slightly pre-curved to reduce ""break-in"" time and enable easier grip on handle bars and ski poles.  On the motorcycle gloves we've added ventilation in-between the fingers and on the back of the hand for air-flow and cooling.  Ski gloves will come with tethering straps so they can be removed without risk of dropping and losing a glove.
Our gloves are made of high-quality materials for long-lasting comfort, protection, and durability.

When designing the BEARTek glove, one of the challenges we'd faced when conceiving consumer value was expense and maintenance.  You can't wash electronics (usually) and they are not always inexpensive to replace when damaged.  Our solution - separate the glove from the electronics.  The EBM is a removable component which enables cleaning and maintenance of the glove without risk to the electronics.  That solves the maintenance problem... but what about expense?  The removability of the EBM immediately aids in the solution of cost.  The EBM and gloves are designed to be completely interchangable.  One EBM can be used on every type of glove we will offer.  So if you ride in the summer and ski in the winter, you only need a single EBM.  What's better is upgrade of the EBM will automatically mean all of your BEARTek gloves are enabled for the new capabilities.High quality manufacturing isn't cheap, so the gloves aren't either.  Our cost model currently stands as follows.  Less complex gloves will cost considerably less.Motorcycle glove - $129Ski glove - $89Electronic Bluetooth Module - $139Only on Indiegogo - the cost is about $130 for a glove and module together, depending on your perk selection!Palm view:What We Need & What You Get

So - why Indiegogo?  We have come so far with this idea and are just about ready to take it to market.  Unfortunately it costs a good bit of money to make that happen.  With the positive responses we've heard so far about the 'coolness' and utility of this product in many markets, we've decided that rather than searching high and low for an investor who'll try to own the company to take us to market, we'll ask the people.  We need your donations to help us manufacture this product and go to the next logical level.

To get there we need to create molds for the ABS plastics ($12,000), electronics for the Bluetooth module and the glove ($18,000 to reach minimum order), and the gloves themselves which have a minimum order quantity ($15,000), and a little room for the ever-present ""fudge-factor"".

I think we've put together some pretty cool perks around the donation model and hope you like them.  Additionally, we've made the price considerably lower than what the gloves and brain modules will be at retail.  All of this is with the hope that you'll take advantage of what we have and tell your friends, family, forums, and bloggers.
As you back us, you'll be coming on the journey with updates of the BEARTek glove reaching maturity and venturing out into the world.  This'll be fun :-).

We appreciate our donors and we will deliver the gloves and modules to you in the order the donations are received - so the earlier you donate, the earlier you'll have your set.  *Signature series may be slightly delayed.
Bluetooth Module and BEARTek glove cradle

There are tons of ways you can help if you so desire.  First and foremost, TELL EVERYONE :-).  Facebook, Twitter, email, forums, magazines, blogs, motorcycle shops, ski shops, screaming from rooftops (that's bold), in a song, anything you can think of, then... tell US!!!  We'd LOVE to hear how you're spreading the word.Indiegogo has AWESOME share tools!  Using them will allow us to know how many new donors you have been able to refer so you have a chance at the special treat at the bottom of this page.  As you can tell, we're looking for creative ways to get you to tell 20 friends... and have them each tell 20 friends... and so on.  Again, we're open to ideas - it's an open forum to success.What if we don't reach our goal?

Eek!  What an unwelcome thought.  So, first, we wouldn't launch this campaign if we didn't think we'd make it.  Second, if there's anything we can do to help you decide to contribute or you have ideas on how we can better spread the word, let us know. Now, to answer the question.  The reality is it is possible not to reach the goal.  At the end of the campaign, if we have not fully succeeded, we will work to build the product  to the highest quality and reward our contributors - if we can't even to THAT, we'll just return the donations which IndieGoGo has passed through to us, back to you.*NOTE:  This campaign is focused on motorcycle and winter sports gloves exclusively.  For any other type of glove we encourage you to let us know your preference by funding this campaign at any level and in the comments section, identify the type of glove (cycling, running, etc) you are most interested in, and as SOON as this campaign reaches it's goal, we will launch a parallel campaign for the most popular other model glove(s).   With your help, it's entirely possible to have ski gloves this winter!!!
***A Special Reward to the 3 donors with!!!***
*(if we exceed the funding goal by $10,000)*

One round trip ticket from anywhere in the continental US to Consumer Electronics Show (CES) in Las Vegas (if we can get in), with 2 night's hotel stay, and my treat dinner with the signature level donors ...and honorable mention on our website",4.0,1,"1 Campaign

David Ortega (psychologist, composer of popular children's game music, father and creator of SymbeeStars) was experiencing a frustrating problem that many parents deal with - nighttime routines that end with your child not ready to go to sleep. Nightlights helped a little, but they didn't do anything to soothe them gently to sleep. Then he thought about what he wished the lights in his child's room would do. He talked to his longtime friends technology inventor John Sosoka and artist David Rees, and his wonderful concept began to take shape in the real world - SymbeeStars.

column4: >Make your kid's room a magical place with these iOS controlled lights.""
>A bright innovation for intelligent consumer lighting systems.""

>Sometimes our iDevices are able to do truly impressive things...A team of creators, some of which are behind the robotic dinosaur Pleo and the Furby, have come together to design a new product called Symbee Stars.""

column3: >What are SymbeeStars? The nightlight of the future . . .
>How do SymbeeStars help you with your sleepless child?
>I don't have a sleepless child - what else can I do with SymbeeStars?
>I don't have a smartphone. Can I still use these lights?
>These sound pretty complicated to set up. How do I get them working?
>What other products has this team successfully brought to market?
>Tell me more about SymbeeStars' battery life and how it attaches to the wall.
>Tell me more about IndieGoGo and why you are offering SymbeeStars on this site.

column1: SymbeeStars are the nightlight of the future. They are battery operated, super low power lights that you can stick to any surface and control with your iPhone 4s, iPad3 or optional remote - with more Bluetooth 4.0 devices being added (Android is around the corner).

SymbeeStars have beautiful interchangeable shades and full color light capability. They are as much beautiful accenting light as anything else. They can be programmed to shift colors, pulse and glow, and fade out over time (perfect for your sleepless child). With the onboard audio sensor SymbeeStars also keep a log of your child's nightly waking activity (accessible on your mobile device).
How SymbeeStars help you with your sleepless child

As parents, we all know that repetitive, soothing stimuli help transition a child to sleep. SymbeeStars provide soft illumination that can follow a preset or user-definable pattern. These lights can slowly dim over time as your child nears sleep. Every aspect is customizable, such as the pattern you choose or the time frame for the dimming.

For toddlers and older children, Symbee Stars can be that comforting light but with a truly magical edge. Imagine falling to sleep as you watch a wash of blue/green watery glow travel from one sea creature to the next, then back again, like a gentle current of water. Want to save on some battery life? Have these dim as your child falls asleep, then softly turn on again if your child wakes. The on-board microphone is ready and listening for your child, and doesn’t waste battery life keeping the lights on all night.

column3: Humans are hard-wired to respond to patterns in nature. Think of a candle’s flame: long, fluid lines are interspersed with flickers and waves. Fluid dynamics are not random behavior either. Symbee Stars light patterns imitate these natural phenomenon because we know organic patterns that are a mid-point between order and randomness are preferred by humans. (Hagerhall, et al., 2008)

column1: I don't have a sleepless child - what else can I do with SymbeeStars?

Don't have any young kids? Do you love beautiful lighting? Are you a gamer? musician? laserium fan? Like cool hi-tech stuff? Need an awesome party light? Want to add some hi-tech coolness to your dorm room? Then SymbeeStars are for YOU.
The possible applications of SymbeeStars are amazingly diverse.
Turn your house or garden into a beautiful space. You could use them for precisely controlled decorative lighting in your home, or fill your patio with fireflies to create a romantic space.

Being able to control your lights from your iPhone means your lights can interact with any application that is Symbee enabled. Imagine SymbeeStars on your walls coming to life in response to the games and books your child experiences on the iPad. Enjoy mood lighting that customizes itself to the music you are listening to on your iphone or ambient simulations like sunsets and rain.
Why not have interactive spooky lights this Halloween or beautiful seasonal lighting for the Holidays? SymbeeStars will be your favorite decoration year round.
SymbeeStars are an exciting platform to develop on, and Symbeeco is enthusiastically dedicated to making the platform readily available to developers for a host of application possibilities.
Here is a partial list of some of the things that can be made possible with SymbeeStars iOS applications:

- Symbee lights react in response to room ambiance
- SymbeeStars interac with click and explore apps
- SymbeeStars to monitor sleep habits
- SymbeeStars real time light shows in response to music from your iPhone or iPad
- SymbeeStars color based image morphing
- SymbeeStars lettering effects

column3: id=71"" rel=""noopener nofollow"" target=""_blank"" title=""SymbeeStars applications""><span style=""color: blue
column6: >CLICK HERE to read a detailed article on all the cool things that are possible with SymbeeStars.

column1: I don't have a smartphone. Can I still use these lights?

Excellent question - Yes. Put in batteries, stick SymbeeStars to any wall (with the provided 3M command strips) and they work. A simple tap will turn them on and they will automatically fade out over time (to preserve battery life). Use our optional remote control to control brightness, pulsing patterns, colors and fade out options. Devices are already positioned to handle BlueTooth4.0, so sometime in the near future many more mobile devices will be able to control SymbeeStars.
These sound pretty complicated to set up. How do I get them working?

We put a lot of effort into making SymbeeStars zero effort for you! SymbeeStars work right out of the box. Download the app from the App Store, and you’re ready to go. If you don’t have (or don’t want to use) an iDevice, use the optional remote control. There are no IP addresses, no passwords, no configuration. It’s that easy.
What other products has this team successfully brought to market?

The team behind SymbeeStars has an amazing track record of bringing award-winning products to market. Ever heard of Furby? Caleb Chung, the co-inventor, is on the team (nearly 50 million sold!). Other successful products include Pleo, the lovable robotic dinosaur, LeapFrog TAG reading system books, top mobile games such as ""Where’s My Water"" and ""Where’s My Perry,"" and award winning smart toys such as Music Blocks, Musini, and Sunshine Symphony.
Tell me more about SymbeeStars' battery life and how it attaches to the wall.

SymbeeStars are powered by standard AA batteries that are very easy to replace. Typical nighttime use will ensure months of battery life. As with any display such as your iPhone screen, your battery life will vary depending upon how bright the LEDs are and how long you keep them running.

Symbee Stars are designed to attach to almost any surface in seconds without any hardware installation issues. They use a single, industry proven 3M command strip, which means that removing them is just as fast, and leaves no mark whatsoever.

There are several technology advances behind SymbeeStars. Let’s start with the new wireless technology. While Bluetooth has been around for years, this year ushered in a whole new kind of Bluetooth, called ""Bluetooth Smart"". The new Bluetooth 4.0 that you are starting to hear about is really two Bluetooth systems in one package. All Bluetooth 4.0 devices, like the iPhone 4S are ""dual mode"" devices. They have all the regular Bluetooth features that we love but they also have an amazing ability to talk to very inexpensive, very low power devices. This ability will change our relationship with the physical world. Now we can connect your phone to a SymbeeStar or let your plants alert you on your phone that they’re thirsty. These Bluetooth Smart devices can run for a year with a small coin cell battery. Of course SymbeeStars are running bright LEDs so they need larger AA batteries to power the lights.

Another technology behind SymbeeStars is in the quality of the light. You’ve seen many products with colored (RGB) LEDs and they have a very cold bluish tint. SymbeeStars have and advanced RGBA LED system that provides a beautiful, warm color palette. If you would like more technical detaions just post a comment and we will respond.
Visit bluetooth.com for more consumer information on Bluetooth.
Tell me more about IndieGoGo and why you are offering SymbeeStars on this site

IndieGogo helps bring projects to market by ""crowd-sourced funding."" In short, this means we rely on small contributions by lots of people in order to meet the budget we need to bring Symbee Stars to manufacturing.

Crowd sourced funding has many advantages:
1. It acts as a pre-order site. Your contribution of 45.00 or more actually means you receive a first-run unit, before everyone else gets one.

2. IndieGogo provides an ""infomercial"" to Technology Investors.
As we meet with potential investors we have repeatedly heard that ""the best way to find a technology investor is for them to find you."" IndieGogo is often cited as the place to present our product and be seen by investors. Investors appreciate that they can not only see emerging tech and design projects on IndieGogo but they can gauge the value of them by the response of the user community.

3. IndieGogo is a powerful market research tool for Symbeeco.
When we place our project on IndieGogo along with our video about SymbeeStars we will immediately start getting feedback on the product, industrial design, features and everything else about the product. The big difference from traditional marketing research is that people who find SymbeeStars attractive will actually be pledging their own dollars to back our project. It’s one thing to say that you’ll buy a product in a focus group, it’s quite another to actually be excited enough about a product to turn over your money before you receive the product.

SymbeeStars, will be the first truly integrated, intelligent lighting system in the consumer space. The SymbeeStars line of LED accent lighting solutions have amazing versatility through interchangeable decorative shades and as a Bluetooth Smart device.

We are a super passionate team of developers, friends and professionals who've collectively, successfully brought to market high-tech products like Pleo the robot lifeform, Furby, Musini, Music Blocks and a host of other software, products and games. Our team effort to bring SymbeeStars to life has been a labor of love. We believe in SymbeeStars and while we are happy to contribute our time for free to make this a reality. The contract manufacturers, printed circuit board engineers, component vendors, qualification labs and injection molding companies need actual money to work their magic! Your generous support will allow us to pay for these outside services so that, at our goal, we can just break even as we manufacture the SymbeeStars for your chosen incentives. Then our dream of SymbeeStars glowing in homes, offices and in your own projects can be realized.
Any funding we receive will first go directly towards delivering SymbeeStars to our loyal contributors (whether we reach our funding goal or not).

If you can't make a monetary contribution to SymbeeStars but are fascinated like we are with cool stuff and high-tech gadgetry please share our story with a friend, or if you are a developer consider creating applications for SymbeeStars. IndieGoGo has share tools to help you easily spread the word.
Thank you so much for your pledge to SymbeeStars!

David Ortega is the inventor of SymbeeStars as well as a composer and clinical psychologist. His studio, Boston Soundlabs, has created critically acclaimed scores for Disney’s Where’s My Water, Nickelodeon’s Rugrats, Ubisoft’s Just Dance © Kids, and many more.

John Sosoka is a serial entrepreneur, multiple patent holder, technologist and designer with dozens of award winning products to his credit. Before creating Symbeeco, John cofounded UGOBE where he led the team to create Pleo, one of the world’s first commercial social robots. John also co-founded Neurosmith- an award-winning company
focused on bringing unique learning-based toys to children.
Caleb Chung is a brilliant designer, inventor, as well as an artist. Caleb was the co-inventor of Furby one of the most successful consumer products of all time.

David Rees is an experienced artist, musician and creative technical developer for all things digital. David was Art Director for Knowledge Adventure and Vivendi Universal for 7 years. As a musician David has composed for Sony Pictures, MTV, Fox, Warner Brothers , JumpStart software and a host of other game, toy and corporate clients, was a finalist in the 2011 International Songwriting Competition, and performs locally in southern California. David’s quest for creative experimentation eventually lead him into mobile devices where he has and currently develops apps for the iPhone, iPad and iPod Touch.

Joe Crotty provides financial leadership and ensures capital is effectively deployed. He has extensive experience in a wide range of leadership, management, and advisory positions. He has been an entrepreneur, investment banker, research analyst, and sales manager.

Diana Stern's extensive background of entrepreneurial and start-up experience span industries from sporting goods to robotics and has brought many products to market.Before joining Symbeeco, Diana held a variety of positions at Ugobe, a robotics company, the most recent as Vice President of Product Management.
Larry McCracken brings more than 30 years of experience in all facets of product engineering and manufacturing for companies like Leapfrog, Atari, Memorex, Prysm, and Ugobe.

Tyler Wilson brings 20 years of experience in the technology field to Symbeeco, specializing in software architecture and programming. Tyler’s early work in system programming, drivers, applications and later on cross-platform 2D/3D authoring systems, give Tyler rare insight into the complex software challenges and how to solve them.

Ben Coate is an international award-winning mathematician with a strong background in design. He has extensive experience in physical and mathematical modeling, as well as advanced problem solving. Ben lends his skills in graphic design, web development, and product design to the team.

David’s quest for creative experimentation eventually lead him into mobile devices where he has and currently develops apps for the iPhone, iPad and iPod Touch.

Joe Crotty provides financial leadership and ensures capital is effectively deployed. He has extensive experience in a wide range of leadership, management, and advisory positions. He has been an entrepreneur, investment banker, research analyst, and sales manager.

Diana Stern's extensive background of entrepreneurial and start-up experience span industries from sporting goods to robotics and has brought many products to market.Before joining Symbeeco, Diana held a variety of positions at Ugobe, a robotics company, the most recent as Vice President of Product Management.
Larry McCracken brings more than 30 years of experience in all facets of product engineering and manufacturing for companies like Leapfrog, Atari, Memorex, Prysm, and Ugobe.

Tyler Wilson brings 20 years of experience in the technology field to Symbeeco, specializing in software architecture and programming. Tyler’s early work in system programming, drivers, applications and later on cross-platform 2D/3D authoring systems, give Tyler rare insight into the complex software challenges and how to solve them.

Ben Coate is an international award-winning mathematician with a strong background in design. He has extensive experience in physical and mathematical modeling, as well as advanced problem solving. Ben lends his skills in graphic design, web development, and product design to the team.",6.0,0,"1 Campaign

We’ve reached our initial goal ahead of the expected deadline, which means that we will launch the Smart Stand project even faster now. The Tablet Stand is now being sent to serial production, while the Phone Stand is on the mould production stage.
Thank you all for your support and confidence.

We are looking forward to realizing new creative ideas together with you! Stay tuned!

Hello, world ! My name is Alex, i'm a Master student from Warsaw, Poland. In addition, i work at an export company, so i often deal with deliveries. We all value our time and money, so when it comes to deliveries, especially international,  it is either time consuming or expensive. So, i gathered a team and started to think about a possible solultion. 

How to make a  beneficial and efficient delivery system ? That's simple. There are lots of people who travel daily to another cities or countries, so, for them, taking some extra cargo isn't a problem. On the other hand, there are people who need to send a cargo as soon as possible, but don't want to overpay for urgent delivery at traditional companies. 

Let me introduce you WODES ( World Delivery System ),  a service, which will unite the people who can make a delivery, and the ones who need it.

WODES - is an entirely new way of delivery, which is dedicated to save your time and money.

Revolution in convenience

All the great things are simple. Thanks to our service you will be able to send whatever you want to any destination around the world. It is not only fast and convenient way to deliver your parcel, but also a way to earn some money. You are going on a trip? Perfect ! WODES is a great way to save money on your trip.

Delivering a cargo by someone going to your destination is a simple thing, but finding an appropriate and reliable driver is quite time consuming. And even when you find one, the problems do not end. You may have difficulties with the deliverer concerning a status of your cargo and a guarantee of safety.

Let's look at situation from a deliverer’s point of view. You are going on a trip, it is not big deal to deliver someone's parcel and thus cut your travel costs.

Our service is designed to solve all these issues and simplify our lives.

Currently, our project requires financial support in order to develop a web-page, applications for iOS and Android, in order to make our project indecent from financial investors who will turn the project from a social service to a cash machine.

If you have any questions or suggestions, feel free to contact us !

Sincerely yours, WODES team

• App controls on your phone (friendly interface, easy to use)
• Precision Steering (steer your wheels with 90 degrees of precision)
• Multi-function lights (enjoy bright left/right turning signals as well as headlights and brake lights)
• Customized speed options (proportional speed control, just like a real car! Also high and low speed switch!)
• Sensor mode functions ('catch me if you can' - your car runs away from you under 'cockroach mode' when you attach our option sensor cubes)
• So small you can keep in your pocket and race anywhere!

column3:
showinfo=0"">

Precision Steering means this steers and drives like a car, NOT like those ebay RC cars! Proportional steering allows down to 15 degrees of control! No more BANG BANG steering!

Have fun racing this car around obstacle courses and race tracks you setup on your desk!

column1: • 1:67 scale (slightly smaller than Matchbox cars and S scale for hobby trains)
• Push button on the bottom that can be used to activate the headlights for use as a flashlight.
• Internal Battery allows the car to run for about 15-25 minutes (depending on speed). Charging takes less than 10 minutes from completely empty

• What really makes this micro RC car special is our plan to open up the development files of the project to the public! We will make the 3D files, APIs, and I/O ports open for development so you can modify, design, or make your own custom RCs!

Google Play Store: QuantowGear

Apple iTunes link: QuantowGear

Make sure to test the app on your phone first!
3 control modes, Tilt to steer, on screen Joystick, and USB-OTG controllers (beta)

Perks and Packages

Regular Package $55
Sports Car and Truck shells with 1 Bluetooth Chassis, 8 swappable tires, 8 mini-cones, USB type C charging cable, Display Stand.

Advanced Order Sports Car Package $48
Sports Car shell with 1 Bluetooth Chassis, 4 sport tires, 8 mini-cones, USB type C charging cable, Display Stand.

Advanced Order Truck Package $48
Truck shell with 1 Bluetooth Chassis, 4 knobby tires, 8 mini-cones, USB type C charging cable, Display Stand.

Sibling Race Package $90
2 X Bluetooth Chassis, 2 X Sports car shells, 2 X Truck shells, 8 X sport tires, 4 X drag race tires, 8 X knobby tires, 30 X mini-cones, 2 X USB type C charging cable, 2 X Display Stands.

Custom Paint Set $120
Regular Package but with Hand Painted Custom Coloured Shells

Premium Set $400
We will design anything that can fit on the chassis! Custom car? Bulldozer? Cockroach? Sushi? We can do it for you!

Ultimate Set $1000
A custom designed shell Plated in 24k GOLD! And a Personalized App!

Quantow Custom shells and Wacky Shells!

Custom Shells Currently Available, each shell is produced in limited numbers and painted by hand please add $18 for each shell you would like: 

(fine print) Only the most popular shells will be plastic injected, for the 2nd and 3rd most popular options, they will be 3d printed, and finished by hand. These will be 3D printed at ultra fine quality, and then primed and coated by hand. The quality is very good, if you look at our models, the red truck and classic car prototypes were both 3D printed! 

About the Project

As a Scale auto fan I’ve looked all over the world for matchbox sized RC cars but I’ve never been able to find a high quality micro RC car (outside of some very expensive DIY kits from Germany). Quantow was started to help small and medium sized businesses create brand new products.

After helping several customers with record-breakingly small Bluetooth projects, we realized we had the solution right in front of us! With Bluetooth 4.1 BLE, we had a low power, high function way to control a remote control car! The Quantow ‘Gear’ Minicar was developed completely in-house, from concept design, to mechanical design, PCB design, to programming
column2:
we developed everything ourselves over the last couple months.

Now we’ve reached the end of the development cycle and we’ve been searching for a way to fund the tooling for production. Help us bring the Gear Minicar to market (and get a great gift at the same time!).

In production! See pictures of the assembly and testing here:
http://www.quantow.com/gear/gear-production/

Thank you from the Quantow Development team!

About Quantow

We founded our company a little over a year ago, and in that time we have already designed 7 different electronic products, and we are already launching 3 of them to production!

Our Engineering Team is located in Taipei, Taiwan so that we can reach our vendors and factories in their timezone. Our Sales and Design team operates in the Pacific Standard time zone (Los Angeles) so that we can talk to our clients during their business hours. If you need to reach us, just drop us a message and we will get right back to you!

column7: >

column1: Our mission is to simplify the way you connect to your mobile devices. This is done by decluttering your life with 1 adapter that converts your existing USB cable into a magnetic end to use on all your mobile devices. Safe, simple and convenient, X-Connect will change the way you interact with your mobile devices forever.

column2: >By becoming a backer of this campaign and choosing a reward, you will be pre-ordering one of our new X-Connect Adapters/cables. Aside from getting a huge special early backer discount, you'll also be one of the first in the world to own it.

column1: We're a startup based in Sydney, Australia that is backed only by ourselves. We have no external investors. Instead we launch products through the magic of crowd funding. The funds raised here will not only go towards manufacturing, they will also help us to design future products.
If you have any questions please email hello@chargeasap.com and we will respond within 48 business hours.
We often overlook the impact of our mobile devices such as phones and tablets in our daily lives. We rely on our phones for just about every part of our day: f
column2: >rom the alarm to wake up, to the
column3: >GPS to get to work and avoid traffic, to checking e
column4: >mails to stay up to date with work to even social media
column5: > to stay connected with our friends and loved ones.

column1: Have you ever purchased a new phone and exclaim how life changing having a new phone is? How more convenient that Type C connector is so you don't have to fumble around in the dark?
column2: >The way you interact with your phones and tablets is crucial to your daily productivity and happiness. The only problem is now you have 2 or 3 different USB cables lying all around the house for all your USB devices. This gets particularly annoying when you're travelling and need to bring a whole tangled mess of cables with you.

column1: The X-Connect Adapter is safe, simple and conveniently connects to all your mobile devices.
1. Insert the tip into the port of your phone, which stays connected securely.
2. Attach the adapter to your existing USB cable
3. The X-Connect adapter will magnetically connect when placed near the tip
Now your 1 cable works for all modern Apple and Android devices!

Each X-Connect Adapter features 2x N52 grade neodymium magnets which are the world's strongest commercial grade magnets. For all you oldies who still think magnets will affect your phones function, mobile phones use SSD (solid state drives) which aren't affected by small magnets like ours. In fact your phone itself has over half a dozen magnets inside it to power features such as your speakers. The magnets will also have no impact on your GPS functionality.
The X-Connect adapter is strength tested to hold 350g whilst the cable can hold an impressive 400g . Enough with the technical blah blah, how strong is that in real life?
column2: >Strong enough to hold an iPhone 7 Plus.

column1: Through the use of our X-Connect adapters, the weak point of your cable which frays easily will be a worry of the past. Our magnetic technology will extend the life of your USB cables.

column2: >When we mean 1 cable for all your phones, we mean it. We've designed 3 magnetic connector tips to fit all 3 major connector types today for all mobile phones, tablets and USB devices.
>The X-Connect Adapter features a reversible magnetic connection which means instant connection every single time. Simple and convenient isn't it? No more having to fumble around.

column1: Another cool feature of X-Connect is that our magnetic tips will protect your phone port from dust and dirt. By leaving the tip inserted in your phone, it will also extend the life of your phone port by preventing the normal wear and tear of cables being inserted in and pulled out of your port on a regular basis.
What sets X-Connect ahead of the competition is its unique bevelled and concave magnetic connector design on both ends of the tip and the adapter/cable.
column2: >Through this carefully engineered 360° exterior positioning of 2x N52 grade neodymium magnets on both ends, the tip only needs to be within 38mm (1.5"") of the magnetic field of the cable tip to be attracted and connect seamlessly.

column1: Competitor designs require the tips to be correctly aligned with their opposite end to magnetically attract and connect. Competitor designs also feature weaker strength magnets and require a perfect alignment of both ends for a correct connection unlike X-Connect. Not all magnetic cables are created equal. Don't be fooled by the similar external look of competitor brands, X-Connect will connect seamlessly every time, even if the tip is flipped 180°, due to both the strong neodymium magnets having their polarity perfectly positioned and the unique outward and concave magnetic connector design.

column2: >We've tested our adapters and cables on dozens of Apple and Android phone and tablet devices with no compatibility issues. As long as you have any device that requires any of today's modern 3 device types: Lightning connector (Apple), micro USB connector (Android) or a Type C connector (Android) you'll be able to use X-Connect Adapter/cables with all of them.
>Please note: The adapter is not compatible with Type C to Type C cables due to its different pin configuration.

column1: X-Connect's tip's are designed to fit a variety of major brand phone cases with ease. With our magnetic tip minimal footprint of only 10.5mm you can be comfortable knowing our tips will fit snug in your phone with your phone case. If you're unsure if this is the case, please email Customer Happiness Team on hello@chargeasap.com and we'll advise you if we have tested with that particular phone case and phone.

The most popular compatibility question we received is if our cables are compatible with the Lifeproof Fre case for iPhone 6/6s/7/8. Here's a video showing you the tip and cable working seamlessly with the Lifeproof Fre case on.

Many of you technology buff's will be aware of Benson Leung the famous Google engineer which has called out many Type C cable brands for not being compliant to the new Type C standards that can damage your accessories and devices. Our Type C tips all feature the 56kΩ which prevents overdrawing of power from your power source to ensure safe use with your Type C devices.
The best feature of asap X-Connect is it's cross-device compatibility. This means you'll only need 1 cable for all phones and USB devices.

We've listened to feedback from thousands of backers from day 1, leading us to re-engineer our X-Connect cables to best suit your daily lifestyle. For those after a whole new cable, our upgraded X-Connect V2.0 cables are the world's fastest charging magnetic cables. We've also removed the LED light for those of you who have a love/hate relationship with it.
The X-Connect V2.0 cable's magnetic strength is even stronger than the adapter, capable of holding 400g (oz). That's strong enough to hold an iPad Air!
No more tangled cables! With a cable tie that comes with every cable, your cable can be wrapped up and transported quickly and neatly every time.

column2: >Our X-Connect V2.0 cables continue to feature the reversible Type A. This is an evolution from the traditional Type A connector that are non-reversible. This means first connection every time, no more fiddling around to connect your cable! Check it out in action below.

column1: All our cable cords are reinforced with braided nylon. They are so strong, they can even pull a 2040kg (4500lb) car!

Once the campaign finishes, you will be emailed a survey after 14 days, from BackerKit asking you to select your options, purchase upgrades, additional add-ons including tips, adapters, cables, cable sets and update your shipping address. Any new purchases from the BackerKit survey will not have an extra shipping charge and you will be offered the same discounted rate per add-on if you purchased a special or volume perk. If you have any questions after the survey has arrived please email hello@chargeasap.com.
If you choose an Apple adapter set, you will receive an adapter for an Apple (Lightning) cable + an Apple tip.
If you choose a Micro USB adapter set, you will receive an adapter for Micro USB cable + a Micro USB
If you choose Type C adapter set, you will receive an adapter for Type C cable + Type C tip
We have developed a replacement for the original Lightning tip for Apple devices to create the ""Alpha"" tip for 2 main reasons:

REASON 1: If you've been through many Apple phone cables, you've experienced the tip wobbling and sometimes even breaking off. This occurs due to  the tip and base being made of 2 different components which eventually break apart over repeated use. Our Alpha tip solves this problem by integrating both the tip and base into 1 unified piece.

column2: >REASON 2: To date Apple has not manufactured or released their own magnetic Lightning tips. This means if a company attempts to gain MFi (""Made for iPhone/iPod/iPad"") certification from Apple this won't be possible as they will
column3: > need to purchase the Lightning tips from an Apple MFi certified magnetic Lightning tip manufacturer which does not currently exist as of May 2017.

column1: Without MFi certification many major retailers will not stock a USB lightning cable for Apple devices. The integration of the Alpha tip bypasses this issue process by not using the Lightning tip and allowing X-Connect to be sold in retailers worldwide. We've evolved from the original Alpha (for Apple) tip, to our unique black Alpha tips found exclusively on asap Technologies products.

column1: Our 1st crowdfunding campaign was asap dash: the world's fastest pocket-sized portable phone charger which successfully raised over $222,538 since January 2016. Find out more here.
Our 2nd crowdfunding campaign was asap connect: The original version of this magnetic USB cable which successfully raised over $628,828 since May 2016. You can purchase it for an here.
Our 3rd crowdfunding campaign asap X-Connect is the 2nd version of our magnetic USB cable which successfully raised over $378,828 since September 2016. You can find out more here.
Thank you to the entire crowd funding community for your support in bringing a consumer-driven technology startup to life.

column2: >X-Connect has evolved from a simple idea of a magnetic cable to an everyday essential for mobile users all over the world. asap Technologies is
column3: > still a start up that's been launched entirely with our personal savings which is why we need your help. You can support by backing the campaign and sharing it on social media. Every dollar will be reinvested back towards production and developing future products aimed at keeping you connected with your mobile devices as fast and convenient as possible.

column1: We've partnered up with Backerkit for a smooth, streamline experience for the fulfillment process. Once the campaign closes we will send you out a survey within 10 business days that will help us to review and break down your order into the specific items you ordered. This is also where you will be given the options to choose the colors, connector types and also purchase add-ons.
How do I choose my colour and connector type?
column2:
>You will be emailed a survey to your inbox via Backerkit at the end of the campaign within 14 days of the campaign ending.

Can I choose a different asap X-Connect connector type and colour for each adapter/cable I order, even if I order them together as 1 perk?
column3:
>Yes, you can choose a different connector type and colour for every adapter/cable purchased. For example if you purchase a TWIN PACK, you can choose 1 Apple and 1 Android adapter/cable in 2 different colours.

How will my order be shipped?
column4:
>All orders will be shipping via courier with tracking, out of our fulfilment centre in Hong Kong and will be delivered in most cases by your local national postal service.

Which countries do you ship to?
column5: >We ship to all countries excluding the following which have been flagged by courier services as restricted or high risk: Belarus, Cote d'Ivoire, Cuba, Democratic Republic of the Congo, North Korea, Sierra Leone, Sudan, Syria &amp
column6:
Zimbabwe. If you would like a shipment to any these countries we will make alternative arrangements that may cost more, however we can't guarantee the shipment's arrival.

 
Your campaign seems similar to these other crowdfunding campaigns ""ZAPTIP"" and ""ZNAPS"" which both are way past their delivery date and also have poor communication with backers so we're very concerned that they are ""scams"" and this campaign is too.
column7:
>This question has been added as we feel it's important that we are 100% transparent about our project and to establish trust with our backers. We have during our last campaign (asap Connect) reports from the Indiegogo Trust and Safety Team in regards to concerns about these campaigns. Neither our product nor any member of our team is in any way associated with those 2 campaigns. Our technology is proprietary to asap Technologies and we have a utility patent-pending with patent filing number P103013.AU. This is our forth campaign on Indiegogo with the first 3 campaigns already delivered to customers.

 
So did your company actually invent the original magnetic USB technology?
column8: >It is very important that all backers understand that this technology has been available in Asia since 2014. No company has claimed to have invented the original magnetic USB technology in the form of a patent so we will never truly know who originally invented it as magnetic power connection has been around for over 20 years and predates even the invention of ""Magsafe."" We can use the analogy of car brands to best explain this. Even though BMW, Ferrari or Lamborghini did not invent the original car, they each have their own unique engine, materials and design. Similarly, Asap Connect uses our own patent-pending magnetic technology with 18K gold plated connector design. We've solved significant issues found in the existing competitor designs and have created a more advanced technology for magnetic USB cables.

column1: What makes asap X-Connect better than other magnetic cables/adapters in the market?
column2:
>There are many features, though the most important is that we are the first to incorporate our patent-pending magnetic connector technology and as our magnets are positioned at the exterior of both the cable and connector tip it will always connect easily. We also have a fully functional cross-device compatible cable that works with all Apple and Android devices for both charging and data transfer.

 
Will the magnet interfere with the phones function?
column3:
>For all you oldies who still thinks magnets will affect your phones function, mobile phones use SSD (solid state drives) which aren't affected by small magnets like ours. In fact your phone itself has over half a dozen magnets inside it to power features such as your speakers.

 
How strong is the magnetic connection?
column4:
>We've designed asap X-Connect V2.0 cables to be strongest magnetic cable on the market, strong enough to lift 400g and even lift an iPad Air. X-Connect adapter can hold 350g.

 
Is it easy to remove the tip from the phone?
column5:
>The tip will stay in place from any general daily use even if the phone is dropped, yet it can be easily removed with just your fingers when needed.

 
What is the length of the cable that comes with the cable set?
column6:
>The length of all asap X-Connect V2.0 cables is 1.5m (4.9ft).

 
Does asap X-Connect support data transfer for Apple and Android devices?
column7:
>Yes, this also includes tethering.

 
Does asap X-Connect come with international warranty?
column8: >Yes, all asap X-Connect cables will come with an international 365 day warranty.

column1: Is asap X-Connect backwards compatible with the original asap Connect cable?
column2:
>asap X-Connect is backwards compatible with the original asap Connect for micro USB and Type C. This campaign's adapters, cables and tips are fully compatible with all items in the X-Connect campaign.

 
Is asap X-Connect adapter/cable compatible with all USB devices?
column3:
>asap X-Connect is compatible with all USB devices for charge and data sync. However it is not compatible with any audio functions such as your Lightning headphones, speakers or Apple Play.

 
Will asap X-Connect affect the charging speed?
column4:
>asap X-Connect V2.0 cable will not alter any device's charging speed and can handle the maximum charging speed for mobile phones for the cable up to 5V/2.4Amps and for the adapter up to 12V/1.9Amps.

 
Can I connect a Micro USB cable with an Alpha tip or vice versa?
column5:
>Yes, asap X-Connect most unique function is that it is cross-device compatible. This means a cable designed for Apple will work with an micro USB tip and vice versa.

 
Why have you not chosen to use the original lightning connector or have MFi certification?
column6:
>Apple has not released a magnetic lightning connector, hence it is not possible to apply for MFi certification and by producing a lightning connector that is not MFi certified, it leaves that company open to legal action by Apple. Any company claiming to have a MFi magnetic connector is not possible as of May 2017. You can ask the company for a PPID number from Apple as proof. However the great news is our cables are made from a factory that produces MFi cables so the chip inside is identical and we have had no compatibility issues after 2 years of testing.

 
Does asap X-Connect V2.0 cables support QC2.0 or QC3.0?
column7:
>asap X-Connect cables will support up to 5V/2.4Amps, which is more than most cables available, but it will not support the maximum speeds of Qualcomm Quick Charge technology due to the 2.4Amps limit. We have tested our cable with a QC3.0 charger and charge speeds are 8% slower from 0 - 50% battery power, and exactly the same speed from 50% - 100% battery power.

 
Will the asap X-Connect adapter charge Type C devices at the full charge speed?
column8: >Currently our Type C adapters are limited to 12V/2.1A. Charging from a Type C to Type C cable has a different pin configuration and is not currently compatible with our adapters.

column1: Will the asap X-Connect cable charge Type C devices at the full charge speed?
column2: >Currently our Type C cables are limited to the Type A maximum limit of 5V/2.4A. Charging from a Type C to Type C cable is designed to have a higher voltage and current which will be made available in our new MagX cable launching December 2017.

column1: During the live campaign, you can initiate full refunds before the campaign finishes. Once the 60 day live campaign finishes and enters Indemand phase, you can initiate a full refund within the first 8 days of backing an Indiegogo campaign by going to your contributions tab on the Indiegogo page.

Please note all sales are final. Indiegogo is not able to guarantee that perks will be delivered or deemed satisfactory. The nature of crowdfunding is such that campaigns on Indiegogo are raising funds for work-in-progress projects, ideas, or causes. Contributing to a campaign and claiming a perk on Indiegogo is not the same as buying a product online. Whilst your contribution brings the campaign idea closer to becoming reality, there's always the chance that a project may end up falling through, and the campaign owner may not be able to offer their contributors the perks they'd originally advertised.

There will be no exchanges or returns for change of mind. In the event your product becomes faulty, please email us hello@chargeasap.com with a description of the issue. Once we assess the issue and are able to determine its a product fault, you'll be able to pay the $7USD reshipping fee for the product(s). We'll then dispatch your replacement order straight away. Please note that if an item has been discontinued, we are no longer able to provide warranty on that item.

If our shipping provider attempts to deliver to your address and the package is returned because of any of these reasons, there will be a reshipping fee: no-one is available to receive the package, the location is not accessible, you've provided the wrong address or you have moved without notifying us before the delivery dispatch.
If you have any questions please email the Customer Happiness Team on hello@chargeasap.com and we will respond within 48 business hours.
FLASH: World's Most Powerful 150W USB-C Powerbank

Our mission is to simplify the way you connect to your mobile devices. This is done by decluttering your life with 1 adapter that converts your existing USB cable into a magnetic end to use on all your mobile devices. Safe, simple and convenient, X-Connect will change the way you interact with your mobile devices forever.

By becoming a backer of this campaign and choosing a reward, you will be pre-ordering one of our new X-Connect Adapters/cables. Aside from getting a huge special early backer discount, you'll also be one of the first in the world to own it.

We're a startup based in Sydney, Australia that is backed only by ourselves. We have no external investors. Instead we launch products through the magic of crowd funding. The funds raised here will not only go towards manufacturing, they will also help us to design future products.
If you have any questions please email hello@chargeasap.com and we will respond within 48 business hours.

We often overlook the impact of our mobile devices such as phones and tablets in our daily lives. We rely on our phones for just about every part of our day: from the alarm to wake up, to the GPS to get to work and avoid traffic, to checking emails to stay up to date with work to even social media to stay connected with our friends and loved ones.

Have you ever purchased a new phone and exclaim how life changing having a new phone is? How more convenient that Type C connector is so you don't have to fumble around in the dark? The way you interact with your phones and tablets is crucial to your daily productivity and happiness. The only problem is now you have 2 or 3 different USB cables lying all around the house for all your USB devices. This gets particularly annoying when you're travelling and need to bring a whole tangled mess of cables with you.
The X-Connect Adapter is safe, simple and conveniently connects to all your mobile devices.
1. Insert the tip into the port of your phone, which stays connected securely.
2. Attach the adapter to your existing USB cable
3. The X-Connect adapter will magnetically connect when placed near the tip
Now your 1 cable works for all modern Apple and Android devices!

Each X-Connect Adapter features 2x N52 grade neodymium magnets which are the world's strongest commercial grade magnets. For all you oldies who still think magnets will affect your phones function, mobile phones use SSD (solid state drives) which aren't affected by small magnets like ours. In fact your phone itself has over half a dozen magnets inside it to power features such as your speakers. The magnets will also have no impact on your GPS functionality.

The X-Connect adapter is strength tested to hold 350g whilst the cable can hold an impressive 400g . Enough with the technical blah blah, how strong is that in real life? Strong enough to hold an iPhone 7 Plus.
Through the use of our X-Connect adapters, the weak point of your cable which frays easily will be a worry of the past. Our magnetic technology will extend the life of your USB cables.
When we mean 1 cable for all your phones, we mean it. We've designed 3 magnetic connector tips to fit all 3 major connector types today for all mobile phones, tablets and USB devices.
The X-Connect Adapter features a reversible magnetic connection which means instant connection every single time. Simple and convenient isn't it? No more having to fumble around.

Another cool feature of X-Connect is that our magnetic tips will protect your phone port from dust and dirt. By leaving the tip inserted in your phone, it will also extend the life of your phone port by preventing the normal wear and tear of cables being inserted in and pulled out of your port on a regular basis.

What sets X-Connect ahead of the competition is its unique bevelled and concave magnetic connector design on both ends of the tip and the adapter/cable. Through this carefully engineered 360° exterior positioning of 2x N52 grade neodymium magnets on both ends, the tip only needs to be within 38mm (1.5"") of the magnetic field of the cable tip to be attracted and connect seamlessly.

Competitor designs require the tips to be correctly aligned with their opposite end to magnetically attract and connect. Competitor designs also feature weaker strength magnets and require a perfect alignment of both ends for a correct connection unlike X-Connect. Not all magnetic cables are created equal. Don't be fooled by the similar external look of competitor brands, X-Connect will connect seamlessly every time, even if the tip is flipped 180°, due to both the strong neodymium magnets having their polarity perfectly positioned and the unique outward and concave magnetic connector design.

We've tested our adapters and cables on dozens of Apple and Android phone and tablet devices with no compatibility issues. As long as you have any device that requires any of today's modern 3 device types: Lightning connector (Apple), micro USB connector (Android) or a Type C connector (Android) you'll be able to use X-Connect Adapter/cables with all of them.
Please note: The adapter is not compatible with Type C to Type C cables due to its different pin configuration.

X-Connect's tip's are designed to fit a variety of major brand phone cases with ease. With our magnetic tip minimal footprint of only 10.5mm you can be comfortable knowing our tips will fit snug in your phone with your phone case. If you're unsure if this is the case, please email Customer Happiness Team on hello@chargeasap.com and we'll advise you if we have tested with that particular phone case and phone.

The most popular compatibility question we received is if our cables are compatible with the Lifeproof Fre case for iPhone 6/6s/7/8. Here's a video showing you the tip and cable working seamlessly with the Lifeproof Fre case on.

Many of you technology buff's will be aware of Benson Leung the famous Google engineer which has called out many Type C cable brands for not being compliant to the new Type C standards that can damage your accessories and devices. Our Type C tips all feature the 56kΩ which prevents overdrawing of power from your power source to ensure safe use with your Type C devices.
The best feature of asap X-Connect is it's cross-device compatibility. This means you'll only need 1 cable for all phones and USB devices.

We've listened to feedback from thousands of backers from day 1, leading us to re-engineer our X-Connect cables to best suit your daily lifestyle. For those after a whole new cable, our upgraded X-Connect V2.0 cables are the world's fastest charging magnetic cables. We've also removed the LED light for those of you who have a love/hate relationship with it.
The X-Connect V2.0 cable's magnetic strength is even stronger than the adapter, capable of holding 400g (oz). That's strong enough to hold an iPad Air!
No more tangled cables! With a cable tie that comes with every cable, your cable can be wrapped up and transported quickly and neatly every time.

Our X-Connect V2.0 cables continue to feature the reversible Type A. This is an evolution from the traditional Type A connector that are non-reversible. This means first connection every time, no more fiddling around to connect your cable! Check it out in action below.
All our cable cords are reinforced with braided nylon. They are so strong, they can even pull a 2040kg (4500lb) car!

Once the campaign finishes, you will be emailed a survey after 14 days, from BackerKit asking you to select your options, purchase upgrades, additional add-ons including tips, adapters, cables, cable sets and update your shipping address. Any new purchases from the BackerKit survey will not have an extra shipping charge and you will be offered the same discounted rate per add-on if you purchased a special or volume perk. If you have any questions after the survey has arrived please email hello@chargeasap.com.
If you choose an Apple adapter set, you will receive an adapter for an Apple (Lightning) cable + an Apple tip.
If you choose a Micro USB adapter set, you will receive an adapter for Micro USB cable + a Micro USB
If you choose Type C adapter set, you will receive an adapter for Type C cable + Type C tip
We have developed a replacement for the original Lightning tip for Apple devices to create the ""Alpha"" tip for 2 main reasons:

REASON 1: If you've been through many Apple phone cables, you've experienced the tip wobbling and sometimes even breaking off. This occurs due to  the tip and base being made of 2 different components which eventually break apart over repeated use. Our Alpha tip solves this problem by integrating both the tip and base into 1 unified piece.

REASON 2: To date Apple has not manufactured or released their own magnetic Lightning tips. This means if a company attempts to gain MFi (""Made for iPhone/iPod/iPad"") certification from Apple this won't be possible as they will need to purchase the Lightning tips from an Apple MFi certified magnetic Lightning tip manufacturer which does not currently exist as of May 2017.

Without MFi certification many major retailers will not stock a USB lightning cable for Apple devices. The integration of the Alpha tip bypasses this issue process by not using the Lightning tip and allowing X-Connect to be sold in retailers worldwide. We've evolved from the original Alpha (for Apple) tip, to our unique black Alpha tips found exclusively on asap Technologies products.
X-Connect has been granted the following international certifications to ensure safe use:

asap Technologies is a consumer electronics startup based in Sydney who believe users should be the creators and innovators of products. We realise that your mobile phone is the one object you interact with every day more than any other object or person, so why not simplify this interaction?

With the interaction of seamless technology, anything is possible. Anything can be done with a click of a button increasing time efficiency for consumers. The future is all about technology and automation. asap Technologies is about providing consumers with a less stressful, better connected and simpler life.

Our team consists of serial entrepreneurs, creatives and engineers who've worked together since 2014 to overcome painstaking obstacles to bring to life the vision of each life-changing product. We're excited to be writing this next chapter in the story of asap Technologies with you.

Our Frustration: We all know how WONDERFUL a smartphone is. We also understand how frustrating it is to carry around all of your smartphone accessories. The ""classic"" tangled cables, power bank, phone stand, OTG memory...the list is endless.

So a year ago we challenged ourselves to create a better solution. One that's packed with essential functions you'll need on the go...in SMALLEST SIZE POSSIBLE! We wanted to create a better companion for you and your phone.

column9: >the world's smallest all-in-1 mobile solution for on the go generation, small enough to sit on your fingertip.
column15: >t can unfold and transform in many ways to meet your needs for:

column7: >WonderCube is durable, super tiny and lightweight. It lives on your keyring and always be there when you need it.

column1: A cable you'll have with you all the time

No tangled cable. No mess. WonderCube features a foldout flexible USB cord measuring 3 inches when extended. Neatly folded in just 1-inch, the cube is completely covered without any exposed contacts. It’s incredibly durable and compact. A cable designed to be with you everywhere!

Quick Charge anywhere anytime

Is your fellow phone asking for juice all the time? No problem! Grab WonderCube to power it up on a trip, at a cafe, in car, at work or anywhere on the go. The built-in gold-plated connectors ensure quick charging through any USB port...to keep you connected!

Have a favourite TV show or Facetime call that's too important to miss? We have you covered with WonderCube's innovative phone-stand. WonderCube’s micro-suction cups plate can easily attach or detach on the phone's back panel.
Get the best viewing angle, every time. Portrait, landscape, it all works!

Always hungry for more space? Plug in WonderCube OTG to expand your phone for another 64GB. Free up memory or transfer photos, movies and songs during your next trip. It also works perfectly as a USB memory stick to transfer files from computer.
(Note: OTG function currently works on Android devices ONLY
column2: iOS version will be announcing in our upcoming development series)

LED mini torch

column4: >Personalised: with your name or slogan

column1: Make it your own or give it to a special one.
***Exclusively add-on feature for funding period only(March - May 15th)***

WonderCube is made of durable ABS and its foldout USB cord is made of flexible thermoplastic elastomer. Weighting approx. 20grams. Measureing 3 inches (76.2mm) when extended, and just 1 inch (25.4mm) when closed.
Compatibility: WonderCube comes with 2 versions: Apple lightning and micro USB connector. It is compatible to the market majority smart devices.

Smart devices are great. They make our lives more convenient and certainly more productive. Yet, they have always come with quite a number of accessories, which individually provide solutions such as charging battery, standing up your phone for the perfect viewing angle, storing and syncing data…etc. However, many of them are bulky and easy to forget.
We believe it's time to re-think a better way to carry those “solutions” with us.

Multiple solutions in 1 design? It just NOT ENOUGH! It needed to be portable, easy to use and fit into our daily lives naturally. Obsessed with simplicity, a utilitarian and intuitive UX (user-experience) design, we set to create the smallest possible product that included multiple essential solutions in one simple design. The result was a small and lightweight 8-in-1 product that you will love. WonderCube is reliable and useful in every situation.
Design evolution of the WonderCube from paper mockups to rapid-prototypes

We spent the first 2 and half months examining how people use and carry smart accessories. We talked to people to understand which accessories they usually carry around and what they like and dislike. Inspired by the data we collected, we then started brainstorming and sketching thumbnails to better imagine solutions for them...and if there any latent needs we might be uncovering.
We narrowed down and focused on the following aspects: Charging, Data storing/transferring, Emergency relieving. We also marked some common frustrations for carrying and using those accessories:
• messing up your bag, backpack or purse
• easy to forget (especially in a hurry which is a norm nowadays)
• carrying more and more accessories means adding burden to your shoulders

Once we were set on several key directions, we moved from paper to action. We built quick prototypes using clay and paper, to get a hand-on experience for better understanding the strengths and weaknesses of our concepts. Having evolved through several versions, we moved to rapid prototyping and tested with users. We believe by putting our ideas into actual contexts and by acquiring feedback through user testing, the design evolved to better meet the needs of our users.

A year later and we are ready to present the fruits of our labor to you -- and we couldn't be more proud. WonderCube, it revolutionises the way you carry and use accessories. It’s ultra-portable and exceptionally functional. All of this was only made possible by the endless pursuit of elegant and efficient design, paying attention to every detail (and every millimetre...) and selecting the most advanced engineering techniques.

>We are fully committed to WonderCube and have spent over a year in development. The journey from concept to our finished product has been challenging and exciting. We couldn't be more pleased with WonderCube
column5: a design that is so small and compact, and able to combine 8 features into a simple and sleek cube structure--nothing could be more efficient. It's amazing, really.

column1: Even though we have put a considerable amount of time and effort into R&
column2: D, we are still well prepared to face any upcoming potential challenges and risks during various manufacturing stages: tooling, final debugging, quality controlling, testing and production run. We believe that by keeping a constant communication and good relationship between all parties actively involved in overseeing and discussing in various processes will help us reduce the amount of risks and to overcome any upcoming obstacles. For sure we would love to share with you, our backers all the sweet and bitter we will have for making it happens!

column1: Another challenge is to sort out the most efficient way to get WonderCube to every backers’ hands as soon as possible (and without delay) We are setting up an in-house logistics team which will be focusing on searching the right logistics partner. We will do our best job to deliver the excitement to you on time, in both a reliable and cost-effective way.

The biggest challenge for us is to spread the word of WonderCube. To share with people over the planet about our excitements and enthusiasm of building a product that challenges the status quo as well as brings new pleasant experience to everyone. We are counting on the Indiegogo community to help spreading it out and finding those who share the same vision.

This is really awesome to share our first Indiegogo project with you. We love Indiegogo and the way it keeps creators and backers always in touch regardless of time and place. We are looking forwards to build a close and friendly relationship with our backers and we can’t wait to post and share any exciting updates and pictures on this platform. If you have any questions or suggestions to us, please don’t hesitate to leave a message. We will get back to you as soon as we could. We believe your participation will surely help evolving our project.
Finally, thank you for checking out our very first Indiegogo project!
