column5: >BeeStylus – The world's first NFC Enabled Stylus and not just for writing !!
column9:
> 


Have you ever been in this situation?

column1: You’re walking down a busy street or around your home talking to someone on the
phone and he suddenly gives you phone number or address.  While the person on the other end of the phone

waits, you frantically search for a pen and paper but to no avail. 

If you tried to open your note APP in smartphone, that you have to do at least 3 steps to launch it.



Well we’ve figured out an ingenious way
that utilizes NFC technology to solve this and other problems. Introducing the BeeStylus, an innovative and uniquely

designed stylus that can do more than just writing.

BlinkSwitch – Launch any app in a snap
you can use the BeeStylus to launch
any app by simply contacting the stylus with your phone or tablet. We call this
feature BlinkStwitch. This feature lets you switch between apps or open
two apps effortlessly, making multitasking that much easier. Some example scenarios

below:

Equipped with the latest NFC technology, you can use the BeeStylus to launch any Apps by simply contacting the stylus with your phone or tablet. We call this feature BlinkStwitch. 

This feature lets you switch between apps or open two apps effortlessly, making multitasking that much easier. 

Some example scenarios below: 

1. Open Evernote or other note taking apps while talking on phone. 

2. Instantly launch the camera while doodling.

3. Quickly launch Google Maps while listening to music. 

4. Open preset websites while watching videos.

What’s more, BlinkSwitch can also be used in the following ways:

1. Touch your device and open YouTube videos. 

2. Touch and open your email. 

3. Touch and dial phone numbers. 

4. Touch and change phone settings. 

And more … 

* These features are only available for NFC-enabled smartphones and tablets.

BeeTask NFC App – Free for all Indiegogo backers .

You heard it! All backers can get this app for FREE. With this app you can customize your settings for BlinkSwtich, or create shortcuts for modifying your smartphone’s setting. We will continue to provide more services (such as phone unlocking) by releasing new apps or collaborating with 3rd party developer.

Stylish Design – Inspired by Marker Pens.

On top of the capabilities provided by BlinkSwitch, the BeeStylus is also a stylish and elegant stylus designed to work on any device with a touch screen. The design of the BeeStylus gets its inspiration from the marker pen, including features such as the easy-grip broad shaft and colorful tips, giving users a vivid look and feel. What’s more the tip, offered in a variety of colors, replicates the experience of using a marker pen.

Innovative Pen Tips – Precise, sharp and colorful

Most pen tips on capacitive styluses are designed in black, mainly because a color tip requires more manufacturing work to make it more intuitive to use on a touch panel. To create a stylus like no other, through trial and error, we have finally come up with colorful tips as smooth and sensitive as black tips.

The touch sensitivity of the stylus relies on the size of the pen tip. We have exceeded the technological standard by making the tip as delicate as 5.3 mm, offering a more precise and smooth writing and drawing experience.

Replaceable tip design – Fit your lifestyle

The BeeStylus is designed with easy-to-remove tips for easy replacement of worn-out ones. We’ll include three FREE extra tips for replacement, exclusive for all Indiegogo fans.

Product Specification  

Dimension: 13.6 cm long / 1.2 cm wide  

Weight: 23.3 g


MySwitch - Unlocked for reaching US$50,000 goal  

MySwitch is an advanced feature that remembers your most frequently used apps, doing away with the constant searching of apps that you use every day. With MySwitch you can quickly and easily select your favorite apps by contacting your BeeStylus with your device. Each family member can also launch their own personalized apps list with their BeeStylus, without the need to flip through seemingly endless app folders and lists.
What you can do with a BeeStylus?
1. BeeStylus a very intuitive pen for your daily use. Use it to take notes, draw pictures and play games, so smooth that you won’t want to use your fingers anymore.
2. BlinkSwitch lets you quickly switch to another app while you are talking on the phone or listening to music. It’s your instant-app-launcher
3. BeeTask NFC App allows you to customize shortcut settings by launching a website or a video on YouTube, perfect for public presentations!
4. MySwitch can remember your most frequently used apps. Instantly find your desired apps in on a multi-user tablet being shared by multiple users  without looking for a needle in a haystack.
5. Turn your BeeStylus into a versatile tool with BeeTask NFC App or 3rd party apps .

9006style is made up of a team of four young spirited individuals with diverse backgrounds. Their mission is to bring inspiration to people’s lives by delivering products that combine both form and functionality.

column3: >James Tang is a iF Product Design Award winner. He specializes in transforming a design concept into a practical, easy-to-use yet stylish product.
>Leon Tsao, a graphic and web designer, is in charge of marketing communications and responsible for creating all communication materials from print to digital.

Not only can you help bring an innovative idea to life, but also be among the first people to use and test our product. You can also share your product ideas with us, which could be the motivation for our next project.

Patrice Chen is an entrepreneur and dreamer with many years of experience in wireless technology and accessories. He is an expert in identifying inconveniences in everyday life and creating practical solutions to remedy them.

We are preparing to launch Folkz, a communicator and texting tool for mobiles. It is designed as platform neutral application compliant to all Smartphone models / Operating Systems viz a viz Android, iOS, Win Mobile and Black Berry. Apart from the apps available currently Fokz uses hybrid delivery model and it is capable of delivering across carrier networks if the target handset is off web services.

Folkz for personal use is offered absolutely free for communicating between two smart phones on peer to peer format. We are launching Folkz simultaneously for Enterprises for facilitating their Application to Person messaging needs. This is being offered as a fully managed service capable of customising any services offered on web to be ported on to mobile platforms. Enterprises can gain significant and demonstrable cost advantage over existing alternate solutions besides gaining benefit of less dependence on technology and infrastructure for delivering A2P communication.
Folkz allows Enterprise users to customize and personalize the solution just for what the user needs and is capable of deployment at users own premises.
Fully Managed Solution on the Folkz Solutions Platform, Users need not have own SMPP App or Carrier connectivity. Fully Compliant to GSM standards as well.

Folkz support multiple languages (around 90 of them), Location based services etc.. And also Active Sync with Legacy Applications and Software and allow interactive communication with users and applications.
Folkz have already signed up Network Partnerships for terminating messages over around 900 mobile networks across the globe.

Currently Folkz Core Modules have been deployed live and currently undergoing Beta tests at couple of partner locations. The remaining tasks involved are adding few of the special services identified (asked for as well) by couple of our Enterprise clients and few add on features for personal use. We need resources for further development work and for building the sales vertical. We expect to invest the major chunk of funding for buying carrier termination inventory to facilitate the user sign ups. Assuming the best scenario of one text message per new sign up even requires USD 20000/million messaging credits on an average. Our estimates are to keep inventory for around 10 million messaging credits..

Considering the wide acceptance and the user base of few other Apps in this segment, Folkz with its unique features can expect even bigger and wider acceptance. However this requires inventory for facilitating user sign ups. On the other hand at a later stage our Enterprise partners can leverage the user base for a significant cost advantage.

Folkz being a start up project, we look forward to raise sufficient funds to invest against the inventory requirements. Even though the project may be able to attract venture investments etc, we believe that it is too early to consider such options, as the priority being demonstrating the strength of the project and building up momentum and create a sizable user base. We consider, ensuring that we have sufficient funds to support the initial  push will help us to concentrate more on finishing the project and deploying it with value added features. Hence we think a crowd funding community can assist us in a big way.
We primarily expect the Indiegogo Crowd Funding community's assistance in:
• Organising capital for our expenses on inventory for the initial five to six months. (Later off course we are confident about generating cash flow from our Enterprise services)
• Spread a word about Folkz and join us as a user of Folkz Free Services. The Folkz download link will be shared with all Indiegogo Contributors from 20th November 2013 onwards.
• Give us valuable guidance and feedback about adding more and more Special Services on to the Platform

We realise the strength of Indiegogo platform to assist a Good project in terms of branding, visibility etc. apart from providing funding support. Also we acknowledge that the collective strength of its community in terms of insights and inputs for enhancing the Project Scope and business strategy would be an immense value add to Folkz team.
We at Folkz expect momentum to pick up for the sales effort and spread a word about this exciting service among the community as well along with this campaign.

Also short messaging as one of the primary services a mobile phone facilitates and almost all subscribers uses, offering the same as a free service will greatly benefit individual /personal uses for texting. On the other hand enterprises also can befit significantly on Folkz platform with demonstrable  cost saving and unique features in offer which are not offered by any other service as at present.
What if we do not achieve the goal?
Well, That will be a tad disappointing
column2: But still we will go ahead. As we are proposing a flexible campaign whatever we are receiving will help us to continue with the work. Only consequence we are seeing is we will have to grow at a lesser pace. But as we look at it, still we can go ahead and the time we need to achieve the scale will be extended a bit.

column1: What if we exceed the funding goal?

An excess funding will be a great encouragement and will demonstrate the faith in the project. We will be working with more focus and determination to make Folkz the best communication platform for mobiles. Any excess amount could help further strengthen the resolve and achieve economies of scale. With mobile customer base of approximately 7 billion globally and still growing, messaging is one service will ever increase in volume. Since messaging is one of the primary service which every one uses, the sample size of the target customers is quite huge and we identify the inventory requirement as one of the major basic requirement going forward.
Hence every additional penny contributed will help us to further derive volume pricing and also can be deployed with increased focus on new user sign ups.

As a matter of fact the application to person (A2P) messaging is poised for a business worth approximately 70 Billion USD annually by 2016 as per latest Research by Juniper. Folkz is being positioned to become one of the dominant players in the industry with its unique approach and features in offer. Hence in a way investment in user sign ups will complement our efforts to lower pricing for the Enterprise customers. Even a very modest 0.5% share of the Global market  of the A2P messaging will itself make Folkz a sizable business..

• Folkz will remain as a free service for basic App to App messaging and communication requirements of its members. Only exception will be when we need to terminate through a carrier network. However with our experience in A2P messaging industry we promise that still we have a cost advantage with Folkz. We believe that maintaining a free unlimited life long messaging platform for Smartphone users is a worthwhile contribution by itself.
• Perks as detailed below strictly in line with time schedules indicated
• A very judicious use of your contributions. Folks team believe that best way of expressing gratitude is by keeping up our words and delivering on the responsibility with accuracy and precision.

Folkz is an India based start up presently having its Development and Production hosted in Infopark SEZ, Cherthala, Kerala. This is a Special Economic Zone and we are an approved unit under SEZ act Govt. of India. The business has been Registered with name Touchcel Connect (P) Ltd
Folkz as a product has been conceived by Sunil George and Shaji Mathew and the project is being promoted by them. We have a six member team of young Software Engineers also assisting us.

Both Sunil George and Shaji Mathew are professionals with around 20 years each in Information Technology industry and have handled responsibility of several profit centres independently before joining together to work for Folkz.
Monetary contribution is not the only way we are looking forward for support from the Indigogo Community.

We greatly appreciate you joining the Folkz community and becoming a user of the free services. We will share the download links here in a short while and simultaneously we look forward to make Folkz available in Google play and iTunes store etc.
Another great help one can do is about spreading a word about Folkz. Please spread a word about it and give reference among your contacts once you download Folkz to your handsets.
Also please share a word about Folkz and this campaign using the Indiegogo share tools and also to your social media network. we are sure that these things are going to help us greatly.

We will be placing a Contributors page in Folkz website and as a common perk, all contributors will have a unique link for Claiming their Discount Vouchers. The discount voucher can be used for claiming a whopping $ 75 discount for the Folkz Enterprise Licenses for your own use or transfer the right to anybody you may choose.

We at Folkz look forward to maintaining a long term relationship with all our contributors. Therefore to maintain the relationship active and to facilitate our contributors being part of Folkz growth story, we wish to give few gift tokens to all our partners on an yearly basis. We are deciding to offer discounts or gift coupons only through the contributors community. The contributors can gift their gift coupons to other people outside the community, so that people whom they want to benefit can be given a discount of $ 50 when they want to use Folkz services. And for every gift token claimed by your contacts we would like to add a Global calling credit of $ 50 to the respective contributors Folkz account.
We will provide necessary tools to administer the gift coupons allotted in every contributor's Folks page.

Thank you for checking out my product iHang!

I hope you can visualize all the possibilities of my product just as much I can and help me to back my product so we can get this manufactured!

My Story,

I once knew a man that told me ""The only way you're going to make a product for this world, is to take an existing product and make it better.""

The idea came to me one night when I was thinking of new products to pursue. When I had the idea of hanging your iPad from the tray back table release clip on airplanes. The cases available for standing your iPad up aren't the ideal way to enjoy a movie on a long flight. When the plane hits turbulence your iPad falls over, there's never any room on your tray table these days any ways so how can you enjoy having your drink and your iPad and your peanuts too!?

My beta-prototype was made from items I found at Michaels, that I put together to make a visual concept. (seen below)
column5:
/>

 

My idea for iHang with your help can allow you to enjoy your own personal movie screen right in front of you on your flight with no hassle of a cluttered tray table. There are so many versatile ways to use iHang its limitless! You can carry it like a briefcase, Hang it from your kitchen cabinet knob while cooking so you don't get sauce all over your iPad. Hang it on your workbench in the garage so you don't knock it over or accidentally hit it with your hammer. etc.

With the quick release clips on the durable para-cord you can hang it from the back of the car seat for your kids to enjoy. Have you seen those iPad mounts for car seats? they are bulky and complicated. When you take the iPad out its also just ugly looking, as seen below.

column1: The current state of the iHang product has been printed by a 3D company for a viable working prototype, from there its up to you backers to help me get the funding to bring these CAD drawings and prototype to a manufacturer.

I received a personal bank loan on my own credit to cover the cost of the CAD rendering and 3-D printing and all the other expenses it costs to start up a new business. I am hoping with your help the iHang can become QVC material and make it to TV commercials across the country and become a hit!

Along with the iHang I have ideas for break off products like the iHang Mini that will fit your iPhone or Android phone. The iHang Universal that will be adjustable to fit Kindle Fire's and Microsoft Tablets. The iHang Power which will have an external battery core to recharge your iPad.  This name is a work in progress but the iHang Woody that would be made out of wood and stained and glossed over like the wood grain in BMWs and Mercedes Benz. The straps and cord would be made of leather to make a higher end version to sell.

Its going to take a leap of faith from you that we can make this product real! I am asking for $5,000 to start the manufacturing costs which I foresee to cost around $1.96 per unit which at $5,000 will yield about 9800 units and with packaging costs.

There is also the need to get the funds for an injection mold. which will cost me any where from $20K. This injection mold will be the base for manufacturing the amount of units I'll need for a large scale operation. I know i'm only asking for $5,000 now but I have faith we can hit $25,000!!!

My plans for when I have this project fully funded is to work with a partner i've found that is going to help me price out and tool an injection mold, once I have that, im going to take this product to trade shows across the country to find retailers to write me a purchase order. Once I have  a purchase order  in my hand I'll take that money to my manufacturer which Ive found in China to produce the amount of units needed by my retailer. I have done most the leg work for the manufacturer. I have the CAD drawings and renderings (as seen below) done, as well as the 3D printed model. The next step really is to get the injection mold I need for mass production, find more investors, and get a sit down meeting with retailers.
My goal with iHang with your help will be to have my product on the shelves of every major product retailer in the country. Wal-Mart, Target, Best Buy, Radio Shack, etc.
As my plans sit now I am filing for a patent with this product, (Patent Pending) that will take a while to get my patent for it as long as the USPTO grants me one, but in the mean time,
1-2 months I will be going to a few trade shows to get my product name out there.
2-4 months I will have found investors to back my manufacturing costs,
3-6 months I will have met with clients and retailers to pitch idea,
5-8 months I will have a PO from a retailer to manufacture units
8-10 months Stock the shelves on the retailer side.
November-January(2015)  send you all (my backers) your preordered iHang of your color of choice.
Here are a few designs options I will have available, ( these are renderings only)
How I intend to get iHang off the ground

Once I have 2000-5000 units on hand I will take those units with me to Tech Conventions here in Phoenix and drive up to Las Vegas to other shows to get the iHang product name out there. I intend to market this product all over the US and find stores who would be willing to purchase in bulk to sell in their stores across the country. The Website iHangMedia.com is a work in progress but will be up and running as soon as the iHang product is available to purchase to the general public.
This project means the world to me and I hope you see its potential. Please help fund this project so I can take it to the next level!

The risks that I may run into here is really finding the funding to launch iHang. Everything is falling into place. The patent is being filled, I have a manufacturer ready to go, A few major retailers have seen the sales sheet on iHang and are very interested. I just need YOUR help to rais e the funds I need to get it in gear.

Have you seen those iPad mounts for car seats? they are bulky and complicated. When you take the iPad out its also just ugly looking, as seen below.

The current state of the iHang product has been printed by a 3D company for a viable working prototype, from there its up to you backers to help me get the funding to bring these CAD drawings and prototype to a manufacturer.

I received a personal bank loan on my own credit to cover the cost of the CAD rendering and 3-D printing and all the other expenses it costs to start up a new business. I am hoping with your help the iHang can become QVC material and make it to TV commercials across the country and become a hit!

Along with the iHang I have ideas for break off products like the iHang Mini that will fit your iPhone or Android phone. The iHang Universal that will be adjustable to fit Kindle Fire's and Microsoft Tablets. The iHang Power which will have an external battery core to recharge your iPad.  This name is a work in progress but the iHang Woody that would be made out of wood and stained and glossed over like the wood grain in BMWs and Mercedes Benz. The straps and cord would be made of leather to make a higher end version to sell.

Its going to take a leap of faith from you that we can make this product real! I am asking for $5,000 to start the manufacturing costs which I foresee to cost around $1.96 per unit which at $5,000 will yield about 9800 units and with packaging costs.

There is also the need to get the funds for an injection mold. which will cost me any where from $20K. This injection mold will be the base for manufacturing the amount of units I'll need for a large scale operation. I know i'm only asking for $5,000 now but I have faith we can hit $25,000!!!

My plans for when I have this project fully funded is to work with a partner i've found that is going to help me price out and tool an injection mold, once I have that, im going to take this product to trade shows across the country to find retailers to write me a purchase order. Once I have  a purchase order  in my hand I'll take that money to my manufacturer which Ive found in China to produce the amount of units needed by my retailer. I have done most the leg work for the manufacturer. I have the CAD drawings and renderings (as seen below) done, as well as the 3D printed model. The next step really is to get the injection mold I need for mass production, find more investors, and get a sit down meeting with retailers.
My goal with iHang with your help will be to have my product on the shelves of every major product retailer in the country. Wal-Mart, Target, Best Buy, Radio Shack, etc.
As my plans sit now I am filing for a patent with this product, (Patent Pending) that will take a while to get my patent for it as long as the USPTO grants me one, but in the mean time,
1-2 months I will be going to a few trade shows to get my product name out there.
2-4 months I will have found investors to back my manufacturing costs,
3-6 months I will have met with clients and retailers to pitch idea,
5-8 months I will have a PO from a retailer to manufacture units
8-10 months Stock the shelves on the retailer side.
November-January(2015)  send you all (my backers) your preordered iHang of your color of choice.
Here are a few designs options I will have available, ( these are renderings only)
How I intend to get iHang off the ground

Once I have 2000-5000 units on hand I will take those units with me to Tech Conventions here in Phoenix and drive up to Las Vegas to other shows to get the iHang product name out there. I intend to market this product all over the US and find stores who would be willing to purchase in bulk to sell in their stores across the country. The Website iHangMedia.com is a work in progress but will be up and running as soon as the iHang product is available to purchase to the general public.
This project means the world to me and I hope you see its potential. Please help fund this project so I can take it to the next level!

The risks that I may run into here is really finding the funding to launch iHang. Everything is falling into place. The patent is being filled, I have a manufacturer ready to go, A few major retailers have seen the sales sheet on iHang and are very interested. I just need YOUR help to rais e the funds I need to get it in gear.",4.0,0,"1 Campaign

ZeroLemon is created by a handful of smartphone enthusiasts who want more power with their phones and provide the best battery solution. We created the world’s first Tri-Cell Battery Design and apply it to all flagship smartphones so that users around the world can enjoy the world’s highest capacity battery.

We had our 20000mAh SolarJuice battery charger in 2015 and found this is a great product to help people who need power outdoor. Therefore,we tried to upgrade the 20000mAh SolarJuice to the current 26800mAh version with more function and more power. And the new version is here now!

We are now in our 5th year of business, so we are very confident in our manufacturing and shipping processes.
However, there are always risks and challenges with the production of anything. There can be delays at the manufacturing facilities if the factory falls behind schedule, or shipping time tables can be delayed due to weather, equipment, carriers or simply human error. Exporting product over any holiday season can also add unforeseen delays and there is always the risk that items make it all the way to it's destination and they get held up in customs for some unknown reason!
Please understand that a more advanced product than initially planned might postpone deliveries. These additionals may also have an influence on the final size and weight of the product.
No matter what uncertains there may be, we are always here to slove for our customer and stand behind ZeroLemon. You can reach us at info@zerolemon.com at any time for any concerns.
Don’t worry if you can’t contribute to the campaign – you can still participate by spreading the word!
• Use the Indiegogo share buttons - let people know you've backed our campaign on your social media outlets!
• Give us a ' like' on FB, or Instagram!

Q1:Does ZeroLemon ship to my country? How much will it cost?
A: Unfortunatey, we w only ship to US resident at the moment and the shipping cost is free.

Q2:What kind of battery cells are inside the ZeroLemon SolarJuice?
A:We use 18650 lithium-ion battery.

Q3:What's the dimension of SolarJuice? is it heavy?
A: The dimension of the SolarJuice is 6.93 x 3.26 x 1.30 in and the weight for it is: 563g(19.86 ounces).

Q4:How long it takes to fully charge the SolarJuice?
A:It takes 14-18 hours to fully charge the external battery.

Q5:What is the life cycle of the SolarJuice?
A:Under normal usage, the SolarJuice has 500-600 full cycles.

Q6:Can I use all the output ports simultaneously?
A:You can use all 3 output ports simultaneously.

Q7:How long does it take to charge the SolarJuice with solar energy?
A:The external battery can be recharged using solar energy when it’s exposes to the sun or in the environment where it is exposes to strong light. Please note that the solar charging function is for emergencies and idle continuous charging. It is not recommended for use as the primary power source for charging. The solar charging conversion rate is 200mA per hour under sunlight and works as a suitable secondary charge when outdoors.

Q8:It says the SolarJuice is expected to be deliver in July 2017, how accurate is this?
A:According to our planning, the first batches will be finished in June and ship out to our backers in July. However, there are circumstances (such as those stated in the Risks &
column2: Challenges) that may cause unexpected delays, therefore we can not guarantee the deliver dates. If anything risks to slow down our planning, it will be clearly communicated.

A:Yes, you can! the total capacity is <
column2: 100Wh, this means you can take it with you as carry-on according to the International guidelines. However, you may not be allowed to store it in your Check-in luggage.

column1:
Q10:Can the SolarJuice get overheated? 
A:Yes, it can. When ambient temperatures are high, or usage is very demanding, the SolarJuice might heat up (comparable to your device working very hard).

Q11:What if something happens to my SolarJuice? What is your return policy?
The unit is covered by a 36-Months ZeroLemon Replacement Warranty. If there are any manufacturing issues, we will repair or replace your unit free of charge.Our customer service at info@zerolemon.com/415-685-4343 is here to help you.

Brno, Czech Republic – An International fair trade takes place at Brno exhibition centre during the last week. Quickie Team was there. We used this event to get more response from the professional and lay public. We presented the Quickie many people as we could. We got very value and positive response, what convinced us of the correctness of our previous decisions.

However, our main reason for visiting this exhibition was more important for us – We were find a reliable and competent business partner, which will supply parts for final manufacturing. We were to discuss the cooperation with exhibiting companies from around the world. We have received several offers from different companies. We are in negotiating phase with these companies to get the best deals price at high technologically level.

IMMO is not just a selfie stick, it is also a single-axis, handheld gimbal stabilizer. It is lightweight, easy-to-use, budget-friendly and works with most popular smartphones.

It transforms your smartphone into a video powerhouse by eliminating shaking and wobbling for sharper, clearer pictures and footage, without bulking up or adding superfluous functions to your phone. With its collapsible design, it easily folds up to an ultra small size that can be carried in a pocket.

IMMO offers roll stabilization of your smartphone even if you are moving fast and a vibration-free shooting experience when you try to live stream or take pictures or videos. The roll motor of IMMO levels your smartphone horizontally within milliseconds whatever direction you are holding it. Cinematic professional-looking shots have never been easier!

IMMO’s unique design ingeniously integrates a single-axis gimbal stabilizer into a selfie stick. It allows you to capture sharp and clear moments while retaining its foolproof operation as of a selfie stick. It weighs only 0.6 pound and has an innovative folding mechanism that makes it exceptionally compact and easy to store in a pocket. 

 

 

 

 

There is no need to download or install any APP to use IMMO. A two-way mobile clamp lets you instantly adjust the direction of the smartphone mount either horizontally or vertically.

 

 

 

IMMO pairs with your smartphone using Bluetooth and has a remote control with a single button mounted into the handle.

 

 

 

IMMO features an extendable telescopic pole that can be freely adjusted between 0.6 and 1.6 feet, so you will have enough space to work your selfie angles. 

 

 

The magnetic design on the bottom of the stick allows it to be easily transformed to a tripod stand which effectively extends your range when taking pictures with the removable Bluetooth remote.

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

WINNERS’ SUN Plastic Electronics (Shenzhen) Co., Ltd. is China’s largest company designing and manufacturing selfie sticks and single-axis handheld gimbal stabilizers. 

 

 

We are the chief supplier to Huawei, Xiaomi, OPPO and Vivo. We have industrial-leading design and R&
column2:
D teams, large production and processing capacity and possess design patents of our own products. The premium craftsmanship and quality of our products make them the best option for photographers.

 

 

The premium craftsmanship and quality of our products make them the best option for photographers.

 

 

TEST VIDEO

column3: >Even though we have confidence to meet our target and ensure everything is on the right track. Our biggest challenge will be meeting our shipping delivery dates. To make a product from a prototype into mass production will always face new challenges that have to be addressed. It takes time and patience to make the right direction and can even lead to minor modification in the appearance than what the prototypes currently show. Since this will be the first production run, we may have to change something.

>Also Apple may have chance to refuse our cable for MFi certification. If that's the case we promise we will still move forward for the production and bring your items to reality and please rest assured that MFi grading components will still be used. However we cannot guarantee a refund because of this since our production run is started and all fund will be used for it. We will let everyone know about any changes via project updates.

How can I choose the colour and connector for my PÖSH cable?

A survey will be sent to you within 14 days after the end of campaign.

Which courier service will be used for your tracked delivery?

Most of the tracked orders will be shipped by DHL(or equivalent) and we will provide the tracking code for you to check for the status of your order.

When will you start shipping?

The planned shipping schedule will be on November. Probably earlier though.

Product FAQ
What colors are available for PÖSH cable at the moment?

Rose Quartz, Mint Green, Lavender Fog(Mist Silver case), Black (Mist Silver, Space Grey, Absolute Black case), more to be available when we reached stretch goal

column1:
Can PÖSH cable sync and charge?

Yes, absolutely.

What is the Max Current allowed for PÖSH cable?

It’s 2.4A

Is type C connector available for PÖSH cable?

It will be available when we reached the stretch goal.

How long is my PÖSH cable warranty coverage?

Our PÖSH cables will provide lifetime limited warranty.

What is lifetime limited warranty?

We will replace your cables for FREE as long as the items are not discontinued.

Are they MFi certified?

We will submit it for MFi certification after the end of campaign. Please stay tuned.

column1: ","Nowadays, typical charging cables are flooded in the markets. The historical design has been applied since Jurassic Period. They all look the same, however PÖSH is able to provide the game-changing elegant design while keeping high durability for the cable itself also it is the smartest looking cable.  PÖSH is a cable you should have with your smartphone.Let's ditch your old boring cable and embrace PÖSHDear friends, we are curious that does it ever come across your mind that one day a cable can carry out your style? Not only does its job well, charge & sync, but also shows your personality.  They say, fashions fade, style is eternal. Thus, we are so thrilled to introduce you - PÖSH, the incredibly exquisite charging cable designed by our industrial designer which is also available in the top trendy colors of all time -Pastels Collection and Blacks Collection. Eye-catching appearance with refine hand feel would be your fancy accessories as well as a perfect gift for your friends.         *Please note that the final design may vary from the final prototype

*You can choose any unlocked colours and connectors for your orders.*Every cable comes with PÖSH leather cable wrap with embrossed logo(MSRP $5) - Pastels Collection - Grey cable wrap - Blacks Collection - Black cable wrap
PÖSH leather cable wrap can also be used in any sort of cables

Available in Lightning and Micro USBAvailable in 1MNon-Toxic TPE & Metal Alloy are used Allow max current of 2.4A20 AWG gauge copper cable for charging - lower AWG indicates lower resistance and potentially faster charging.

*2M and 20CM available when meets stretch goal*Type-C available when meets stretch goal#We will submit our application for MFi certification after the end of campaign   We have filed our PÖSH cable for design patent application.Our PÖSH cable has also been obtained the following international certification.
We are a company which used to do OEM electronic products. And in 2016 we have decided to do something differently. We created PÖSH.

The philosophy behind PÖSH is to create exquisite products without compromising its functionality and quality. And PÖSH cable is our first product for our brand.  We believe PÖSH will make a difference to this industry. And we need your support to make it happen.

Even though we have confidence to meet our target and ensure everything is on the right track. Our biggest challenge will be meeting our shipping delivery dates. To make a product from a prototype into mass production will always face new challenges that have to be addressed. It takes time and patience to make the right direction and can even lead to minor modification in the appearance than what the prototypes currently show. Since this will be the first production run, we may have to change something.

Also Apple may have chance to refuse our cable for MFi certification. If that's the case we promise we will still move forward for the production and bring your items to reality and please rest assured that MFi grading components will still be used. However we cannot guarantee a refund because of this since our production run is started and all fund will be used for it. We will let everyone know about any changes via project updates.

column3: >Making MegaMini your travel companion during a long-haul trip....

>HIFIMAN’s founder and CEO, Fang Bian, believes a high performance, compact, easy to use player should be available for everyone to enjoy and at an affordable price. With three years of research, the MegaMini was designed to be user friendly and support DSD, lossless and Higher Res music formats than your standard cell phone. It is also efficient so it won’t run down your battery while you enjoy your hi-res music.

column2: >Founded in New York by Dr. Fang Bian, HIFIMAN is today widely recognized as one of the leading brands of high performance headphones and portable audio products. Its reputation as a major forerunner of innovation has won acclaims from mainstream media such as Time Magazine, Forbes and Daily Mirror. HIFIMAN’s product line covers high-end high-fidelity headphones, music players and headphone amplifiers.

column3: >HIFIMAN is the mastermind behind the world’s most advanced Planar Magnetic technology as well as the first true hi-fi portable music player, acclaimed by critics and audiophiles alike. Innovation-driven, the HE series has become the byword and benchmark reference for hi-fi headphones, particularly in the US market. In 2009, HIFIMAN launched the HM801 portable audio player, initiating the era of premium portable hi-fi players with interchangeable amplifier cards. The resulting flagship player, HM901, is still considered the pinnacle of portable hi-fi music players.

A: Check you’ve got the latest firmware edition.  You can also, if you like : break in the player by listening to music, some say this would make the sound even better!

column1: Slimmer, Lighter and even more Compact,  MegaMini is a high-resolution music player that performs like high-end players but at a fraction of the price, and with longer battery life.

""But I can play music on my phone.  Why do I need a Hi-Res Music Player?""Hi-Res music has superior sound quality over compressed audio formats (which is what you hear using your phone).  High-resolution audio contains greater detail and texture which brings you closer to the original performance.Its music like you've never heard it before.
MegaMini is created by HIFIMAN, a leading designer/manufacturer of high performance portable audio products
And the Honors Go on and On...
Things You Want to Know About
MegaMini supports TF card capacity up to 256GB
This amazing result comes from an expansive collaborative project by the HIFIMAN team over three years of hard work.
Efficient battery life up to 15 hours
MegaMini saves your cell phone battery life. You don't have to rely on your phone for music. With 8000 songs in your pocket, you can listen to the music without draining your cell phone’s battery.
We spent a lot of time looking for a user-friendly interface that was at the same time easy to use, good-looking and intuitive.
Cellphones do not support high-res music formats. The MegaMini can read the highest resolution audio format.
Forget about MP3. Enjoy music like if you’re in the middle of  a concert right in front your favorite singer, band or orchestra….
Enter a brave new world of High-Fidelity.
Save time and money by not having to attend live concerts. MegaMini plays the lively reproduction of your favorite music everywhere you go and in High Res! Yes it is that good.
Perfect as It Is: At Work or At Play
Making MegaMini your travel companion during a long-haul trip....

HIFIMAN’s founder and CEO, Fang Bian, believes a high performance, compact, easy to use player should be available for everyone to enjoy and at an affordable price. With three years of research, the MegaMini was designed to be user friendly and support DSD, lossless and Higher Res music formats than your standard cell phone. It is also efficient so it won’t run down your battery while you enjoy your hi-res music.

Founded in New York by Dr. Fang Bian, HIFIMAN is today widely recognized as one of the leading brands of high performance headphones and portable audio products. Its reputation as a major forerunner of innovation has won acclaims from mainstream media such as Time Magazine, Forbes and Daily Mirror. HIFIMAN’s product line covers high-end high-fidelity headphones, music players and headphone amplifiers.

HIFIMAN is the mastermind behind the world’s most advanced Planar Magnetic technology as well as the first true hi-fi portable music player, acclaimed by critics and audiophiles alike. Innovation-driven, the HE series has become the byword and benchmark reference for hi-fi headphones, particularly in the US market. In 2009, HIFIMAN launched the HM801 portable audio player, initiating the era of premium portable hi-fi players with interchangeable amplifier cards. The resulting flagship player, HM901, is still considered the pinnacle of portable hi-fi music players.
Exhibiting at Major Industry Trade Shows

Have you ever been rushing to make your flight after a long wait in the security line?  Well how great would it be to know how long you will be waiting in that line before you leave the house?  Well now there is.

We are Patrick Guelda and Kyle Graham, MBA students at Bellarmine University.  Our product is called OnTime, a mobile app that tells users how long of a wait they can expect when they get to the airport.  With the use of an algorithm that considers variables like traffic coming into the airport and how full the flights are that day, this app can estimate how long you will be waiting to get past security. 

There are other apps out there that say they do the same thing, but they rely on other passengers standing in the security line giving accurate information.  How is a person in the back of a line supposed to know how long they’ll be waiting?  Also, how can you be guaranteed that a fellow app user is standing in that line when you need them?  No other app can give the accuracy or reliability that OnTime offers. We also hope to partner with airports to help make them more efficient and further set us apart from other apps.

OnTime can be downloaded onto smart phones and other mobile devices through the app store.  Downloading the app is free and basic use is also free.  Revenue will be generated through selling advertisement space on the app.  There will also be a premium version without commercials or ads for an added fee. 

This would be a huge asset to anyone that flies, whether that is every week or once a year.  Since the majority of fliers use mobile devices, they would have this tool at their fingertips every time they travel.  Initial plans are to offer this service to airports regionally, with long-term plans that will reach international markets. 

Kyle will oversee the design of the app, while Patrick will oversee marketing.  Together we will oversee operations and seek to grow the app over time.  We are seeking$15,000 to get the app up and running.  $10,000 will be used to pay developers to get the app ready for market.  That will require an estimated 100 hours at $100/hour. We believe that by seeking highly qualified developers we will alleviate the technological factors that may hinder our success. The remaining $5,000 will be dedicated to social media marketing. This should provide us a large enough budget to create brand awareness and reach a large enough audience to prevent social factors from limiting us. 

Our goal is to hit 100,000 downloads in the first year. Based on our research, we can expect to make an average of $0.09 per download from advertisement revenue.  That’s a total of $9000 in the first year. Of those 100,000, we expect 10% to be long-term owners of the app.  Of the long-term owners, we expect 10% of those to upgrade to the premium version we will sell for $1.99.  That means that if 1% of the initial owners of the app buy the premium version, then we can expect an additional $1,990. So we estimate total revenue for our first year to be right around $11,000. 

As we grow into different markets and expand internationally, we expect that by year five we will see 5 million mobile device users download our app.  Assuming our previous calculation, revenue over the 5-year span from ad revenues and premium upgrades will equal $549,500. 

With so many frequent air travelers in the world, the potential customer base is great.  The biggest challenge ahead of us is getting to market ahead of potential competitors.  This is the reason we are looking to you for help to get our product off the ground now. 

So what’s in it for investors?  Well in addition to being the first to have access to OnTime, every investor will also get the premium version of the app for free.  Those investing over $2000 will also receive 1% ownership of OnTime.

Don’t miss out on this opportunity to be in on the ground floor of one the best apps this year.  Once again, we are Patrick Guelda and Kyle Graham and we are asking for your help to make traveling a little easier for those around the world.

column16: >
column17:
>

PowerSquare Tango featured on Daytime TV Show

column9:
>

 

Convenience at its best

Charge your phone anywhere on the pad. No more looking for a sweet spot!

column1: Charge two devices simultaneously - Our patent pending Adaptive Position-Free system enables seamless charging of multiple devices
column9:
>

Works with all Qi compliant devices

Every phone that integrates wireless charging today is Qi complaint. Qi guarantees future proof designs. Tango will always work with Qi compliant phones even when new enhancements to Qi specification are introduced.
column26:
>

 

Background

We started PowerSquare with a vision of creating a value added consumer devices brand for mobile power management that enhances usability for consumers

Among the many mobile accessories, we identified wireless power as one of the key focus areas in our roadmap. The reasons are two fold:

column1: • Firstly, our know-how of the technology and the ecosystem. We as a team collectively have more than 90 years of industry experience in the electronics, battery and power management area. Our key members have worked with every major OEM and consortia playing a key role in commercializing wireless power as we know today

• Secondly, it aligns perfectly well with our vision of creating valued added mobile devices brand. In the area of wireless power we aim to bridge the technology gap and create differentiated solutions for the marketplace that enables consumers to leverage the benefits right away rather than waiting for the technology to evolve.

Conceptualizing TANGO

After deciding to build a product in the wireless power space, we tried multiple industrial designs using existing one coil and 3 coil solutions. But as a team, we were not happy with the overall user experience. We wanted to take our system a bit further and develop a product that pushes the boundaries and gives us an edge over everything else out there. We set ourselves three goals:
• A position-free transmitter that allows the user to place the phone anywhere on the pad
• Ability to charge multiple devices at a time – we finally decided to support two devices to ensure optimal system cost vs market adoption
• Most importantly, our system should work with all Qi devices – we picked Qi since it has widest adoption so far.

column8:
>

 

The Adaptive Position-Free System (APF)

There are many demos out in the market that show multi-device charging. None of them have been in production. We wanted to ensure we didn't fall in that category.

Based on our experience we knew that we had to build a multi coil system to provide a wide charge area. We knew it had to be more coils than just 3 to ensure a large charging area. After countless hours of experimenting across multiple magnetics designs, system configurations and algorithms, we finally developed our patent pending magnetics and software algorithm and the APF system was born.

APF System PCB and Magnetics Stack

column6:
>

 

APF System Evaluation

System testing - We tested and validated multiple configurations and test scenarios until we were satisfied with the performance.

Here is REV 0..It didn't have a name...we had to hide the electronics in a box. :-)
column8:
>

 

The WAR Board - oh boy, all those late nights, pizzas and nightmares...the team doesn't want to wipe this board...ever :-) so with your help we may retire it on to a wall in the office :-)
column9:
>

 

Compatibility with Qi Devices

As this was our top priority, we ensured all experiments and developments were based on Qi protocol. The Tango pad works with any current or future device that is built to be Qi compliant.

There are multiple use cases:

1. Phones with built-in Qi functionality: With these phones you just have to place them on the Tango pad to start charging.

column1: 2. Phones available with Back covers: The phone is manufactured with back covers which have wireless charging receiver circuit embedded into them. Most of these compatible sleeves are available on Amazon
column2:
>

 

3. All other phones: There are many wireless power receiver adaptors available on amazon that will add wireless power capability to your phone. We are offering a version that should work with most phones android/windows as part of the Android/Windows Starter Combo pledge.

Universal Micro USB Wireless Receiver for Android/Windows phones
column3:
>

 

Add wireless power capability to your phone
column10:
/>\ 

4. iPhones: Dedicated iPhone cases are available on Amazon that add Qi functionality to the phone. We are offering a iPhone case as part of the pledges. iPhone case is now compatible with 6, 6S, 6 Plus and 6S Plus. Sorry we don't have 5S versions at this time. Our iPhone case also includes a micro USB connector so you can charge with a cable without removing the case. We understand that some people love the extra micro USB connector and some don't. There are other options available on Amazon that will fit your need.

Note: We always recommend using Apple approved accessories

Apple approved iPhone Case now compatible with iPhone 6, 6S, 6 Plus and 6S Plus - An Indiegogo Exclusive discounted price!

column23:
>Having done extensive testing on the APF system, we decided on the X and Y size of the Tango pad to provide optimal combination of look, feel, portability and performance. Once we had the size locked in, we evaluated 100s of designs and zeroed in on the final design. Images below show Tango's progress from humble beginnings to its final form.

Pencil sketches of various designs
column24:
>

 

3D Modelling and Prototyping

After various iterations of modeling and prototyping, we finalized the two piece top design. We build various prototypes to ensure the overall structure was light weight and sturdy at the same time.
column25:
>

 

Fine-tuning the Design and Tooling

This was lot more difficult than we expected. One key aspect we looked at was that we didn't want Tango to look like just another geeky device. Lot of our feedback was to make the product look good on a side table at home. We decided on the two piece top cover design that would enable us to cater to many color variations down the road.

We have received lots of kudos for the color and design. So proud of the young team to make this happen.

Move from single piece top cover to two piece giving us a lot of flexibility on color variations down the road
column26:
>

 

We evaluated the entire system at each stage. We added these spacers to increase the air gap between the coils and top plate that helped in thermal management
column27:
>

 

3D model of the final plastics
column47:
>

 

The Adaptor

Our adaptor comes with the following interchangeable plugs. All shipments will include this adaptor except for Early Bird USA shipments which will include a USA only plug.
column48:
>

 

Image below shows end connector dimensions of the adaptor

column4:
>

 

Where are we today?

We have shipped a small set a units to customers and reviewers and have received great reviews. We have a strong supply chain in place to support production runs. Our manufacturing partners have years of experience in developing wireless power solutions that will ensure Tango is manufactured with utmost care and precision. 

Timeline
column5:
>

Why Indiegogo?

Indiegogo is a vibrant and wonderful community that we would love to be part of. We thank and respect every backer for their contribution and we responsibly commit to deliver Tango. We also promise to continue to work on more innovations in this exciting field. 

Your support will help us achieve the following:

column1: • Execute on our roadmap of innovative products

>

Ability to charge multiple devices at a time – we finally decided to support two devices to ensure optimal system cost vs market adoption
Most importantly, our system should work with all Qi devices – we picked Qi since it has widest adoption so far.

The Adaptive Position-Free System (APF)There are many demos out in the market that show multi-device charging. None of them have been in production. We wanted to ensure we didn't fall in that category.Based on our experience we knew that we had to build a multi coil system to provide a wide charge area. We knew it had to be more coils than just 3 to ensure a large charging area. After countless hours of experimenting across multiple magnetics designs, system configurations and algorithms, we finally developed our patent pending magnetics and software algorithm and the APF system was born.APF System PCB and Magnetics Stack

Evolution of the APF system APF System EvaluationSystem testing - We tested and validated multiple configurations and test scenarios until we were satisfied with the performance.Here is REV 0..It didn't have a name...we had to hide the electronics in a box. :-) Rev 2 Electronics The WAR Board - oh boy, all those late nights, pizzas and nightmares...the team doesn't want to wipe this board...ever :-) so with your help we may retire it on to a wall in the office :-) Compatibility with Qi DevicesAs this was our top priority, we ensured all experiments and developments were based on Qi protocol. The Tango pad works with any current or future device that is built to be Qi compliant.There are multiple use cases:1. Phones with built-in Qi functionality: With these phones you just have to place them on the Tango pad to start charging.

2. Phones available with Back covers: The phone is manufactured with back covers which have wireless charging receiver circuit embedded into them. Most of these compatible sleeves are available on Amazon 3. All other phones: There are many wireless power receiver adaptors available on amazon that will add wireless power capability to your phone. We are offering a version that should work with most phones android/windows as part of the Android/Windows Starter Combo pledge.Universal Micro USB Wireless Receiver for Android/Windows phones Add wireless power capability to your phone\ 4. iPhones: Dedicated iPhone cases are available on Amazon that add Qi functionality to the phone. We are offering a iPhone case as part of the pledges. iPhone case is now compatible with 6, 6S, 6 Plus and 6S Plus. Sorry we don't have 5S versions at this time. Our iPhone case also includes a micro USB connector so you can charge with a cable without removing the case. We understand that some people love the extra micro USB connector and some don't. There are other options available on Amazon that will fit your need.Note: We always recommend using Apple approved accessoriesApple approved iPhone Case now compatible with iPhone 6, 6S, 6 Plus and 6S Plus - An Indiegogo Exclusive discounted price!

Using Tango with iPhone Sleeve   Having done extensive testing on the APF system, we decided on the X and Y size of the Tango pad to provide optimal combination of look, feel, portability and performance. Once we had the size locked in, we evaluated 100s of designs and zeroed in on the final design. Images below show Tango's progress from humble beginnings to its final form.Pencil sketches of various designs 3D Modelling and PrototypingAfter various iterations of modeling and prototyping, we finalized the two piece top design. We build various prototypes to ensure the overall structure was light weight and sturdy at the same time. Fine-tuning the Design and ToolingThis was lot more difficult than we expected. One key aspect we looked at was that we didn't want Tango to look like just another geeky device. Lot of our feedback was to make the product look good on a side table at home. We decided on the two piece top cover design that would enable us to cater to many color variations down the road.We have received lots of kudos for the color and design. So proud of the young team to make this happen.Move from single piece top cover to two piece giving us a lot of flexibility on color variations down the road We evaluated the entire system at each stage. We added these spacers to increase the air gap between the coils and top plate that helped in thermal management 3D model of the final plastics    The AdaptorOur adaptor comes with the following interchangeable plugs. All shipments will include this adaptor except for Early Bird USA shipments which will include a USA only plug. Image below shows end connector dimensions of the adaptor

Where are we today?We have shipped a small set a units to customers and reviewers and have received great reviews. We have a strong supply chain in place to support production runs. Our manufacturing partners have years of experience in developing wireless power solutions that will ensure Tango is manufactured with utmost care and precision. TimelineWhy Indiegogo?Indiegogo is a vibrant and wonderful community that we would love to be part of. We thank and respect every backer for their contribution and we responsibly commit to deliver Tango. We also promise to continue to work on more innovations in this exciting field. Your support will help us achieve the following:
Increase the reach of the product
Execute on our roadmap of innovative products",47.0,1,"1 Campaign

The Shut Up, Devil! app puts the power of the Word of God in your pocket, to help you resist the devil, whenever, wherever he attacks.

You’ll have access to Scriptures related to almost any issue you face, each including a personalized version designed to speak aloud. Possibly the app's most powerful feature is the reminder system, which alerts you to speak your favorite Scriptures as often or as little as you like.
Common categories and an app-wide search make it easy
to find the Scriptures you need, when you need them.
Swipe through cards that present Scriptures with personalized application.
Share a card with friends or bookmark for quick access later.
Stay on the offensive by setting reminders to speak Scripture aloud.
Be notified as often or as little as you like.
Your generosity will help empower thousands to resist the devil and renew their minds with the Word of God.
• $1325 for iOS app (1/3 already funded by private donors)
• $600 for video production and marketing (video teaching, Google and social media ads)
Excess funds will support further marketing and the media outreach of Kyle Winkler Ministries, Inc.
Kyle Winkler Ministries has contracted with a Christian app company—a trusted developer of numerous faith-based mobile applications.
The iOS version is set to release by early October. Development for Android will begin as soon as the funds are raised, with a release goal of early December.

Kyle Winkler Ministries is a media and teaching ministry, airing on the Christian Television Network and various online outlets. Through media, writing and live events, Kyle Winkler encourages people into a deep relationship with God, not settling for casual or powerless faith.

The ministry is a registered Florida not-for-profit corporation with pending 501c3 status.

to try out a new messaging application for Android phones that lets you get
chatty with social integration and more? Tired of messaging apps that
provide functionality but lack polish? Say “Hi” to Courier, with
its super customizable eyecatching graphics plus all the features
other messengers lack it has a lot of polish. So, go ahead, get
– Always know how many texts you have sent and how many unread
texts you have with a push-notification style widget right on your
Integration – Did your contact update his status while you were
talking? Maybe it could be a conversation piece. With automatic
Twitter and Facebook updates and syncing never run out of things to
– With 5 default themes and dozens of other themes available for
download your chat application will always match your mood. Although
many themes are free, others support causes such as the (RED) theme
which a portion of the proceeds goes to fight HIV AIDS to create an
– Aside from the 6 default backgrounds that come with courier, you
can set any image on your device as the background of Courier.
Style Conversations – Make following the conversation easy with a
and Attach – Sometimes you have to send more than just text.
Courier has attachment settings to allow you to upload media to your
messages. Or maybe all you have to say is text, with the ability to
send canned responses you can get back to your contacts faster.
Pictures – See all your contact's smiling faces and profile
Status /Profiles– Set yourself to Away, Busy , or Idle to not only
let your contacts know but to also change notification/ringtone
– Courier is an extremely complex and expansive messenger with a
ton of features. Way too many to cover.
isn't just one application-- it is a suite of applications designed
to make communicating easier-- allowing your to go ahead and get
chatty. Although this isn't a definite time line several applications
with the Courier branding are planned for release in the months after
with Facebook – an Exclusive theme for Courier as well as Facebook
IM – add your Yahoo, AIM, and MSN contacts to your SMS application.

The BFB ARMY Mobile Application
Although the world probably does not need another mobile app that navigates you somewhere...

Our Free BFB ARMY application will help you navigate to all the tap rooms, restaurants, and other merchants that help support our efforts at The Beer for Brains Foundation (BFBF) and provide DISCOUNTS for food and beverage.   Once completed and launched, we will be launching a Membership program called the BFB Army to receive swag, and prizes for visiting your favorite craft beer places.

After the launch of the mobile app and the start of the BFB ARMY Membership Program, we will be giving out swag including BFB ARMY pins, T-shirts, hoodies, discounts to beer, food and music events around North America along with other incentives known as ""stripes"" for visiting our Merchant Members.

The cool stuff is that when you are in a new town or location, it is a bonus to find out where great craft beer serving bars and restaurants can be found. With our free mobile app, you can find all the paces you want to drink in any town.  As a member of the BFB ARMY, you will know what discounts are offered before you head out!
Our BFB ARMY Merchant Partners will support our foundation through the discounts offered to future members.

Our Beer for Brains Foundation Founder has spent decades in the Craft Beer World and has already established relationships with many of the 2,800+ tap rooms, 500+ beer festivals, thousands of restaurants and hundreds of music festivals around North America
...and eventually the world! This is just the beginning!

Not only will we be creating a powerful network for everyone to find destinations for great food and beer, but we will end up helping our wonderful friends at The Beer for Brains Foundation who contribute to the overwhelming fundraising efforts necessary to provide cutting edge research in the field of brain cancer treatment.
Three things, in our opinion, will lead to a successfully funded campaign:
1) ANY dollar amount that you can spare MAKES A DIFFERENCE!
2) PLEASE spread the word about the BFB ARMY Indiegogo campaign to everyone you know by tweeting and sharing in the music, beer, and ""foodie"" world.
3) PLEASE tell us about YOUR favorite local craft beer serving establishments, so we can work on adding them to our list of participating merchants!
<h3>The more people we touch, the closer we will get to our goal
column2: the LAUNCH of the BFB ARMY!

column1: During our first campaign, our backers’ generous support helped us raise enough funds to launch iblazr’s production and ultimately bring this wireless flash to a wide audience. Our first backers—all 2,633 of them!—became the first among many to own iblazr. Now, Instagrammers, party people, techno geeks, photographers, cinematographers, professional journalists and so many others use iblazr flashes every day to take photos, shoot video and lighten their daily lives. ￼

Since launching iblazr, more than 20,000 users in 195 countries snapped over 150,000 photos with the help of our flash. iblazr is currently available in more than 45 countries, in hundred of shops, including Apple Stores and Best Buy, and online. Today every iblazr user is an essential part of our team, project and history.

iblazr 2, the second generation in the iblazr flash series, is the most advanced light source for smartphones and tablets available in the consumer market. This flash designed for smartphones also comes in handy when taking photos with tablets or DSLR cameras, lighting analogue photography, brightening nighttime video calls, or simply functioning as a small but powerful flashlight.

In creating iblazr 2, we not only optimized the physical design of the device but also made significant improvements to its electronic components. The result is an iblazr with more functions that remains as easy to use as it was before.
iblazr 2 is the only flash that works with native camera apps on your iPhone, iPad and Android smartphones!

You simply use Bluetooth to connect iblazr 2 to your smartphone, then launch the native camera app. By tapping the iblazr device twice, it will beam a powerful 300 LUX on 1m flash synchronically with your camera’s shutter! That's absolutely magical.
iblazr 2 uses Bluetooth 4.0 Low Energy technology that transforms the iblazr into a remote flash with a range of up to 80 feet (25 meters).

We added a touch sensor to iblazr 2 for a more comfortable and intuitive user experience. This sensor lets you adjust the light color temperature from 3200K to 5600K to help you take better photographs in every situation. Want to get up close for a fancy portrait? Choose your warm light setting. Need a powerful cold flash, instead? Change the setting to 5600K mode. This flexibility will allow you to shoot photos that look more natural, professional and creative.

Only measuring 40mm x 28mm x 10mm (1.57"" x 1.1"" x 1.57""), iblazr is compact in addition to being smart and extremely multifunctional. 
Check out all its features below:
We knew that a brilliant, new hardware solution could compromise software improvements. This prompted us to invent Shotlight—the alternative camera app that allows users to make adjustments manually.

column4: mt=8"" rel=""noopener nofollow"">
column6: mt=8"" rel=""noopener nofollow"">Shotlight App at App Store

column1: Most photo apps provide plenty of post-photography filters that might improve the look of pictures, but sacrifice their quality in the process. Our team decided to go in a different direction by offering a new and innovative way to improve pictures before they are even snapped. By taping on the Shotlight display you will gain access to every manual parameter you need to take one perfect shot after another. Now you can choose the lowest ISO and the right exposure so every picture you take will appear not as your smartphone sees the world, but as you see the world.

This same manual flexibility applies when shooting in video mode. For example, you can adjust your camera’s focus while recording—a classic trick cinematographers employ to shoot the movies you see at the cinema.

column4: >The auto sync feature automatically connects the iblazr 2 to your device when you open the app. No matter how many iblazr 2 units you want to use simultaneously, they can all connect at once to your smartphone or other device.

column1: The new app is designed to provide a better experience using its primary options, including adjusting the brightness of iblazr’s LEDs, changing the light color temperature, and adding more flashes to an array of units. What is more, each individual unit can be single-tuned within the Shotlight app.

And because we care about our existing users, Shotlight was also designed to support first-generation iblazr units. Using this app will help maximize what is already the most versatile light system available—adjust the temperature, power output or number of units you need with ease to achieve the best lighting possible.
We love light! And we love trying to shine a 75 degree spread spot as brightly and evenly as possible. To do so, we’ve tested hundreds of LEDs and made dozens of optics tests.
iblazr 2 provides 300 Lux on 1m in Flash mode (2X more than a smartphone flash) and 150 Lux in Constant light mode (up to 10X more than a smartphone video light).
Shooting portraits without a flash, with the smartphone flash, and with the iblazr flash.
Using iblazr 2 as a video light gives your DSLR camera the ability to shoot small videos well at night. (Great for shooting interviews, video blog posts, etc.)

column3:
> 

iblazr uses Bluetooth to replicate the effect of a camera shutter. This allows you take highly creative shots by pointing the light in any direction or simply outside the shot, using it as a remote!
column10:
>

 

For accessories that come FREE with each iblazr 2 unit, see below:
column11:
>

 

MOUNT CLIP. We designed a new mounting system for iblazr 2—a clip with a silicon coating that works with any mobile device that is 0.24"" to 0.37"" (6 mm to 9.5 mm) wide. It clips to both the lower edge of an iPad Air 2 and the upper edge of an iPhone 4.

With multiple clips you can use an array of units to enlarge the total amount of light you require. Each unit multiplies the amount of illumination you receive. For example, 3 iblazr units = 3 times more light.
column12:
>

 

The clip is specially designed to attach the iblazr flash to a large number of mobile devices, displays and other surfaces.
column13:
>

 

COLD SHOE. We know that your DSLR needs a small, powerful video light. We also know that iblazr 2, just as in iblazr’s first generation, will help you shoot great content by adding an extra light when necessary. To make adding light easier, we made a simple and efficient Cold Shoe Mount. If you take your most compact light companion with you to your next filming, you will be both surprised and delighted by how useful it proves to be!

While shooting a brief interview in an urban environment.
column14:
>

 

DIFFUSER. Pros say that the best light is a soft light. We say the best light is the one that is with you! That's why we made a silicon diffuser with a small hole to fit on your key ring, so now you will never forget your iblazr at home.
column15:
>

 

FLEXIBLE CHARGER (Sold Separately). Not only does the flexible charger charge the flash, it also functions as a lamp stand allowing iblazr 2 to provide illumination in a variety of situations even when your not taking photographs. The new flexible charger is now 15.75 inches (400 mm) long and able to hold not just an iblazr flash, but a heavy smartphone as well.
column24:
>

 

We believe iblazr 2 will prove to be even more useful and handy than our already highly functional first generation flash. We worked as hard as possible between our previous campaign and now to further realise iblazr’s awesome potential. Now we again seek support from our backers to help us launch the mass production of iblazr 2. The money you help us raise will allow us to manufacture molds, purchase electronics, organise the mass production and delivery of new units, meet certification standards, and complete other tasks necessary to make this product work even better than you expect it to. (Similar to our previous campaign, these funds will also help us design and implement new features based on our backers’ ideas for improving this flash.)
column25:
>

 

We believe that with help of creative people our product can be more multifunctional and useful. Similar to our previous campaign, we are offering you the opportunity to sync the iblazr 2 flash with apps you create. SDK will allow iOS and Android developers to play with the following settings: flash timing, LED brightness, LED color temperature, strobe mode, among many others settings.

Now we have made it even simpler for you to implement the code and control the flash. Moreover, our support team is always near to help you use instructions and create awesome photo/video apps absolutely FREE.
column26:
>

 

Our jobs are our passion. We are a small team that is truly passionate about what we do. That is why we never accepted outside investments and why we remain 100% focused on product development and expansion. Thanks mainly to the support of our backers, following our first campaign we were able to undertake an enormous effort to bring iblazr to people all over the world.

Each person of our team does whatever is necessary to realise this collective dream of ours. It is just one of many reasons we do not call the work that we do work. To us, this project is so much more.

column6: src=share_button"" rel=""noopener nofollow"">

column2: >

column4: >For PRESS inquiries you can always reach us on press@iblazr.com And get the best info at our custom

column1:
Risks and challenges

Our team successfully completed its first campaign and knows what it's like to handle a project that is well-funded by backers representing more than 60 countries. Knowing that our first product was great—but also just the beginning—we redoubled our efforts to significantly improve upon our initial offering by creating an even better product: the iblazr 2.

We recognize that every new technology faces unexpected technological challenges, but we also know how to confront and overcome these challenges. We can guarantee that by backing iblazr 2, you will support a dedicated team of enthusiastic people that will do everything possible to carefully deliver an awesome product to your door, while providing you with the best possible support along the way. Join us today!

 

 

","Shipping information | May & JuneUSA: 3-6 business days
