Our team decided to go in a different direction by offering a new and innovative way to improve pictures before they are even snapped. By taping on the Shotlight display you will gain access to every manual parameter you need to take one perfect shot after another. Now you can choose the lowest ISO and the right exposure so every picture you take will appear not as your smartphone sees the world, but as you see the world.

This same manual flexibility applies when shooting in video mode. For example, you can adjust your camera’s focus while recording—a classic trick cinematographers employ to shoot the movies you see at the cinema.

The auto sync feature automatically connects the iblazr 2 to your device when you open the app. No matter how many iblazr 2 units you want to use simultaneously, they can all connect at once to your smartphone or other device.

The new app is designed to provide a better experience using its primary options, including adjusting the brightness of iblazr’s LEDs, changing the light color temperature, and adding more flashes to an array of units. What is more, each individual unit can be single-tuned within the Shotlight app.

And because we care about our existing users, Shotlight was also designed to support first-generation iblazr units. Using this app will help maximize what is already the most versatile light system available—adjust the temperature, power output or number of units you need with ease to achieve the best lighting possible.
We love light! And we love trying to shine a 75 degree spread spot as brightly and evenly as possible. To do so, we’ve tested hundreds of LEDs and made dozens of optics tests.
iblazr 2 provides 300 Lux on 1m in Flash mode (2X more than a smartphone flash) and 150 Lux in Constant light mode (up to 10X more than a smartphone video light).
Shooting portraits without a flash, with the smartphone flash, and with the iblazr flash.
Using iblazr 2 as a video light gives your DSLR camera the ability to shoot small videos well at night. (Great for shooting interviews, video blog posts, etc.)

iblazr uses Bluetooth to replicate the effect of a camera shutter. This allows you take highly creative shots by pointing the light in any direction or simply outside the shot, using it as a remote!     For accessories that come FREE with each iblazr 2 unit, see below:  MOUNT CLIP. We designed a new mounting system for iblazr 2—a clip with a silicon coating that works with any mobile device that is 0.24"" to 0.37"" (6 mm to 9.5 mm) wide. It clips to both the lower edge of an iPad Air 2 and the upper edge of an iPhone 4.With multiple clips you can use an array of units to enlarge the total amount of light you require. Each unit multiplies the amount of illumination you receive. For example, 3 iblazr units = 3 times more light. 3 Iblazr² units = 3 times more light. The clip is specially designed to attach the iblazr flash to a large number of mobile devices, displays and other surfaces.  COLD SHOE. We know that your DSLR needs a small, powerful video light. We also know that iblazr 2, just as in iblazr’s first generation, will help you shoot great content by adding an extra light when necessary. To make adding light easier, we made a simple and efficient Cold Shoe Mount. If you take your most compact light companion with you to your next filming, you will be both surprised and delighted by how useful it proves to be!While shooting a brief interview in an urban environment.  DIFFUSER. Pros say that the best light is a soft light. We say the best light is the one that is with you! That's why we made a silicon diffuser with a small hole to fit on your key ring, so now you will never forget your iblazr at home.  Diffuser + Key Clasp. Keep the iblazr 2 with you always simply by clipping it to your key chain or belt. FLEXIBLE CHARGER (Sold Separately). Not only does the flexible charger charge the flash, it also functions as a lamp stand allowing iblazr 2 to provide illumination in a variety of situations even when your not taking photographs. The new flexible charger is now 15.75 inches (400 mm) long and able to hold not just an iblazr flash, but a heavy smartphone as well.                    We believe iblazr 2 will prove to be even more useful and handy than our already highly functional first generation flash. We worked as hard as possible between our previous campaign and now to further realise iblazr’s awesome potential. Now we again seek support from our backers to help us launch the mass production of iblazr 2. The money you help us raise will allow us to manufacture molds, purchase electronics, organise the mass production and delivery of new units, meet certification standards, and complete other tasks necessary to make this product work even better than you expect it to. (Similar to our previous campaign, these funds will also help us design and implement new features based on our backers’ ideas for improving this flash.)  We believe that with help of creative people our product can be more multifunctional and useful. Similar to our previous campaign, we are offering you the opportunity to sync the iblazr 2 flash with apps you create. SDK will allow iOS and Android developers to play with the following settings: flash timing, LED brightness, LED color temperature, strobe mode, among many others settings.Now we have made it even simpler for you to implement the code and control the flash. Moreover, our support team is always near to help you use instructions and create awesome photo/video apps absolutely FREE.   Our jobs are our passion. We are a small team that is truly passionate about what we do. That is why we never accepted outside investments and why we remain 100% focused on product development and expansion. Thanks mainly to the support of our backers, following our first campaign we were able to undertake an enormous effort to bring iblazr to people all over the world.Each person of our team does whatever is necessary to realise this collective dream of ours. It is just one of many reasons we do not call the work that we do work. To us, this project is so much more.
For PRESS inquiries you can always reach us on press@iblazr.com And get the best info at our custom Press Kit

Risks and challengesOur team successfully completed its first campaign and knows what it's like to handle a project that is well-funded by backers representing more than 60 countries. Knowing that our first product was great—but also just the beginning—we redoubled our efforts to significantly improve upon our initial offering by creating an even better product: the iblazr 2.We recognize that every new technology faces unexpected technological challenges, but we also know how to confront and overcome these challenges. We can guarantee that by backing iblazr 2, you will support a dedicated team of enthusiastic people that will do everything possible to carefully deliver an awesome product to your door, while providing you with the best possible support along the way. Join us today!",48.0,0,"2 Campaigns

It's about the size of a credit card. Ultra thin, lightweight, powerful and the first fully customizable phone charger battery pack. Choose your favorite colors, materials and metallic finishes. The first battery pack to match the sleek lines, beauty and elegance of your smartphone.

The smartphone was designed to be lightweight, compact and aesthetically beautiful. Why should your external battery pack be any different? Here at ChargeAll, we designed an entire line of external battery packs that were easy to carry, powerful enough to keep up with your lifestyle and fully customizable to match who you are.
Thin is in. We designed our external battery pack to fit in the palm of your hand and mimic the size of a credit card.
Dress up your external battery pack just like your outfit or smartphone.

Our goal was to come as close as possible to matching the beautiful finish of your smartphone. Whether you have an Apple iPhone 5C in pink, Apple iPhone 5S in Gold or even a Samsung Galaxy S3 in Graphite, we have a customizable skin to match your phone. We'll even be coming out with leopard print, carbon fiber and zebra skins as limited edition options.

Countless hours of design and engineering were put into this project.

The hardest part was trying to fit all of the components into a small enclosure. After several redesigns we finally produced a version as thin as possible.

Building prototype and demo units at ChargeAll headquarters.


The Rewards

IndieGoGo Exclusive! Save 25% off now! These special rewards are offered to backers only. The final product will be delivered in 2-4 months once we have confirmed production with our manufacturing partner accordingly. Buy one for you, your family and all your friends. Give the gift of power with the World's Thinnest Phone Battery Charger.
column5:
>Like us on Facebook/Twitter to show your support!

http://facebook.com/chargeall

http://twitter.com/chargeall


About ChargeAll

The problem is that thousands of helpless people are saying “My Cell Phone Died”. ChargeAll wants to make sure this does not happen to you. Our goal is to make sure you’re always charged and always ready. For the past 3 years, we've been placing cell phone charging stations at places like restaurants, coffee shops, schools, offices and more. The idea is simple, free cell phone chargers should be everywhere.

column1:
Can't wait to charge your phone? Neither can we. ChargeAll is also offering our portable keychain charger for sale. This all in one device is a battery pack and USB flash drive with built in charge cable. It's extremely compact and features a soft rubber finish. Take it with you anywhere! It can provide an additional 6 hours of smartphone use and store up to 1,750 songs on the built in USB flash drive.

Help Us Create the World's Thinnest Battery Packs!

iVoizer: smart and easy phone call recorder

Small, simple and cheap call recording device for business and home.
column6:
>iVoizer:

- never asks you for additional charge for recording calls

- needs no mac or pc to start recording your call

- has no bugs as lots of apps have

- easy to carry with your (it is light and small)

- can be used as normal flash drive


Intro

- iVoizer allows you to record all incoming and outcoming call. 

- It's very simple in use. You only plug in your ears and push the button.

- It's so small, that you can carry it with you all day long as a lighter or usb flash-drive.

- This device needs no extra wires, software or anything else.

- You can have 2/4/8/16Gb for more and more calls.

For home 


- Conversations with your parents and grans can be saved as warm memories and played then to your children or grandchildren
column7:
>same as you do it with photo albums. To keep not only their picture but their voices and the great stories.

- Record all your calls with insurance, cable, phone, and other companies. It could be really helpful in the future.

- Play recorded call to your friend or relative when he borrows something (DVD, game, book, tool, money, etc.),
column8: >then forgets to return or loses it and says, he didn't take it.
column9:
>

For business 

- No need to jot down during the phone interview. Record the call and transcribe or play it whenever you want!

- Mystery shopping. Rise efficiency of your division or firm by writing down calls with further analysis and improvement.

- Business training. Let them hear their own voice and the speech. First time it's mostly always a shock.


What is iVoizer? 


iVoizer is a small device that you can use to record all of your cellphone conversations. 

It is compatible with any mobile phone that uses a CTIA connector, like Apple, Blackberry, Nokia, Samsung and more!

The best part is that there is no need to install an application because the iVoizer runs standalone,
column10: >and it saves all the conversations in its internal memory. Also, the device is very compact.

column1: nowadays there is no 100% working device or app that will record and store your
phone calls privately. All existing apps for recording either store your calls
on their servers or do not work on all phones.

column9:
>Walk-through

1. Connect it


 2. Record it

3. Share it


Production Plan
column11:
/>





Tech Specs

Memory: 2/4/8/16Gb 

Recording quality: stereo 128 kb/s

Recording format: mp3

Record time: 2Gb can store 33 hours of recordings (16Gb - 266 hours)

Compatibility: any android and ios device, and other smartphones and tablets
column14:
>Very important: Please check your country's laws to be sure that your are using iVoiser with legal purposes

Check the links below:

Digital Media Law Project: Recording Phone Calls and Conversations

Life Hacker: Is it Legal to Record Phone Calls?

Digital Millennium Copyright Act (DMCA)


Risks and challenges

 Everything is tested and ready for production. We just need some quantity to start production for customers. We'll also test every unit very carefully to avoid defects. The only thing that can't be under our control is shipping time and post delays in post offices. Every parcel will be shipped with tracking and every backer will be informed about proceeding of shipping.

The GeoActivate App stops you having to think about sending text messages or emails whilst driving - it will automatically send them for you!
It will also wake you up on a train when you get near to your station and it will automatically switch on your driveway lights or open your gates as you approach your house!

We all have Smart Phones and we LOVE to communicate.  These enhance our lives, our efficiency and help us conduct business like never before.  We can now let people know where we are and warn friends or clients if we are going to be late - but we can't do that whilst we are driving, - or can we?

The GeoActivate App harnesses the power of our Smart Phone to constantly monitor where we are and it then sends out pre-defined text or email messages AUTOMATICALLY according to where we are or whether we have just left somewhere - or indeed if we are about to arrive somewhere! 

This is called ""Geo-Triggering"" and the App can create four types of Geo-Triggered events:
In its simplest form the App will sound an alarm and alert you, or wake you up,  when you cross a GeoFence, (an imaginary line across a map) or get say within 5 miles of your destination.

You set up a new Alarm Event when you are travelling somewhere on say a train or bus and are likely to drift off to sleep after a long day at work - or whilst you're listening to relaxing music through your iPhone's ear buds.   When you get close to your destination the alarm sounds and wakes you up in time to get your things together and not miss your stop.

You can also use this feature whilst walking or driving to remind you of something as you approach somewhere. Maybe you are in your car and getting close to the toll bridge and you should be getting your coins to hand.
The first major feature is Automatic Text Messaging.

You can set up a pre-defined text message to be sent automatically.  You can type in a completely new message or use one of the available standard messages such as ""Just left work"".  You can then edit this text making it something like: ""Just left work, see you in an hour, love Bob x""
You then set the Trigger Condition - which can be:

When I leave a pre-defined location
When I arrive at or get within x miles of a destination
When I cross this geofence ( a map location)

This is a really great feature and you can use it going to and from work to let someone know that you are on your way - or maybe you are only 5 miles away and want them to know that you will be arriving soon!

If you are picking a colleague up in the car on the way to a meeting, you can set an ""I'm here!"" message up to automatically send when you are just round the corner - so that he or she can come out and just hop in the car!  No waiting around when you get there!

You can use this for all sorts of quick text messages which might have tempted you to text whilst driving.  You only have to look at the latest crash fatality statistics to remind yourself that this is NOT a good idea.
Let's say for example that you are due to pick up your teenage daughter from friends or maybe from a night club which maybe isn't located in the best neighbourhood.

The GeoActivate App can automatically text her to be ready just before you arrive.  You can set the trigger distance anything you like such as 100m, 500yds or even 2 miles for example from your destination.

Very similar to SMS / Text Message Events are Email Events.
You set them up in exactly the same way and the GeoActivate App will email any contact with a pre-defined message when you get near to or leave a location.

This is a great feature for business travellers who can for example set up a series of emails to be sent to a client or business colleague when they get say 30 miles , then 20 miles, then 10 miles etc. from their location or office so that they know exactly where their appointment has got to!
This is going to be the fun bit!

We are sourcing and building some compact SMS Relay Receiver boxes from 1 to 7 channels.  All you do is pop in a basic PAYG (Pay As You Go) Sim card into the device and the GeoActivate App will be able to send coded commands to the unit from just about anywhere to control the relays!

This gives you the ability to automatically switch just appliances or devices on or off as you approach or pass a location.  For example, you could set an Event up to open your garage doors or your electric gates - or switch on your driveway or house lights just as you arrive home!
You could even automatically switch them all off again when you leave!
You could switch the coffee pot on when you are 10 miles from home - or turn on the office heating when you leave your house.

You don't have to be driving - you could be walking or cycling and turn your portch light on as you get 100 yds from your house.  No more fumbling with keys or finding your LED keyfob torch in the dark!
You can probably think of many more things you could do with this technology than we can - so let us know if you have any great ideas and we'll share them!
This is what the App will look like:-
... and here is how you setup an Alarm Event
Automatically send a text or email to someone you are meeting ...
Automatically open your gates, turn on your lights - or control almost anything as you arrive home!
How we will use and funds raised?
The App is our passion and we have already started writing it and testing the bits that are finished - so we are VERY confident of completing it on time.

We have invested a lot of time and money so far ourselves but need your help for the last push.  We want to add and refine these great new features and do more research and development on the the Home Automation elements of the App.

We are talking to Home Automation companies and want to explore more ideas with them.

The App initially runs on an iPhone running iOS 5 or later and the project funding target will enable us to get a very refined version of the App out within about a month.

If we exceed our target (and I REALLY hope we will!),  then any money will go towards an Android port and designing a lower cost relay box so everyone can benefit.
If the funds are there we will start this work one month after launch.
We would also like to produce a Lite or Free version of the App with some limited features and any extra funding will help make this happen quickly.
We have lots more ideas for enhancements and follow-on products and we can't wait to share them with you after we get this one off the ground!
Any backers giving $25 or more will get a vote on which of our ideas we implement first!

You could be part of a great thing here - a fully functional App that is actually useful to a lot of people and can help save lives by removing the need for people to text and drive!

Ask us any questions you might have and join in with us if you can - lets have some fun!
We are asking for less than half the cost of producing the GeoActivate App and so we are very confident that we will be able to complete the project on time.

The App is specified and a very competent development team in place and software is being written now and so we are very confident that any backers will receive their App rewards on or about the time stated.

Software is never finished and there are bound to be niggles and problems after we launch as we discover what ingenious uses people are putting the App to! This is normal and we have on going software support to quickly fix any problems as soon as possible.
Hardware is often a challenge and in our case the hardware in question is the SMS relay control boxes. We are already testing early hardware and have some very encouraging results to date.
Out of all the projects that I have run (including large Homeland Security type projects) this one smells right - and we are going to have a great time together - you and us!
Thank you for reading this - we DO hope that you will join us in the adventure!

How we will use and funds raised?
The App is our passion and we have already started writing it and testing the bits that are finished - so we are VERY confident of completing it on time.

We have invested a lot of time and money so far ourselves but need your help for the last push.  We want to add and refine these great new features and do more research and development on the the Home Automation elements of the App.

We are talking to Home Automation companies and want to explore more ideas with them.The App initially runs on an iPhone running iOS 5 or later and the project funding target will enable us to get a very refined version of the App out within about a month.If we exceed our target (and I REALLY hope we will!),  then any money will go towards an Android port and designing a lower cost relay box so everyone can benefit.
If the funds are there we will start this work one month after launch.
We would also like to produce a Lite or Free version of the App with some limited features and any extra funding will help make this happen quickly.
We have lots more ideas for enhancements and follow-on products and we can't wait to share them with you after we get this one off the ground!
Any backers giving $25 or more will get a vote on which of our ideas we implement first!

You could be part of a great thing here - a fully functional App that is actually useful to a lot of people and can help save lives by removing the need for people to text and drive!Ask us any questions you might have and join in with us if you can - lets have some fun!
We are asking for less than half the cost of producing the GeoActivate App and so we are very confident that we will be able to complete the project on time.

The App is specified and a very competent development team in place and software is being written now and so we are very confident that any backers will receive their App rewards on or about the time stated.

Software is never finished and there are bound to be niggles and problems after we launch as we discover what ingenious uses people are putting the App to! This is normal and we have on going software support to quickly fix any problems as soon as possible.
Hardware is often a challenge and in our case the hardware in question is the SMS relay control boxes. We are already testing early hardware and have some very encouraging results to date.
Out of all the projects that I have run (including large Homeland Security type projects) this one smells right - and we are going to have a great time together - you and us!
Thank you for reading this - we DO hope that you will join us in the adventure!

column3:
>We guarantee you will receive your MATRIX Creator. It is already shipping!

MATRIX Creator was built with a mission to give every maker, tinkerer, and developer around the world a complete, affordable, and user-friendly tool for simple to complex Internet of Things (IoT) app creation.

At glance, the FPGA-driven development board for the Raspberry Pi is a ""hardware bombshell"" with a microphone array, IMU, microcontroller, NFC, and more sensors. To simplify hardware application development, the MATRIX creator includes MATRIX OS, which allows developers to build hardware applications in just a few lines of code using JavaScript.

Unleash your creativity with MATRIX Creator. The multitude of sensors available and integrations allow you to build more, faster. Our community collaborates on projects and brings amazing ideas to life. 

Let's just say it's more crowded than your work station. 

The 8 MEMs microphone array on MATRIX Creator allows you to leverage voice recognition in your app creations by using the latest online cognitive services including Microsoft Cognitive Service, Amazon Alexa Voice Service, Google Speech API, Wit.ai and Houndify. You can trigger events based on sound detections, such as receiving a text message when your dog is barking back home. 

MATRIX Creator is a ""hardware bombshell,""and there is even more to it. 

It is really easy to manage your apps on the MATRIX Platform. You will be able to configure apps via the mobile application and use intuitive and customizable dashboards to pull information from one or more apps. The MATRIX mobile app and OS are currently in active development.

Pretty much anything your heart desires. Post on the comments section to share ideas and get feedback. Backers: send us pictures and videos of the projects you've built.

column1: This tutorial will help you build your own Amazon's Alexa using a Raspberry Pi and MATRIX Creator, the first Microphone Array add-on for Raspberry Pi. We will use Alexa Voice Services (AVS), it is the service used by Amazon Echo that allows us to accomplish many of the challenging tasks in this project.

Full tutorial available on Instructables.

This tutorial will help you build the ultimate universal remote control using a Raspberry Pi and MATRIX Creator, the first IR remote receiver/transmitter add-on for Raspberry Pi. We are using LIRC (Linux Infrared Remote Control), that is appropriate for this job. It simplifies many of the difficult tasks that we need to accomplish.

Full tutorial available on Instructables.

Demonstrating the testing &
column2: implementation of MATRIX Creator being used to quickly prototype a self-balancing robot.

column1:
Use MATRIX Creator for your robot disco party.

Quick implementation of gesture detection and the IR transmitter on the MATRIX Creator.

Use gesture to set mood lighting or raise the volume on your sound system.

Simple example demonstrating tracking of one face and transforming the positions on the Everloop LED ring. MATRIX can track multiple faces simultaneously as well.

Build a Face-Tracking robotic butler that approaches people at a party.

Simple application of the compass demonstrating its functionality.

Build an autonomous quadcopter for hotdog deliveries on the beach.

See https://github.com/matrix-io.

At $99, you can experience the power of MATRIX Creator. Kits are exclusively available in Indiegogo!

We ship everywhere, including New Caledonia. MATRIX Creator has shipped to over 30 countries to date. P
column3:
>erks will be fulfilled byOctober 2016 (we are currently shipping orders as they come in). 

United States packages will be shipped via USPS Priority Mail (1-2 days). 

International packages will be shipped via DHL (1-3 days). 

We have received incredible feedback from MATRIX Creator lovers all over the world. 


It all began with a Kickstarter campaign for MATRIX - The Internet of Things for Everyone:

column1: During our Kickstarter campaign and immediately after, we were overwhelmed by the waves of developers asking us for a dev board based on MATRIX. Their request was for us to release a hardware building block that was inexpensive, packed with enough components to make it compelling, and easy for them to start developing applications for MATRIX.

This occurred organically based on developer-centric input and we decided to go to the drawing board and see if we could make it happen as a “starter MATRIX”. In a nutshell, we packaged portions of the vast progress made on your MATRIX device and launched MATRIX Creator. Our hope is that developers with the MATRIX Creator will immediately start creating amazing apps that MATRIX lovers around the globe can download.

Post in the comments section! Let's catapult an Internet of Things app economy where every maker, tinkerer, and developer around the world can bring their ideas to life. Tell your friends and family about MATRIX Creator!

Am I rewarded for referring friends to the MATRIX Creator campaign?

Absolutely, our team really values your contribution and enthusiastic support during the MATRIX Creator Indiegogo campaign. In order to up the stakes, we have put together a referral program that lets you earn awesome rewards when you share online. You earn one point for every $1 you drive to the campaign.

If MATRIX Creator does not achieve it's funding goal, will I still get the product? 

Yes. Our team will deliver all Indiegogo orders in October even if we do not reach our funding goal (we are currently shipping orders as they come in). We truly appreciate each MATRIX Creator backer. Given the overwhelmingly positive response we have received for MATRIX Creator, we have full confidence that production will continue full throttle.

Who will pay taxes on international orders of MATRIX Creator?

Import taxes for the device will be paid by the recipient at the destination. 

How much does MATRIX Creator weigh?

MATRIX Creator weighs 4 oz. 

We prefer that you submit your questions to the comments section. You may e-mail us at creator@matrix.one.

Important note:

Z-Wave® is a registered trademark of Sigma Designs, Inc., ZigBee® is a registered trademark of the ZigBee Alliance, and Raspberry Pi® is a registered trademark of the Raspberry Pi Foundation. All logos and trademarks are property of the respective rights’ holders, no claim intended.

MATRIX Labs is a member of the Z-Wave Alliance and ZigBee Alliance. MATRIX Creator certification for these two technologies is underway, Z-Wave and ZigBee SDKs will be released when we receive final certification.

column10: >    ""Jackery’s PowerBar is the portable charger for all of your mobile devices.""
column15: >""This is the last battery pack you’ll ever need.""       -  BGR
column24: >
column25: >The PowerBar gives you peace of mind that your mobile devices will stay connected on-the-go. It is the must-have all-in-one accessory to power up smartphones, laptops, drones, tablets, gaming consoles, speakers, lights, digital cameras, mini fridges and much more!
column27: >The 20,800mAh / 77Wh ultra high capacity PowerBar can power almost anything with a USB, USB-C and even an AC outlet. It can also charge four devices at once.
column28: >Made with premium materials, proven safety checks and intiutive technology, the Jackery PowerBar will keep your valuable devices charged up safely.
column33:
> 

 

The highly versatile Jackery PowerBar even has a built-in AC outlet. Typically devices with a higher capacity require an AC wall outlet to recharge, but when away from home this is not always possible. The PowerBar's built-in AC outlet means you can fire up laptops and other devices on the move easily. It can power any device with AC input under 100W.

column1: With the Jackery PowerBar's USB-C output, you can easily keep your MacBook, Pixel, Nintendo Switch and Samsung Galaxy going all day long.
column2:
>

Powered by Qualcomm® Quick Charge™ 3.0 it allows you to charge compatible items up to four times faster than typical chargers. That’s less time waiting and more doing.
column4:
>

The USB outlet ensures the majority of smart devices can be charged with ease. For those which are not compatible with Qualcomm® Quick Charge™ 3.0, this is the ideal choice.
column7:
>

With its own battery management system, the PowerBar adapts to optimal voltage levels for each device when powering. It continuously manages inflow and outflow to ensure that both your device and your PowerBar are operating in the most efficient way.
column11:
>

The compact and lightweight design means the PowerBar can easily fit in bags and suitcases.
column14:
>

Get power whenever and wherever with this nifty all-in-one device. Whether on the beach, out hiking or camping, or enjoying a music festival, never fear losing power. Worrying about conserving power can mean that beautiful shot on holiday is missed - don’t let that be you. It is even safe to take on planes.
column15:
>

Make sure you never miss that all-important email or phone call when out of the office. If you need to make that deadline when out and about, don’t let battery power hold you up.
column16:
>

If you’re off the grid for days at a time on a long camping trip, this is the power source for you. Simply plug in the attachable solar panel (sold separately) and recharge the PowerBar for continued use.

Easily recharge your PowerBar by plugging into your car power source.
column17:
>

Once back at home, or near an AC outlet simply plug into the wall to recharge in 6-7 hours.
column21:
>

The Jackery PowerBar is made from a strong thermoplastic material which is fireproof and able to withstand daily wear and tear. Each PowerBar has been designed to the highest safety and quality standards, ensuring reliability and performance.
column22:
>

The Jackery PowerBar has been through 20 levels of product testing to ensure it is safe to use. The built-in battery management system protects the PowerBar, as well as the devices and people using it.  

Please make sure to use the multiple use power bank with best quality and safety to charge your high value devices.
column23: >
column26: >
column28:
>

 

We are a driven and ambitious team dedicated to being the power source for mobility. We developed the PowerBar concept to meet the practical needs of the mobile lifestyle for both work and play. Established in 2011, Jackery is a proven and trusted brand with complete design-to-manufacturing capabilities. We certainly have the ability to deliver the Jackery PowerBar to our backers on time if we reach our campaign goal.
column38:
>

 

Q: Can it power up my laptop?

A: Yes, most laptops' power consumption is under 65W. The Jackery Power bar is 85W (Max 100W). Please refer to your adapter power requirements.

Q: Can I directly charge a MacBook through USB-C?

A: Yes.

Q: How long will it will take to charge my phone?

A: It depends on your phone battery capacity and which output it has. Generally it takes less than 2 hours to fully charge an iPhone 7 from any USB port. With Qualcomm® Quick Charge™ 3.0 it will take approximately 35 minutes to charge to 80%.

Q: Can it power a TV or projector?

A: Yes, using the AC outlet the PowerBar can power a TV under 43 inches and under 100W. It can power projectors under 100W. 

Q: How many times can it charge my phone?

A: It depends on your phone’s battery capacity. Based on our testing, it will charge smart phones approximately 6 times and a 12inch MacBook 1.1 times, and power a 5W LED light for around 10 hours.

Q: Can it power up my Nintendo switch?

A: Yes, you can use the USB-C port to charge it or use the AC port with your own adapter.

Q: How do I use the AC outlet?

A: To activate the AC outlet, press the power button for 2 seconds until you see the LED indicator turn on. The USB output port is automatically turned on once you insert the cable.

Q：Can it be used outside of the USA? 

A：It has to work with international converter plug for other places outside of USA since the original plug just meets US standard.

Q: How do you recharge the PowerBar?

A: Connect the PowerBar to a USB-C charger via the USB-C cable. The LCD screen will show the status of the battery.

Q: How long will it take to fully charge?

A: With the provided 5V 3A USB-C charger, it will take about 6-7 hours to charge fully.

Q: Does it support Qualcomm® Quick Charge™ 3.0 ?

A: Yes, it has Qualcomm® Quick Charge™ 3.0, which means it will charge all compatible devices rapidly.

Q: Can I take it on a flight?

A: Yes, you can, the capacity of Jackery PowerBar is 20,800mAh / 77Wh so it falls within the Federal Aviation Administration’s safety limit of 100Wh and is safe to take on planes.

Q: Can I charge it with a solar charger?

A: Yes, but you will need a USB-A to USB-C cable which is not included in the box.

Q: Does it support pass-through charging?

A: No.

Q: What is the lifespan of the battery?

A: It has a lifespan of 500 cycles. After 500 cycles the PowerBar will retain 80% of its previous power.

Q: Which battery is used in the PowerBar?

A: The PowerBar has built-in UL certified 18650 lithium battery.

Q: How do I know the battery status?

A: Press the power button once. You can track the battery level from the LCD screen.

Q: What is the warranty period?

A: The warranty is two years.

Q: Does this product have any protection from damage?

A: The Power Bar has passed strict quality control tests outlined below.

Over Voltage Test

Over Current Test

Over Charge Test

Over Discharge Test

Short Circuit

Temperature Protection Test

High &
column39:
Low Temperature Test

Vibration Test

Salt Spray Test

Wear-resistance testing

ESD testing

Thermal Shock Test
column40:
6 times -25℃~70℃

Constant Moisture Test: 48 Hours at 45℃ 95RH% Container

Acoustic Noise Test: 1M <
column43:
5000 times

Bending Test: 3000 times

Key Test: 10000 Times

Drop Test: 09M UL 2743 Standard

Aging Test: 300 times

Matching Test: Compatible with 99.9% devices

Q: What do I do if I have any problems with my PowerBar?

A: PowerBar has 2 year warranty. For your own safety please do not disassemble the product. Contact our support team for help.
column44:
>

 

Jackery designs, develops and manufactures portable power solutions which provide our customers the utmost safety, performance, and style. Our mobile device chargers and innovative energy storage products have earned multiple design awards, satisfying millions of customers since 2011. We continue to invest in research and development of new products to meet the growing needs of power.

Jackery. The power source for mobility.

Visit our official website at www.jackery.com

Customer service

For any customer service queries please contact our support team.

column3: 5000 timesBending Test: 3000 timesKey Test: 10000 TimesDrop Test: 09M UL 2743 StandardAging Test: 300 timesMatching Test: Compatible with 99.9% devicesQ: What do I do if I have any problems with my PowerBar?A: PowerBar has 2 year warranty. For your own safety please do not disassemble the product. Our mobile device chargers and innovative energy storage products have earned multiple design awards, satisfying millions of customers since 2011. We continue to invest in research and development of new products to meet the growing needs of power.Jackery. The power source for mobility.Visit our official website at www.jackery.comCustomer serviceFor any customer service queries please contact our support team.",50.0,0,"1 Campaign

0,"


The Problem


Computers have connected us all in previously unimaginable ways, enabling entrepreneurs and businesses to collaborate more effectively regardless of their location. What used to require an entire office to accomplish can now be down from laptops and mobile devices, and the right software tools.

Though as a species we’ve come a long way toward replacing the traditional workplace with programs and plugins like Skype, Google Docs, eFax, GoToMeeting, and countless other invaluable tools, an enormous amount of disparity, redundancies, and inefficiencies still exist in the way we work online. As it is now, the burden falls on every individual to discover, install, and learn to use every individual tool required to complete specific tasks online.

The Opportunity

We knew there had to be a way to consolidate the many methods people use to communicate meaningfully on the Internet. Our solution is a complete all-in-one telecommuting and digital collaboration platform, which requires zero additional external plugins, programs, or training to instantly begin using.
Imagine being able to log on to any computer or mobile device equipped with our browser and instantly share documents live, hold audio or video conferences and meetings in full 1080p or ultra 2160p quality (which can be recorded and shared with other team members), send faxes or text messages, call phones, or share screens. You only need a webcam and microphone, hardware that already comes standard on almost every desktop, tablet or phone, nothing else! Totally platform independent, you can use Windows, Linux, Mac, Android, etc. Two browsers can talk eachother :)

Moving Forward

Our all-inclusive system is a major leap forward in simplifying the world of mobile communications, and it significantly lowers the barrier to entry for anyone looking to get involved in the online life. We know that the future of business lies in increased mobile communication, and we plan to be a prominent vehicle for bringing current businesses and their teams further down this path. We need only $139000 to make this vision a reality and start connecting
users across the globe more easily than ever before. By investing in
us, you are making a more efficient world for everyone, and enabling the

freedom to live and work without restrictions on location.


These are the features what we will bake into your browser through our site:

Faxing directly from your browser:
• As easy as email. No setup required. No hardware or software. Easier than a fax machine.
• Fax faster online, confirmations delivered via email. Quickly find your online fax archives. Faxes delivered directly to your email. No more paper jams.
• Choose and get your own fax number. Choose by area code or by city. A real fax number for you!
• Private and secure: No more shared fax machine hassles. Faxes delivered straight to your email. Easily control confidentiality. Private faxes remain private.
• Save money: no more fax machine. No toner needed. No extra phone line needed. No paper needed.
• Save time: freedom to fax from anywhere. Save, forward and organize as easily as email. Online fax archive. No more lost faxes.
• Green technology: no need to print before faxing. Preserve the enviroment. Save on electricity without a dedicated fax machine. Reduce waste of paper, energy and consumables
Call any phone number directly from your browser and enjoy these features:

• Get your own phone number from us. It will ring directly in your browser when somebody calling your number :) From the 1st of September 2014, you will be able to port your existing phone number to us!
Not Disturb, you can easily block all incoming calls whenever,
wherever, and however you want - Plus, we make it easy for you to turn
it on or off as much as you want. When DND is on, all your incoming calls are automatically sent to your voicemail.

• Voicemail: Get your messages by phone, web, or email and stay on top of your messages in more ways than you ever thought possible. Fast and easy transfer of voicemail messages to anyone, anytime. We send you an email notifying you every time you receive voicemail and attach the actual message.
<li><i>Follow Me: This feature allows you to receive calls at multiple numbers or devices you designate.
If you do not pick up at one location the system will ring onto a second
or a third number or location that you specify.
<li><i>Call Waiting: Never miss a call again with our easy to use call waiting feature. Call
waiting allows you to put the 1st call on hold while you answer the 2nd,
and switch back and fourth seamlessly.
<li><i>Auto attendant/IVR: An Interactive Voice Response(IVR)/Auto-attendant feature is perhaps one
of the most desirable features for businesses. An IVR plays an
automated message to all incoming callers. This message plays to the
caller, specifies the options which are available to them, and
subsequently prompts them to make their selection based on the nature of
the call. Once the caller chooses the appropriate option, the call can
be routed to the intended party, extension, department, etc. IVR's are
very robust and efficient tools in any business environment, and work to
decrease the amount of time spent needlessly on the phone with a
caller. Since the entire system is fully automated, calls are routed
with more efficiency, and you will be able to maximize your
<li><i>MOH(Music On Hold):  Music on hold is a feature which plays music to callers who have been
placed on hold by you. The music can be
customized to play music pertaining to the demographic base of the
callers, or simply present the callers with a number of custom recorded
messages relating to the potential nature of the call. An example of this would be to record a message which can then play
every X seconds indicating that the call is ""important to us and will be
<li><i>Office hours/time conditions: The Office Hours feature makes it possible to route a call based on the
time, day of the week, or month. This feature can be useful for routing
calls differently after business hours, during weekends, holidays, etc. A
good example of this feature in use would be to play to callers a
message indicating that the business is currently closed. The message
can then inform the caller of the regular business hours and prompt them
to leave a message or simply call back during business hours.
<li><i>Call Blocking: This feature, when enabled, prevents a number from calling you. This is useful to prevent unwanted calling/solicitation, prevent
harassment and/or abuse, stop telemarketing companies who just won't
give up, and more. You can also block anonymous calls!
Video and audio features baked for you:
• Schedule a video/audio conference call or hangout right now or in the future by clicking a button
• Conferencing with up to 100 participants..and still know exactly who’s speaking at anytime, thanks to the face, object and voice detection mechanism.
• Share files, presentations with up to 1GB in size with one or many participants
• Smart adaptive audio and video bandwidth management with congestion control mechanism
• Full (1080p) and Ultra (2160p) HD video up to 120 frames per second
• Share your whiteboard drawing or your screen with another participant(s)
• Record multimedia content and sell it to others
• Use the system as a virtual office
• Use the sytem as a motion detecting baby monitor, just put the webcam to the baby's room.

Your can help to make this vision a reality and start connecting users across the globe more easily than ever before. By investing in us, you are making a more efficient world for everyone, and enabling the freedom to live and work without restrictions on location. Every pledge takes all of us a step

closer!



The founders

Gilles Capelluto

Gilles Capelluto is active

in the Internet field for 20 years and he is an expert in the art of presenting the program to the end-user. He is responsible for the BYOB user interface. 

The thing about Gilles is he’s a thinker and he’s a doer. Even better: he’s strongly driven by his values, which clearly center on WWW. He puts in the effort to make sure that not only everything he does is great, but great for everyone.

Laszlo Bekesi

Something about Laszlo just makes you feel safer. The feeling heightens
when you get to know him, and discover what a genuinely great and

thoughtful guy he is. He is a strong expert in the telecom sector. Speed and quality are his second and third names. He is responsible for the backend of BYOB which connects your browsers together :)

He have lost count of the number of VoIP/Linux/Cisco installs, upgrades and

modifications he have carried out.


Feature requests from the founders? You're welcome!

It's not technology that guarantees successful results. What matters most is listening to clients, knowing how to efficiently
develop features, and ultimately custom designing solutions that

are both flawless and intuitive. From building simple features to carry out complex tasks, we'll make sure that what we do works for you. We're skilled at what we do, but what we really want is to learn from

you :)

For every feature requests, we make it our mission to work with you, to grow
with you, and to assist you so that the end product isn't just what you
get, it's exactly what you wanted.

Thanks for taking the time to check us out, and please get in touch if you have any questions.

Hi! Ever lost anything important, or better yet, priceless? Yeah, well, so have we. That's why we thought up Belon.gs, a novel and thoroughly awesome way to make it tons harder to permanently lose your stuff.
How does it work, then? Check out the video -- or just read on, if you don't want to spend a couple of minutes to watch it.
• You order tags - for free - on our website, and we'll deliver them anywhere in the world.
• You claim the tag stickers online, and then slap them onto your phone, laptop, wallet or whatever you don't want to lose.
• In the case your stuff gets lost, whoever finds the item will most likely find the tag too.

• The finder goes to the address on the tag and you'll get immediately notified (by email, SMS, instant message, whatever) that someone's found your stuff. You can then enter anonymous live chat with the finder and settle upon how to get your stuff back.
You can also set a reward for your stuff via PayPal, to make it a little more likely for greedy moneygrubbers to return your things.
We also have plans for corporate users with more needs.

We have a totally awesome Finnish print house, so we're able to crank out these stickers -- did we mention every single one is unique, unlike some of the other companies in this same business? -- every which way we like.
Oh, and as an added bonus feature -- gamification for the win! -- you can also refer your tags
column2: ie. if you order tags and hand some of them out to your friends, you can become their referrer beforehand and reap awesome rewards for your World Domination Referral Ranking points. (What these awesome rewards are, we don't really know yet. But at least some of our Belon.gs swag.)

column1: So, Why Do We Need Money Then?
We already have our website and service up and running, but it still needs a lot of work. And work does not come cheap. So that's one thing.

Then there are the expenses for producing the tags and mailing them all around the world. We have negotiated good deals with the tag factory and with some more money we can purchase a larger amount of tags at a time so they would become quite a lot cheaper for us.
The same stands for mailing -- sending out large batches ends up being much cheaper for us.
Since it is a Flexible Funding campaign, every little helps. No matter how much we get, we can get at least a bit more stuff done.
We also have some Belon.gs swag: we can send you a t-shirt, for instance.
More than anything (aside from money), we're going to need traction, to make Belon.gs a truly global, world-wide institution. So what you can do, if you can't donate yourself for whatever reason, is
• Above all, spread the word! Let your friends, your foes, or just random strangers on the street know about Belon.gs and this campaign. (You can use the share buttons right here too.)
• Order tags and tag your items! (Mention Indiegogo and we'll try and send you a little more so you can give some out to your friends.)
• Or if you have any awesome, grand ideas that could help us along, then we'd love to hear about them!
Digital Trends: Belon.gs will use QR codes and good deeds to get your lost items found
This is our product team in... um... all our... handsome glory.
(The T-shirts you can get as perks look like these we're wearing here. See here for a better preview.)
Our Facebook page (please like us!)

M3 Cases is a small business I run out of my home shop making custom aluminum small form factor (SFF) computer cases. Inspired by the [H]ard|Forum community, M3 is for enthusiasts by an enthusiast.

As a PC gamer and case mod enthusiast, I have always appreciated a compact purpose built computer case. Problem is, very few exist that are exactly what you want. So, I have taken some of my ideas and added feedback from the PC enthusiast community to create the M3A2, a slim mini ITX case designed specifically for powerhouse hardware and those lengthy graphics cards we all love.

The case is machined entirely out of aluminum. The front, rear and sides are a solid 4mm thick extrusion. The top and bottom panels are 3mm plates. The PCI mounting bracket and case stand are machined from 6mm aluminum bar stock. It's a solid beast.
Finished off in a subdued textured black powder coat, the M3A2 has a very understated minimalistic appearance, but still has the mean performance look.

Configure the front panel to your needs. You can opt for a ultra-clean look with nothing but a pin-hole power LED, or go for complete functionality with USB3.0, slot-load optical and Bulgin-style LED ring power button.

column2: the only customizable machined aluminum mini ITX enthusiast case...

column4: />
column7: />
column10: />
column13: />

column1: Material: 100% aluminum, 6mm stand and PCI bracket, 4mm side panels, 3mm top/bottom panels, 1.6mm drive brackets
Finish: Textured black powder coat (Options: Natural brushed aluminum or other)
Storage: 4 x 2.5"" mounts or 2 x 2.5"" mounts + 1 x 3.5"" mounts (depending on your configuration)
Optical: 1 x slot-load optical (Options: tray-load optical or no optical)
Front Panel: 2 x USB3.0 (Options: USB3.0/HD Audio or no front panel I/O)
• Infrared receiver (internal USB, Intel CIR or AsRock CIR)
• Hidden power button (rear mounted w/ front pane pin-hole LED)
• Custom engraved graphics (i.e. company logo, artwork, etc.)
*Specifications are subject to change as the project progresses.

I want to bring a case to the community that is designed by enthusiasts for enthusiasts and offer a product that meets the demands of gamers and their hardware, all while allowing users to put a personal touch on their case.

Please, make a donation and spread the word about this project. I need your support to make this happen and every little bit can go a long way to help if we band together! Share the link to this campaign!

The money you graciously contribute will go towards CNC equipment, tooling and development and testing of the M3A2 Beta cases. The CNC mill/router, tooling and materials required to make these cases are not cheap, so every little bit helps make this happen.
What does the future hold after this campaign?

My hope is for this M3A2 concept to lead to more designs to fit a broader range of hardware and applications. Already in the works is a miniature version of the M3A2 design for single slot low profile cards, perfect for mini gaming systems or home theater PCs. And the design can easily be expanded to accomodate mATX and ATX motherboards for added versatility!

Above all else, no matter what you give, I give you my heart felt thanks for your interest and contribution into this project. It would not be possible without you. A special thanks page will be created on the M3cases.com website to pay tribute to those who made it all possible.

For those of you who felt inspired to give $20, along with the special thanks, you will be placed on the priority list for the next run of M3A2 cases. And if you so choose to order an M3A2 case, you will receive $20 off your purchase!

And if you felt it in your heart to graciously give $250 or more, you will be the recipient of one of eight of the M3A3 Beta cases. Along with one of the limited run beta models you will be afforded extra personal touches on your case per your request (i.e. name engraving, logos, themes, etc.)

For those of you who felt inspired to give $20, along with the special thanks, you will be placed on the priority list for the next run of M3A2 cases. And if you so choose to order an M3A2 case, you will receive $20 off your purchase!

And if you felt it in your heart to graciously give $250 or more, you will be the recipient of one of eight of the M3A3 Beta cases. Along with one of the limited run beta models you will be afforded extra personal touches on your case per your request (i.e. name engraving, logos, themes, etc.)",5.0,0,"1 Campaign

Pandora is an audio recorder like Zoom or Tascam? No, pandora is not an external recorder. Pandora takes the audio from the Microphone/s and sends the signal to the camera, allowing you to control the audio levels manually and removing the ""Hiss"" recorded into the video.
How Pandora transfer the Power to the camera? Pandora comes with a DC coupler for your camera model, that goes into the battery compartment of your camera.

column1: If your camera is not in the list, check if you have Mic input, google for ""your camera model + DC Coupler"", and check if it has a 1/4 tripod thread on the bottom.
At some cases like Nikon D4 and Canon 1D, we will charge extra to provide the DC coupler for the power connection. Contact us if you have problems with that.
Those cameras that use 5v like the Gopro, Nikon Coolpix, Tablets and Smartphones, are Ok, since Pandora also provides 2 USB Outputs with 5 volts.

or Sony a7s. Will it work?This is the ideal tool for those cameras, since those
slim models tend to have more vibration and smaller battery power. We are
making special adapters that fits directly in Pandora to make every camera
model as comfortable as possible holding handheld.
Phone/Tablet? You can replace the camera using your smartphone or tablet,
make sure you have the adapting mount, which you can buy from us or print
yourself for free. After that, just connect Pandora to your phone´s mic
Input. Also you can feed/charge your mobile device via the USB port at the
same time you are shooting videos, that way you will never run out of

I want more than one Pandora. What should I
do? You can buy as many as you want, don´t add the shipping cost, we will
contact you with the exact cost depending on the quantity you ordered and the
The Team behind Pandora: We are a team
of Argentinean filmmakers, designers, developers and engineers with the crazy
idea of making a product that is actually what the big companies left behind in
the DSLRs at a very affordable price. The filmmakers provided the problems and
the best solution for them. The engineers developed the main components and the
designers put all that together the most useful way possible. Filmmakers tested
the first prototypes and requested some modifications to the engineers and
designers. New prototype arrived to the filmmakers and had a great result. Now
we just have to raise the money to improve the design, make the molds and produce Pandora in a big scale to start
Why don´t we sell Pandora´s patent to a big
company for manufacturing and distribution? As you know, companies tend to
buy this patents and never produce them, so they can sell you different
products at higher price rate. And we want this product to be on the market.
We will stay self-funded to maintain the
control over our process, growth, and vision.
<div><span>We need your help to develop Pandora and start
mass production. You'll be the first to
receive Pandora at a price significantly less than future retail price.
some of the photos/videos in the campaign are from a prototype, and other
computer generated. Our task is to improve our model according to the
production line we will use, depending on the funds we rise.
monitored at the highest level by well-known professionals in their field, and
each unit will be TESTED before shipping.
Delivery time:We understand the whole seriousness of our
work, and we understand that our terms of production and date of perk delivery
production pipeline, so everyone could have their Pandora as soon as possible.
We will cover all stages of production, so you will be informed of the course

of work and the date of delivery.  The main idea is to ship Pandora in December, but that date depends in the money we rise, the time it takes to rise that money, and the production line we choose. Some tooling process takes longer than others. Please support us and let Pandora be a part

of your crew. 

Upon successful completion of the campaign, follow the updates section on this page and on our website. In addition, we will contact you to clarify all issues, and to get the details of delivery, and model of your camera.

We are still designing some of the accessories, so you can´t order them yet.
We´ll let you know as soon as we have the definitive list with the final prices wich depend on the material and production method used.
They will be made in wood, aluminum or plastic.
The price will be accessible and some models will be available online for 3D printing.
We get your mail when you buy Pandora. We will contact you soon.
If we have a successful campaign we will send free accessories to our supporters.

","Pandora´s design is currently a work in progress, and it is close to the final version.You might see different models on the campaign, but all supporters will get the final design like the one above.Check Pandora´s features in 3D!Pandora is an all in one sound, battery and stabilizing solution for your DSLR camera.
You improve your sound on camera.
You improve your video, removing the wobble and the microvibrations
You save a lot of money in gear.
You save a lot of time & problems on location.
You save lot of postproduction hours.
You save weight on your travels.
Pandora has a 14.000Mah battery, with enough power for the camera and two attached accessories to shoot for more than 5 hours!
And if you’re just running the camera, more than 15 hours of video!
-More than 96Gb recorded onto your Canon SD.
-It´s like 14 Canon LP-E8 Batteries in your camera.
« 10 Hours of video without overheating the camera. »
Solar Panel  and micro USB charger.Easy and secure.Charge with the sun, or anywhere in the world with your cellphone charger.No more adapters, no more bulky chargers.
The Solar Panel provides power to the audio battery to avoid runing out of juice in case you can´t charge your Pandora in a couple of days. The SP is 1 Watt.

Pandora has 2 batteries, the main one that give the power to the camera and   accessories outputs, and the Audio Battery, that feeds the audio board and the Phantom Power for the mics.The audio battery has more than 4500Mah while a Juicedlink has only 800Mah.
Also you can charge Pandora with your standard battery charger, just plug the DC Coupler to the Battery charger, and then plug it to Pandora.
With Pandora you wont wake up in the middle of the night to change the battery in the charger.
Also you can re-use the batteries from old laptops, ask your friends for those old batteries. We will be uploading a video-tutorial on how to bring them back to life!Save money! Save the earth!
With Pandora you get more than 24 hours time-lapse.
Pandora provides to the DSLR the same audio quality as the Yamaha consoles
Don´t sync any more. Pandora improves the audio recorded to the video. So you don´t need any external recorders and to waste  a lot of hours synchronizing the audio  to the video files.
The test:SPOILER ALERT! - Our prototype has less noise than the ZOOM H4N
Plug in your headphones and listen carefully...

Pandora Improves the audio quality removing the noise floor from your Camera.And if you are a detail-freak, you can always make it better in post. The noise reduction will be more accurate since there is less noise floating around in all the frequencies.
Download our audio sample and try it yourself.
2 balanced XLR inputs  with individual Phantom Power +48v.2 mini-jacks 3.5mm and 2 jacks 6.5mm.Individual channel control.Audio braketing (One Mic with two channel at different levels).
Audio Monitoring via Headphones and Vu-meter.The unique form factor allows the Vu-meters to be allways at sight.
Also there is a volume control in the headphones so you can increase the signal and listen even in the loudest place.
Shoulder grip means it´s steadier, it´s light and fast.
Use the back of Pandora to grip your shoulder and distribute the weight between your arm and your body.
Turn your gear from a handy-cam to a shoulder-cam in 1 second.
Keep your right hand over the DSLR controls.  Change your iris, shutter speed, ISO and your WB faster than ever.

The SNIPER MODE is the best way to get stabilized shots on your DSLR. The back of Pandora is a supporting point, you don't need to ""Press"" against your chest, you barely feel Pandora touching you, and you get to rest your arm, and get more stable images.It´s so natural that you won´t even notice it is there.
Watch the video sample with raw footage, filmed with the T3I, Canon 50mm (80mm Equivalent) and Digital Zoom (3x, 240mm equivalent). No tripod, no image stabilization in lens nor in post.

Change your camera, keep Pandora. Use a small accessory (included) to adapt each camera model for a perfect grip.
Look at the LIST for your camera compatibility:
Stop looking for your SDs.Change your SD Card within seconds and don´t miss a shot never again.
You can attach an optional base-plate with 15mm rods, to use a matte-box and your follow focus.
Improve your Pandora with free to print 3D accessories.

From FOLLOW FOCUS to TV Prompter. All You need under creative commons license. Pandora is expandable, ready to plug any accessories you need. It has simple pressure holes, and some 1/4""-20  mounting threads on the bottom, also the rails on the side and the back provide a great place for multiple accesories.

Our electric design is expandable, just like a PC, you can insert new modules with different applications. This makes Pandora possibilities, endless.We are already thinking in some of the boards, like a GPS tracker, an Intervalometer, audio recorder and much more.

A little history:After some years shooting
documentaries with a DSLR in Patagonia Argentina, we realized that we  had
to improve the quality, but in the meantime we needed more portability and fast
The first issue we had were the batteries, too little power for too many hours
The second issue was the center of gravity, Impossible to get stable
images without IS or bulky stabilizers.
Then, the most challenging one, improve the audio quality, and get
rid of that loudly noise floor.
After a lot of research and tryouts we requested a loan to the National
Government to start working on the prototype.
We had the Idea, the tools, and the experience of all the issues any filmmaker
around the world would face with a DSLR.
are restyling the design with industrial designers, and reducing the
board so we can place new features inside Pandora for the streatch goals
and future upgrades. Also we are improving the audio quality, by removing most of the wires.
Challenges:The time is essential, it will
take a few month to manufacture the molds, and the boards, so you will have to
give us a hand and be part of that process.If we don't reach the 35k
goal, we´ll make the DSLR Optimizers one by one 3D printed in the best quality
possible or in fiber glass,  and we´ll send them in order of

backers. Our main goal is to ship all Pandora´s before Christmas, but it may get delayed at some point in the manufacturing process, since there are so many cameras out there and we want the best fit for all of them. If you can´t wait we reccomend you to get the prototype perk, and you will get your Pandora in just a few months. But we think the biggest challenge is to make people understand that it is
possible to create one solution for most of our DSLR problems.

We are already gathering ideas for electronic modules and 3D printed accessories.

of Argentinean filmmakers, designers, developers and engineers with the crazy
idea of making a product that is actually what the big companies left behind in
the DSLRs at a very affordable price. The filmmakers provided the problems and
the best solution for them. The engineers developed the main components and the
designers put all that together the most useful way possible. Filmmakers tested
the first prototypes and requested some modifications to the engineers and
designers. New prototype arrived to the filmmakers and had a great result. Now
we just have to raise the money to improve the design, make the molds and produce Pandora in a big scale to start
Why don´t we sell Pandora´s patent to a big
company for manufacturing and distribution? As you know, companies tend to
buy this patents and never produce them, so they can sell you different
products at higher price rate. And we want this product to be on the market.
We will stay self-funded to maintain the
control over our process, growth, and vision.
We need your help to develop Pandora and start
mass production. You'll be the first to
receive Pandora at a price significantly less than future retail price.
Prototypes:Currently we have fully working prototypes,
some of the photos/videos in the campaign are from a prototype, and other
computer generated. Our task is to improve our model according to the
production line we will use, depending on the funds we rise.
Production: The whole production process is
monitored at the highest level by well-known professionals in their field, and
each unit will be TESTED before shipping.
Delivery time:We understand the whole seriousness of our
work, and we understand that our terms of production and date of perk delivery
We will try to accelerate the
production pipeline, so everyone could have their Pandora as soon as possible.
We will cover all stages of production, so you will be informed of the course

of work and the date of delivery.  The main idea is to ship Pandora in December, but that date depends in the money we rise, the time it takes to rise that money, and the production line we choose. Some tooling process takes longer than others. Please support us and let Pandora be a part

of your crew. Upon successful completion of the campaign, follow the updates section on this page and on our website. In addition, we will contact you to clarify all issues, and to get the details of delivery, and model of your camera.

We are still designing some of the accessories, so you can´t order them yet.We´ll let you know as soon as we have the definitive list with the final prices wich depend on the material and production method used.They will be made in wood, aluminum or plastic.The price will be accessible and some models will be available online for 3D printing.We get your mail when you buy Pandora. We will contact you soon.If we have a successful campaign we will send free accessories to our supporters.",81.0,6,"1 Campaign
is about protecting lives and saving lives worldwide! It may in fact
be the most important project on Indiegogo! It will allow military units to
capture insurgents instead of killing them. It will allow law enforcement
officers to stop a criminals without killing them. It will allow private
citizens to stop attackers without killing them.
already getting requests from military and law enforcement suppliers from
around the world. We need your support to get these non-lethal smart bullets
These micro-controlled non-lethal, non-impact smart bullets will initially be available in two versions.  A ShockRound and a PepperRound.
Each one is equipped with two solid state micro-sensors that turn ON the round
when fired, and activate the round millisecs before impact. These projectiles
are designed to be fired from a standard 12 gauge shotgun at 450 feet per
second and have a range of 100 yards. Both are lightweight, carbon fiber
projectiles that produce a low-recoil which allows them to be fired from various
12 gauge shotgun formats. The ShockRound produces a flash-bang and
nitrogen gas shock wave that disables the assailant. The PepperRound produces a
flash-bang and a capsaicin cloud that causes a burning sensation to the eyes
and throat rendering the assailant unable to continue.
bullets will forever change the landscape for the use of non-lethal weapons by
military forces, law enforcement and others worldwide. When it is
necessary to use SmartRounds™ the community and law enforcement will have peace of mind that there
will likely not be fatal consequences.” Nick Verini - CEO SmartRounds
Nick is a mechanical engineer. He received his BSME from New
Jersey Institute of Technology. He also has a MBA from Rutgers University. Nick
has worked in the field of compressed gases and cryogenics for over 25 years.
He was the founder and principal engineer at Nitronics Systems, Inc. which
designed and manufactured microprocessor controlled nitrogen generators.
In April 1999 things changed dramatically for Nick. That was when the
terrible tragedy of Columbine occurred. Nick had moved his family to Colorado
in 1993. Nick thought if that horrible event could happen in peaceful
Columbine, Colorado then it could happen anywhere in America.
He started thinking about what could be done to prevent this and other
events like this from happening again. He decided that law abiding and trained
individuals needed to have a truly effective non-lethal weapon as a choice to
defend themselves. Recent tragic events involving law enforcement officers and unarmed
citizens reinforce the need for police to have options other than lethal force.
Nick started working on various less-lethal and non-lethal weapons that
military, law enforcement and private citizens could arm themselves with. Nick
started developing less-lethal impact type projectiles but eventually realized
that what was really needed was a non-lethal “smart bullet” that stopped an
In 2010 Nick formed SmartRounds Technology, LLC and he began
building various prototypes of smart bullets that could stop an attacker
without being lethal. After four years and many hours of engineering design, building and testing
Nick has arrived at two SmartRounds
column2: a ShockRound and a PepperRound. There is a video on Youtube

column1: that shows these two smart bullets in action.
In order to get from prototype to production SmartRounds Technology is looking
