INTRODUCTION

NO stickers, NO tapes, NO foreign objects, NO software...Just you and your Phone/computer/tablet. IN-BUILT is how technology works these days. Remember when
you had to buy a Webcam and connect to your computer? Remember when
manufacturers started making computers and other devices with in-built

Webcam? Now it's time for those Webcams to have an in-built ""SHUTTER"" that will solve the Spying problem(s). We all know necessity is the mother of all inventions so let me introduce you to my Webcam Spy Blocker called the ""MANUAL SHUTTER"". Also see my ""stretch goal"" of the ""Automatic Shutter"" below.

The ""MANUAL SHUTTER"" and It's IMPORTANCE

The ""MANUAL SHUTTER"" is manually operated as the name indicates, and is in-built into the device. This is not anything you've seen before because this is and will be the future of Webcam security. The shutter is conveniently controlled by a sliding button. Movement of the button helps the in-built shutter to open thereby
revealing the Webcam lenses for use OR slide in opposite direction to close, protect, and prevent hackers from
spying on unsuspecting victims in their privacy. The size of the button is about the same as the On/Off
buttons found on the side of cellular phones. It also has

grids for friction to ease movement by the user and does not prevent a laptop from closing or folding. It does not affect or interfere with the functions of your phone, tablets, or other webcam devices. The button is also design in a way that it can be anywhere on the frame of the device(computer/tablet/phone) and still function perfectly. Not only will this provide
the much needed privacy and security in people's lives, it will also
change the way computers and other devices with Webcam capability are made
Webcams can and have always been hacked to spy
on people’s privacy. Unsuspecting victims continue to pay the price (see videos attached). Privacy is
a top priority for everyone. Most people including experts advise
consumers to use a piece of tape to cover the lenses of their Webcams. Sticky
tapes leave sticky mess on the devices and the camera, and sometimes falls off easily.

I even have a patent pending ""Clipper"", which would soon be made available for purchase on www.webcamspyblocker.com. The Clipper covers the lenses of existing computers, laptops, tablets, phones and other devices only when placed on the device. Although products like the Clipper is created for existing devices with Webcams, but they can be lost/stolen. Some people suggest using a ""software"" blocker. News flash my friends, all Software are made to be hacked. You just have to know what it does and then undo it. If big corporations like Target and Home Depot can be hacked, need I say more? Unlike anything else, the ""Manual Shutter"" is manufactured along with the
device (in-built) and the only visible part will be the tiny button to

The only way you can ""hack"" HARDWARE is by being physically present with the device in your possession. This is what makes the ""Manual Shutter"" great and unmatched, which also takes the guessing game away by revolutionizing the way these devices are manufactured
column2: period. This in-built shutter moves over the face of the Webcam lenses internally, preventing the viewing

column1: of any object(s) in its direction. This invention will provide a lasting

solution to this growing technology problem. Even government agencies like the FBI can secretly spy on you through your Webcam lenses without your consent. What is your privacy worth to you and your family? Let's stop creepy webcam hackers for good.
My Goal and How You Can Help
working prototypes (Computer/Phone/Tablet) and present it to the top companies for licensing. And in a very short period of time, this kind
of computer and device would be the norm on the shelves in your local stores.  Make this happen with your help and contribution. If you
can't donate, please spread the word on Facebook, twitter, and other
social media websites, and I'll be forever indebted to you.

column2:
Challenges

Just like every project, there are risk and challenges involved. However, I'm a firm believer that the only obstacle in your way that can stop you is the one that you let stand in your way of success. People should see obstacle as an opportunity to prove why you have become better at resolving issues
column3: dealing with, and resolving unforeseen circumstances that comes your way.

column2: ""We Can Complain Because Rose Bushes Have Thorns, or Rejoice

column1: Because Thorn Bushes Have Roses."" Everything in life is simply how you approach it. I'm fully committed to making sure nothing stands in my way of this becoming a reality sooner than later. I'm working very closely with the engineering and supply chain to ensure that production will take place and be completed as scheduled. I've overcame many challenges in my personal and business life so this will not be the first or last.

I also have a Patent Pending idea that solves the same problem. It's called the Automatic Shutter (AS). The AS works with Skype and other video chatting services. The difference in price point between the ""Manual Shutter""  and the ""Automatic Shutter"" gives consumers the option as to what to purchase. When you turn on a video chat like Skype on your laptop, phone or tablet, then the shutter automatically opens revealing the camera lenses. When you turn on your camera/webcams to take a picture, it automatically opens the shutter revealing the lenses. When done, the shutter automatically closes to cover the lenses until your next use. So, simply put, the shutters opens ONLY when the camera is ON and in use
column2: then closes when the camera is not in use or OFF.

column1: This is a revolution and we will together change the way Webcam devices(including cell phones and tablets) are manufactured. Saying that your contribution to this project would be truly
appreciated is simply an understatement. Any contribution received will be
forever cherished, and I will truly be forever appreciative from the
bottom of my heart. Thank you for your time and support!!!

At the end of a successful campaign, I'll create a page on www.webcamspyblocker.com acknowledging the list of contributors and promoters that made this happen. Please let me know if you want to remain Anonymous and I'll be sure to respect your wishes. Thank You!

starting a new business has been both exciting and challenging. I never think
of age as a determining factor in pursuing and fulfilling my dreams. If
anything, it keeps the mind active and the creative juices flowing.
30 years, thoroughly enjoying every aspect of the landscape
of the people, to the incredible outdoor experiences within easy reach, and
raising a family in this environment has truly been a blessing. It’s given me one
of my greatest lifetime experiences , when I took my 16 year old son to the
summit of Mt. McKinley in 2006. I’ve built a few successful businesses over the
years: the Northern Lights Entertainment Publication, now in its 28<sup>th</sup>

column2: the Wild Card, a 14 year old fundraising medium

column1: prominent refinishing business, presently in its 7<sup>th</sup> year of
operation. Hard work coupled with a ‘never say die’ attitude is part of my
character, and believing that to live life to the fullest, you have to take
chances and challenge yourself to go beyond your comfort zone, and in ways that
lead to a more personally fulfilling life.
Key Master was the result of a frustrating attempt to find the right key out of
several on hand, that would open the lock to a back yard shed. If only there
was a way to uniquely identify each key, and keep that information in a
database for reference later. That would solve the problem I encountered. Was this a problem other people faced as
well?<span>  I soon discovered I was not alone,
and its usefulness in the business community was far reaching
those that dealt with numerous keys in their daily operations, as in property
managers, janitorial services, car dealerships and so on. Unfortunately, in the early 80’s, technology
was not advanced enough to make such a device small enough to be portable, and as
well, the cost for a prototype was prohibitive.
phone era, faster processors and improved location technology.
February of 2012, my wife and I were introduced to a very talented team of
computer engineers, that were enthusiastic about my idea and up for a challenge.
In its engineering, we wanted the recognition aspect to work in two ways
use the phone’s camera to identify the key, and also to recognize the correct
key if a person is at the lock site. With GPS capability, a person could
database the lock’s exact location, and find the key closest to that site. As important,
the application had to be easy to use.
they completed their task, and the Stellar Key Master is now ready for the
venture, there are always sacrifices to be made, both in time and money. To
this point, we’ve ‘boot-strapped it’, and with a sizeable debt to pay off, but
to move forward to the next stage of development, we need your help.
going to shine on the national level and down the road globally, with exciting
enhancements on the horizon, but to hasten its success, our marketing budget
has to swell. Press releases, social networking and targeted ads are in place
for the short term, but the same is needed on a continuing level, until our
product really gains traction in the marketplace. Your donation and word of

mouth advertising will help us reach that point.

REWARD SPECIAL:
Alaska’s most valued resource, other than oil, is the
salmon. It brings tourists by the millions, and Copper River Reds are a prized
possession world-wide. Halibut adds to that fervor. Alaskans are a colorful
people, organic by nature, and resourceful. Made in Alaska products, from

smoked salmon to homemade jams, jellies and syrups, are beyond compare. So with the support of some of my fellow Alaskans with businesses of this nature, I've put together some incredible samplings of Alaska’s finest, and you'll see these
For these rewards, the Made In Alaska contributors
will include: Alaskan Salsa Salmon from Anchorage

column3: and Alaskan Boreal Bouquet out of

column1: Alaskan Salsa Salmon is the original fire breathing Salmon,
with a sombrero on top, all natural with no preservatives, offered in a HOT,
Medium or Mild salsa. Check them out at www.salsasalmon.net
The Alaska Seafood Company specializes in boneless smoked

column2: halibut, salmon caviar, and jerky. Find out more about them at www.alaskaseafoodcompany.com.

column1: Kahiltna Birchworks, also known as Alaska Wild Harvest, is
the largest producer of pure organic birch syrup, and one of the rarest gourmet
food products in the world. It also happens to be one of the most difficult to
produce. Along with their award winning syrups of many flavors, their Alaska
Wild Harvest line of jams are made with whole wild berries kettle cooked
slowly, to offer a richer, berry flavor. The Birch Cream Caramels and Birch
Almond Brittle are, ‘to die for’. Look them up at www.alaskabirchsyrup.com.
Alaskan Boreal Bouquet Gourmet Herbal Vinegars offer a
tantalizing taste sensation of organically grown herbs, cultivated without the
use of chemicals on a traditional Alaskan homestead nestled in the boreal
forest of Fairbanks. Fresh bouquets of flowering herbs are hand harvested and
suspended in seasoned rice vinegar. These richly flavored vinegars offer an
exciting and robust addition to dressings, marinades, and sautés, transforming

any meal into a gourmet experience. To find them, go to www.basicallybasil.com.

With only a few days left, it's apparent that we're not going to reach our goal of $20,000. This means that we won't be able to develop (for both iOS and Android) and release the app in May 2013.
That's ok though because we're VERY close to having enough money for a working prototype!
Which is why our NEW goal is $2500. Please open up your heart and donate today. Even just a few dollars will get us one step closer to being able to help thousands of deserving people.
And remember, everyone who donates gets the app for free!
What does farro, malt vinegar, semolina, and even Triticum dicoccon have in common?
They all contain gluten, a dangerous and hidden poison to those with celiac and gluten intolerance and it's hiding in thousands of products.

• The GlutenGuru iPhone app will take the time and risk out of gluten-free shopping by allowing the user to scan the ingredients of food items. Our app will determine FOR them if the item is safe to consume.

• With your donation we will be one step closer to reaching our goal of creating THE FIRST EVER iPhone application and mobile toolbox dedicated to making the grocery shopping experience faster and easier for people who have intolerance to Gluten.

column3: What Will Our App Do Upon Launch

column1: Because after launch it's just going to get better!
• With newly developed technology it will scan the ingredients in any product.
• If the ingredients are gluten free users will be informed it is safe
• If the item is safe, users will be given an option to add the product to the database.
• If the product contains gluten, users will be alerted and a list of the unsafe ingredients contained in the product will be listed.
• By building a significant database we will be able to improve the users experience and allow us to create new features for the app.

• Phase 1 will involve building the prototype, the database of ingredients, and the app itself. Then we will improve app functionality through extensive beta testing. Our app developer is local Edmontonian @seanhealy.
• The 2nd phase involves more marketing, expanding the app functionality and technology and getting the app in front of the people who need it the most.
We're relying on YOU for your help and generosity. Please help us reach our goal!
Here's a breakdown of why we need $20k
• First and foremost we need to build a prototype.
• We will need to build our basic app
• This will include a bar-code scanner and other technology we will be incorporating.
• We will need to beta test in order to debug and work out the glitches and will have subsequent costs associated with this.
• Ongoing and monthly fees will include hosting, licensing, bug fixes, app updates and upgrades and other maintenance costs
• We will then add new features into the app. Some examples including a sharable/savable shopping list, the ability to scan for other allergens and many more useful tools.
• With our goal of wanting everyone to have access to our app we will need to build our app for other operating systems.
• Although we are both creative and resourceful we will need some for marketing if need be.
• Lastly-AFTER we have succeeded in our goal we would like to buy a bottle of bubbly and share a toast.
We're 2 Canadian sisters (Jodie Costello and Melanie Nathan) who are passionate and determined to make Celiac Disease more manageable for people worldwide.

Jodie is an expert at Gluten free living with a strong background in sales and technology. Her son has T1 diabetes and Celiac Disease and she understands the impact of modern wheat and the importance of a Gluten free life. Now she wants to make gluten free living easier for people to deal with by providing more options for food management and being the ""go to"" guru for safe non-gluten food choices.

Melanie has marketed for big brands and companies. She is an auntie of a child with Celiac. She has a strong background in tech and Internet Marketing and wants to help bring awareness to the plight of people who are having to struggle with an aversion or intolerance to Gluten.
Together we CAN make this a reality, but we NEED your help.

Jodie is a stay-at-home mom, because she loves it and because of necessity and practicality. Daycare is expensive and depending on the work schedule, it can leave little time to prepare meals, shop and spend time with her family.

Her husband serves in the Canadian Forces which means he can be away a lot, sometimes for long periods of time and Jodie steps up to fill the gap every time. With the typical costs of raising a family, combined with the cost of her sons insulin and Diabetic supplies, coupled with the costs of a Diabetic/Celiac diet there is very little left over.

""I was just diagnosed with Celiac 4 days ago. Just got home from my first grocery shopping trip in tears. Its so hard to decipher the packaging. I had to carry a 3 page list of do-not-eat ingredients with me, and I was still confused!"" - Recently diagnosed Celiac sufferer
Unfortunately, this scenario is becoming all to common.
Access to - and education about - Gluten free foods prevents families with Celiac disease from:
This therefore decreases their quality of life while increasing indirect costs associated with the disease.
Furthermore, 30% of Celiac disease patients may develop a malignancy (non-Hodgkins lymphoma)! Adhering to a Gluten free diet is CRITICAL for preventative purposes, in spite of the personal costs.

The GlutenGuru iPhone app will take the time and risk out of gluten-free shopping. By allowing the user to scan the ingredients of food items, our app will determine FOR them, if the item is safe to consume.

Technology is always advancing and people with health issues can really benefit from this, more and more people are using smart phones as their ""go to"" answer. With your contribution, and our technology we want to bring it to a whole new level.
""So obviously this will be of huge benefit potentially...Here's your chance to crowdfund this Edmonton..."" - CBC Radio
Building New Apps In Edmonton with tech columnist Dana DiTomaso
""This latest app I heard about might just deserve top ticketing on my phone – a gluten-free grocery app!"" - Triumphdining.com
Tech-Savvy Gluten-Free grocery Shopping

""The prevalence of gluten-free apps highlights the potential of smartphones to help Canadians battle chronic health issues... Last November, the Pew Research Center reported that one-third of American cell phone owners search for online health information using their mobile device."" -  Techvibes
Read it on Techvibes: Canadian App Promotes Gluten-Free Shopping, Seeks Crowdfunding
""The team, which includes Edmonton app developer Sean Healy, hopes the technology will give people more choice when it comes to buying gluten-free food."" - Global Edmonton

column6: >Read it on Global News: <a href=""http://www.globaltvedmonton.com/sisters+hope+to+ease+gluten-free+shopping+with+app/6442815332/story.html#ixzz2MEUV6FFn"" rel=""noopener nofollow"" style=""color: #003399
column7: target=""_blank"" title=""GlutenGuru app on Global"">Global Edmonton | Sisters hope to ease gluten-free shopping with app

Melanie, the developers, are working on a new app that will be the solution to every newly gluten-free's problem... When I heard about this app and how revolutionary it was going to be in the gluten free world, I immediately knew this was something that people had to hear about."" - GlutenAwayBlog

column6: >Read it on GlutenAway: The New Gluten Free App / GlutenGuru

column3: What People are Saying About the GlutenGuru App

column1: ""Check out GlutenGuru App. Sisters creating an iPhone gluten-free shopping app. Sisters in biz, pretty cool."" - Brian Fogata
""I think GlutenGuru App is going to be incredibly useful. If I'm buying a snack for a celiac friend, sometimes I screw up. #twizzlershavegluten"" - Brittney Le Blanc
""TERRIFIC idea for an app!!!"" - Mina's Purely Divine Gluten Free

""As someone who has seen a direct major improvement in my health since drastically cutting back on gluten in my diet, and knowing people with Celiac disease, I’m grateful to be able to help get this thing started!"" - Alan Bleiweiss
Q: Who is the kid in the photo??

A: He's the worst Waldo ever (because he's so easy to spot lol)! Actually, he's our inspiration for creating this app and our reason for wanting it to succeed. He is Jodie's son and he has Type 1 Diabetes as well as Celiac. As you can see by his pic, this doesn't prevent him from always smiling!
If you can’t contribute financially, you can still help by...
• Getting the word out and making some noise about our campaign
• Linking to our Indiegogo campaign page from your website
• Suggesting people for us to talk to
• Letting us write a guest post, introducing our app, for your blog
• Following GlutenGuruApp on Twitter
• Liking and sharing Gluten Guru App on Facebook
• Following GlutenGuruApp on Instagram
We gratefully accept both Credit Card and PayPal donations.
Email Melanie or Jodie at glutenguruapp@gmail.com
With only a few days left, it's apparent that we're not going to reach our goal of $20,000. This means that we won't be able to develop (for both iOS and Android) and release the app in May 2013.
That's ok though because we're VERY close to having enough money for a working prototype!
Which is why our NEW goal is $2500. Please open up your heart and donate today. Even just a few dollars will get us one step closer to being able to help thousands of deserving people.
And remember, everyone who donates gets the app for free!

In September 2014 we presented the PiKon, a 3D printed, Raspberry Pi powered astro-cam. We wanted to show how these disruptive technologies could put the realisation of a DIY, home made telescope within the reach of anyone. The response was fantastic, with national press coverage and thousands of hits on our PiKonic web site. Now we want to help anyone who wants to build their own PiKon by offering everything from 3D printer files to a complete kit with 3D printed components and optics.

We've teamed up with We Do 3D Printing of Sheffield, provide all the bits you'll need as perks and even offer some fully built PiKons for people who just want to create Raspberry Pi programmes for astronomy.

Through our social media, we'd also like to establish a community where makers, astronomers, Pi programmers and educators can share information, experiences and of course, images.

Bienvenu à vous qui nous suivez depuis le début, vous êtes là pour en savoir plus sur le Crimson, je vous invite à descendre plus bas.

Vous ne connaissez pas la marque Pandoradvanced

Je suis Christopher Fernandes, ou Kriss. En 2014 je réalisais mes premières créations, puis de fils en aiguilles j'ai tissé un petit commerce.
Aujourd'hui, nous sommes des créateurs fous au nombres de deux, le design est notre passion et nous cherchons l'innovation dans l'informatique jours après jours, et si vous êtes la sans même nous connaître, c'est qu'une photo à attirer votre attention.
Je vous invite à découvrir notre site internet en suivant les liens et surtout à nous suivre sur Facebook.
Après le colossal projet du Jetblack : Bureau et Ordinateur, nous avons eu quelques demandes pour un boitier d'ordinateur Pandoradvanced.
Je me suis donc lancé le défi de dessiner et de créer avec Pandoradvanced un boitier innovant.

Pourquoi un crowdfounding?
C'est très simple, voici un tout petit aperçu des charges:

Un fonctionnement classique d'entreprise me direz-vous? A la différence que nous proposons un produit de luxe à faible marge.

Qu'est ce que ça vous y gagnez?
En utilisant Indiegogo nous avons la capacité de travailler en flux tendu.
On cherche à faire connaitre nos produits et prouver ce qu'on à dans le ventre. En gros, VOUS FAIRE PLAISIR. Pour cela, nous avons besoins de vous, enfin de toi, qui

lis ces mots, voici quelques explications:
Un beau graphisme vaux mieux qu'un long discours

A propos des rendus.
Nos rendus sont des fichiers 3D, comme un document à imprimer, on les envoient directement à nos partenaires sous traitant.
Grâce à la modélisation 3D et quelques calculs, on peux connaître le poids, la taille au millimètre prêt, les mécanismes, les erreurs à ne pas commettre en conception tels que les matériaux à utiliser.

Fabriquer un prototype est très couteux, dans l'usinage une machine prend du temps à configurer, et de la main d’œuvre à exécuter, donc de l'argents, beaucoup d'argent, surtout en France.

Grâce à IndieGoGo nous pouvons noyer le prototype dans des commandes en séries et nous permettre d'afficher ces tarifs défiant toute concurrences.

Que faisons-nous pendant la récolte des fonds?
Votre achat est stocké sur le compte IndieGoGo jusqu'au jours -J.
Pendant ce temps chez Pandoradvanced, on se charge de regrouper tout les achats et de préparer le packaging du boitier.

Si vous jouez le jeu, on va vous vendre du rêve!


Si la campagne n'atteins pas ses objectifs?
Nous avons opter pour un financement flexible, si les objectifs ne sont pas atteint, vous aurez quand même vôtre contribution.

Nôtre but est de vendre le boitier Crimson via IndieGoGo et de faire connaître la marque grâce à vos retour positif.
Nous ne cherchons pas à injecter votre argent dans nôtre entreprise, notre réputation en dépend.

3 Coloris:

Orange et blanc

column8: />Disponible uniquement le temps de la campagne IndieGoGo.

column1: Quelques points innovants qui rendent le CRIMSON unique:
Nous ne connaissons aucun boitier accompagné d'un ventilateur derrière le CPU. Pourtant les températures sont extrêmes et bien conservé.

Les aimants sont un vrai plaisir pour le câble management, vous pouvez dès le début de votre installation, trier vos câbles sans encombre, même les câbles reliant votre ou vos cartes graphiques, Ethernet, Etc ...

La Garantie Pandoradvanced 2 an:
Bon c'est une première série, mais si par exemple au bout de 6mois votre peinture s'écaille ou un bras articulé casse par l'usure. On vous le change sans discuter!
Parceque vous nous faites confiance sur IndieGoGo, on va faire ce qu'il faut pour rester soudé.
Exemples de montages:
Nous sommes actuellement une petite start-up donc un grand merci pour votre soutien, nous recevons chaque jours des messages d'encouragement et des demandes pour nos produits.

Si ce n'est pas déjà fait:
Nous vous invitons à liker la page Facebook, jetez un œil on va faire un petit concours avec des belles choses à gagner!
Même si vous n'achetez pas, posez-vos questions ici, nous pourrons créer une FAQ avec nos réponses.

Merci à toi!

column2: >VastStick is the memory storage device that will revolutionize the industry. Expandable up to 4TB,  you can save MASSIVE amounts of data in the palm of your hand.

column1: Expandable -  Merge and amalgamate the capacity and speeds of up to 16 microSD cards.
Compatibility - Compatible to accept any capacity size SD cards.
Fastest Speeds- Current transfer speeds of USB3.1 with the ability to surpass 10Gb/s in the near future.
Power Reduction -  Ability to reduce power and heat levels by over 90%.
Fault Tolerance- Hardware raid-within-raid is built-in and can be set to any raid within the device itself.
No Data Loss - Hot swap cards and never lose data. For example, if the device is set to raid 1 and a card goes bad, you can easily remove it and replace it without losing any data.
Versatile - Ability to increase number of cards and data capacity as your needs grow.
Advanced Function with Speed- Input/Output Operations per Second will be over 200,000 surpassing even the fastest SSD's.
Longevity - Lifespan is estimated at over 20 years for normal consumer use.
VastStick uses the world’s first Solid State Flash Array Drive (SSFAD) patented technology.
What is SSFAD? It is a term we created to establish a new benchmark in the industry. SSFAD means Solid State Flash Array Drive and defines how VAST products function.
This advanced memory technology is revolutionary, durable,  fast, scalable, replaceable, and expandable.
You can backup an entire computer to VastStick and take it with you anywhere.

      Secure Sliding Lid Allows You to Insert Up To 16 microSD Cards.

 VastStick 1st Version Test, Showing Capacity and Functionality:

column1: Flexible and Functionable Connection With Vast 4-in-1 Cable Connector
column2:
>BENCHMARK TESTING

In preliminary testing, VastStick achieved a score grade of 225:

And transfer speeds of 85-85MH/s:

Never again worry about the storage capacity of your PC, laptop, tablet or mobile device. 

Designed for convenience and portability, VastStick allows you to store, back-up and share your favorite contents without the limitations of Internet connections, cables, or connectors.

 

 

 

 

The possibilities are endless.

Whether you are sharing a presentation at the office, at home, or while traveling, the VastStick is the perfect product for you.    

Oh, and it has up to 8 hours of continuous streaming time on a single charge!
column5:
/>

 

VastStick comes with the free VastStick App for iOS and Android devices. 

This easy-to-use app automatically displays your device’s content in a simple file system for quick and easy viewing of your digital media and files.

The app sorts all the content on the drive according to its type, and you can simply select video, music, or photos from the menu in order to access that content.
column6:
>WHY VASTSTICK IS FOR YOU

VastStick is the future of memory storage. More and more, we need more space, more memory, and more flexibility with how we save data.

VastStick storage capacity starts where others seem to lack, and you can select the storage capacity that suits you, choosing from: 64GB, 128GB, 256GB, 512GB, 1TB, 2TB and 4TB.

These formats are fully expandable up to an unprecedented 16TB!
column7:
>BACK-UP AND RESTORE:

PC's, laptops, tablets and smartphones come with such a limited amount of internal storage. After installing an operating system, programs  and apps, the remaining space for digital content is reduced dramatically.

This is the reason VastStick is a must-have for savvy users, who want to carry their entire digital library around with them.
column8:
>SAY GOODBYE TO THE CLOUD:

With the VastStick, there's no need to pay monthly fees for storage or to worry about hackers and others (e.g. 3rd party server operators) gaining access to your content. Also, you're not limited to the need for an internet connection in order to simply access your content.

The VastStick frees you from these limitations by providing a secure and versatile experience unlike any other.

 

  GET THE FASTEST READ/WRITE SPEEDS WITH USB3.1 TECHNOLOGY:

VastStick is the largest and most versatile storage device ever created, and we equipped it as such, with USB3.0.

It's the fastest  read/write speed available in the market, with improved power consumption, data rate, security and pairing reliability.
column9:
>BUILT IN WIFI:

VastStick has the optional built-in Wifi that can broadcast its own wireless network, over which you can share, store and stream with up to 20 connected devices.

VastStick allows for Internet pass-thru mode, which enables you to access the web while still connected to the drive.
column10:
>WIRELESS STREAMING:

With the VastStick, you can seamlessly stream your videos, photos, music, and documents to your smartphones, tablets, and computers – wirelessly!

VastStick supports most of today's mainstream file extensions, so that you can easily stream all of your content directly from the disk without the inconvenience of having to convert files to compatible host device formats.

Supported File Formats:

column1: • Videos - WMV, AVI, MKV, MP4, MOV, FLV, MPG, RMVB, M4V, TS
• Documents - DOC, DOCX, PDF, XLS, XLSX, PPT, PPTX, TXT

PERFECT FOR WIRELESS SHARING WITH FRIENDS OR FAMILY:

The VastStick allows you to easily share media with up to 20 other users simultaneously, or stream up to 5 different HD movies to five devices at the same time.

It has the ability to support multi-platform wireless streaming between any combination of mobile devices, VastStick. .

 

GREAT FOR THE OFFICE, PRESENTATIONS, AND BUSINESS MEETINGS:

VastStick is great for professionals, they can connect it with any device via wireless and use it for presentations with high volume data exchange.

 

SIMPLE AND FLEXIBLE - IDEAL TO TAKE WITH YOU WHEN TRAVELING:
column6: >OUR PERKS
column9: '/>
column10:
>ABOUT US

As Tech entrepreneurs, we have created other technologies that were based in the mobile and wireless telecommunication industry.

As a result of those experiences and our ability to see technologies in a different light, we envisioned what is now Vast Drive. Of course, this technology came after many hours of painstaking research, experimentation and high level firmware and software programming from our talented team.

This campaign is about bringing to the market a patented advanced data storage device and technology that has the potential of changing the storage industry and reducing the burdening load on our power resources.

The VastStick &
column11:
Vast Drives are the epitome of Green Technology.  Contributors, at this early stage, will help bring this project to the next stage of development, where we will begin manufacturing and distributing the Vast Product Line, help us share in our vision, and be a contributor.

Thank you for your support. For further informations of this project please reach us at http://www.cforcedesign.com

Did you know that the new iPhone models support fast charging?

Apple has officially stated that with fast charging, your iPhone 8, iPhone 8 Plus, and iPhone X can charge up to 50 percent in as few as 30 minutes. However, you would need to pay at least $75 for Apple’s 29W power adapter and a USB-C-to-Lightning cable. This extra $75 is pricey, even when fast charging is necessary. (Read more about this here: https://support.apple.com/en-us/HT208137)
column2: >
column5: >It costs too much to charge your phone quickly, so we developed a Qualcomm QC adapter-compatible cable to save you money and time.
column8:
> 

With C-Force, you can charge the iPhone 8, iPhone 8 Plus, and iPhone X up to 50 percent in 30 minutes, compared to 22 percent in 30 minutes with the Apple charging cable.

 

Start charging your new iPhone faster with 9V 1.8 A. Get hours of additional battery life during the day, even if you only plug in your phone for a short period.

column1:
LDR 6033 smart chips scale the current of your mobile device to determine whether or not your device supports fast charging. This patent-pending high-tech system can protect your device against overcharging. In addition, C-Force will reduce its charge speed in the last 25 percent to avoid damaging the battery of your mobile device.

When charging with the pack-in gear, here are data regarding charging with the C-Force pack-in gear:

If you want a faster charge but don’t want to pay over $75 for Apple’s charging cable, you have another option.

Use Qualcomm QC adapters and the C-Force cable instead of Apple’s overpriced PD adapter and USB-C-to-Lightning cable.

The C-Force cable is a good investment if your phone needs a quick charge in the morning before work, or if you need to boost your iPhone in the middle of the day.

 

 

C-Force allows your phone to intelligently scale the amount of power it receives based on the current charge state of its battery. C-Force has two different lights to let you know which type of charge your device is receiving: a blue light during quick charging, and a white light during regular charging.
column2:
>

With the new LDR 6033 smart chip technology and LED indicator, it is safe to charge your old iPhone, iPad and other Apple devices as well (including devices older than the iPhone 8).

 

C-Force consists of bend-resistant nylon braiding. It protects against the six most common issues among charging cables: overheating, short-circuiting, overcurrent, undercurrent, overcharging, input overvoltage, and output overvoltage. We offer a lifetime warranty on our cables (excluding the connector).

Copper tin alloy wires protected by PVC coating and aluminum shield, C-Force’s premium quality is revealed from its inside.

C-Force is not only a charging cable: it also supports data transfers from Lightning to USB-A Type.  Charge your phone from any power source, and take advantage of easy data transfers between your Apple device and USB-A while charging.
column3:
>

We are a team of young people who are extremely passionate about 3C products. Our team consists of serial entrepreneurs, creatives, and engineers who have worked together to bring C-Force fast-charging products to life.

You can initiate 100 percent refunds within the first eight days of backing an Indiegogo campaign by going to your contribution tab on the Indiegogo page.

column4: >The ATOM completely reinvents the conventional 3-axis phone gimbals with its lightweight portability, rich functionality and expanded APP extensions.
column10: >Atom is coming as the super portable 3-axis gimbal with its unique folding structure. More than a half size can be saved to make your travel more easy and enjoyable.
column12: > In comparison with other conventional phone gimbals
column16: >ATOM weighs only 440 gram (15.5 oz), so your arms won’t get so tired even after a long shoot.
column17: >Motors in conventional phone gimbals are not big in order to keep a relatively small size and light weight, and normally those gimbals just have a payload around 220 gram.
column18: >If they want to increase the payload, they would have to make the motors larger, at the price of sacrificing the using experience due to the larger size and heavier weight.
column19: >Thanks to the ATOM’s unique structure, ATOM can reach a high payload of 310 gram which is presently the highest in phone gimbal category, without the need to use larger and heavier motors and the body remains light weight and compact size.
column21: >Multifunctional Buttons on the Handle
column23: > ATOM's handle gathers a rich set of buttons that you can use to control almost all the functions of the gimbal and Snoppa App. And almost all the shooting operations can be done with one hand.
column24: >Even if you don't have Snoppa App, you can use most of the buttons on the handle. As long as your phone’s Bluetooth is connected to Atom, the buttons on the handle can control your phone to shoot or stop.
column26: >Front control panel
column28: > Back side  control
column30: >According to different contexts, you can easily adjust the motion sensitivity of Atom. The three tracking modes can be switched with just one button.
column32:
> 

1 . Smooth movement in normal mode

2. Hold the trigger button to instantly lock the orientation to ensure the footage is stable

3. Click and hold the trigger button to set the gimbal into the fast track mode for tracking fast moving objects

column2: >One-Key switch between horizontal and vertical orientation
column3: >For all other conventional structure gimbals, changing between horizontal and vertical shooting is a troublesome and time-consuming process.
column4: >Thanks to ATOM’s unique structure, changing the shooting orientation had never been so easy and fast.
column5: >You can change the orientation both by one-key click (setup in the app), or rotate it manually.
column8: >The ATOM integrates plenty of control buttons, including a customizable slide button on the side. In the app you can freely define the slide button with zoom or focus function as per your need.
column12: Object track
column14: >Unrestricted Heading Rotation
column15: >Atom uses a heading motor that can be rotated without infinity. There’s no dead angles when shooting dynamic time-lapse video. When performing face tracking or object tracking, there is no need to worry about the target exceeding the rotation range of the gimbal.
column20: >With the dedicated app, people can get more gimbal controls and shooting methods
column22: >A Mic Interface for Third-party Microphones
column24: >Great movies have memorable sounds. That’s why Atom creatively built in a mic interface for third-party microphones. This can efficiently improve the audio quality for interviews, live streaming and live shooting.
column29: >The ATOM is mainly designed for phone filming, but it also can be used for action cameras like GoPro Hero 4, 5, 6 series.
column30: >There’re two ways to mount the GoPro
column32: >Mount with an adapter
column34: >Mount directly onto the phone holder
column37:
> Typical problems in the conventional 3-axis phone gimbal 

All the ordinary 3-axis phone gimbals use the orthogonal structure, and have two typical problems:

1. Mounting the phone is quite troublesome and time-consuming that people need to balance the phone before startup by adjusting the motor arm.

2. The side motor would hide the phone’s charging port (and sometimes the mic port too)
column38:
>How does the Atom behave

column53: >Atom battery runs up to 24 hours. You can easily handle demands of continuous filming during a long journey or a long filming hours even when you are away from a power source.
column55:
>Thoughtful details

In addition to the unique exciting features, the ATOM also have a lot of thoughtful details which help to get a better user experience.

There’s a lock on each motor arm, which can prevent the arm from moving around when the gimbal is closed.

 

Some mobile phones have keys in the middle part of the side, which could easily cause problem when attach the phone to the gimbal phone holder.

ATOM effectively solve this issue by designing a slot in the rubber griper.

 

On the back of the phone holder, there’s a slot on the upper and lower part respectively. In this way user can pull out the phone holder much easier.

 

With the dedicated app, people can get more gimbal controls and shooting methods

>Why You Should Invest in an ATOM Right Now

All pre-ordered products will also come with a 1-year warranty.

column11:

column13:
>FAQ

How long is the warranty?    

The ATOM comes with a 12 month limited warranty for Indiegogo backers. We also ensure that every unit is free from manufacturing defects and handled with the utmost care during shipment.

Do I have to pay VAT / GST?    

The recipient is the importer of record and must comply with all laws and regulations of their local government. Orders shipped may be subject to import taxes, customs duties and fees levied by local country. The recipient of an international shipment may be subject to such import taxes, customs duties and fees, which are levied once a shipment reaches the recipient's country. Additional charges for customs clearance must be fulfilled by the recipient. Snoppa has no control over these charges.

Which filming devices are compatible with ATOM?    

ATOM is primarily designed for mobile phones, but it may also can support (hold) some other devices like GoPro hero series. 

What kind of microphone does the ATOM support?

ATOM supports 3.5mm TRRS microphone.  TRS is not supported.

Is ATOM waterproof? 

No, it’s just splash proof.

When I can receive my order? 

The shipment of the first batch of ATOM will even begin before the crowdfunding ends. Actual ship dates will vary depending on your country, your location, and when you’ve placed your order. We will keep you up to date on every step of the process. 

In order to deliver ATOM safely and efficiently, the orders will be dispatched by different courier companies, depending on the destination regions. Consequently we may ship out in a slightly different order from the initial buying sequence.

Change of address?    

If you need to update your address, please contact our Indiegogo support team: indiegogo@snoppa.com

Indiegogo’s shipping location lists me in the wrong country?

At the end of the campaign, we will send out a survey confirming where you would like your ATOM to be shipped.

What is your refund policy?    

Refunds are processed on a case-by-case basis. At some point we will need to lock down refunds in order to go into production and ship product to you. We will not be able to refund orders once they've shipped.

","ATOM Reinvented 3-axis phone gimbal The ATOM completely reinvents the conventional 3-axis phone gimbals with its lightweight portability, rich functionality and expanded APP extensions.  Foldable & PortableAtom is coming as the super portable 3-axis gimbal with its unique folding structure. More than a half size can be saved to make your travel more easy and enjoyable. In comparison with other conventional phone gimbals  Small but powerfulATOM weighs only 440 gram (15.5 oz), so your arms won’t get so tired even after a long shoot.Motors in conventional phone gimbals are not big in order to keep a relatively small size and light weight, and normally those gimbals just have a payload around 220 gram.If they want to increase the payload, they would have to make the motors larger, at the price of sacrificing the using experience due to the larger size and heavier weight.  Thanks to the ATOM’s unique structure, ATOM can reach a high payload of 310 gram which is presently the highest in phone gimbal category, without the need to use larger and heavier motors and the body remains light weight and compact size.  Multifunctional Buttons on the Handle ATOM's handle gathers a rich set of buttons that you can use to control almost all the functions of the gimbal and Snoppa App. And almost all the shooting operations can be done with one hand.Even if you don't have Snoppa App, you can use most of the buttons on the handle. As long as your phone’s Bluetooth is connected to Atom, the buttons on the handle can control your phone to shoot or stop. Front control panel   Back side  control Flexible Tracking ModesAccording to different contexts, you can easily adjust the motion sensitivity of Atom. The three tracking modes can be switched with just one button.  1 . Smooth movement in normal mode2. Hold the trigger button to instantly lock the orientation to ensure the footage is stable3. Click and hold the trigger button to set the gimbal into the fast track mode for tracking fast moving objects

column1: One-Key switch between horizontal and vertical orientationFor all other conventional structure gimbals, changing between horizontal and vertical shooting is a troublesome and time-consuming process.Thanks to ATOM’s unique structure, changing the shooting orientation had never been so easy and fast.You can change the orientation both by one-key click (setup in the app), or rotate it manually. Zoom & Focus controlThe ATOM integrates plenty of control buttons, including a customizable slide button on the side. In the app you can freely define the slide button with zoom or focus function as per your need. Zoom Control Focus control Face track & Object track Unrestricted Heading RotationAtom uses a heading motor that can be rotated without infinity. There’s no dead angles when shooting dynamic time-lapse video. When performing face tracking or object tracking, there is no need to worry about the target exceeding the rotation range of the gimbal. Wonderful App FeaturesWith the dedicated app, people can get more gimbal controls and shooting methods A Mic Interface for Third-party MicrophonesGreat movies have memorable sounds. That’s why Atom creatively built in a mic interface for third-party microphones. This can efficiently improve the audio quality for interviews, live streaming and live shooting. Action camera supportThe ATOM is mainly designed for phone filming, but it also can be used for action cameras like GoPro Hero 4, 5, 6 series.There’re two ways to mount the GoPro1Mount with an adapter2. Mount directly onto the phone holder Protect your phone carefully Typical problems in the conventional 3-axis phone gimbal All the ordinary 3-axis phone gimbals use the orthogonal structure, and have two typical problems:1. Mounting the phone is quite troublesome and time-consuming that people need to balance the phone before startup by adjusting the motor arm.2. The side motor would hide the phone’s charging port (and sometimes the mic port too) How does the Atom behave On ATOM, we creatively invent a non-orthogonal structure with the oblique arm. In this unique structure, the side motor will not hit the bottom of the phone any more and leaves the phone a large movement space. Supports Wireless/wired Phone ChargingAtom is equipped with wired charging and wireless charging, which allows you shoot without worrying about dead battery after shooting. Atom can easily charge your phone with wireless charging. You can even start to charge midway through the shooting, without any interruption. If your phone does not support wireless charging, Atom’s wired charging is outstanding as well. You might think if the phone mounting and gimbal stabilization would be affected by the charging cable. Let me tell you something, thanks to its unique structural design, Atom can perfectly avoid these problems. Super Long RuntimeAtom battery runs up to 24 hours. You can easily handle demands of continuous filming during a long journey or a long filming hours even when you are away from a power source. Thoughtful detailsIn addition to the unique exciting features, the ATOM also have a lot of thoughtful details which help to get a better user experience.There’s a lock on each motor arm, which can prevent the arm from moving around when the gimbal is closed. Some mobile phones have keys in the middle part of the side, which could easily cause problem when attach the phone to the gimbal phone holder.ATOM effectively solve this issue by designing a slot in the rubber griper. On the back of the phone holder, there’s a slot on the upper and lower part respectively. In this way user can pull out the phone holder much easier. With the dedicated app, people can get more gimbal controls and shooting methods  SPECIFICATIONS   SHARE WITH FRIENDS AND FAMILY!    OPTIONAL ACCESSORIES 110° Wide angle lens
Length weight: 49g (with spring clip:60g, with U clip: 71g)

The Wide angle mobile phone lens can enlarge 30% view sight compared with the original camera, which  can obviously highlight the object’s features when shooting landscape, building, portrait and so on. Clip-on Microphone
Clip-on Mic for iPhone and Android devices
Mic clip for securing microphone to clothing
Includes a 13 feet (4m) 1/8’’ TRRS Female to Male extension cable

column1: • See How HYPER MIRROR Works In Action, Please Refer To The ""Demo Video"" Section Below.
Have you guys been sick of these problems?
• Wired HDMI connection works great, but running cables all over the place to connect devices is inconvenient and unsightly.
• Ordinary wireless casting solutions often require Wi-Fi, which commonly results in lagging video and delayed audio.

• Cross-operation systems or cross-platform casting is never easy to achieve, creating compatibility problems and making streaming a closed ecosystem like what Amazon, Google, and Roku provide. Not to mention the many applications that need to be installed.
• My traditional, non-smart screens like TVs, monitors, and projectors still have value and deserve a powerful upgrade rather than breaking the bank for an expensive “smart TV”.

Now, all of those issues are no longer a problem. Introducing the streaming myth loop breaker - HYPER MIRROR, the world’s only Zero Lag, Off Wi-Fi, No App, cinema-quality screen mirroring device that is perfect for large screen gaming, video conference, movie watching and social media browsing. With HYPER MIRROR you can truly enjoy the convenience of plug &
column2: play wireless streaming to any HDMI screens, such as TVs, monitors, projectors, and more. You name it, we link it.

column1: No more messy cabling, no more frustrating gaming experiences on a tiny screen, no more internet prerequisites, HYPER MIRROR works like a charm for any viewing need.

HYPER MIRROR utilizes the industrial leading mm-Wave (AKA EHF) technology that is normally found in 5G networks. Compared with Bluetooth and Wi-Fi streaming, EHF allows more content transmission at faster speed with a more stable connection and ultimately higher quality. How Fast?  For the first time in the consumer market, almost No Latency. How good in quality? Professional gamers say “hurray!”.

Never spend another second waiting for connection or app installations. Wireless gaming with Zero lag and crystal clear, sharp images for a more enjoyable and smooth, perfectly synced casting experience.

Connect multiple devices to one screen wirelessly with just one-click to switch between output signals. Embrace the freedom of a no cable lifestyle. HYPER MIRROR is a more convenient way to cast any content to a larger screen.
There are no limitations on the media you wish to cast, HYPER MIRROR supports all types of streaming sources. It’s your best companion for both work and leisure.
Does not require any Wi-Fi connection. Patented mm-Wave technology allows you to wirelessly plug and play it whenever, wherever, and on any devices you like.

Just simply connect it to your smartphone, laptop, or tablet. Instantly upgrade any traditional TV, monitor, or projector to a smart screen with HYPER MIRROR. It saves you from buying a gimmicky smart TV.
<ul><li>HYPER MIRROR Casting Desktop Mode On Android Phone &amp
HYPER MIRROR was created as a easy way for mobile device content casting.  HYPER MIRROR is a reliable. We develope this to make your life more convenient.

Safety is No.1 priority, HYPER MIRROR has been tested thoroughly and systematically to ensure reliability and stability. So far HYPER MIRROR passed all the tests necessary to be qualified for mass production. Therefore, we are confident to tell you the HYPER MIRROR story, and we are confident in delivering satisfaction. Because we love it, and we hope you will like it too!!

column1: Coffee prices have been falling for the past 3 years to an
historically low, due to many factors, specially the stagnated demand, as a
consequence of the economic crisis in consuming countries, and over production,
in particular by countries as Brazil, Vietnam and Colombia, which are by far

the 3 top producers in the world, with a total of about 90 million bags. 90% of the world production is channelized thru top exporters, transnational corporations, international traders/brokers and big importers, leaving to the coffee growers only 5% (about $ 1.20/pound) on the final price of the product they grow, with so much hard work and economic effort. 

All
coffee growers are suffering now, however for small growers (in some countries 80%), especially the
ones in Central America, the situation is particularly difficult as,
besides the low current prices, they had to overcome the Coffee Leaf Rust
plague (Roya) as well, which, in many areas, has decimated the coffee bushes
population. Therefore, producers in these regions are facing a terrible
economical disaster, as most of them depend exclusively on coffee and they are
getting lower pay, for smaller crop and higher production costs, for 3 years in
a raw now.  As if all this was not enough, they are
facing another 2 or 3 years of price crisis, where 40% of the small growers are
at risk of going out of business, hence putting the Central American coffee on

bottom - from the plantation to the cup. Established in New York back in 2000,
as a coffee brokerage/trading house, YouTradeCoffee has always
strived to be a professional, perseverant, innovative and highly IT developed
company, specializing in the end to end coffee trade. We stand for Information,

and innovative way to trade coffee. As a result, we have been honored

at risk of going out of business, hence putting the Central American coffee on
Knowledge and Information have always been Power
and if combined with the proper Tools,
at one click away, to help you reach thousands of potential buyers around
the world, it is Freedom as well. In recent years most countries have
communication, making internet accessible even in the most remote areas.
Therefore, we warmly invite You all, to help us democratize
and make the Coffee Trade accessible to millions of growers around the
world, by building an Independent Coffee Trade Platform meant to
host a truly Free and Open Market, based on offer and demand only. Let’s
build together the infrastructure needed to move forward with the Coffee
Trade Revolution, which will potentially give economic freedom to 25 million coffee
growers around the world, giving them the opportunity to trade
their coffee directly, cutting out the middle men and hence getting a higher
Our experienced team, with over 50 years in the international coffee trade,
allied to one of the best IT packages, aims to bring together producers,
exporters, traders, importers & roasters in a platform where they can
professionally conduct their day to day business. Having already
established one of the most sophisticated IT infrastructures offered by any
coffee broker, YouTradeCoffee is currently working on the next
will take the form of new software tools for B2B International Coffee
Trade, that ultimately will cut out the intermediary from the
commercialization chain. It is a solution meant to inform and empower
particularly the small and middle sized producers and roasters,
but at the same time functioning as a powerful tool for the mainstream coffee
trade as well. At YTC platform you will be able to buy,
sell or auction coffee 24/7, sign contracts & track your trade
operations online, in a secure, organized, transparent, professional and
comfortable environment. Besides all of this you can ask for professional
consultancy/assistance regarding international coffee trade matters, read daily
Coffee News & Market Reports, consult the Weather,
Currencies, daily NY""C"" & LIFFE Chart & Quotes,
You, our supporters, have always been the core of YouTradeCoffee (YTC). Together we have always believed that we can make a

difference and will we make a difference, therefore we warmly invite you to be part of the Coffee Trade Revolution in order to finally empower the Coffee Growers, which are being paid less than 5% on the end price of the product they grow, and at the same time you’re helping us to continue informing you in a transparent and independent way.

""I'm sufficiently excited about it that it just became the second crowdsourced project I've ever funded.""

column1: ""The idea is simple and a little bit ingenious: If you’re going to tolerate that extra bulk in your pocket, you might as well get something for your trouble.""
""ReadyCase for iPhone 5 is the new thin Swiss Army Knife""
""This iPhone case is the type that gets handed to James Bond by Q before he heads out on a mission.""

column2: >Every contribution ships with case bodies for both the iPhone 4/4s and iPhone 5. No matter when you upgrade we've got your covered, literally...

column1: The included USB stick and Multitool can be used interchangably with either case body.

column2: >Slim Minimalist Design. We’ve crafted the ReadyCase to be highly functional, yet as slim and simple as possible.  At less than 3mm thick, your phone will still easily fit in your pocket.  Made of aerospace grade composite materials, it’s durable and slim.
>Integrated Multi-Tool. Stay prepared.  We will contact you regarding your knife color preference once we're ready to ship.
>Integrated USB Stick.  Share your files easily. 8GB or 16GB.

column1: Use the USB Stick as Multi-angle Stand. Prop up your phone in landscape or portrait, at different angles.
Integrated Headphone Clip.  Keep your headphones tangle free.
Left: iPhone 4s, Right: iPhone 5

column2: >Integrated Lens Ring. Attach a variety of lenses specifically designed to work with the iPhone. ReadyCase ships with three lenses.

column1: A macro lens for shooting extremely awesome extreme close-ups:
Taken on iPhone4s with a macro lens on ReadyCase
A fish eye lens for a massive viewing angle with a uniquely stylized look.
Taken on iPhone4s with a fisheye lens on ReadyCase
A wide angle lens for getting the right frame in particularly tight areas.
Taken on iPhone4s with a wide lens on ReadyCase
The wide angle lens also removes the annoying crop in video mode.
Frame from stock iPhone4s video
Frame from iPhone4s video with wide lens attached

We have a clear plan to cross the finish line, but part of that plan relies on you.  We have calculated that we need $15K to bring the ReadyCase to market.  Here is a breakdown of where the funds will go as well as our timeline for the project:
If you're interested in seeing the ReadyCase made and would like to receive one of the first editions, please contribute.

Can I take ReadyCase on a Plane?
With the knife still on the case, probably not.  Luckliy it's easy to remove and check with your luggage.  If you forget and the TSA confiscates it, you'll only lose the knife not the entire case, and we plan to sell replacement knives for cheap!

Where do I add money for international shipping?
When you select a contribution level, you're prompted to enter in the total contribution amount just below.  This is for people that want international shipping, or if you want to toss a few extra bucks our way just to be nice.

What if I forgot to add international shipping?
After the project is funded and we're ready to ship, we'll contact each contributor to confirm shipping details.  If you didn't add shipping when you contributed, you can add it then.

How do I select knife color?
After the project is funded and we're ready to ship, we'll contact each contributor to verify their preference.

I have an iPhone 4/4S, but might get an iPhone 5 in the near future.  I know I'll receive a case body for the iPhone 5 with my contribution, but will I need a new USB drive and Multitool?
The USB drive and Multitool are interchanable with either case body, so you will not need a second set to future proof your iPhone 4/4S ReadyCase.

More info on www.fojo.me

Hello.

Thank you for taking the time to get to know our portable photographic enlarger - Enfojer. Once it is in production, it will enable you to develop black and white photo prints straight from your phone or developed films.

Enfojer was dreamt up by the two of us Vanda Voloder and Ilija Stjepić,  as we were looking for a way to print digital photographs from a phone. Four versions later we got a fully functional prototype. During the last year, it has been tested on a daily basis and in various conditions. It performs admirably.

Be funky, save photography

Enfojer bridges almost 200 years of photographic history, from the first camera to the most recent hybrid camera phones that made photography ubiquitous. It is our hope and desire that with this little gadget we preserve the old art of photo development and help you, and you, and you rediscover the magic that happens in a darkroom.
column2: />Enfojer is an educational tool for budding photographers, as well as entry-level photo enlarger for enthusiasts. That being said, we are sure professionals will get some kicks out of a portable darkroom.

column1: Our best trick yet is printing photos a lot cheaper than with an average printer.
column2:
>For our next trick, photos printed with Enfojer can last up to 70 years.

Put on a red light.

Kit contains all you need for happy photo development. Enfojer is sturdy and it can enlarge pics from any smartphone or film up to 6x6 format. Nice people from Ilford Photo agreed to provide a steady stream of quality photo paper. We picked them and they liked us because we share love for vintage photography technology.

column1: Our kit includes a portable, battery powered red light, for those on the fly photo prints in your hotel bathroom darkroom.

Snappy photo development

Using the Enfojer is really simple. Take a photo, snap your fingers, adjust picture size, expose the paper, bath it, dry it and voila - exhibition ready prints up to 20x20 centimeters in size.

You will need some chemicals from a local photo store. We thought about bundling them as well, but international shipping of liquids is a bit complicated.
Chemicals used in a black and white photo development are not dangerous, but apply caution and read the handling instructions. Please.

Every Fojo is unique

Old school print development makes every print slightly different, due to microscopic imperfections in the silver halide coating on paper and the chemical reaction that turns parts of the coating black or grey. It means a lot of room improvise with the final outcome and improve your photos in the process.

Tech specs

Enlarger comes with a universal cradle compatible with any iOS, Android or Windows smartphone up to 141 mm x 71 mm size. It works fine, you just need to place your phone carefully in the center.

Precision inclined people can get custom made cradles for Apple iPhone 4, iPhone 4s, iPhone 5, and the new models, Samsung Galaxy S3 and Galaxy S4, HTC One and One X, Nokia Lumia 925 and Lumia 1020, Sony Xperia Z and Xperia SP and enjoy the cradle snugness to the max.

Dimensions

Enfojer
283 mm long x 260 mm wide x 408 mm tall

Tray rack with trays
286 mm long x 370 mm wide x 250 mm tall

Tray
285 long mm x 265 mm wide x 45 mm tall

Why Enfojer?

We love photography, as it once was. Smell of chemicals, red lights in small darkrooms, lines on which developed prints are drying. The moment of magic when the photo appears on the pristine white of photosensitive paper.

Now obsolete, this printing process is something romantic, beautiful and magical, worth preserving for future generations.

All we need for this little trip down the photographic history lane to be available to all, is a bit of your help.

Be a pal. Help us jumpstart Enfojer and get a bit of history repeating. Contribute what you can.

Share this with your fellow photo enthusiasts, invite friends, and foes alike - they can use the Enfojer to print photos too.

Of course, follow FOJO on Facebook or Twitter for updates.

Perks

Special thanks goes to our beloved team.

Nenad Vukušić Seba | We didn't have money for George Clooney.

Avoq | Great music by a great man.

Raško Bajraktarević | Beautiful and talented camera driver.

Risks and challenges

Of course, there are some, but in a year and a half we have been working on this, we tested several types of material, photo papers, various builds and designs, people to work with and found partners in people from Ilford Photo. We hope everything will be all right and that you get to play with your Enfojer by February 2014. That leaves us with a lot of manouvering time, in case something does not go according to production plan. No worries, we know how to handle those. We learned it in the last year and a half.

FAQ
No. Developing color prints is a lot more complicated, demanding and
chemically complex process. It is seriously toxic too, so we do not
think it should be done at home for reasons of safety and health.
2. Which chemicals should you get and where do you get them?
We recommend ILFORD MULTIGRADE DEVELOPER or PQ UNIVERSAL
in combination with ILFORD RAPID FIXER. You can get these in your local
photo equipment store or just order them online. Of course, if you can't
get Ilford, there are others. Experiment is half of the fun with
3. What lens are we using in the Enfojer?
It is a wide angle polycarbonate toy camera style meniscus lens. It
blurs the image just right so you don't see the pixels on your print.
Yeah, we tried sharper and better ones, but the results were too
4. How much room you need for a darkroom?
Any room that can be completely dark can be a darkroom. Bathrooms
tend to be perfect as they have smaller windows or none at all and
running water. You need running water (or a large bucket). Garages,
basement storage rooms…any space you can isolate from light.
You don't need a lot of space, as the Enfojer takes 283 mm x 260 mm,
trays in our rack take 290 x 370 mm, or each tray on it's own is 285 x
285 mm. So you need at least a 60 cm up to a meter of level surface.
5. What is the light source for printing out of negative films?
Your phones bright LED screen. It's enough.
6. What materials are used in Enfojer production?
Base and tray rack are made out of anodized aluminum. Enfojer
itself is mainly glass-reinforced polyamide, ultra high quality durable
plastic. Tongs and trays are made out of lighter and softer plastics, to
lower the cost of manufacture and make them more functional.
7. How long does it take to make a print, altogether?
Once you have everything setup, from phone to finished print it takes exactly 6 minutes.
8. Why do you have to use the red light?

Mostly because it would be darn difficult working in the dark. Red light is used because majority of black-and-white papers is sensitive to blue, or blue and green light. Reds do not expose the paper.
